story:
Introduction and Problem: Short Summary

Hi! My name is Joe Sicilia.  When I was 17 I was diagnosed with Muscular Dystrophy.  I'm in my 40's now and have been using a cane or crutches basically since I was first diagnosed.  The problem is that cane/crutch tips have very little texture or traction. Whenever I transition from the snow or rain outside to a smooth surface (like hardwood floors) on the inside, I find my cane/crutches tend to slip and lose traction.

  • Most of the current solutions use spikes or other technology that cannot be used indoors.
  • Most current solutions require the cane/crutch user to adjust or unscrew the traction device - which is messy and often those of us with chronic diseases like Muscular Dystrophy don't have good hand dexterity to perform these tasks.
  • The solution to this problem must be a product that can be used both indoors and outdoors, must be hands-free, and must have a lot of extra traction for more stability.

So my wife (a registered nurse) and I have created a patent-pending solution.  We have created a cane/ crutch tip that is safe for indoor/ outdoor use, hands-free, inexpensive, and creates more traction and friction surface-areas for more stability.  Together with your funding, our idea can change the lives of millions of people who use a cane or crutches in order to safely move around on a daily basis.

What We Need & What You Get


  • To start with we are asking for $5000.  This funding will help us create a marketing plan and tools as well as begin to manufacture our product on a larger scale.
  • Additionally, the funding will be used to fund a trip to a convention where I was invited to showcase my product to potential licensors and marketing professionals - this is a big opportunity to meet the necessary people to help launch my product.
  • For helping fund our product you will get in on the ground floor of this revolutionary new product as well as you may even get an opportunity to develop our logo and name our product depending on your donation.

The Impact

  • This product has the ability to drastically improve the life of someone who is crutch/ cane dependent.
  • I'm sure we all know someone who needs to use a cane/ crutch to move around on a permanent basis - our product can give them some extra freedom and confidence by having a more stable walking platform.

Risks & Challenges

We feel the risks and challenges are minimal.  While we are still developing our manufacturing partners, we do have the ability to begin manufacturing right now, although on a much lower scale.  Therefore we will be able to provide our perks and go forward with trying to find a partner with which to enter into a licensing agreement.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't afford to contribute financially you can still help by spreading the word about our product to all of your FaceBook and online friends.  Additionally, Indiegogo has tools you can use to help spread the word.

story:
Caritas Clinic:

The Caritas Clinic, which is the Latin term for charity and love, has been meeting the Denver community's growing need for acute illness treatment, chronic disease management, as well as prevention and screening services.
It serves a population of predominantly undocumented Hispanic patients and medicaid patients who are unable to obtain access to care. 
No patient is ever denied services due to the inability to pay. However, many patients are unable to afford their medications and medical supplies. 
Diabetes medications and supplies can be the most crippling. 
  • On average a glucometer cost $15-20/month. 
  • Glucometer test strips cost an additional $10-30/month. 
  • Insulin can be even more expensive and can cost up to $400 a month. 
AVERAGE total cost to patient per month = $450.00
Because of that high cost, it is estimated that 29 million people living with diabetes in the U.S. cannot afford the cost of the medication. 
My goal is to raise $2500.00 to donate to Caritas Clinic, an underserved clinic in the Denver Metro area, to assist patients with the burdening cost of monthly diabetic medication and supplies.  
  • If my goal is not achieved, all funds will STILL be provided to Caritas Clinic to assist with cost of glucometers, test strips and insulin as every dollar can make a difference. 
Currently at Caritas Clinic, we have three undocumented patients who have become dialysis dependent due to poorly controlled diabetes. Without insurance these patients must come to the emergency room every 4-5 days in complete kidney failure in order to receive dialysis. Without routine dialysis, these patients live day to day with ongoing nausea, vomiting, abdominal pain, shortness of breath and whole body swelling. If these patients were to wait too long before coming into the hospital, the end result could be fatal arrhythmia or cardiopulmonary arrest. As such, many come too soon and are turned away only to return several days later more ill. On average, these patients spend 4-8 hours on the dialysis machine, sometimes longer. They then return home without any additional support! Despite their illness, some even continue to work to pay for other medications and to help others family members with similar problems. 


IMPACT:

When diabetes goes untreated it can lead to increased hospitalization, decreased quality of life and life-threatening complications. 
  • If left untreated, patients can have problems with eyes, kidneys and destruction of peripheral nerves.
  • High blood sugar also compromises the body's defenses against bacterial infections and patients are at higher risk of serious infections requiring a higher level of care. 
  • Adults with type II diabetes are twice as likely to die of stroke or heart attack.
  • The lifetime risk of losing a limb is about 7%.

(Image: Critical limb ischemia which will require a below the knee amputation)

(Image: Undocumented immigrant on dialysis machine.)

MOST of these complications can be prevented with appropriate medications and improved blood sugar control. 

Please donate and help make a difference today!


About Me:

My name is Katie Kaput and I am an Internal Medicine resident at Exempla Saint Joseph Hospital interested in helping others care for diabetes and to prevent long term complications of diabetes.

Part of my residency training, involves treating/managing patients at Caritas Clinic. On average, I spend 4-5 hours a week educating people about chronic illness and helping them to control their disease.

I have also have much personal experience with type II diabetes, as my father is a type II diabetic and suffered a heart attack in his 50s.  


Risks & Challenges:

The biggest challenge that I will face is ensuring that patients use their glucometer, test strips and insulin. Nonadherence is often a barrier to adequate care. Education is key!

  • The cornerstone of therapy for all patients with diabetes is an individualized, self-management program. 
  • General knowledge of carbohydrates (through the help of a nutritionist), exercise based plans and an initial assessment and treatment goals will be discussed with all of the Caritas Clinic patients prior to donation of medications and supplies. 
  • Patients will be seen and evaluated every three months to evaluate for compliance with therapy, complications of illness and to ensure prompt initiation and intensification of pharmacotherapy to achieve and maintain clinical goals. 


Other Ways You Can Help:



The field of medicine is continuously evolving and everyday new therapies and treatment options become available.
Continued learning is one of the many benefits of the medical field. 
There are ample opportunities to help others learn and expand their knowledge base. 
  • Educate public. 
  • Promote screening and local health fairs. 
  • Help STOP childhood obesity.
  • Donate old glucometers and extra supplies to local clinics. 
  • Join Walk with a doc, an organization dedicated to improving health through walking. Click here to find a location near you: http://walkwithadoc.org

Thank you for your time!

story:
*VIDEO TRANSCRIPT*
"We make a product that you rub on your body for pain relief. We took some very popular ingredients in the marketplace that people are using everyday.

We took Aspirin for pain relief. We took MSM & Glucosamine for your joints. We took Arnica which is a natural homeopathic ingredient for pain relief.

And we took those ingredients and we put them in a microscopic onion. And that encapsulation is delivered through the skin into the area where you need pain relief the most. We thought about people are taking these things orally, but we wanted to provide a treatment that you could rub just on the site of pain. It doesn't smell, it has a lotion and clean consistency, and it works...."

***WATCH THE VIDEO FOR MORE, INCLUDING HOW YOUR CONTRIBUTIONS WILL BE USED***


  • MSM, Arnica, Lecithin, Aloe, Glucosamine, Green Tea, Tissue Nutrients…
  • Intensive Concentration Going Deeper Into the Muscles—Closer to the Joints
  • A Gradual Heat That Helps Keep Your Joints & Muscles “Toasty Warm”
  • Refreshing and light, just stepped out of the shower- Clean Scent


  • FlexPower is used by elite athletes including players on championship teams like the Golden State Warriors, San Antonio Spurs, US Women's National Team, Los Angeles Galaxy, Seattle Seahawks and college teams like Duke Men's Basketball and many more. 
  • People use it before activity to warm-up muscles and joints for optimal performance AND after activity for recovery and pain relief. 
  • After years of being in the locker rooms of the most competitive professional athletes in the world, we are ready to bring the performance and pain relief benefits of FlexPower to active people everywhere

 MESSAGE FROM FLEXPOWER CO-FOUNDER, RASHEEN SMITH


  • Fully rebrand our product line and bring FlexPower to many more people.
  • We have created new packaging designs for our two pain relief cream products, including original FlexPower  and new FlexPower with Arnica  for men and women. 
  • We want to produce new FlexPower tubes featuring these new designs and we want you to be a part of it!  
  • The new look and messaging is targeted to everyday consumers who want a modern solution for pain and arthritis relief, and active individuals seeking optimal performance before exercise.

We recently completed a very small production test run of 4 oz tubes in our Original formula!  With your help, we will be able to scale up and complete full production runs for each cream product in both sizes: 2 oz and 4 oz tubes for both original FlexPower and new FlexPower with Arnica for men and women.

Your contributions also enable us to launch our exclusive Indiegogo Perks featuring our new brand messaging, inspired by our athletes (see below!)


First we created a new "iconic" logo. We incorporated the power button element to achieve an identifiable symbol that reinforces the idea that FlexPower is, and should be, part of any athletes pregame preparation. In essence, FlexPower is your body's push-to-start button before or after any workout.

Next, for our new packaging, we sought to establish a clean, modern and contemporary look that was both professional and consumer friendly:


Finally, we've developed new brand messaging that we are providing to you as the cool Rewards in this campaign in return for your support.


***CLICK HERE TO CONTRIBUTE NOW***


QUICK NOTES-
- All shirts available in Men’s, Women’s and Kids sizes.
- We will email you before items are ready to ship for order details (choice of shirt, hat, tank and sizes)



You can be a big help by sharing FlexPower with your friends and family on social media. Please follow us on -- 

       Facebook, Twitter (@flexpower) and Instagram (@flexpower)

From the pro athlete to the soccer-playing son and the getting ‘er done grandma…
FlexPower is now used by the whole family for muscles & joints.

MSM, Arnica, Lecithin, Aloe, Glucosamine, Green Tea as well as other ingredients in your new tube of FlexPower act in orchestrated synergy to produce a combined pain-relieving sensation that is greater and longer-lasting than what each of them could do on their own. With FlexPower's technology these ingredients are absorbed—“injected’’—directly into your muscle and joint cells.

Pain pills vs. FlexPower: Pain pills can definitely provide relief but some people are concerned with potential side effects or their body simply cannot tolerate them.


THE STUFF OF SCIENCE FICTION, WITHOUT THE FICTION

  • How FlexPower is able to go deeper into your muscles, even closer to your joints
  • Because of the demand from pro athletes and coaches, liposome technology was used for this clever cream. Liposome technology was developed to deliver drugs directly to the cells quicker and more efficiently by using an artificial substance that is virtually identical to the material as the cell membranes in your body. It is then mixed with (coats over) medicine, making it a “liposome.”
  • Because this coating is made almost like a cell membrane, the cell in the body absorbs it easier and more efficiently, taking the enclosed medicine in with it.


FlexPower provides targeted pain relief without side effects. Our creams provide local treatment directly to the site of pain.
  • Permeation is greater with liposomal encapsulation
  • Eliminates irritation and optimizes delivery
  • Greater concentration and residence time
  • Protects encapsulated material from degradation
  • Minimizes systemic absorption



Our luxurious cream base rubs on smooth like lotion and is CLEAN-SCENTED with no medicinal odor. That's right, NO ODOR! Fresh and clean like you stepped out of the shower. 


Courtney Watson - Head ATC Los Angeles Sparks (WNBA) & Trainer for Floyd Mayweather TMT (The Money Team)
"I have been using FlexPower for many years and my athletes and clients love it. The product works and because I always recommend it to my colleagues I am very excited to see they will be attending the FWATA meeting this year.”

Jeremy Newberry - Retired NFL Pro-Bowl Center, SF, CA
"It’s the best product out there by far. We’ve had access to just about every cream you can possibly think of. You can tell by how fast it went on the counter in the training room...For professional athletes it’s not as big of a deal because we have to get out there and play regardless. But making a difference in people’s lives like my grandfather is a huge deal. He loves this stuff and swears by it. He’s out walking more and riding his bike more and doing a lot more stuff than he was having trouble doing before, just because of this product."

Joyce Hueston - Indianapolis, IN
"I’m not a sports person, just an ordinary woman of 67 years of age. I have severe muscle spasms that I believe are being brought on by my medications but I am not convincing my doctor of this. My hands, wrists, legs, ankles, back and everywhere else will spasm at one time. I grab FlexPower and put it on like body lotion with help. It will be no more than ten minutes and the spasms are gone. I would do without food if it were necessary just to have FlexPower. Please do not quit making it.”

Laura Spencer - Pro Cyclist, San Francisco, CA
"After I go for a long, hard bike ride, the gradual heat of FlexPower makes my muscles feel the recovery process in action. I love the clean scent after a day riding in the dirt!”

Julia Grice - Boulder, CO
“I came across the FlexPower table at VeloSwap in Denver and decided to give it a try since my back and knees were killing me from standing all day. I have fallen in LOVE with your product. The first time I tried it just out of the shower it truly felt like I had a heating pad on my back. What surprised me the most was how long it lasted! It’s been great for my knees on some of the steeper hiking trails and I am looking forward to using it in when I go snowshoeing this winter. My parents have arthritis and I’m excited to put FlexPower in their stocking this year so they can try it too. FlexPower back then.”

Erik Phillips - Gym Owner
“We’re always trying to find stuff that our players are comfortable using and that we know will help them. We use FlexPower during warm-ups to get the guys heated up and going. When I was with the Denver Nuggets and Phoenix Suns, we would use it with ultrasound and a combination of other modalities to get the guys ready to go for a game. We would keep it on the bench with us in case any of the guys feel that they need it during the game.”


***CLICK HERE TO CONTRIBUTE NOW***

story:
What Is the StandUp Walker?


The StandUp Walker combines the ease of a walker with an innovative stand-assist device that helps the user to easily and safely stand up.  The StandUp Walker fills the void of three primary products that nearly all mobility-challenged patients use – a Standard Walker, Toilet Safety Rails & Seat Lift Mechanism.  Ultimately it helps people who have mobility issues to get up and go from just about any seated position.  It's the perfect device for home and on the go! 

StandUp Walker Mechanism


Features


StandUp Walker's Inventor

The original concept was conceived by a Howard Liles, when he was an engineering student at MIT - this was his senior design project.  Upon graduation, Howard attended Georgia Tech for his masters in engineering.  While at Georgia Tech, his project had new urgency when his grandmother suffered a severe hip injury due to a fall at home and Howard witnessed the challenges she faced with getting up to use a walker.  

Howard engaged the Mobility Rehabilitation Engineering Research Center (mobilityRERC) and Dr. Stephen Sprigle at Georgia Tech and received a grant from the National Institute on Disability, Independent Living and Rehabilitation Research (NIDILRR). 

Highlights

We are launching StandUp Walker and making it available first on Indiegogo:

  • Be one of the first to own a StandUp Walker! 
  • Or donate to the Falling Forward Foundation
  • StandUp Walker will sell for $249 each (20% discount during campaign)
  • Free shipping within the continental United States

story_txt:
What Is the StandUp Walker?
 

The StandUp Walker combines the ease of a walker with an innovative stand-assist device that helps the user to easily and safely stand up.  The StandUp Walker fills the void of
three primary products that nearly all mobility-challenged patients use – a
Standard Walker, Toilet Safety Rails & Seat Lift Mechanism.  Ultimately it helps people who have mobility issues to get up and go from just about any seated position.  It's the perfect device for home and on the go!  


StandUp Walker Mechanism


Features


StandUp Walker's Inventor
The original concept was conceived by a Howard Liles, when he was an engineering student at MIT - this was his senior design project.  Upon graduation, Howard attended Georgia Tech for his masters in engineering.  While at Georgia Tech, his project had new urgency when his grandmother suffered a severe hip injury due to a fall at home and Howard witnessed the challenges she faced with getting up to use a walker.  


Howard engaged the Mobility Rehabilitation Engineering Research Center (mobilityRERC) and Dr. Stephen Sprigle at Georgia Tech and received a grant from the National Institute on Disability, Independent Living and Rehabilitation Research (NIDILRR). 


Highlights
We are launching StandUp Walker and making it available first on Indiegogo:  Be one of the first to own a StandUp Walker! 
Or donate to the Falling Forward Foundation
StandUp Walker will sell for $249 each (20% discount during campaign)

Free shipping within the continental United States

Colors available: reflex blue, emerald green, burgundy red. We will follow up with an email to get your color selection!
 The first StandUp Walkers ordered before March 20, 2016 will be shipped in May 2016

story:
I am no longer able to climb the stairs in the home I am living in. Most of my time is spent in this area and which is below the main floor. I have a guard rail that helps me climb the stairway but there are occasions where I have fallen and injured my knees. I have not as of this time have fallen down the steps but I have had times when I needed to climb the stairs on my hands and knees which is a situation where it is dangerous and life threatening to keep trying to climb all of the stairs on my hands and knees.

My present age is seventy five years old and in the month of September I will be seventy six years old. This makes my ability to continue in my future more impossible than it is at this time.

The funding I am requesting here will allow me and my granddaughter to buy a home that does not have a basement. And if we cannot find a home that will fill this need we can add a chairlift to the new home. At this time we are renting our home so we cannot install a chairlift system in this home. We presently are paying a rental cost of $1500.00. Your contributions will provide us enough money to buy us a house that will better fit our needs at this time. The rent we pay is paid partly from my income which is social security income funds of just a little bit above $1300.00 per month of which $600.00 of this is my share of the rent. My granddaughter pays her part which is $600.00. And she pays all of the utility bills and most of the groceries for the household. I cannot use any of my income for this part because I have bills and credit card debts to pay which I cannot pay at this time. A look at my credit report shows that I have the sum of $23,000.00. And other debts that are not on my credit report are found to be $18000.00 which I cannot pay with my income that is left after my rent is paid. So we are developing this fundraiser to close out all our personal debts.

In addition to all my debts it is impossible for me and my granddaughter to buy a new home that is ours to live in. We have looked at some options and the general cost of homes that will fit our needs is asking about $195.000.00 for a good home. My goals are to buy this house and get the home upgraded and improved which would cost about an additional $65000.00 estimate. The sum total will be $301,000.00. And we will need to add an additional amount to cover the taxes and the cost of moving which will be about another $10,000.00 since I am not in a condition enough to do the movement myself and my granddaughter is busy with her job so she cannot get help with this task. This will bring the total we need up to about $311000.00.

Before we can buy a house we will have to be able to buy our home without a mortgage on the home. Most mortgages are set up for 30 years and at my age we will not qualify for a home using a mortgage. So our only option is to get enough funding through donations to pay the home off completely. But buying a new home without a mortgage would cause the state tax commission require us to pay the property taxes when we move in. any donations you make will produce a receipt from our PayPal account which will allow you to save money when you file your income taxes.

Your donations are of value to us because we are among the elderly and we do not want to live in a rest home for the elderly. My granddaughter wants to assist me and live with me until my time to pass on comes. Then she can live in the home until she can no longer live there. She has an immune disease that may cause her to pass away before I do. And we have a grandchild that is at this time the age of 19 years old. He will be given the home when we both are deceased. Her age at this time is 39 years old and she has a lot of doctor bills to pay her which cost her lot of her income. Her job does provide her with an insurance program for her illness but there are a lot of copay costs which limits her income until they can find a way to cure her illness. If she does pass away before I do we can hire a person to assist me for the remainder of my life.

Without the full funding we are asking for through your donations we may not be able to hire the help we might need in our future. We realize that there will be a lot of readers that will see this fundraising event and would like to help but their income will not allow them to make a donation.   And the program has tools that will show you how to locate others that my want to donate to our cause.       

Buying a home at my age can have a lot of obstacles to overcome. An example is listed below;

The homes available may not be suitable for our needs

We like to have a garden and we want enough property behind the home for our vegetable gardens.

If we find a home that will suit our needs and it has a stairway attached to it we will need to add from one to two chairlifts to allow us to go up these stairways

The house we are renting at this time will not allow us to install such stair lifts.

We will need a large garage to house our vehicles and we have one vehicle that needs some repairs.

Knowing these challenges will help you decide how much you want to donate to our cause. And facing another birthday that will probably cause my problem to be even more serious that it is now and I will have to work hard to make then home work.

We realize that there will be a lot of readers that will see this fundraising event and would like to help but their income will not allow them to make a donation. Ways you can help is to post a comment about this fundraising event on your Facebook, Twitter or LinkedIn system and direct them to this fundraiser using the link we provide which is our shortened URL at http://igg.me/at/homefunding

story:
Press Report


KOSHIRO is specialized in theresearch and development work of intelligent wearing and mobile health products.
[Sleep Master] Intelligent Sleep head - pad, which is used together with mobile phone APP, is a kind of product integrating software&hardware systems.
Although we have put our enormous enthusiasm for designing this product, we know deeply that a good product can not be made overnight, rather, it is users’ participation and interaction that make her be constantly improved.Therefore, in order to use ideal products, you can join in advance the experience of new products and improvement process. At the same time, you have the power to “pre-listen”, and receive preferential price.
Your participation will not only be beneficial to us, but also to you and millions of people who need to improve sleeping quality.

FAQ

1. How does [Sleep Master]do?

[Sleep Master] belongs to the scope of music therapy, its mechanism is not only to be able to ease the psychological pressure and causes the body to relax, more important is that through the unique BBT (Binaural Beats Technology) ,it can act directly on the control center to promote brain wave frequency conversion, induce the human body quickly into deep sleep. Research found that 30 minutes of θ wave state can reduce up to four hours of sleep needs, equivalent to 4 hours of normal sleep.

2.EEG and the brain’s state?

EEG(Electroencephalography) technology is used to measure brain’s electrical vibrations from the suface of the scalp.The resulting EEG pattern will contain frequency elements mainly below 30Hz.The frequencies are categorized into four states as follows:

  • Beta-14Hz-30Hz-Highly alert and focused

  • Alpha-8Hz-14Hz-Relaxed but alert

  • Theta-4Hz-8Hz-Drowsiness(also first stage of sleep)

  • Delta-0.5Hz-4Hz-Deep sleep

  The dominant frequency in the EEG pattern determines what shall be called the current state of the brain.If the amplitude of the alpha range frequencies is highest,then the brain is said to be in the alpha stage .Note,that other frequencies still exist and it is impossible to give any “exact frequency your brain is operating on”.

3. Entraining the brain to a desired state

  If external stimulus is applied to the brain, it becomes possible to entrain the brain frequency from one stage to another. For example, if a person is in beta stage (highly alert) and a stimulus of 10Hz is applied to his/her brain for some time,the brain frequency is likely to change towards the applied stimulus. The effect will be relaxing to the person. This phenomenon is also called frequency following response. When the brain’s state is close to the applied stimulus,entrainment works more efficiently. Thus,when doing a sweep from one frequency to another,the starting frequency should be as close to your current brain state as possible. The sweep speed should be such that your brain’s state changes steadily with it,so that the difference never gets very large. In practice, it is difficult to determine your brain state without extra equipment(like EEG devices).However,you can quite safely assume that during the day your brain is in the beta stage(about 20Hz) and you can start the sweep from there.If you are already somewhat relaxed,you can use a start frequency of 15Hz or a few Hz lower.

4. Stimulating the brain with binaural beat frequencies

The easiest way of applying stimulus to the brain is via ears.Other senses could be used as well,and vision is actually used quite often(often in addition to hearing).However,humans cannot hear sounds low enough to be useful for brain stimulation,so special techniques must be used.One such special technique used is called binaural beats.

  If the left ear is presented with a steady tone of 500Hz and the right ear a steady tone of 510Hz,these two tones combine in the brain.The difference,10Hz,is perceived by the brain and is a very effective stimulus for brainwave entrainment.This 10Hz is formed entirely by the brain.When using stereo headphones,the left and right sounds do not mix together until in your brain.The frequency difference,when perceived by brain this way,is called a binaural beat.

5. How about BBT&BBT products?

Binaural beat technology (BBT) products are sold internationally as personal development and health improvement tools. Producers suggest benefit from regular listening to binaural beats including reduced stress and anxiety, and increased focus, concentration, motivation, confidence, and depth in meditation. Binaural beats are auditory brainstem responses that originate in the superior olivary nucleus as a result of different frequency auditory stimuli provided to each ear. Listeners to binaural beat "hear" a beat at a frequency equal to the difference between the frequencies of the applied tones.

6. Effectiveness of binaural beats

• Reduce stress

  • Achieve deep relaxation

  • Enhance Creativity

  • Improve motivation

  • Quit smoking

  • Lose weight

  • Overcome depression and anxiety

  • Alleviate pain

  • Increase self confidence

  • Eliminate unwanted habits

  • Accelerate energy

  • Improve Sleep

  • Practice meditation... and many more

story:
Solve the big "elephant in the room" of health care.

Chronic pain makes us miserable while costing our society over $500 billion in health care and lost work. It involves about 25% of the cost of health care, and almost 5% of the total U.S. gross domestic product. The People’s Campaign for Preventing Chronic Pain is helping solve this problem with innovative personalized on-line Toolkits for training people on preventing and reducing chronic pain and, in the process, transform health care for everyone. If you help us, you will be the force that changes health care forever.  Let us explain.

How can you help?

You can help by encouraging everyone to get their own personalized Training Toolkits to learn how to prevent and reduce chronic pain. The funds will then to be used to support research, education, and advocacy on preventing chronic pain.  You can help a friend, a family member, a colleague, a health professional, or even yourself through the Toolkit. Spread the word!

What do people say about the training?

93% of participants believed the training changed their life. 85% of health professionals believed it changed their care of patients. Read some comments.

What's in a Toolkit?

This word chart illustrates some of the 7 realms concepts that are included within the training sessions of each toolkit. The training is personalized to each individual through an assessment to find out "who are you?", establish personal goals on "who do you want to be?", and self-paced training videos to "be the person you want to be" in preventing chronic pain.  Training videos are evidence-based, informative, creative, and experiential. The training is about you!

Why use crowd-funding to change health care?

It is true that our current health care system is fragmented and inflexible since health systems, health plans, and reimbursements often dictate treatments and thus, little training is offered to patients. Health care can become more health-oriented when people demand it. That's why this is the People's Campaign is on crowd-funding site. You become the force of change!

Why is chronic pain such a problem?

Whether it is back pain, neck pain, headache, facial pain, or others, the personal impact of chronic pain in terms of suffering, loss of function, depression, addiction, loss of work, conflict, and other consequences is incalculable. Since we all have pain conditions at some point in our lives, you need to know how to prevent chronic pain. So, please keep reading!

Nobody teaches us how to prevent chronic pain.

We spend billions of dollars on amazing advances in pharmaceuticals, devices, surgeries, and other innovative treatments for pain conditions, yet often fail to deliver long-term successful relief primarily due to the lack of engaging, empowering, and educating patients in simple self-management strategies to reduce risk factors and enhance protective factors that will prevent chronic pain. You can change this!

Really? Can we actually change health care?

Yes, we can! Chronic pain care can be dramatically improved when self-management training is added to the treatments provided. Doing this will transform the health care system from our current passive doctor-centered care to patient-centered transformative care.

With your help, this campaign will change it.

The Training Toolkit makes it easy for individuals, health professionals, health plans, and employers to learn how to prevent chronic pain. On-line training is less expensive, more effective, and can be used in any clinic, work, or home setting. In one year, we trained 30,000 people from 178 different countries in preventing chronic pain through on-line training (www.coursera.org/course/chronicpain). Technology is amazing!

Can health professionals help?

Definitely! Nearly 2/3rds of all visits to health professionals are for pain conditions.  So, we developed a special toolkit for health professionals so they can implement patient-centered transformative care  by adding patient self-management training to their treatment. This makes it easy to improve care and patient outcomes within any clinic setting.  Get a toolkit and try it!

What can employers and health plans do?

A lot!  We also developed a special toolkit for employers to help their employees and members prevent chronic pain. It is easy to implement in the workplace or through your health plan. The Toolkits have everything including an implementation plan, staff training, marketing, and resources for employees.  Get a toolkit and try it!

A Win-Win-Win!

The goal of this campaign is to create a win-win-win for people, health professionals, and employers. Preventing chronic pain can improve our health and well-being while at the same time improve the quality and lower the cost of health care and work loss. Why NOT do this?

What are the cost savings?

The biggest benefit to the toolkit is the relief of knowing how to prevent chronic pain. However, the campaign can also help the bottom line for individuals, health plans, employers, and health professionals. Based on research, the return on investment is at least 3 to 1. This is a no brainer!

What are the goals of the campaign?

What are the next steps?

We hope you are still with us. In the 21st century, we can transplant organs, watch the body function, and cure many diseases. Now, with technology-driven training, we can all learn how to prevent chronic pain too. Just add the person.  You!

Attend the Conference October 9-10, 2015!

The 2-day Treating and Preventing Chronic Pain Conference will be held on October 9-10, 2015 in Arlington, Virginia. The Conference sponsored by the National Fibromyalgia and Chronic Pain Association and the International MYOPAIN Society includes dynamic presentations and workshops on a host of topics from prevention to successful management of chronic pain. Register for the Conference here!

Get your PERK!

Individual Toolkit. For $100 (half price for Indiegogoers), you can participate in the personalized on-line assessment and training program for preventing chronic pain. And, provide us feedback! You will also receive a letter of appreciation, a certificate that authenticates your important role in the transformative health care revolution, and can be part of the Preventing Chronic Pain Network with access to newsletters, information, tools, and resources for preventing chronic pain.

Health Professional Tool Kit.  For $1,000, you'll bring transformative care and preventing chronic pain to 10 patients. Consultation will be provided to the clinic staff to implement transformative care in preventing chronic pain. This includes training sessions of clinical staff and health professionals, on-line patient assessment and training program,  reimbursement protocols, patient materials and handouts, media releases, and others. Travel expenses not included. You will also receive a letter of appreciation, a certificate that authenticates your important role in the transformative health care revolution, and can be part of the Preventing Chronic Pain Network with access to information, tools, and resources for preventing chronic pain. 

Employer Tool Kit.  At $1,000, you'll implement a program for preventing chronic pain for 10 employees or health plan members. Each Employer Toolkit includes staff training seminar for implementation, secure on-line personal assessments for each employee or member, on-line self-management assessment and training program, and access to pain preventing tools for employees. You will also receive a letter of appreciation, a certificate that authenticates your important role in the transformative health care revolution, and can become part of the Preventing Chronic Pain Network with access to information, tools, and resources for preventing chronic pain.

Who are we?

The Advisory Board of the People's Campaign for Preventing Chronic Pain includes the following individuals and the International Myopain Society, the National Fibromyalgia and Chronic Pain Association, and the Osteoarthritis Action Alliance. We all want to prevent chronic pain and improve our health care system. As the Campaign grows, we hope many others will contributing to this effort.

Health care can become more health-oriented when people demand it. That's why this is the People's Campaign is on crowd-funding site. You become the force of change!
Why is chronic pain such a problem?
Whether it is back pain,
neck pain, headache, facial pain, or others, the personal impact of chronic pain in terms of suffering, loss of function, depression, addiction, loss of work, conflict, and other consequences is incalculable. Since we all have pain conditions
at some point in our lives, you need to know how to prevent chronic pain. So, please keep reading!Nobody teaches us how to prevent chronic pain. 
We spend billions of dollars
on amazing advances in pharmaceuticals, devices, surgeries, and other innovative
treatments for pain conditions, yet often fail to deliver long-term successful
relief primarily due to the lack of engaging, empowering, and educating
patients in simple self-management strategies to reduce risk factors and enhance
protective factors that will prevent chronic pain. You can change this! 
Really? Can we actually change health
care? Yes,
we can! Chronic pain care can be dramatically improved
when self-management training is added to the treatments provided. Doing this will transform the health care system from our current passive
doctor-centered care to patient-centered transformative care.
With your help, this campaign will change it. 
The Training Toolkit makes it easy for individuals, health
professionals, health plans, and employers to learn how to prevent chronic pain. On-line training is less expensive, more
effective, and can be used in any clinic, work, or home setting. In one year, we trained 30,000
people from 178 different countries in preventing chronic pain through on-line training (www.coursera.org/course/chronicpain). Technology is amazing! Can health
professionals help? 
Definitely! Nearly 2/3rds of
all visits to health professionals are for pain conditions.  So, we developed a special toolkit for health professionals so they can implement patient-centered transformative care  by adding patient self-management training to their treatment. This makes it easy to improve care and patient outcomes within any clinic setting.  Get a toolkit and try it!
What can employers and health
plans do? 
A lot!  We also developed a special toolkit for employers to help their employees and members prevent chronic pain. It is easy to implement in the workplace or through your health plan. The Toolkits have everything including an implementation plan, staff training, marketing, and resources for employees.  Get a toolkit and try it!
A Win-Win-Win!
The goal of this campaign is
to create a win-win-win for people, health professionals, and employers. Preventing
chronic pain can improve our health and well-being while at the same
time improve the quality and lower the cost of health care and work loss. Why NOT do this?What are the cost savings?
The biggest benefit to the toolkit is the relief of knowing
how to prevent chronic pain. However, the campaign can also help
the bottom line for individuals, health plans, employers, and health professionals. Based on
research, the return on investment is at least 3 to 1. This is a
no brainer! What are the goals of the campaign?
What are the next steps? 
We hope you are still with us. In the 21st
century, we can transplant organs, watch the body function,
and cure many diseases. Now, with technology-driven training, we can all learn
how to prevent chronic pain too. Just add the person.  You! 

Attend the Conference October 9-10, 2015!The 2-day Treating and Preventing Chronic Pain Conference will be held on October 9-10, 2015 in Arlington, Virginia. The Conference sponsored by the National Fibromyalgia and Chronic Pain Association and the International MYOPAIN Society includes dynamic presentations and workshops on a host of topics from prevention to successful management of chronic pain. Register for the Conference here!

Get your PERK!

Individual Toolkit. For $100 (half price for
Indiegogoers), you can participate in the personalized on-line assessment and training program for
preventing chronic pain. And, provide us feedback! You will also receive a letter of appreciation, a
certificate that authenticates your important role in the transformative health
care revolution, and can be part of the Preventing Chronic Pain Network with
access to newsletters, information, tools, and resources for preventing chronic pain. Health Professional Tool Kit.  For $1,000, you'll bring transformative care and preventing chronic
pain to 10 patients. Consultation will be provided to the clinic staff to
implement transformative care in preventing chronic pain. This includes training sessions of clinical staff and health professionals, on-line patient assessment and training program,  reimbursement protocols, patient materials and handouts, media releases, and others. Travel expenses not included. You will also receive a letter of appreciation, a
certificate that authenticates your important role in the transformative health
care revolution, and can be part of the Preventing Chronic Pain Network with
access to information, tools, and resources for preventing chronic pain. 
Employer Tool Kit.  At $1,000, you'll implement a
program for preventing chronic pain for 10 employees or
health plan members. Each Employer Toolkit includes staff training seminar for
implementation, secure on-line personal assessments for each employee or member,
on-line self-management assessment and training program, and access to pain preventing tools for employees. You will also receive a letter of appreciation, a
certificate that authenticates your important role in the transformative health
care revolution, and can become part of the Preventing Chronic Pain Network with
access to information, tools, and resources for preventing chronic pain. 
Who are we?
The Advisory Board of the People's Campaign for Preventing Chronic Pain includes the following individuals and the International Myopain Society, the National Fibromyalgia and Chronic Pain Association, and the Osteoarthritis Action Alliance. We all want to prevent chronic pain and improve our health care system. As the Campaign grows, we hope many others will contributing to this effort.

story:
Hello,

My name is Vladimir Dimitrov and I am an owner of the invention. I am working on this project for years and I shall be glad to present the results to you. As you will see the device ignites directly salty (sea) water using some energy to this purpose, let say as much as necessary for the operation of two electric bulbs.
The flame coming out of the water reaches temperature of 5000 C and can be used for cutting, welding and heating.
We can turn a dream into reality together, namely use the sea water as ecologically clean fuel.



How it works?

This is a new method for super-fast dissolution of the water. The hydrogen is liberated at the tip of voltaic arc with negative potential and it is ignited at the moment of its generation.



Specification WATBURN 250

Power Source - Electricity  and water
Rated Voltage - 110/220v
Frequency - 50HZ
Dimensions box- 20*12.5*8cm
Weight - 0.9kg
Color - black and white
Usage - multifunctional
Power - 250W
Temperature flame-to~5000°C

Length of flame-2 iches (50mm)



The water flame and the fuels.

All fuel types : benzine, gas, butane, propane, natural gas, naphtha have constant melting and burning temperatures. The water flame reaches different temperature when in contact with different materials. The explanation of this mysterious behavior of the flame is the interaction of the atoms on a quantum basis. The different materials – glass, metal, fluids have different atomic structure. Every material will be converted into fluid or gas state when it reaches its own phase change temperature. The flame has different temperature which depends on the type of material with which it interacts.



Practical application

The flame can weld glass, quartz, cast iron, copper, aluminum. The materials are heated so quickly that the heat does not have a time to dissolve. The small flame can be used for precise operations.

Melting and fusing of materials

The flame generated by the device allows to melt glass and cast it around other materials or even fuse with them. For instance we can weld metal and ceramics. This is possible because every one of the materials reaches its own melting temperature without overrunning it. This is a phenomenal feature of the flame.

I started testing the prototype.

burning salt water in a small cup of coffee-Dimitrov laboratory






Heating

Materials which have higher melting temperature are heated much faster by the flame.
The device can be used also for:
-neutralization of nuclear and toxic waste
-heating
-treatment of surfaces
The surfaces treated with the flame acquire better quality.


What is the ecologial and economic interest?

The device allows for resolution of three major global issues:
- exhaustion of fuel resources
- pollution of the natural environment
- reduction of energy prices
The most essential benefit of the device is that we can produce this flame everywhere  where we need it and at very low price because the basic resources for this production are electric energy and water.
All issues related to the storage and loses due to escape of the gas cease to exist. The flame generated by the device is useful both for heating various substances  and as a source of clean energy, capable to substitute all types of fossil fuels



Who we are?


We are small team consisting of an engineer-inventor – Vladimir Dimitrov and a software developer – Emil Lazarov. We work for years in the field of free energy. We already have a working prototype and we hope that with your support we can bring this invention to the market at really affordable price. The funding we need is necessary to make the device more compact, economic efficient and safe.


What's Nexт

Your support on our campaign will help us to:

Completion of the prototype and production....

 




  • Order materials
  • Assemble the product
  • Quality test and inspection
  • Adding a system for regulating the flame
  • Design, produce and manufacture the packaging
  • Shipping to our warehouse
  • Design of new more powerful version  WATERBURN500 power-500w Length of flame 7 inches...

We are optimistic about shipping out WATERBURN250 the first weeks of August.




Special thanks

Valentin Vekov

juli_kolev

ILIAN DOBREV

Ivan Zlatev

plamen.vassilev

Desimira Marinova

Krumov_i

Ivan V.(nizo)

pr.p.monova
Todor Dimitrov,
Mike De
Michela Jones
Don Thomas
Jamil,Sofia,
Tom,Gabriel
d. m.   
Chris Olenik   
Eli Shrira   
plamen.vassilev   
Marcelo Karlsson   
Aviador Company
Roger J
Martin G

Official Sponsors

www.bonita.bg
www.el-otoplenie.com 
www.extrazabania.com
www.extrazabasein.com 
www.gutto.bg




Other Ways You Can Help


If you do not need a WATBURN now, but you do love our idea, please support us through sharing our WATBURN campaign to your social media or refer WATBURN to people around you.

Благодаря на всички за подкрепата Thank you all, who supported me.

Contact

dimitrovdevice@abv.bg

story:
Short Summary

Dallas, Texas.   May 18, 2015:  First annual golf tournament at Firewheel Golf Park (www.golffirewheel.com) at 600 West Campbell Road, Garland, TX sponsored by Operation Care International.  Registration and golf range starting at 8:00am.  Tee time at 9:00am.

What We Need & What You Get

Shotgun start, best ball golf tournament for 144 golfers and corporate sponsors.  Our goal is to raise $100,000 or more in order to deliver supplies to meet the needs of 5,000 children in the Amazon region of Brazil.  Participants will receive breakfast and lunch.  Lunch will include an awards ceremony.  Each golfer will receive a goodie bag, and participate in contests for prizes, including a $50,000 shootout.

The Impact

Operation Care International exists to glorify God and serve the needs of impoverished children and the homeless for over 10 years now.  Proceeds from the event will provide life-transforming benefits to 5,000 children in the Amazon region by sharing the love of Jesus, providing food, backpacks, school supplies, socks, shoes, and t-shirts. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Non-golfers can support this mission also in three ways.  First, by a copy of the new book from founder, Susie Jennings, "31 Days of Mountaintop Miracles".  Second, buy a voucher for $1000 worth of restaurant coupons.  Third, sign up for the non-golfers "Tips and Secrets Clinic" conducted by a course professional.

story:
Hello all, My name is Steven Covington. I am a martial artist, personal trainer and, health and fitness fanatic. Since the 8th grade, I've always wanted to teach, even though I didn't know exactly what I wanted to teach. Once I started martial arts, I knew that I wanted to practice for the rest of my life. Through martial arts I became a kick-boxer, boxer, and finally made my way to mixed martial arts. It was through my passion with combat sports that I began taking interest and learning more about health and fitness. That's when I knew that I wanted to become a health and fitness professional and use that passion to help make a positive impact on the lives of others, which I can honestly say without first realizing it, I've been doing just that.


I am a HUGE superhero fan. I think of them as more than just entertainment, I think of them as inspiration to aspire to. As such, its always been my goal to be a real life superhero and find a way to give back to the world. The only way I know I can do that is through my passion of martial arts and health and fitness. My dream and goal for many years has been to open my own gym and use it to help make a difference in the community. I want my gym to be the place people can go to just get away from the stress of the world or where kids (or adults) can come find and learn discipline to focus on becoming the best person they can possibly become.

I've been voted most likely to succeed in high school. Friends and strangers alike have said that I inspired them when all I was doing was not giving up on what I believed. I've struggled through martial arts, combat sports, being jobless and even homeless at a point. I want to be able to be that "hero" I and many others believe I can be.

Reaching this goal will mean that years of hard work, practice, and struggles, can be used to give back to the community the best way I know how. Through health, fitness and, martial arts.

What I will need:


After doing calculations on how much each piece of equipment cost(to own), the estimated costs of rent, electric, insurance, advertisements, phone, etc., I would need about 45,000 dollars just to open a location and own all the equipment. My best friend is also a personal trainer and we would be running the business together. The extra 5,000 dollars would be for any emergencies or slow months we may have. 

Besides the basic membership options, I plan to have an advanced martial arts program and special discounts for students with a valid school ID of any type of school. I'd also like to at some point start a daycare or after school program once the gym is able to maintain itself. I will also offer affordable personal training, nutrition counseling and, family membership options.

This is my life goal and even if I don't reach the monetary goal, whatever I do receive or any extra will be put in an interest baring savings account so that my dream will one day become a reality.

The Impact:

I live in America and one of the biggest problems (among many) we face is obesity and other illnesses that can be reduced through a healthy lifestyle. Many of the conditions brought on by illnesses and conditions from lack of health or fitness factors are considered chronic illnesses. Leading a healthy lifestyle by joining a gym such as the one I plan to create can help make people happier and more productive. It can give people an outlet for stress even stop kids from turning to a life of crime. Studies have shown that chronic health conditions indirectly take an effect on the economy, so encouraging and helping people become healthier will even help boost the economy.

I've been a personal trainer for three years and have seen a lot of people become happier and healthier little by little each day. I've watched kids come in excited to tell how they've stood up to bullies without having to turn to violence or running away. A man who has become a good friend of mine was on the verge of leaving a gym I work at when we had a fitness challenge. His wife made him enter and asked myself and other trainers to push him. Not only did he lose 31 pounds in 3 months, but he won the competition and has become happier and more motivated to get to the gym almost daily.

I also plan to make it a place for the holidays. I want to have thanksgiving dinners and the such for everyone who doesn't have a family, just doesn't want to cook, or just wants to eat.

Risks & Challenges

One of the biggest risk with opening a gym is just getting people to sign up. Even after signing up no matter how affordable a gym may be, people do have other obligations in life that may prevent them from being able to pay on time or at all. I am able to understand what it's like to be in the position to not be able to afford something or to not be able to pay on time. I know from being in a gym that certain months will be busier than others and that people may have to cancel. 

I plan to solve these problems by being affordable number one, but also I plan to work with people and find the best way to adjust so that I can still make a profit, but still keep them as a member. If I have to make a special deal that isn't going to cost the business more than I will be willing to do so. 

Another plan I have is to have personal trainers who are independent contractors. Meaning they would make their own prices and train as many or few clients as they desire or could but, they would have to pay a small monthly fee in order to train clients at the gym. This would be a great way to keep the gym from needing to pay extra for employees while still gaining money and allowing members to have a variety of unique trainers to fit each of of their unique personalities and training needs.

Other Ways You Can Help

Maybe you like my plan but cannot afford to make a contribution? Maybe you have fitness gear that you want to donate? Maybe you network with others who can?

I'm asking for help and I will only turn it down from illegal means so, if you are able to help in any way, shape or, form, please do so. Even if the biggest thing you can do would be to share this on social media that may be all it takes for someone who may be able to do a little more to do just that.

story:
Short Summary
Africans today are more interested in getting fit than ever before. In this age of information, we now know that preventable illnesses such as diabetes, high blood pressure, and obesity - which have claimed thousands of lives - can be combatted by exercise and a healthy lifestyle. Yet with the everyday stresses of life, it can be hard to find the motivation to go to the gym.

My name is Ada, and I am a certified fitness instructor based in Washington DC. My passion is to revolutionize the face of fitness back home - to transform working out from a grueling task to an enjoyable experience. AdaAri Fitness combines the most effective exercises with the most popular Afrojams, and features weekly exercise routines on YouTube. Africans on the continent and in the diaspora instantly connected with this fun-yet- effective exercise program, as they were able to identify with sounds that inspired them to move. These workouts have been a huge hit in Washington DC and online, and this spring,the Nigerian Ambassador to the US commissioned us to conduct a #GetFitwithAdaAri workout at the embassy.

My dream is to bring this unique exercise back home. On October 10, I will be bringing the #GetFitwithAdaAri phenomenon to Nigeria. This free event will bring hundreds together in a morning of energy, exercise, and culture all fueled by our music. #GetFit - Lagos will also feature presentation on the important role exercise plays on living a health life. Attendees will be motivated and properly equipped with the right tools to improve the quality of their lives through exercise.

What We Need
Financial support of any amount will go a long way! It will help to cover:

Event space in Lagos, Nigeria
Refreshments - Water, fruits
Take-home fitness items for each attendee
Set up and clean up staff
Visas/vaccination
Security
Roundtrip airfare and lodging for the AdaAri Fitness team from Washington DC to Lagos (4 adults)


The Impact
Exercise has the power to change lives for the better. We want to empower the masses and improve health at the front end - preventing diseases from happening so that we do not have to spend tons of money to cure them. And we want everyone to have a blast while doing so.

Risks & Challenges
We already have all the groundwork laid out. We have identified a location and have teams on ground to begin set up and marketing. Thousands of AdaAri social media followers are already requesting a live workout session in Lagos - so the excitement is there. The biggest challenge will be raising the funds. If we are unable to raise the total amount required, we will scale back on the gifts that we are providing the attendees, and require each attendee to pay the bare minimum required to cover the costs for the day. The AdaAri Fitness team is also ready to stay with friends and family during the trip to cut down on lodging expenses.

Other Ways You Can Help
Please help us get the word out and make some noise about this campaign. Spread the news by sharing this with you friends/family/social media network.
story_txt: Short SummaryAfricans today are more interested in getting fit than ever before. In this age of information, we now know that preventable illnesses such as diabetes, high blood pressure, and obesity - which have claimed thousands of lives - can be combatted by exercise and a healthy lifestyle. Yet with the everyday stresses of life, it can be hard to find the motivation to go to the gym. My name is Ada, and I am a certified fitness instructor based in Washington DC. My passion is to revolutionize the face of fitness back home - to transform working out from a grueling task to an enjoyable experience. AdaAri Fitness combines the most effective exercises with the most popular Afrojams, and features weekly exercise routines on YouTube. Africans on the continent and in the diaspora instantly connected with this fun-yet- effective exercise program, as they were able to identify with sounds that inspired them to move. These workouts have been a huge hit in Washington DC and online, and this spring,the Nigerian Ambassador to the US commissioned us to conduct a #GetFitwithAdaAri workout at the embassy. My dream is to bring this unique exercise back home. On October 10, I will be bringing the #GetFitwithAdaAri phenomenon to Nigeria. This free event will bring hundreds together in a morning of energy, exercise, and culture all fueled by our music. #GetFit - Lagos will also feature presentation on the important role exercise plays on living a health life. Attendees will be motivated and properly equipped with the right tools to improve the quality of their lives through exercise.What We NeedFinancial support of any amount will go a long way! It will help to cover:Event space in Lagos, NigeriaRefreshments - Water, fruitsTake-home fitness items for each attendeeSet up and clean up staffVisas/vaccinationSecurityRoundtrip airfare and lodging for the AdaAri Fitness team from Washington DC to Lagos (4 adults)The ImpactExercise has the power to change lives for the better. We want to empower the masses and improve health at the front end - preventing diseases from happening so that we do not have to spend tons of money to cure them. And we want everyone to have a blast while doing so. Risks & ChallengesWe already have all the groundwork laid out. We have identified a location and have teams on ground to begin set up and marketing. Thousands of AdaAri social media followers are already requesting a live workout session in Lagos - so the excitement is there. The biggest challenge will be raising the funds. If we are unable to raise the total amount required, we will scale back on the gifts that we are providing the attendees, and require each attendee to pay the bare minimum required to cover the costs for the day. The AdaAri Fitness team is also ready to stay with friends and family during the trip to cut down on lodging expenses. Other Ways You Can HelpPlease help us get the word out and make some noise about this campaign. Spread the news by sharing this with you friends/family/social media network.

story:
More Than Just Information

                      


Smart watches, heart rate monitors, sleep trackers - if you're anything like me and the millions of other people who invest in these gadgets, you probably find bioelectrical monitoring quite fascinating.

The problem is, once you are familiar with your blood pressure patterns, heart rate, REM sleep durations, average number of steps etc etc etc, what do you DO with that information?

Sure, knowing your baseline makes it easier to set goals and targets... but HOW are you going to achieve them? Do you find yourself resolving to eat better, exercise more, go to bed earlier - only to find yourself back in your old habits a short time later?

This is because nobody ever taught you how to take charge of your CHARGE - your bioelectricity, or how nervous sytem activity controls not only your movement and your body's functioning, but also your mental and emotional processing.

Until recently very little was understood about how our brain activity integrates with our physical system to determine our overall level of well-being. We now know more than ever about the complexities of the nervous system and how bioelectricity can be harnessed to elevate our energy beyond any level we have experienced before.

So, would you like to invest in actually improving your health, rather than just measuring it? And if you could share the secrets of your new-found energy with others, would you help them too?



About Us

Smith and Wellness are a small Adelaide-based organisation committed to:

1)  sharing information about bioelectricity and the role of the human nervous system in health and well-being

2)  educating and coaching people to APPLY that information


Smith and Wellness is headed by myself, Bek Smith, a physiotherapist with a focus on neurodynamics (how the nervous system moves within the body), and a tertiary background in psychology and pain processing. I have previously been published as a scientific author, and am now writing a chapter in my first book intended for a public audience. 

Co -authored by 16 people who are each contributing a chapter about a different 'life hack', "Elevate Your Life" is due to be released in mid-2016. This is an enormous undertaking with books being published in hard copy and electronic format, involving a large team of editors, publishers, web-based professionals and of course the authors themselves. 

This is where you come in - in order to raise the funds we need for this undertaking, I am offering pre-orders for the book, as well as a range of services to help you elevate your own life!


Your Impact

You, the Indiegogo community, have already helped Smith & Wellness get this far, and for that we are truly grateful! Last year we launched our first campaign to raise the capital needed to get us off the ground. Even though we only reached 10% of our goal through online and cash donations, it was enough to purchase the basic bioelectrical instruments we now use daily to educate and inspire our clients towards greater well-being!

This book is important because of the audience that NEEDS our message and are not hearing it anywhere else. Health professionals all have their own niche and way of treating different conditions, but many of them shy away from working with the complexities of the nervous system. If we can teach even the basics about bioelectricity to consumers AND their health professionals, we can finally target the common link that underpins almost every single health issue known. 


                                       

   

Share The Bioelectricity Buzz!

  • I need to submit fees of $10,000 before April in order for the chapter on bioelectricity to go to print. That's only 200 people pledging $50 each! Or 100 people pledging $100! Or only 20 people receiving a $500 package that will not only raise the quality of their own life (at a discount!!) but also help other people at the same time!
  • If you're sick of spending time and money on gadgets, apps, diet plans, massages, personal training and coaching that falls short or only helps for a short time, maybe invest a fraction of that moula in learning how to get the most out of them instead.
  • Check out the range of perks you can get; pre-order your very own copy of "Elevate Your Life"  or even receive a personalised copy! Get courses and workshops (run in Adelaide) with bonuses thrown in, or some discounted sessions with your very own bioelectricity practitioner, either in person or via Skype. 
  • If Smith & Wellness has helped you before, this is your chance to get the message out to other people and do your bit to create a healthier, happier world!


Non-financial help

We understand that some people just can't contribute right now, but that doesn't mean their help isn't valuable.

  • Is ours a worthy message? Would other people benefit from hearing about it? Get the word out about "Elevate Your Life" and make some noise about our fundraising campaign!
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools to let your friends on Facebook and Twitter and Instagram know that there is a solution to their health concerns.
  • Visit www.smithandwellness.com to find out more about our approach, and send the link to others so they can discover how to ELEVATE their ENERGY too!

Thank you in advance for helping us raise the bar when it comes to healthcare. :)


With gratitude and in kindness,


~Bek Smith


Click here for more information on elevating your energy today!

story:
Short Summary

My beautiful best friend died at the age of 14 to a rare, mean cancer named CANCER ALVEOLAR RHABDOMYO SARCOMA,Sarcoma's are rare types of cancers that develop in the bone, muscle or cartilage. Sadly, Chloe lost her year long battle but nearly 8 years on and we're still keeping her memory alive. The Chloe Bigmore Trust was set up in her memory and that is why the team has kindly agreed to help me fundraise for this wonderful charity.  

What We Need 

As there are 5 team member:

Alex Capon
Ross Harbron
Mari Izzard 
Charlotte Sisson
Damian Robinson

We are aiming to raise £100 each which makes our grand total of £500 for this amazing charity!

The Impact

Thanks to the generosity of our sponsors already they have been able to sponsor two rooms in the new Phase Two of the Hospital. 
One room is a family room where children and their parents can have extended stays at the hospital together in their own purpose built accommodation, the second is the parent's room where the parents of children on the wards can take a break for tea and a chat with other parents.
However now the Chloe Bigmore Trust is fundraising to provide equipment for the new wards at the Children's Hospital of Wales

What We're Doing...

"At Run or Dye, you become part of the rainbow. As you run through the course, you will get showered in safe, eco-friendly, plant-based powdered dye at every kilometer...turning you into a technicolour canvas of fun!"

5km+Fundraising+Paint = #Wicked4Chloe @ Run or Dye KENT

Other Ways You Can Help

You can also donate and find out more information  at the Chloe Bigmore Trust website 

http://www.chloebigmore.co.uk/page1.php

story:
We are ready to go!


I don't see my answer here, whom do I contact?

My name is Rick Perez. I am available to answer all your questions concerning the Indiegogo campaign and  Shaper Pillow products.
Please feel free to contact me by email: Shaperpillow@gmail.com                                                                                                                                                                                            I invented a new pillow simply because I could'nt get a good nights sleep due to poor pillow guality and positioning.  I'm here to talk about a revolutionary new product designed to give everyone a comfort level beyond anything ever seen. It's called the shaper pillow. The shaper pillow is designed for people of all ages, and will help accomodate anyone in any position needed for thier comfort and orthopaedic needs. The shaper pillow is unlike any other pillow in the world simply because it does what no other piollw can do. Other pillows do what they want to do, the shaper pillow flexes and does what ever you want. Flexes into your position of choice, and stays for a custom comfort not available with anything else. When you sleep using an ordinary pillow you must ajust to a pillow that is not made for your specific anamatomical needs , therfore you dont get a good night sleep, WAKING UP SORE and in Pain. Our bodies come in different shapes and sizes, so for everyone to use a standard uncustomizable pillow and expect a perfect nights sleep is simply implausible. A human being spends an average of 1/3 of their lives at rest or asleep. Why not make sure this time is spent as comfortable as possible. The shaper pillow has an infinite number of customizable positons only limited by your comfort needs. Do you a pillow that dictates how you are positioned while you rest, or would you like to take control of your life with the flex pillow today. The Shaper Pillow is 100% machine washable.

story:
“WATER FOR ALL” BRINGING WATER 

TO NEEDY HOUSES.



Who we are

Hello!. We are Resed, a start-up dedicated to developing various technologies that improve the life's quality of people and while increasing efficiency in companies. 

Our slogan and philosophy is “we make come true your ideas”. That was the moment we considered the following, why we do not make it happen too, our ideas? “Water for all”, a water purification system capable of reaching people of scarce resources.



System description

“Water for all” is a water purification system, which is able, from a water source previously studied and after some procedures, delivering it for human intake. This system is designed for people who currently do not have potable water, bringing this important thing to houses which are located in rural or scarce resources areas. The system is self-sustaining, due to is powered by solar energy, promoting further environmental protection.

The increased importance of “Water for all”, which it has come to solve one of the major problems that exist today, water scarcity, bringing this resource to the greatest posible numbers of houses.

Product sheet (diptych)





Magnitude of what you get

Nowadays, the problem of water shortage is global. There are millions of people around the planet who do not have this basic service, causing deaths and stagnation in the productivity of the first economic activity such as livestock and agriculture.

In quantitative terms, according to the Department of Economic and Social Affairs of the United Nations, nearly 700 million people from 43 different countries suffer water shortages. While approaching 500 million this situation. 1,600 million, about a quarter of the world population, are faced with situations of economic water scarcity, where countries lack the capacity to transport water from rivers and aquifers infrastructure. A possible way to make a projection about this problem, it is predicted that by 2030, nearly half the world's population will live in areas of water stress.

Note: For more information on global drinking water problem, we recommend reading the "Sick Water" report developed by the UNEP (United Nations Environment Programme).


We carry potable water to those who need it most, no matter how far or isolated they are.

Place of first installation.




What we need and what you get


Much funding is required

Our goal is $ 100,000, which 20% will go to the research area, this way, we can improve the equipment and becoming more efficient. And 80% will be for the installation of this machines in people’s houses needed.
To fulfil the target, we contemplated at least 20 facilities in isolated rural areas. These facilities include a solar panel system, which gives autonomy to the system, allowing it to work in this kind of places.

Tell people about your exclusive rewards.Make them excited!

We have two rewards. For people who donate between $ 100 and $ 200, we send a photograph with a message of gratefulness by some of the families who were benefited and for people to donate more than $ 200 a video with acknowledgments of some of the families and a sample of the installation.



Describe where the funds go if you fail the overall goal.

If the goal is not achieved, the funds will go towards the realization of the greatest possible number of facilities, because helping people is the goal of this campaign.


Describe your record of success in projects like this (if you have one).

Almost a year ago, we presented the same project in the international competition of TV channel History Channel "Una idea para cambiar la historia", where we got the second place.




Other ways you can help

In case of people can not donate money for this cause, we hope to share the idea in social networks and to their close people. We hope that you can continue to support us, to follow us in social networks and on our website.   

www.resed.cl

www.facebook.com/resed.cl

twitter.com/resed_cl

www.youtube.com/user/resedcl
