story:
Our Groundbreaking Campaign 

We are Hallaway, and we’re asking for your support to open the first ever crowdfunded medical cannabis dispensary in history. While it’s an innovative idea, it’s also incredibly simple. In fact, we were surprised no one else had thought of it: keep patients at the center of our mission by keeping them at the center of our business model, and build a market by building a community. Basically, we want you to feel as invested in us as we feel in creating a healthier, happier Maryland. 

Hallaway is prelicensure -- this means that we have not yet obtained a license from the MMCC. Our team is working day and night to make sure we obtain a license this fall. Your help on this campaign, will bring us closer to our goal. If we do not win a license, we will not stop with our quest to obtain one.  If you want to watch the application process, follow us on Snapchat (user name in the rewards). 

We are three best friends, with a passion for helping people feel better.

What We Need 

The costs of licensing and building out a medical cannabis dispensary are enormous, and most companies rely on investors to help them get up and running. But those investors expect returns, and they want a business plan that’s going to put profits in their pockets. For Hallaway, though, our patients are our priority, and providing them with safe, consistent, affordable medicine is our number one concern. So we thought of a courageous new model for the cannabis industry: let’s skip the investors. Let’s get our funding from our patients and push the profits back to them in the form of deep discounts.

What You Get

We are offering founding memberships to all qualifying campaign donors. This means that, in addition to the product discounts you’ll receive for our entire first year of operation, you’ll forever be a part of the Hallaway community and the Maryland medical cannabis movement. Special VIP privileges for all founding members include patient resources, event invitations, members-only classes, and birthday gifts (free gram of dried flower every year on your birthday-forever!). 

Bigger donors have the opportunity to display their name or brand on our founders’ wall or a chance to name our patient resource center, which will be stocked with reference materials, a lab-grade microscope, and a lending library of cannabis related literature. This is a great way to show your patients that you care about patient focused cannabis in Maryland.

We Answer To You

Most medical cannabis dispensaries get their capital from investors, or from out-of-state businesses that have an interest in Maryland’s market. We’re not against the big guy, and we’re excited about the high bar they’ll set for our state’s medical cannabis. But we think there’s room for everyone, and we don’t want small businesses to get squeezed out because they can’t acquire the capital these bigger companies have access to. As a small, local company, funded by patients, we won’t have investors looking for a share of the profits. We will be able to pass those savings on to you and reinvest in the state of Maryland and the community we share.

Do you qualify as a Maryland Patient?

Qualifying patients, registered in Maryland have:

  • Obtained a recommendation from a certifying doctor in Maryland.

  • Registered with the Maryland Medical Cannabis Commission

You do not have to be a Maryland resident to qualify as a Maryland patient. This means anyone from Pennsylvania, Virginia, West Virginia, and beyond can obtain a recommendation from a certifying Maryland physician if they have one of the qualifying conditions OR if their certifying Maryland physicians believes medical cannabis would provide relief of their particular condition.

If you have any questions about whether or not you qualify, email us at info@hallawaymaryland.com. We’d be glad to provide resources to answer your questions.
Still not sure if you qualify? Check out the Cannabis Commission's Website HERE!

We Are Hallaway

We will always aim to be a model of a responsible, ethical, and diverse business, dedicated to making a positive impact in our neighborhood and our city. We continue to demonstrate our commitment to our community through our relationships with both Habitat for Humanity and the Maryland Food Bank, and we’ve already pledged to donate a portion of our profits each year to the Epilepsy Foundation for the Chesapeake Region. 

Working for Patients Since Day One

We have been working day and night to get this dispensary off the ground. In addition to raising funds we have had to: prepare our application, gain support from community leaders and members, secure several appropriate locations, take courses in dispensary management, and the whole time -- keep our day jobs! We've also met some really awesome people along the way. Through networking and fundraising events we've met leaders in our industry as well as politicians, advocates, and of course -- PATIENTS! Beyond our industry we've worked with some really awesome local artists, consultants, and professionals. Two of our founders are the co-chairs for Women Grow: Baltimore, and as far as we can tell -- Hallaway is the only dispensary that is a member of the Maryland Chamber of Commerce. We have never stopped working to get patient-focused cannabis to Maryland.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand if you don't have money to contribute right now, but there are certainly ways you can still help:

  • Share the link to this campaign on all of your social media using the tools above and use the tag #wearehallaway

  • Join our email list over at www.HallawayMaryland.com to stay updated on all things Hallaway!

  • Spark the conversation - Talk to family, loved ones, friends, doctors, patients, and anyone you know who cares about patient-focused cannabis about our campaign, and invite them to join us!

No matter what you give, no matter who you tell, remember: We cannot do this without YOU.


The Shirts
story_txt:
Our Groundbreaking Campaign We are Hallaway, and we’re asking for your support to open the first ever crowdfunded medical cannabis dispensary in history. While it’s an innovative idea, it’s also incredibly simple. In fact, we were surprised no one else had thought of it: keep patients at the center of our mission by keeping them at the center of our business model, and build a market by building a community. Basically, we want you to feel as invested in us as we feel in creating a healthier, happier Maryland. Hallaway is prelicensure -- this means that we have not yet obtained a license from the MMCC. Our team is working day and night to make sure we obtain a license this fall. Your help on this campaign, will bring us closer to our goal. If we do not win a license, we will not stop with our quest to obtain one.  If you want to watch the application process, follow us on Snapchat (user name in the rewards). 
We are three best friends, with a passion for helping people feel better.What We Need The costs of licensing and building out a medical cannabis dispensary are enormous, and most companies rely on investors to help them get up and running. But those investors expect returns, and they want a business plan that’s going to put profits in their pockets. For Hallaway, though, our patients are our priority, and providing them with safe, consistent, affordable medicine is our number one concern. So we thought of a courageous new model for the cannabis industry: let’s skip the investors. Let’s get our funding from our patients and push the profits back to them in the form of deep discounts.What You GetWe are offering founding memberships to all qualifying campaign donors. This means that, in addition to the product discounts you’ll receive for our entire first year of operation, you’ll forever be a part of the Hallaway community and the Maryland medical cannabis movement. Special VIP privileges for all founding members include patient resources, event invitations, members-only classes, and birthday gifts (free gram of dried flower every year on your birthday-forever!). Bigger donors have the opportunity to display their name or brand on our founders’ wall or a chance to name our patient resource center, which will be stocked with reference materials, a lab-grade microscope, and a lending library of cannabis related literature. This is a great way to show your patients that you care about patient focused cannabis in Maryland.We Answer To YouMost medical cannabis dispensaries get their capital from investors, or from out-of-state businesses that have an interest in Maryland’s market. We’re not against the big guy, and we’re excited about the high bar they’ll set for our state’s medical cannabis. But we think there’s room for everyone, and we don’t want small businesses to get squeezed out because they can’t acquire the capital these bigger companies have access to. As a small, local company, funded by patients, we won’t have investors looking for a share of the profits. We will be able to pass those savings on to you and reinvest in the state of Maryland and the community we share.Do you qualify as a Maryland Patient?Qualifying patients, registered in Maryland have: 
Obtained a recommendation from a certifying doctor in Maryland.
Registered with the Maryland Medical Cannabis Commission
You do not have to be a Maryland resident to qualify as a Maryland patient. This means anyone from Pennsylvania, Virginia, West Virginia, and beyond can obtain a recommendation from a certifying Maryland physician if they have one of the qualifying conditions OR if their certifying Maryland physicians believes medical cannabis would provide relief of their particular condition. If you have any questions about whether or not you qualify, email us at info@hallawaymaryland.com. We’d be glad to provide resources to answer your questions.
Still not sure if you qualify? Check out the Cannabis Commission's Website HERE!
We Are Hallaway
We will always aim to be a model of a responsible, ethical, and diverse business, dedicated to making a positive impact in our neighborhood and our city. We continue to demonstrate our commitment to our community through our relationships with both Habitat for Humanity and the Maryland Food Bank, and we’ve already pledged to donate a portion of our profits each year to the Epilepsy Foundation for the Chesapeake Region. 
Working for Patients Since Day One
We have been working day and night to get this dispensary off the ground. In addition to raising funds we have had to: prepare our application, gain support from community leaders and members, secure several appropriate locations, take courses in dispensary management, and the whole time -- keep our day jobs! We've also met some really awesome people along the way. Through networking and fundraising events we've met leaders in our industry as well as politicians, advocates, and of course -- PATIENTS! Beyond our industry we've worked with some really awesome local artists, consultants, and professionals. Two of our founders are the co-chairs for Women Grow: Baltimore, and as far as we can tell -- Hallaway is the only dispensary that is a member of the Maryland Chamber of Commerce. We have never stopped working to get patient-focused cannabis to Maryland. 


Other Ways You Can Help
We understand if you don't have money to contribute right now, but there are certainly ways you can still help:

Share the link to this campaign on all of your social media using the tools above and use the tag #wearehallaway
Join our email list over at www.HallawayMaryland.com to stay updated on all things Hallaway!
Spark the conversation - Talk to family, loved ones, friends, doctors, patients, and anyone you know who cares about patient-focused cannabis about our campaign, and invite them to join us! 

No matter what you give, no matter who you tell, remember: We cannot do this without YOU.

The Shirts

story:
Hello! My name is Gillian, I am a Holistic Health Coach and Yoga Teacher.

For the past 5 years, I have been dedicated to helping people transform their lives one healthy habit at a time with self-care practices like healthy eating, yoga and meditation. I work with clients one-on-one, in group classes, workshops and retreats. I really LOVE what I do.

Through my experience as a coach, I’ve seen that most people are missing the tools, support and resources it takes to make lasting diet and lifestyle changes and improve their health.

There’s so much conflicting health and diet information out there that it is overwhelming for most people to get started with living a healthy lifestyle. 

About a year ago, I came up with the idea to make a video series that recorded all the guidance I was constantly giving my clients. At first I was thinking it would be a short YouTube series but it ended up being so much bigger and better than I ever could have imagined!

Using the common questions and sticking points that I see with my clients, I’ve designed Healthy Living 101 to be a comprehensive and fun way to learn all the things you would cover in your first few sessions with a Holistic Health Coach.

It acts as a roadmap to a better life for those who know they need to make changes but don’t know how or where to begin. It sheds light on many different practices that together make up a healthy, balanced lifestyle.


I live and breathe what I do.

I have known since I was just a little kid that I am here to help people feel better. I am so incredibly blessed to be able to do this for a living!

This course is just another outlet for me to help people however, because of the online format, it will allow me to reach far more people than I would ever be able to in my private practice.

‘Healthy Living 101’ teaches you how to create and lead a balanced lifestyle right from the very beginning. It will cut through the confusion around food, movement and daily practices and leave you feeling empowered to take responsibility for your health. This course contains practical and realistic solutions for everyday life including:

  • how to plan, shop for and cook healthy homemade meals.
  • how to treat your body right and reduce exposure to toxins.
  • how to choose the right exercise for you, do yoga and meditate.
  • how to manage stress and live a happy life!


What else does it include?

Each Healthy Living Lesson comes with a downloadable Workbook, loads of resources to further your learning and has homework assignments so that you can get hands on experience practicing what you learn.



I’ve run into a little road bump… I am out of money! I have been personally funding the project so far but there have been some unforeseen costs and it simply isn’t an option anymore. To launch it properly and really get the message out there, in the way I know it’s meant to, I need your help:

  • I owe my video team a fair penny for all their work shooting and editing the course.

  • I need money to compensate my talented graphic and web designers for their hard work!

  • I need funds to finish the remaining programming for member’s portal, which allows you to login and view all 15 video lessons, download the workbooks and resources, and enjoy the super awesome bonuses.

In return for helping me out I want to offer you some love!

  1. Donate $7 or less and get my Healthy Living Checklist.

  2. Donate up to $27 and get my Healthy Living Checklist + Snack-Sized Cookbook.

  3. Donate $37 or more and get my Healthy Living Checklist + Snack Sized Cookbook + Raw Food Cleanse Ebook.

  4. Donate $97 or more and you get the downloadable resources (listed above) + full access to my course Healthy Living 101, when it’s released. Aiming for a ‘Back to School’ themed launch this September!

  5. Donate $147 or more and get all the downloadable resources + full access to my course upon it’s completion + a FREE 30 minute coaching session with me (via phone or skype)!

Use the Indiegogo social buttons to share this campaign with your friends and family to help get the word out and make the world a better place.

Thanks SO much for your support! I love you!

Gillian

story:
I am putting myself out there, humbling myself, and embarrassing myself to see if I can get some help from kind hearted strangers... please read this to the end ... I'm begging you.

Yes, I'm in Canada. Yes, we have healthcare. However, Canada's healthcare does NOT cover ANY dental work whatsoever. And it's insanely expensive.

This is why I so desperately NEED your help! 

I have seen celebrities using this type of means for funding projects of their own, and they have more money than I will ever see in a lifetime.
I am hoping that there will be a few people out there that will help me out by even donating a few dollars... even $5 or $1 helps.

I started this campaign just over a year ago on Go Fund Me. I've managed to raise $430 on there ... I've only posted this on my Twitter up until now ... so now I'm posting it on my Facebook, and face the humiliation because I have no other options left... I'm literally running out of time... I've been told I just might die.

I have been told that I have aggressive stage 1 cervical and a rare vulvar cancer and have to have the dental surgery done before I have that surgery done because when they put me under and intubate me, it will more than likely break off my teeth which will cause more extensive damage to my teeth, gums and jaw, not to mention I risk swallowing them. My dentist, and my oncologist have told me that if this happens, they will not fix it or try to save them if that happens, they'll just do their surgery and have me deal with it with my dentist after... and that will cost much more to fix, plus risk me going septic from infection from it once they fall out.
Left undone, I risk further humiliation of having no teeth at 40, still being unable to eat solid foods, but, going forward with my cancer surgery, I will at least not die being untreated and my daughter only being 8 (who I have NOT told I have cancer as my father, her grandfather, just passed away from it in October, so it scares her to hear the word now) will at least still have her mother alive. My 12 year old knows, and has even donated $25 of her own money she saved up from babysitting!

After FINALLY finding what I thought was an awesome job just over 8 months ago, that actually offers me benefits, it all came crashing down around me when my employer, Target Canada, closed its doors in Canada and I am now finding myself out of work yet again...... and no benefits, yet again.

15 years ago I had all 4 wisdom teeth removed and the dentist screwed up. A reverse retainer was supposed to be put in front top and bottom to avoid spacing of the teeth, and it was not done. Therefore all teeth started spacing out to where the front 2 had a 1/4 inch gap. Over time, due to increasing difficulty in eating because of the spacing and loosening of the teeth, I have become anaemic, and have had significant bone loss so therefore implants are no longer even an option any more.

In order to be able to eat to some degree, my previous dentist offered me a payment plan to have a denture made for me and a partial for the bottom on a payment plan ... he said he could extract the top front 4 because they were so loose it would be fast and simple with local freezing ... and he used a temporary partial plate for the top 4 front teeth. This was able to be done in his office... however, I had to go to a dental surgeon to do the rest of the extractions as they were so extensive. So, we went ahead and did it...
This temporary upper was supposed to be taken out and replaced with the denture within 3 months.

That was 10 years ago. This already took every penny I had.

It took me 3 years to pay him off... I managed over 5 years after that to pay for my top denture to be made and the bottom partial ... I now have those... however, this gets worse........... I tried to set up the appointment with the surgeon................ tried.

An appointment was finally made 2 years ago for the extractions, and the night before, got a call from the dental surgeon's secretary to go over all the do's and don'ts like don't eat after midnight etc... and was told to make sure to have the full $5800 for the extractions ready by cash, credit card or money order before the surgery, including the $800 for the anaesthesiologist. I was in shock. This wasn't the plan! This wasn't what was discussed! I was living in daily pain and they promised to HELP ME!

The initial consultation was horrific, but he was the only surgeon in the area that I could call. I was humiliated, judged, and left in tears. I got the appointment booked, but not without walking out feeling less than 2 feet tall.

During my consultation, we included discussing a payment plan option. Feeling the way I did, I still agreed because he was willing to do a payment plan.
When I received the phone call the night before the surgery, apparently the payment plan option was no longer an option.

They said sorry, that option isn't available and we don't know why it was even discussed with you. I was told flat out that "You have 15 minutes to decide how and if the payment will be made or we're cancelling the appointment. If you can't pay it upfront, then we will have to give the appointment to someone else."

The appointment was cancelled and they hung up on me when I started to cry and tell them I couldn't live in pain like this any more. They didn't care.
After searching for a good dentist that would do the extractions for me, not judge me, or make me feel bad, I haven't been able to find one. I did find one that said he could help, however, again, we're now looking at extensive costs because of how long this has been left. He did an updated x-ray for me... I have only 1 molar left in tact in the top right of my mouth.

My current dentist is trying very hard to work with me on the costs, but, unfortunately, he needs to be paid as well, and so does the anesthesiologist.
He has said that because I need thousands of dollars worth of work done to correct these problems, and now, the surgery time is tripled because of how much he needs to cut into my gums to literally dig out every broken piece left below the gum line, the cost has now increased as well. He said the bottom plate that I paid for, is now useless, and I have to have a whole new denture made for the bottom. I can't afford that again. That's yet another $3000 I now have to dish out.

I have been told that because of the state of my bottom teeth, I can not have an impression made of the teeth to have a denture made to put in when the extraction happens... I have to wait for the gums to heal and then have one made to fit the top one I currently have. So, I will have no bottom teeth at all until I can afford a denture to be made.

The cost is absolutely out of my mind's comprehension to be able to even save for at this point... I have no job now, but am looking like crazy for another one that offers benefits. Which means putting it off again for a few more months until I find another job and benefits kick in, and then take more time off work from a new job...

The next appointment was supposed to be June 10th. My birthday. Yay. Not how I wanted to spend it, but I have no choice. If I don't have the money up front for the anaesthesiologist at the very least, they will NOT do the surgery.

This appointment ended up being cancelled because the cost for the anaesthesiologist went from $700 quoted to $2700!!! HOW!? I don't know. But, he said if I don't have it, too bad, he doesn't care about my situation, or who I am, he will not do it. Nice huh?

I made one last ditch effort to contact The University of Toronto Oral Surgery department last week - AND GOT IN!!! I had my consultation and they can do the work!!!

I had an AMAZING consultation with one of the Dental Professors and they are going to get all the work done for me at a lesser cost!
THEY WANT TO HELP!

My original dentist was going to charge me $8900 for all extractions and anaesthesiologist NOT including pre-op visit, post-op visit, or taxes!

For The U of T surgery - $5800 for ALL! Extractions, pre-op, post-op, anaesthesiologist AND TAXES INCLUDED!

Due to the severity of my situation, they're giving me a PRACTICING DENTIST that has come back to finish their Oral Surgery Degree and that is a GRADUATE of the course!!!

I am SOOOO beyond excited!!!

Appointment is booked for August 26th at 8:30 am

PLEASE share and help me reach my goal!

I NEED THIS DONE!

Again, I am putting myself out there, humbling myself, and embarrassing myself to show the world what a sad state I am in, to see if I can get some help from kind hearted strangers...

Every donation helps.

story:
Quick Summary:

Health discovery by safe and radiation-free screening using advanced infrared technology will enable the detection of any inflammation and potential cancerous activity at an early stage, and the follow-up dietary based treatment options would potentially save many lives as well as billions of dollars on healthcare expenditures for chronic diseases.

The problem:

Modern life is full of stress the vast majority of which is psychological - work, finances, families, and their competing demands. Stress activates a sympathetic response (also known as “fight or flight" response) in our body which is useful when we really need it. But when it's happening at a low grade all the time in response to the chronic stress, our body can, over time, take a profound physical toll. Organs are fatigued and not functioning properly, and the body is constantly in a state of inflammation, creating the environment for degenerative diseases.

Research indicates that chronic inflammation and stress are the big players in the age related diseases such as cancer, cardiovascular disease and brain deterioration. The problem is that the traditional medical intervention is evidence based. That is, the disease has to be mature enough for diagnosis by traditional diagnostic tools. This is a reactive approach- it costs more and saves less lives. We need a safe, effective and less expansive option for chronic diseases, that is prevention and early intervention!

What is Health Discovery?

Health discovery is a process of preventive health screening by using an advanced infrared technology that is 100% safe and is uniquely able to detect any inflammation and potential cancerous activity at an early stage. Our body emits infrared radiation which is essentially heat produced by vascular activity and metabolic reactions, and this heat pattern is remotely detected by infrared technology. Moreover, this screening (also known as tele-thermography or infrared thermography) is the gold standard for documenting sympathetic response and thus an ideal tool for discovering chronic inflammation in the body.Thermography does not replace any modality, it simply provides a safe and sensitive alternative. The true value of thermography lies in the fact that it gives you the opportunity for early intervention, before the potential development and growth of a chronic, life threatening disease. The nice thing is, that it is a non-invasive, radiation-free & touch-free procedure!


Who will benefit from it and how?

  1. According to American Cancer Society’s estimates (www.cancer.org), 1 in 8 women in the US will develop invasive breast cancer in their life time. Breast cancer does not happen overnight, it is a disease that takes years to grow to the stage it can be detected by traditional screening modalities. Detection by mammography and other traditional modalities depend on the size and density of the tumor, and by the time a tumor is detected by traditional X-Ray mammography, the body has over a billion cancer cells. On the other hand, Infrared Thermography can detect early stage vascular changes long before they could develop into a tumor and is effective in detecting benign versus malignant abnormalities. The earlier a disease is diagnosed, the more likely it is to cure or effectively manage it and lower its impact on your life. 

  2. Heart disease is the number one killer of both men and women in the U.S. (www.seer.cancer.gov). The most common test used to detect level of inflammation in the blood stream is called C-reactive protein (CRP). It is a simple and inexpensive test, however, it is non-specific; that is, it simply detects inflammation from all sources, including medications or injuries. For this reason, it cannot always be used to measure chronic inflammation concerning cardiovascular disease. This is another area where Thermography can be very helpful since it can show the inflammation in the peripheral arteries leading to the heart and/or redirection of blood perfusion in the chest area (via sympathetic response), thus providing early warning indicators for a developing heart disease.

The safe alternative:

Preventing a disease is easier and less expensive than treating a disease after it reveals itself. We don’t just wake up in the morning with a health challenge. It’s a process that takes years, and it is often result of your actions or inactions. The adoption of early intervention and follow-up natural dietary based treatment options will empower people take control of their health,  increase average life span, and would potentially save billions of dollars to the healthcare expenditures. The alternative is as following:

  1. Discovering and monitoring health by using infrared thermography, a) for the peace of mind, or b) to detect any abnormal activity, inflammation and potential cancerous activity at an early stage.  Please check our website for more information at: www.irwise.com. The next question is, what if you see early warning signs of a developing disease? 

  2. We will provide follow-up dietary based treatment options for specific chronic conditions that are normally not available in the traditional medicine, certainly not in a concise form. Working in collaboration with medical doctors, nutritionists and available literature in the nutritional medicine we will offer dietary recommendations and make it available and accessible online as well.

Related Links:

http://startuptechvalley.org/presenters/

http://www.1millioncups.com/albany/events

Why Indiegogo?

We are reaching out on Indiegogo in order to seek help from the community to promote health in the community. The success and sustainability of our enterprise is contingent upon adequate funding, and community’s collective funds and generosity can help us realize this dream.

Use of funds:

Your pledge funds will be used to raise awareness about the program and its benefits, hiring staff, finishing incomplete projects (1-further advancing the sensitivity of breast screening, 2-dietary based treatment options), and paying for the overhead expenses of the screening center. Our hope and goal is to make the business self-sustainable in 18-24 months.

Quick Summary:
Health discovery by safe and radiation-free screening
using advanced infrared technology will enable the detection of any
inflammation and potential cancerous activity at an early stage, and the
follow-up dietary based treatment options would potentially save many lives as
well as billions of dollars on healthcare expenditures for chronic diseases.

The
problem:
Modern life is full of stress the vast majority of
which is psychological - work, finances, families, and their competing
demands.
Stress activates a sympathetic response (also known as “fight or flight" response) in our
body which is useful when we really need it. But when it's happening at a
low grade all the time in response to the chronic stress, our body can, over
time, take a profound physical toll. Organs are fatigued and not functioning properly, and the body
is constantly in a state of inflammation, creating the environment for
degenerative diseases. 
Research indicates that chronic inflammation and stress are the big players in the age
related diseases such as cancer, cardiovascular disease and brain deterioration. The problem is that
the traditional medical intervention is evidence based. That is, the disease
has to be mature enough for diagnosis by traditional diagnostic tools. This is a
reactive approach- it costs more and saves less lives. We need a safe,
effective and less expansive option for chronic diseases, that is prevention and early intervention! 

What is Health Discovery?
Health discovery is a process of
preventive health screening by using an advanced infrared technology that is 100%
safe and is uniquely able to detect any inflammation and potential
cancerous activity at an early stage. Our body emits
infrared radiation which is essentially heat produced by vascular activity and
metabolic reactions, and this heat pattern is remotely detected by infrared
technology. Moreover, this screening (also known as tele-thermography or infrared
thermography) is the gold standard for documenting sympathetic response and thus an ideal tool
for discovering chronic inflammation in the body.Thermography
does not replace any modality, it simply provides a safe and sensitive
alternative. The true value of thermography lies in the fact that it gives you the
opportunity for early intervention, before the potential development and growth of a chronic, life threatening
disease. The nice thing is, that it is a non-invasive, radiation-free
& touch-free procedure! 







Who will benefit from it and how?


According to American Cancer
Society’s estimates (www.cancer.org), 1 in 8 women in the US will develop invasive
breast cancer in their life time. Breast cancer does not happen overnight, it is
a disease that takes years to grow to the stage it can be detected by
traditional screening modalities. Detection by mammography and other
traditional modalities depend on the size and density of the tumor, and by the
time a tumor is detected by traditional X-Ray mammography, the body has over a
billion cancer cells. On the other hand, Infrared Thermography can detect early
stage vascular changes long before they could develop into a tumor and is
effective in detecting benign versus malignant abnormalities. The earlier
a disease is diagnosed, the more likely it is to cure or effectively manage it
and lower its impact on your life.  
Heart
disease is the number one killer of both men and women in the U.S. (www.seer.cancer.gov).
The most common test
used to detect level of inflammation in the blood stream is called C-reactive
protein (CRP). It is a simple and inexpensive test, however, it is
non-specific; that is, it simply detects inflammation from all sources,
including medications or injuries. For this reason, it cannot always be used to
measure chronic inflammation concerning cardiovascular disease. This is another
area where Thermography can be very helpful since it can show
the inflammation in the peripheral arteries leading to the heart and/or redirection
of blood perfusion in the chest area (via sympathetic response), thus providing
early warning indicators for a developing heart disease. 

The safe alternative: 

Preventing a disease is easier and
less expensive than treating a disease after it reveals itself. We
don’t just wake up in the morning with a health challenge. It’s a process that
takes years, and it is often result of your actions or inactions. The adoption of early
intervention and follow-up natural dietary based treatment options will empower people take
control of their health,  increase
average life span, and would potentially save billions of dollars to the healthcare
expenditures. The alternative is as following:

Discovering and
monitoring health by using infrared thermography, a) for the peace of mind, or
b) to detect any abnormal activity, inflammation and potential cancerous
activity at an early stage.  Please check
our website for more information at: www.irwise.com. The next question is, what if you see early
warning signs of a developing disease?  
We will provide follow-up dietary based treatment options for specific chronic conditions that are normally not available in the traditional
medicine, certainly not in a concise form. Working in collaboration with
medical doctors, nutritionists and available literature in the nutritional
medicine we will offer dietary recommendations and make it available and
accessible online as well.

are reaching out on Indiegogo in order to seek help from the community to promote

story:
The Wingman Harness was designed by Dr. Chris Spinelli for his daughter.  His daughter experiences mobility issues which her twin brother does not have.  When she was a youngster she had functional needs which were not addressed in traditional therapy.  Fortunately, Chris is both a pediatric physician and a military officer.  He does not back down from a challenge easily, got out his sewing kit and started building the harness.  Chris continued to improve the design and sew new harnesses.  Driven by his passion as a father and his unique expertise in both pediatric medicine and parachute webbing the Wingman Harness was born.

Chris and his family took the harness to a large Children’s Hospital in the Midwest.  The hospital encouraged the Spinelli’s to make more harnesses and get them on the market so other folks could benefit.  While encouraging, this has proven to be a tough process due to limited resources and a lack of a distribution network.  Through trade shows the harness has reached a few hundred therapists as well as a few flagship hospitals. To gain wider awareness and adoption, Wingman needs FDA approval; this will make it eligible for insurance reimbursement, thus making it more affordable for many users.  This approval process is long, expensive and frankly difficult, but your help can get us over the hump!  The harness is made in the USA by a specialty manufacture with expertise in parachute harnesses and military webbing. This is certainly not the cheapest way to build it, but quality is important and we think this is the best.

This is where you can help!  Your support of the $25,000 campaign will fund:

  • FDA application fee of $5,000

  • FDA first year annual fee of $3,600

  • Legal fees estimated to be $10,000

  • A shipment of adult and child harness $7,000

A successful campaign will result in increased availability of the harness, and hopefully more daughters, sons, family and friends in your community experiencing the freedom of increased mobility! 

Since Wingman is designed to help others, that is exactly what your contributions will do.  Rather than just send you a coaster for making a small donation, we have chosen to partner with two great charity’s to get Wingman in the hands of those that need it. 

The funding perks:

·  $25, Get an awesome Wingman T Shirt.  Choose between “I am a Wingman” or “I love my Wingman”.

·  $150, Give a Wingman to charity!  You can select to give a Wingman to a child through Camp Independence.  Or, you can elect the Wounded Warrior Project and give one to an injured veteran.  Either way you will be a hero to us and to the person whose life you impact.

·  $175, Get a Wingman!  If you have a loved one who could use the Wingman, or you are therapy provider, get a Wingman for less than the normal cost, and play an important role in helping us achieve the goal of better affordability and wider adoption. 

·  $250, Get the Deluxe Harness System. This system includes the Wingman Harness, the ceiling strap, chest strap, and leg strap.  These extras combined with the harness give you the greatest flexibility and opportunity to use the harness in the most diverse and effective ways.  The kit is great for therapist or home use.


Does Wingman Actually Work?

YES!  In addition to Chris’ daughter who is doing much better, the harness has been the subject of two clinical trials.  The results of the first trial were published in the most recent winter edition of the Pediatric Physical Therapy magazine. 

Why are there only two sizes? 

Wingman is designed to be adjustable allowing the Child version to fit kids 2+ years of age to puberty, and the Adult version to fit individuals from puberty to adult sizes.  It is adjustable around G-Tubes, pacemakers, or central line ports. 

Does Wingman Benefit the Caregiver as well?

YES!  Wingman’s impact is also felt by the person helping the person wearing it.   Caregivers have told us they experience less back pain due to the ergonomic nature of the device and the custom fit to the person wearing it. 

THANK YOU for your support of Wingman and this crowdfunding campaign!

story:
Short Summary

My name is Gladstone Etienne, Founder of ZABICOLife.  Just a little background on myself, I grew up in the Caribbean, using herbs as a part of my daily life.  I later went into pursuits of education in finance and herbalism. I am very passionate about herbs and how they promote healthy living, and I want to share the health benefits.   I have developed all natural organic herbal blends, which support detoxing, lower blood pressure, strengthening the heart muscle and rhythm, and women’s health issues including, fibroids, and hormonal balance support.  As more people are exploring alternative methods of healing ZABICOLife would like to be at the forefront of such efforts by providing products that support health.  Your contribution will allow my company to make these awesome herbal blends available to the public at large. 

What We Need & What You Get

I am seeking $10,000 in funding. This funding will enable me to complete packaging, marketing, website development, and inventory.  These funds will be used solely for business matters.  I have already begun selling on a small scale to family members, friends, and associates; however, I would like to present these awesome herbal blends to a larger clientele on a higher platform. This is very exciting as my desire is to see people living in optimum health.  I am willing to offer herbal samples as my unique perks to contributors. 

The Impact

Your contribution will allow me to bring years of passion to the forefront.  I grew up using an abundance of herbs for many different ailments. I rarely visited the doctor as a child as my parents administered herbs for such things as; stomach aches, detoxing, sprains, skin issues, headaches, etc.  Many people have experienced improvement from my 7 Day Herbal Cleanse.  Herbs shouldn’t be a substitute for conventional health; however, the use of herbs helps to support and improve overall health conditions and sustainment of quality of life. 

Risks & Challenges

I am not a medical doctor, nor do I claim to be one.  I am simply sharing the benefits that I have seen in my life, and the life of others by embracing the healing benefits of herbs.  The more people are educated on the use of herbs, the more they will be inclined to include herbs as a part of their lifestyle. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you would like to contribute but are not able at this time, please spread the word. It’s like when you receive good news, or good information. You can’t keep it to yourself, you have to share.  I view ZABICOLife as a good thing that could help someone you know.

story:
BBoyUltimatum & Related Media is dedicated to organizing & promoting professional & amateur Break-dance competitions while spreading intellectual understanding through empowerment, education, development and training methods, hosting over 40 signature Friday Night Throw Down competitions starting in 2012-present  featuring 100's of the best Break-Dancers and awarding over $40,000 in prize money. 


BboyUltimatum's 2 Goals


1) Host a 9 competition Friday Night Throw Down series from April-August 2016 in NYC, to crown the BboyUltimatum, Friday Night Throw Down: CHAMPION FOR A CURE grand Champion Break-dancer.


2) DONATE 15% of our total raised funds to AMERICAN CANCER SOCIETY and Further supporting the Cancer patients through performance, volunteer work and outreach.


  • WHY BBOYULTIMATUM SUPPORTS CANCER RESEARCH?

During building this campaign founder "WESTROK" received a call that his friend and fellow member of the ALL PRO BBOY Dance family, Tim "DJ TIMBUK2" Jones  passed from cancer.  TIMBUK was a world famous DJ from Chicago and an inspirational person.  The campaign immediately shifted to honor a brother that gave so much of himself.  A week later another friend died of brain cancer.  We will honor all friends and family that have been affected by cancer, with love, passion and support for the those who are presently fighting.  Portions of our years profit will go toward the American Cancer Society.  We trust that this the right thing to do, so we are starting now!  15% we will be given to The ACS at the end of our campaign.   Checkout our AMERICAN CANCER SOCIETY page here

bit.ly/FNTD-2016-ACS

  • ITS NOT JUST ABOUT MONEY, WE ARE ALSO GIVING OURSELVES...

BboyUltimatum is organizing volunteer to work directly with groups and individuals facing this challenge.  Inspiring with good music, dance, and maybe just be a good friend to have support.  Break Dancing is based on creative energy, through focus, discipline and just bringing an atmosphere of fun!

(To join our volunteer team please email me at BboyUltimatum@GMAIL.COM)

  • SO WHAT IS BBOYULTIMATUM'S  FRIDAY NIGHT THROW DOWN? 

The Friday Night Throw Down series is an 8 event, bi-weekly, 1-on-1 Break-dance competition, where 20 elite Break-dancers have a shot to place 1st, 2nd or 3rd.  All finalist will face off during the championship final to crown a 2016 FNTD: CHAMPION FOR A CURE Champion.  Competitors are judged on skill, technique, style, foundation, and execution by veteran, professional, and seasoned Break-dancers. Contributing to BBU:FNTD is supporting the development of this cutting edge sport, Cancer awareness/research, attend live competitions, and participating in free classes and workshops. We live stream HD quality footage for every event FREE on WWW.BBU.NYC network.


*ALL EVENTS THUS FAR HAVE BEEN FREE, but to circulate future funding, continue to provide, donations to cancer research and growing the FNTD events, the 2016 BBU: FNTD competitions will be ticket based.  REGARDLESS, ALL COMPETITORS REMAIN ABLE TO REGISTER and COMPETE FOR FREE  CONSIDERING THEY MEET COMPETITION REQUIREMENTS.

  • WHY HAVE WE HOSTED FNTD COMPETITIONS YEAR AFTER YEAR?

BboyUltimatum is a leader in producing Break-dance events.  The past 4 years we have supported our community of highly skilled and talented pro/am Breakers (generally age’s 14-28 female & male) with an organized, trusted platform, and network.  BBU offers a structured event to passionate, dedicated, artist/athletes. With support from the breaking community and spectators, year after year we have hosted FNTD, with free workshops/classes, and even sponsoring individual Break-dancers. FNTD is for the community by the community.

  • WHY ARE WE SO COMMITTED TO PRO BREAK-DANCING?

BboyUltimatum is part of a greater global movement. The 2016 FNTD is an opportunity to expand worldwide, offering a platform to Break-dance athletes to display the power of positive Hip Hop artistry.  2016 FNTD  is a major step toward our cultures first developing pro sport.  When a Break Dancer shines the entire community is empowered.  The inspiration and hope young individuals gain from FNTD events is exponential.  We are building self-esteem, and discipline in a positive organized environment for at-risk youth, and spreading the word about health awareness.  Those who envision professional recognition, consistently train, focus on innovating style, and are passionate will have the opportunity to compete on a global level.  We are committed to offering this opportunity. 

"We want to express our highest gratitude to Bboyultimatum for taking there precious time out to venture in Belize exploring and promoting Break Dance to the fullest. We are sure that the Bboy battle event meant something great to all the young men that participated"

Boldcoms, Community Organization
Belize City, Belize

  • HOW DOES FNTD  COMPETITION WORK?? 

Break Dancing is a globe community, and BBU has traveled worldwide hosting FNTD .  BBU, FNTD morphed from small live street competition to major auditoriums with numerous spectators and international judges.  The FNTD is a tournament style, 1-on-1 competition highlighting exceptional practitioners of this skill, viewed globally, via live-stream.  We partnered with Qinetic Live which specializes in high quality streaming for pro sports events. They are committed to coverage of the FNTD with a full camera crew, and production team at a discounted rate, providing the highest quality HD streaming for all 2016 FNTD: CHAMPION FOR A CURE competitions. Watch the last live BBU:FNTD 2015 COMPETITION 

  • OUR VISION ENCOMPASSES PHILANTHROPIC INITIATIVES.

Every event is introduced with FREE workshops, classes, and seminars, sponsored by BBU.  Break dancers, judges, and officials, volunteer their time to teach spectators, fans, and novice Break-dancers the history, training methods, and philosophy which they practice to master this skill.  The audience can engage and understand Break-dancing from a practical point.  We are expanding these volunteer efforts to a community being faced by the challenge of cancer, and help spread information about preventive tools based on health, wellness, and dance.

  • HOW DID BBOYULTIMATUM'S FRIDAY NIGHT THROW DOWN START?

Founder Jameel “WESTROK” Coleman has over 25 year of Break-dance experience and seen the development of Breaking culture grow from an underground level to a global phenomenon.  As a seasoned entrepreneur in Break-dance promotions he’s dealt with organizations that only wanted watered down Break dance, gymnastic, or acrobatic events.  WESTROK has committed his life to developing a series of authentic, professionally organized competitions, which represent our culture as a whole.  BBU is building foundation for a professional Break-Dance industry that will allow artist/athletes to compete regularly as respected, career, competitors.

  • How your money will be spent.

    15% goes directly to help fund the American Cancer Society.  Please take a look how the ACS is helping individuals who are facing this challenge.

http://www.cancer.org/research/cancerfactsstatistics/index

Operational cost (Organizing 4 month biweekly event, stipend, copy print, paperwork, consulting, marketing and promotion, and legal fees)- $15,000

Security- $8,000

Staffing (includes Qinetic Live fee) - $6000

Space rentals- $11,000

Prize money- $9000

Graphical work- $5000

Content Hub Maintenance/Upgrade (Website BBU.NYC)- $2500

DJ’s-$3000

Judging fees- $4000

Miscellaneous Rental equipment (Camera dollies, sound system, extra cameras, rental trucks)- $10,000

Exclusive BBU/FNTD gear, consolation prizes and give away for competitors-$5000

Transportation/Travel-$3000

Development of BBU APP-$5000

*A small portion will be used to initiate meetings and presentations to investors and potential sponsors for the second half of competitions in 2016 and moving into securing funding for the next 3 years (Stay tuned for BBOYULTIMATUM’s *ALL PRO BBU REGIONAL & *APB WORLD TOUR, yea we are going to take over the world!!!) - $1000

Schedule (tentative):

April 15th

April 29st

May 13th

May 27th  

June 10th 

June 24th 

July 8th

July 22nd

August 12th

Venue location TBA

BBOYULTIMATUM SITE-  www.BBU.nyc or www.BBOYULTIMATUM.com

AMERICAN CANCER SOCIETY PAGE- http://main.acsevents.org/site/TR?type=fr_tribute_fund&fr_id=11240&pxfid=1992892&action=reply&parentid=226558&return=rlst&bpg=post&bpg=post&pg=fund#reply

Find This Campaign On

Facebook Twitter


Preview of a few perks:

competition Friday Night Throw Down series from April-August 2016 in NYC, to crown the BboyUltimatum, Friday Night Throw Down: CHAMPION FOR A CURE grand Champion Break-dancer.2) DONATE 15% of our total raised funds to AMERICAN CANCER SOCIETY and Further supporting the Cancer patients through performance, volunteer work and outreach.
WHY BBOYULTIMATUM SUPPORTS CANCER RESEARCH?
During building this campaign founder "WESTROK" received a call that his friend and fellow member of the ALL PRO BBOY Dance family, Tim "DJ TIMBUK2" Jones  passed from cancer.  TIMBUK was a world famous DJ from Chicago and an inspirational person.  The campaign immediately shifted to honor a brother that gave so much of himself.  A week later another friend died of brain cancer.  We will honor all friends and family that have been affected by cancer, with love, passion and support for the those who are presently fighting.  Portions of our years profit will go toward the American Cancer Society.  We trust that this the right thing to do, so we are starting now!  15% we will be given to The ACS at the end of our campaign.   Checkout our AMERICAN CANCER SOCIETY page herebit.ly/FNTD-2016-ACSITS NOT JUST ABOUT MONEY, WE ARE ALSO GIVING OURSELVES...BboyUltimatum is organizing volunteer to work directly with groups and individuals facing this challenge.  Inspiring with good music, dance, and maybe just be a good friend to have support.  Break Dancing is based on creative energy, through focus, discipline and just bringing an atmosphere of fun! (To join our volunteer team please email me at BboyUltimatum@GMAIL.COM)

SO WHAT IS BBOYULTIMATUM'S  FRIDAY NIGHT THROW DOWN? 

The Friday Night Throw Down series is an
8 event, bi-weekly, 1-on-1 Break-dance competition, where 20 elite Break-dancers
have a shot to place 1st, 2nd or 3rd.  All finalist will face off
during the championship final to crown a 2016 FNTD: CHAMPION FOR A CURE Champion.  Competitors are judged on skill, technique, style, foundation,
and execution by veteran, professional, and seasoned Break-dancers.
Contributing to BBU:FNTD is supporting the development of
this cutting edge sport, Cancer awareness/research, attend live competitions, and participating in free
classes and workshops. We live stream HD quality footage for every event FREE on WWW.BBU.NYC network.*ALL EVENTS THUS FAR HAVE BEEN FREE, but
to circulate future funding, continue to provide, donations to cancer research and growing the FNTD events, the 2016 BBU: FNTD
competitions will be ticket based.  REGARDLESS,
ALL COMPETITORS REMAIN ABLE TO REGISTER and COMPETE FOR FREE  CONSIDERING THEY MEET COMPETITION REQUIREMENTS.
WHY HAVE WE HOSTED FNTD COMPETITIONS YEAR AFTER YEAR?

BboyUltimatum is a leader
in producing Break-dance events.  The past 4
years we have supported our community of highly skilled and talented pro/am
Breakers (generally age’s 14-28 female & male) with an organized, trusted
platform, and network. 
BBU offers a structured event to passionate, dedicated, artist/athletes. With
support from the breaking community and spectators, year after year we have hosted FNTD, with free workshops/classes, and even sponsoring individual Break-dancers. FNTD is for the community by the community.
WHY ARE WE SO COMMITTED TO PRO BREAK-DANCING?
BboyUltimatum is part of a greater global
movement. The 2016 FNTD is an opportunity to expand worldwide, offering a platform to Break-dance athletes to display the power of positive Hip Hop artistry.  2016 FNTD  is a major step toward our
cultures first developing pro sport.  When a Break Dancer shines the entire community is empowered.  The inspiration and hope
young individuals gain from FNTD events is exponential.  We are building self-esteem,
and discipline in a positive organized environment for at-risk youth, and spreading the word about health awareness.  Those who envision professional recognition, consistently train, focus on
innovating style, and are passionate will have the opportunity to
compete on a global level.  We are
committed to offering this opportunity. "We want to express our highest gratitude to Bboyultimatum for taking there precious time out to venture in Belize exploring and promoting Break Dance to the fullest.  We are sure that the Bboy battle event meant something great to all the young men that participated"Boldcoms, Community OrganizationBelize City, Belize
HOW DOES FNTD  COMPETITION WORK?? 
Break Dancing is a globe community, and BBU has traveled worldwide hosting FNTD .  BBU, FNTD morphed from small live street competition to major auditoriums with numerous spectators and
international judges.  The FNTD is
a tournament style, 1-on-1 competition
highlighting exceptional practitioners of this skill, viewed globally, via live-stream.  We partnered
with Qinetic Live which specializes in high quality streaming for pro sports
events. They are committed to coverage of the FNTD with a full camera crew, and production team at
a discounted rate, providing the highest quality HD streaming for all 2016 FNTD: CHAMPION FOR A CURE competitions. Watch the last live BBU:FNTD 2015 COMPETITION  
OUR VISION ENCOMPASSES PHILANTHROPIC INITIATIVES.
Every event is introduced with FREE workshops, classes, and seminars, sponsored by BBU.  Break dancers, judges, and officials, volunteer their time to teach spectators, fans, and novice
Break-dancers the history, training methods, and philosophy which they practice
to master this skill.  The audience can engage and understand Break-dancing from a practical point.  We are expanding these volunteer efforts to a community being faced by the challenge of cancer, and help spread information about preventive tools based on health, wellness, and dance.
HOW DID BBOYULTIMATUM'S FRIDAY NIGHT THROW DOWN START?
Founder Jameel “WESTROK” Coleman has over 25 year of Break-dance experience and seen the development of Breaking
culture grow from an underground level to a global phenomenon.  As a seasoned entrepreneur in Break-dance promotions
he’s dealt with organizations that only wanted watered down Break dance, gymnastic,
or acrobatic events.  WESTROK has committed
his life to developing a series of authentic, professionally organized competitions,
which represent our culture as a whole.  BBU is building foundation for a professional Break-Dance industry that will allow artist/athletes to compete regularly as respected,
career, competitors. 

How your money will be spent.

15% goes directly to help fund the American Cancer Society.  Please take a look how the ACS is helping individuals who are facing this challenge.


http://www.cancer.org/research/cancerfactsstatistics/index

Operational cost (Organizing 4 month biweekly event, stipend, copy print, paperwork,
consulting, marketing and promotion, and legal fees)- $15,000 


Security- $8,000
Staffing (includes Qinetic Live fee) - $6000

Space rentals- $11,000
Prize money- $9000
Graphical work- $5000
Content Hub Maintenance/Upgrade (Website BBU.NYC)- $2500
DJ’s-$3000
Judging fees- $4000
Miscellaneous Rental equipment (Camera dollies, sound system, extra cameras,
rental trucks)- $10,000
Exclusive BBU/FNTD gear, consolation prizes and give away for competitors-$5000
Transportation/Travel-$3000
Development of BBU APP-$5000
*A small portion will be used to initiate meetings and presentations to
investors and potential sponsors for the second half of competitions in 2016
and moving into securing funding for the next 3 years (Stay tuned for BBOYULTIMATUM’s *ALL
PRO BBU REGIONAL & *APB WORLD TOUR, yea we are going to take over the
world!!!) - $1000
Schedule (tentative):
April 15th 
April 29st 
May 13th 
May 27th   
June 10th  
June 24th  
July 8th 
July 22nd
August 12th
Venue location TBA
BBOYULTIMATUM SITE-  www.BBU.nyc or www.BBOYULTIMATUM.com
AMERICAN CANCER SOCIETY PAGE- http://main.acsevents.org/site/TR?type=fr_tribute_fund&fr_id=11240&pxfid=1992892&action=reply&parentid=226558&return=rlst&bpg=post&bpg=post&pg=fund#reply

story:
Peace of Mind Baseline Group

Our mission is to provide a more thorough and objective concussion baseline and return to play protocol to youth athletes.  Conventional testing is not doing enough to combat the ongoing concussion epidemic.

  • Our group is comprised of Fathers, Coaches, Certified Athletic Trainers, and  Physical Therapists who all have seen the inconsistencies in how concussions are dealt with, and the lack of standardized protocols in place to keep our children safe.
  • Funds raised by our campaign will be used to kickstart the use of our technology in schools.  When we explain the benefits of our solution over what is being done now, we have the interest of schools, but funding the project always delays testing.
  • Studies have shown that our complete protocol, along with doctors input, have allowed students to return to play in most cases faster and in a safer manner


Leading Edge Technology Offers a Solution

TRAZER is a “movement simulator” offering the first and only concussion baseline assessment that actually replicates the interactivity, spontaneity and functional movement demands of sport. By challenging the senses, mind and body, TRAZER recreates the physical demands actually faced by your athlete on the field or court.

TRAZER measures what is invisible to the naked eye, and generates objective reports that show your athlete’s global performance capabilities.

The New York Times recently commented on the predictive value of the NFL Combine, “An analysis by the Harvard Sports Analysis Collective confirms that a track meet in February is of limited use for people trying to figure out how well people will play football in November…Any exercise involving a cone does not seem to matter much.”

By contrast, TRAZER’s randomized cues elicit realistic movement responses that allow us to measure such elusive and sport specific parameters as reaction time, first step quickness and stopping power.

TRAZER HRA’s Baseline Concussion Assessment yields (4) reports that provide data relevant to:

• a possible future concussion,

• current cardio respiratory fitness,

• orthopedic health and possible defects, and

• overall performance.


We need funding for marketing, education, and to deploy testing to large groups of athletes 

  • We will be attending local seminars, trade show, health fairs, and hosting events to gain attention to our solution.
  • Even without reaching our goal, all money will go towards our initial mission to get kids baseline tested.  The more money we raise, the more baselines we can provide to the communities at little or no cost.

The Impact on Children

Your money will help protect students athletes from being subjected to inadequate concussion baseline and return to play testing.  The current "low cost" cognitive only system does not do enough to help understand the athlete's overall well being.  Our solution simulates a virtual game like environment, raising the athlete's heart rate to game levels, making sport specific movement demands, and requiring cognitive multi-tasking abilities.

The biggest challenge we have is the cost of testing.  We believe there couldn't be a worse reason for people not to get this test.  With all the money being charged for private lessons, equipment, and league fees, the safety should come first.  Without your health all these other things are meaningless.  

The most important thing to remember is....without a baseline on file, you will never know whether you are returning to play at 100% of where you were prior to the concussion.

If you cannot offer financial support at this time, please feel free to share our story with friends, family, colleagues, and coaches!

story:
Safe Herbal Medicine, Easily Accessible 

Modern medicine has done much to extend lives and conquer disease but the focus on monetary gain has taken our individual health and placed it in the hands of others who may not always have our best interests at heart. In fact, pharmaceutical side effects have become an acceptable norm throughout the world with a previously estimated 290 people being killed by prescription drugs each day in the United States alone. This is not to say that traditional herbal medicines are entirely safe themselves. Many herbs can be toxic and even dangerous at certain doses. Even in the herbal industry there is a rising issue with supplements containing improper and often ineffective doses and/or forms of medicinal herbs. Some herbal companies have even been caught distributing supplements which contain none of the stated ingredients. Our mission at Bountiful Herbs LLC is to take plant medicines with a long history of safe use and continually incorporate new research into a website that will enable the everyday individual to make personalized medicines in the proper form and dosage.

The Vision

Imagine being able to get online and access a user-friendly website (Bountiful Herbs) where you can type in one or multiple symptoms. Our site will then give you a recommended list of herbs that have been used traditionally to treat your type of issue(s). As you look through the herbs you will be able to select some that seem just perfect for you and your individual concerns. Every herb you desire you'll simply click and add it to the formula list. The site will pop up with suggestions and even similar pre-made formulas as well. You can then take your formula and decide what form you want it in...as tea packets? As a tincture? You'll decide how much of each herb you want in it and with a click of a button you can submit your order to our trained herbalists. The herbalists will review your order and symptoms and will then create your personalized formula with a suggested dosing schedule. Within a short time your personalized herbal formula is shipped straight to your doorstep.

What Makes Our Vision Unique

There are many informative herbal medicine websites out there. However, there are none that allow everyday people to create their own botanical formulas. As stated, our ultimate goal is to bring herbal medicine making into the hands of the novice and expert alike! Your support will not only create something unique and free for the public but will ultimately lead to a company which you can count on to provide the highest quality natural ingredients! 


Meet The Team

         Dr. Michael Hummel, NMD - Founder/CEO

Dr. Hummel grew up in a small Arizona community where he developed a love for herbal medicines and natural health therapies. The first science project he ever completed was a survey of local edible herbs while in 2nd grade. Other than a multitude of life experiences Dr. Hummel's formal education began with the completion of an Associate’s Degree in Science with Honors at Yavapai Community College. His high academic performance earned him an award signed by the governor of Arizona which provided him full tuition to any of the three major Arizona universities. A few years later he graduated from Northern Arizona University with a dual major in Biology and Chemistry. During that time Dr. Hummel spent several years shadowing physicians and volunteering at various clinics and hospitals in order to fulfill his dream to become a general practice physician. Upon graduation, he entered into a mainstream medical school but soon realized his personal desires to become a holistic physician were not being met. He then spent a year in a Chiropractic program where he learned about and felt a strong call towards the profession of Naturopathic Medicine. Dr. Hummel went on to graduate from the Southwest College of Naturopathic Medicine (a four year accredited naturopathic medical school) as a Naturopathic Medical Doctor. During that time, he spent a considerable amount of focused training in botanical medicine studies specifically taking various extracurricular courses, attending multiple seminars, and completing numerous clinical shifts focused on botanical medicine. He is now currently completing a CNME/NPGA-approved general practice residency at Cameron Wellness Center with Dr. Todd Cameron, NMD. 

Dr. Hummel created The Bountiful Herbs Botanical Medicine Database for professionals while attending medical school. He noticed that even experts in the field often needed to reference the safety and characteristics of individual herbs but that nothing currently existed that allowed practitioners to create individualized, safe, and effective formulas in a timely manner. He then spent 2 years in conjunction with other experts and programmers creating the first version of the program. Dr. Hummel believes whole-heartedly in the power of botanical medicine and is passionate about making herbal medicine a simple option for everybody to explore. 

          Mary Hummel - Founder/CFO

Mary completed her undergraduate studies in Family & Human Development at BYU - Idaho and Utah State University. She continued her learning at Northern Arizona University and is one test away from completing her Masters degree in Nutrition from the University of Bridgeport. She is a stay-at-home wife and mother. She homeschools her three awesome kids. She loves learning about nutrition and how it impacts the human body. Mary loves using herbs to heal and prevent disease within her family.
          Andrew Markin - Programmer

Andrew is an experienced developer with outstanding OOP and C/C++ skills. He has worked with a wide range of tech including PostgreSQL, MySQL, MS SQL Server, InterBase/Firebird, SQLite. Andrew has experience with image analysis and synthesis, plug-ins writing (e.g. Photoshop), and cross-platform software development. Andrew has been key in taking the program in its infancy and transforming it into the professional version. His attention to detail makes him a stellar addition to our team!

          Gilbert Wellisch - Website Developer/Programmer

Gil has been working in computer programming for over 30 years. He is an expert when it comes to database development. He has been working with website development for the last 4 years. Gil was instrumental in creating the original Bountiful Herbs database. His wisdom and expertise will be fundamental in the creation of the online version of the Bountiful Herbs database.


Every Contribution Helps Us Reach Our Goal of Creating a Successful Business! 

Thank You for Your Support and Time!
