story:
Stack Labs Inc

Originally founded in 2013 to create a new type of responsive light bulb, Stack Labs was working on occupancy and spatial awareness from the very beginning.  Early on, the seeds of an idea were there as Stack’s Data Scientist realized that the embedded motion detection could offer a much different product.

Lighting studies running circadian patterns in retirement communities offered an ideal opportunity to start collecting and validating data.

In September 2017, Stack divested the lighting hardware side of the business and a few of us with aging parents and grandparents decided that we should attempt to build a product that would give us some daily insight into how our loved ones’ are doing.

Less than a year later StackCare was born and we started to implement a professional version for retirement communities. Over 18 months Stack built up working relationships with a number of communities from California to Vancouver to Tennessee to Toronto and points in between.

So many people have been requesting an at-home version of StackCare that we decided this was a must! Now in January 2020 'StackCare @home’ is being launched online to friends and family. 

Production has started. Nationwide deployment is planned for 2020.

What StackCare does...

Data science algorithms constantly search for anomalies and atypical occurrences or events and when something is spotted the notification platform issues an alert back to the specific account holder.

This all happens in a fraction of a second.

StackCare then continuously learns and adjusts for each individual resident over time. This helps maintain accuracy as behaviors change as residents age or change their routines.

Worrying About Your Parent

Independence and dignity are important to seniors. But anyone with a parent living alone understands the daily anxiety and stress of worrying whether Mom, or Dad(!), is OK. StackCare can be the perfect solution waiting for both of you!

Privacy

StackCare is designed to allow your aging loved one to live in their own home as long as possible without being intrusive or cumbersome. All of the motion data is protected, only you control the app and we designed it so that you can add other family members, caregivers or the resident themselves. 

There are no cameras, no microphones, nothing to wear and no batteries to recharge. The system is designed for self-install and is so easy we've had a number of seniors installing it themselves; no-one will be calling or showing up at the door.

Smart Solutions

StackCare uses discrete motion sensors and artificial intelligence to learn individual behavior and activity patterns, sending notifications directly to your phone. A fall alert pendant or box is a great idea but it can only react when something catastrophic happens or when your loved presses that button; StackCare doesn't replace that but offers so much more...

With StackCare you get to see at a glance, simply and easily, if your loved one is sleeping ok, is visiting the bathroom too often, whether his/her activity patterns have changed, or even seeing the house temperature to make sure everything is set for the ideal climate.

Easy to Use

StackCare’s easy to use app will give you the information to know if everything looks normal or if maybe you need to check in on him/her. Mom/Dad keeps their independence, you get peace of mind.

No Tools Required!

Download the app. Plug in the hub. Install the sensors. It’s that simple.

How StackCare Works...

 

StackCare Hardware

Three discrete sensors to collect motion data combine with a gateway which connects to your wiFi and sends data to the Stack Cloud.  

The Sensors

Whether for StackCare @home or with our retirement community product for professional managers and caregivers, we use the same high quality sensors made by NYCE Sensors Inc in Canada. Stack tunes the sensors so they give us rich motion data when someone’s home and then preserve their battery life by ‘sleeping’ when they sense that there’s nobody there. The sensors have a built in thermometer to also provide room temperatures helping you to make sure that Mom or Dad are turning on the AC when they need it.

The Gateway

The Gateway is really just a coordinator for ‘talking’ to the sensors, it collects motion data 24/7 and sends it back to the Stack Cloud. We don’t identify individuals, protecting your loved ones’ privacy, so we just analyze movements within the household based on a unique number identifier for each Gateway.

Oh, and good things come in small packages; the Gateway is only 4”x4” square (that’s 11cmx11cm for our friends in Canada) so it won’t be obtrusive or take up much room.

Development work is completed; we're ready to ship.

The StackCare App

We're already available in the iOS app store; Android version is planned for May 2020.

The app includes insights on sleep hours and bathroom visits, both of which are critical wellness indicators while changes may also indicate an increase in fall risk.  Other screens include room temperatures as well as a discussion platform which connects directly to other family members or caregivers.

Future Developments

We have a number of ideas and concepts in our development plan and we'll be adding new features and notifications over the coming months and into the future.  All updates are done over-the-air so your product will just continue to get better and better.

One of the upcoming developments we're already working on is an option that allows you to receive a daily 'positive' notification letting you know that Mom (or Dad, Grandma, Grandpa) is sleeping ok, is up and about and activity patterns match their usual.

Subscriptions

StackCare monitoring runs 24/7 and sends pushes notifications to your phone; therefore there's a monthly subscription fee which can be reduced down by purchasing annually.  We're launching here with specials only for Indiegogo early birds.

What We Need & What You Get

Next stage for us is simply to start rolling out national sales, word of mouth will be critical to making this a success so we want to build an initial user base:

  • Social Media pages established
  • Web-store established
  • Product ready to ship by early February 
  • You'll receive the full hardware package and a subscription of your choice

The Impact

Retiring baby-boomers are driving a rapidly aging demographic, and a mis-match versus the limited number of retirement community beds.  More of us than ever before will be growing old in our own homes but the stress on family members is significant.

StackCare allows seniors to retain their dignity and privacy while providing family members peace of mind.

Risks & Challenges

All of the hardware development is completed.  Software and the app has been tested and is ready.

Orders will be shipped starting early February.

Other Ways You Can Help

Tell friends and relatives about StackCare.  We all have an aging parent/grandparent or know someone who does.

Thank You!
story_txt:
Stack Labs Inc
Originally founded in 2013 to create a new type of responsive light bulb, Stack Labs was working on occupancy and spatial awareness from the very beginning.  Early on, the seeds of an idea were there as Stack’s Data Scientist realized that the embedded motion detection could offer a much different product.
Lighting studies running circadian patterns in retirement communities offered an ideal opportunity to start collecting and validating data.
In September 2017, Stack divested the lighting hardware side of the business and a few of us with aging parents and grandparents decided that we should attempt to build a product that would give us some daily insight into how our loved ones’ are doing.

Less than a year later StackCare was born and we started to implement a professional version for retirement communities. Over 18 months Stack built up working relationships with a number of communities from California to Vancouver to Tennessee to Toronto and points in between.

So many people have been requesting an at-home version of StackCare that we decided this was a must! Now in January 2020 'StackCare @home’ is being launched online to friends and family. 
Production has started. Nationwide deployment is planned for 2020.
What StackCare does...
Data science algorithms constantly search for anomalies and atypical occurrences or events and when something is spotted the notification platform issues an alert back to the specific account holder.
This all happens in a fraction of a second.
StackCare then continuously learns and adjusts for each individual resident over time. This helps maintain accuracy as behaviors change as residents age or change their routines.
Worrying About Your Parent
Independence and dignity are important to seniors. But anyone with a parent living alone understands the daily anxiety and stress of worrying whether Mom, or Dad(!), is OK. StackCare can be the perfect solution waiting for both of you!

Privacy
StackCare is designed to allow your aging loved one to live in their own home as long as possible without being intrusive or cumbersome. All of the motion data is protected, only you control the app and we designed it so that you can add other family members, caregivers or the resident themselves. 
There are no cameras, no microphones, nothing to wear and no batteries to recharge. The system is designed for self-install and is so easy we've had a number of seniors installing it themselves; no-one will be calling or showing up at the door.
Smart Solutions
StackCare uses discrete motion sensors and artificial intelligence to learn individual behavior and activity patterns, sending notifications directly to your phone. A fall alert pendant or box is a great idea but it can only react when something catastrophic happens or when your loved presses that button; StackCare doesn't replace that but offers so much more...
With StackCare you get to see at a glance, simply and easily, if your loved one is sleeping ok, is visiting the bathroom too often, whether his/her activity patterns have changed, or even seeing the house temperature to make sure everything is set for the ideal climate.
Easy to Use
StackCare’s easy to use app will give you the information to know if everything looks normal or if maybe you need to check in on him/her. Mom/Dad keeps their independence, you get peace of mind.
No Tools Required!
Download the app. Plug in the hub. Install the sensors. It’s that simple.

How StackCare Works...


 

StackCare Hardware
Three discrete sensors to collect motion data combine with a gateway which connects to your wiFi and sends data to the Stack Cloud.  
The Sensors

Whether for StackCare @home or with our retirement community product for professional managers and caregivers, we use the same high quality sensors made by NYCE Sensors Inc in Canada. Stack tunes the sensors so they give us rich motion data when someone’s home and then preserve their battery life by ‘sleeping’ when they sense that there’s nobody there. The sensors have a built in thermometer to also provide room temperatures helping you to make sure that Mom or Dad are turning on the AC when they need it.
The Gateway
The Gateway is really just a coordinator for ‘talking’ to the sensors, it collects motion data 24/7 and sends it back to the Stack Cloud. We don’t identify individuals, protecting your loved ones’ privacy, so we just analyze movements within the household based on a unique number identifier for each Gateway.

Oh, and good things come in small packages; the Gateway is only 4”x4” square (that’s 11cmx11cm for our friends in Canada) so it won’t be obtrusive or take up much room.
Development work is completed; we're ready to ship.
The StackCare App
We're already available in the iOS app store; Android version is planned for May 2020.

The app includes insights on sleep hours and bathroom visits, both of which are critical wellness indicators while changes may also indicate an increase in fall risk.  Other screens include room temperatures as well as a discussion platform which connects directly to other family members or caregivers.


Future Developments
We have a number of ideas and concepts in our development plan and we'll be adding new features and notifications over the coming months and into the future.  All updates are done over-the-air so your product will just continue to get better and better.
One of the upcoming developments we're already working on is an option that allows you to receive a daily 'positive' notification letting you know that Mom (or Dad, Grandma, Grandpa) is sleeping ok, is up and about and activity patterns match their usual.
Subscriptions
StackCare monitoring runs 24/7 and sends pushes notifications to your phone; therefore there's a monthly subscription fee which can be reduced down by purchasing annually.  We're launching here with specials only for Indiegogo early birds.
What We Need & What You Get
Next stage for us is simply to start rolling out national sales, word of mouth will be critical to making this a success so we want to build an initial user base:

Social Media pages established
Web-store established
Product ready to ship by early February 
You'll receive the full hardware package and a subscription of your choice


The Impact
Retiring baby-boomers are driving a rapidly aging demographic, and a mis-match versus the limited number of retirement community beds.  More of us than ever before will be growing old in our own homes but the stress on family members is significant.
StackCare allows seniors to retain their dignity and privacy while providing family members peace of mind.

Risks & Challenges
All of the hardware development is completed.  Software and the app has been tested and is ready.
Orders will be shipped starting early February.

Other Ways You Can Help
Tell friends and relatives about StackCare.  We all have an aging parent/grandparent or know someone who does.
Thank You!

story:
Moving Physical Therapist and Chiropractors to the Digital Age - Stage 1

 

Stage 1

In order to move the Physical Therapist and Chiropractors to the Digital Age, we need to complete our App that we have started.

 

Super Smart Stick and Big Kitty Labs – the perfect partners

 

HIT, llc searched high and low for the perfect partner to help us realize the benefits of pairing the S3 with our sensor platform and providing the best Mobile app experience we could design. We found the perfect partner with Big Kitty Labs, Columbus, OH. Dan Rockwell, CEO and Tushar Kulkarni, Co-founders of Big Kitty Labs, have been instrumental in the design and development of our companion Mobile app.

 

Their expertise and guidance has helped us move quickly and focus on early validation and testing, targeting the release of our MVP later this year. As we continue to add user centered features and value, their team provides the skill set and value to evolve and refine our Mobile app road map and bring our users a delightful experience.

 

The S3 App aims to provide a platform for coaching and guided progress to assure safe, beneficial daily use of the S3 for a variety of applications. The S3 coaching content is designed to be specific enough to address the needs of our users, easy to access content and assess progress. Further, the platform will provide care partners of all varieties, a one-to-one connection with their constituents in the future, allowing professional evaluation, as users progress through various therapies.

THE SUPER SMART STICK.............FOR THE PROFESSIONALS

To the Professionals!

The demands of higher workloads and documentation standards coupled with lower reimbursements (PDGM) makes day to day operations for health care professional extremely challenging. Trying to balance the demands of caseload and documentation, while also trying to maintain a high standard of patient care, can lead to high degrees of clinician burnout and declining patient outcomes and employee satisfaction.

The Super Smart Stick was designed to address issues that healthcare professionals are facing such as Work Flow Efficiency, improving patient outcomes, and collecting data digitally.

The Super Smart Stick was designed with the vision in mind of benefitting all brands of therapy: Home Health, Sports Medicine, Chiropractic, Sports Performance and Wellness.

Work Flow Efficiency

 

 

 

Indeed, the S3 is not just another wellness device, but a platform for health, healing and wellness that anyone can benefit from.

Stage 2

We are running stage 1 & 2 simultaneously. We did not want to ask for too much support to start with from the Indiegogo community. As we speak we are calculating our Beta Production.  Our aim with our Beta launch is to get our devices into the hands of 10 lucky people.  With that hand off, we will gather important information.  We want to know the in's and out's of what people think about our design, routines and app.

This information will help us tweak any necessary issues before launching The Super Smart Stick to the world.

By running these two Stages simultaneously, We want to ensure that we keep our launch date of September 2020 accurate. Equipped with all the whistles and bells that we are promising.  Everything about our device The Super Smart Stick  will be tried, tested and confirmed.

Youngstown State University

One of our most important partners is the Engineering department at Youngstown State University. On February 13th, Rick Eberts and I went to introduce the Super Smart Stick to the Engineering Students at YSU.  The purpose of our visit was to introduce the Super Smart Stick as a project for the students to use. Their mission is to stress test, design test and software test our product.  To determine the possible weakness and liabilities of the Super Smart Stick and provide us with recommendations to improve our device before it hits the market.

This step is extremely important! We are not only doing a beta launch to determine the pitfalls and use the recommendations to improve our device, we have taken it one step further! We have  a University Engineering department test the device for defects. Now that is Super Smart!

 

 

What makes the Super Smart Stick (S3) so SMART?

Its versatility and its design.  With the S3 you can replace all that bulky expensive gym equipment with a single hand held device that you can adapt to your own personal needs.  We can work with YOU and your health practitioner or therapist to achieve your targeted, measurable goals.

 

 

 

 

TESTIMONIALS 

Chad has spent most of his adult life living with back pain which he got from playing sports. His greatest wish is to be able to play with his kids and maybe get a few rounds of golf in!!

After just 6 weeks of using the Super Smart Stick Chad can feel a positive change in his back pain – no painkillers, no ice treatment.  He can feel the improved core stability which is helping to control his back pain.

THE SCIENCE BEHIND IT 

PERFORMANCE AT YOUR FINGERTIPS

Training efficiently has never been this easy.

 

Sitting is the New Smoking Epidemic

In the past 30 years we've transitioned from manufacturing and labor jobs to knowledge and service work.  Sedentary work and lifestyles mean that sitting down has become the "New Smoking Epidemic" because of the health risks it poses.  Sitting weakens core spinal muscles, leading to a higher risk of injury and compromised movement.

 

With guided routines you can:-

  • Decrease the nagging pain from a desk job
  • Increase range of motion and mobility safely
  • Increase pushing/pulling, hinging/squatting capabilities
  • Improve core activation in countless positions
  • Decrease back injuries in vulnerable positions
  • Increase movement efficiency

Who are Health Intrinsic Technology

Joseph Bleacher

Co-Owner and C.E.O of Health Intrinsic Technology Super Smart Stick


I was born on Friday the 13th in September of 1963. I was born with neo-natal hepatitis. I was jaundice and had orange hair. They did exploratory surgery where I had 13 stitches. The doctor told my mother to take me to the priest to get my last rights read to me. So she did. I had my last rights read to me when I was 3 months old. My mother took me and prayed to Saint Anthony.

So here I am at 56 married for 32 years and have had 4 young adults.
SO I BEAT THE ODDS!

I grew up in Youngstown Ohio my father Dr. John H.O. Bleacher was the first pediatric surgeon in our community. So my Father was a local legend here in Youngstown. Being the only pediatric surgeon he operated on in the area. It’s Great to hear, Oh your Dr. Bleacher’s Son?! You’re dad was a Great Man and a Great surgeon... those hands he had such big hands and he operated on those little babies. And then they would proceed to tell me how their Son or daughter are in their 30’s with careers and kids and they are so so grateful. So our family has big shoes to fill.

Growing up I was a swimmer. What a Great way to learn discipline, hard work and that your efforts directly affect the outcome. I had a big passion for swimming and being 5’91/2” I was no Michael Phelps but the passion gave me the inspiration to try out for the University of Cincinnati swim team when Frank Busch was coach in the 80’s.

So where I’m going with this is that I have good grounding. I was able to walk on the UC Bearcats and be on the team and then my second year the team nominated me for captain.
SO I BEAT THE ODDS!

After graduating from UC with honors in a BA in Marketing and Communication I soon moved to the U. K.  I joined the hospitality trade in the U.K. with Scottish and Newcastle Retail where I successfully led 5 units from failure to roaring success. I was showcased on the SKY Pub Channel to attract professional managers to operate units. I drove the Newly formed Barras brand by being on the Food Steering group where my idea for making “The Best of Barras”featured our most popular food items with the best margin in the center of a three folded Menu. It made the company Millions of Sterling. I then moved into marketing supporting the growth of 135 John Barbra’s units and 250 Hybrid units with marketing activities, incentives and kudos to our successful managers. Strategically supporting the growth of our business until we sold our multiple units to the Spirit group in the U.K. SO I BEAT THE ODDS!

We decided to move back to America to start new adventures. We relocated back to Youngstown to be close to my side of the family. We’ve been back here 7 years and we are looking to continue our successful streak.

At present I am co-owner & heading a start up called Legacy Christian Home Care. A non medical home care agency and just tucked a successful year under our belt.
SO I BEAT THE ODDS!

I am also co-owner of Health Intrinsic Technology (H.I.T.) the mother ship of the Super Smart Stick where we are looking to launch our amazing state of the art device to help people and professionals enhance their lives.
So please help us BEAT THE ODDS!

 

Rick Eberts

Chief Design Officer of Health Intrinsic Technology Super Smart Stick

I'm a graduate of The Ohio State University and bring 22 years of product design and development experience, in corporate and consulting design, to the HIT team. As Chief Design Officer my focus is to fuel the purposeful, passionate development of HIT products, packaging and branding, with innovative, user-centered processes, resulting in superior outcomes. The Super Smart Stick (S3) is the first of our efforts.

I have also been impacted by severe lower back pain, due to injury, and sought many solutions to my condition. The development of the S3, in a very personal way, was an opportunity to leverage my skills to offer an effective solution to this widespread problem. A solution which empowers our users to live better without the use of pain killers or expensive therapies. The HIT team sought to understand the most common causes and derive an optimal solution for the large population of people living with non-specific back pain.

The realization of the S3 has personally and professionally engaged me over the past five years and our vision, our passion, is to share the benefits of the S3 with many. Thoughtfully considered, carefully executed, optimally designed, the S3 is the marriage of design, science and technology in pursuit of better spinal health and wellness.

SHARE OUR VISION WITH US!

There is a trend towards Preventative Medicine! Our Philosophy at Health Intrinsic Technology is that“Prevention is better than Cure.” If we can prevent a single person from having back surgery than we have done our job!

Introducing the Super Smart Stick (S3)!

Our Vision is...

  • to share with ALL people suffering from back pain a better way without having to resort to medication!
  • to Empower you to take control and beat your pain long term!
  • to help you create the “Best Version of You”
  • to help you realize that “Good Health is Your Greatest Asset”!

 

We are Currently seeking funding for our Stage 1 Launch to help us establish our move from prototype to production. Your money will help complete our app to stage 2.1.  Finish our patent and let more people know about the Super Smart Stick. We are extremely Grateful for your support. 

How YOU Can Help?

From the dog, squirrel and a stick five years ago, we have developed a product with YOU in mind. No special gym membership or personal trainer needed.  The Super Smart Stick and the app will guide you through to better health.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are lucky enough not to suffer from back pain, then you probably know someone who does!!  The S3 is an easy and innovative solution, so tell them about it!

You can just "Back It" and contribute as little (or as much!) as you want - just hit the button at the top of the campaign.

We are grateful for the opportunity to share this campaign. Please share this with your family and friends to spread our vision.  They will thank you for it!!

story: I know what it takes to save a life and the speed in which you do it in is critical. These kits can help save your life, a loved ones, or even a strangers. We can help save people from catistrofic events one at a time by being ready, prepped, and prepared.
story_txt: I know what it takes to save a life and the speed in which you do it in is critical. These kits can help save your life, a loved ones, or even a strangers. We can help save people from catistrofic events one at a time by being ready, prepped, and prepared.

story:
DEEPSPORT™ STORY

DEEPSPORT™ Cooling Sheets will change the game in gaining a quality sleep forever, as our sheets use a patented antimicrobial weave that is 99.9% effective against MRSA, STAPH and other Bacteria.  Bed Bug and Bed Mites can NOT grow on DEEPSPORT™ material.  In addition, we use an FDA certified technology called Dermatherapy® which is certified as a medical device for Atopic Dermatitis, Eczema and Psoriasis, as well as pressure ulcers.  DEEPSPORT™ thermoregulates your body temperature and keeps you cooler and drier.  Our product stops night sweats and is backed by real clinical studies at top universities and hospitals.  So if you are an athlete looking to stay cooler, or someone going through menopause or postpartum, DEEPSPORT™ will keep you cooler and drier.  There are many claims being made today about metals, Egyptian Cotton and Thread Counts in sheets which have zero to do with quality or true functionality.  DEEPSPORT™ Athletic Cooling Performance Sheets feel as smooth as silk, but keep you cooler with the cleanest surface.  DEEPSPORT™ is also Odorless, Stainless and MADE 100% in the USA!

What We Need & What You Get

We are raising $250,000 to drive our on-line strategy.  We have already gained confidence from sports teams, IMG Academy and consumers on-line, but we need to raise capital to expand our reach through social media.  All of our perks are backed by either DEEPSPORT™ product or on-line acknowledgment.  Together, we can change the sleep industry forever.  We are spending the capital on media buys on multiple websites, including DEEPSPORT.com.   We are not paying salaries, just spending capital on product, marketing and media. We have the technology and the product and need your support to help educate the world on DEEPSPORt™! 

The Impact

Sleep is the one thing we take for granted in our life and its the most important. Even as important as food and water, but its the first thing we sacrifice.  Sleep affects everything in our life from cognitive skills, diet, exercise, memory, mood, athletic performance and kids grades in school.  I spent the past year gaining a better understanding of Sleep as I was like most of you.  I just took it for granted, until I researched many sleep studies on athletes and athletic performance.  See, I was an athlete in college.    I am also the former CEO of Champs Sports.  I was never taught anything about sleep as an athlete or a business professional. Sleep affects everything and there needs to be a real product to gain a quality sleep on the market besides Melatonin and Ambien.  We spend 1/3 of our lives sleeping on bed sheets.  Our skin is the largest organ in our bodies, but we don't spend much time thinking about our bed sheets as a product that can help us sleep better.  We invest in mattresses and pillows, but we don't think about the sheets that touch our skin.  Now, I understand the importance of sleep and so should you!  DEEPSPORT™ will change the sleep industry forever.

Risks & Challenges

The biggest hurdle facing DEEPSPORT™ is the education needed as many people don't understand that the sheets you sleep on can truly make a difference.  This is why, if we can raise the capital, we can educate the consumer.  Everyone that we talked to has a sleep story, typically a sleepless night story.  They power through their sleep issues.  They take pills.  However, once they hear the DEEPSPORT™ story, they ask where can I purchase these sheets.  We need your help spreading the DEEPSPORT™ message.  There are many imitators out there claiming high thread counts, Egyptian cotton, Bamboo and other technologies that keep you cooler, drier and safer.  There is very little regulation in this industry.  DEEPSPORT™ has published clinical studies in Medical publications, uses an FDA certified technology in DERMATHERAPY® and an antimicrobial that protects you from bacteria and Bed Bugs.  At DEEPSPORT™ you rest assured, our product is real!  Change your Sheets!  Change your Life!

Other Ways You Can Help

Please join the sleep revolution at DEEPSPORT.com.  Share Indigogo with your friends.  There is a solution to sleepless nights.  There is a solution to stopping night sweats.  There is a solution to help with asthma, menopause, postpartum, eczema, psoriasis and dermatitis.  Its not ointments or pills!  IT's DEEPSPORT™!  The key is spreading the word on sleep.  The more we talk about sleep, the better!  DEEPSPORT™ provides a resource for the hundreds of millions of people worldwide that have sleep issues.

What We Need & What You Get We are raising $250,000 to drive our on-line strategy.  We have already gained confidence from sports teams, IMG Academy and consumers on-line, but we need to raise capital to expand our reach through social media.  All of our perks are backed by either DEEPSPORT™ product or on-line acknowledgment.  Together, we can change the sleep industry forever.  We are spending the capital on media buys on multiple websites, including DEEPSPORT.com.   We are not paying salaries, just spending capital on product, marketing and media. story:
CONTEXT

Palestine has a very young population, most of who still live in the villages. The reality is, that most the jobs, recreation facilities and wealth is concentrated in major urban centres like Ramallah. This makes access quite difficult, both logistically in terms of transport and also the high costs often associated with participating.

We are committed to breaking down these barriers and we believe that the martial arts provide the perfect platform for us to do so.

Approximately 70% of Palestine's population are under the age of 24 (49% under the age of 14). Youth unemployment rates for girls are approximately 45% and 37% for males. 

THE GOAL

Our ambition is to have non-profit martial arts gyms spread to the villages all over Palestine, inspiring and empowering the new generation by getting them engaged in programs across a range of sports including Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu, Wrestling, Judo, Boxing, Karate and MMA to name just a few. 

YOUR CONTRIBUTION

Your contribution will allow us to build our first purpose built gym to be situated in the ancient biblical village of Taybeh (in the West Bank). This will include gym space, boxing ring (already purchased), Judo/Jiu-Jitsu Tatame (Already purchased), other resources and equipment. It will also include accommodation to host camps for local training camps and for international guests. This will be first step to establishing our vision for Palestine MMA and building a brighter future for our children.

story:
Trained Genius has worked directly with industry leaders to provide a more cohesive link between Beam and your devices.  We will continue to expand support for popular wearables now and in the future.

 

  • Beam's key challenge is to grow a vibrant community that can support the frequency and breadth of content we wish to offer.  In order to avoid growing too fast and becoming too expensive to operate, we focus on a scalable model with coaches who teach from home.  
  • Beam's biggest risk is supplier shortages of hardware like wristbands and headsets.  To mediate this risk Beam works closely with manufacturers and has access to inventory projections and ability to order from the factory.  This reduces the risk of any surprises.
  • Sometimes the biggest risk is avoiding something new that could cause us to grow.  We've worked hard to bring you a product that can help improve your quality of life and we believe the risk we are asking you to take in experiencing it is small relative to the benefit that awaits.
story_txt:
Trained Genius has worked directly with industry leaders to provide a more cohesive link between Beam and your devices.  We will continue to expand support for popular wearables now and in the future.
 






Beam's key challenge is to grow a vibrant community that can support the frequency and breadth of content we wish to offer.  In order to avoid growing too fast and becoming too expensive to operate, we focus on a scalable model with coaches who teach from home.  

Beam's biggest risk is supplier shortages of hardware like wristbands and headsets.  To mediate this risk Beam works closely with manufacturers and has access to inventory projections and ability to order from the factory.  This reduces the risk of any surprises.
Sometimes the biggest risk is avoiding something new that could cause us to grow.  We've worked hard to bring you a product that can help improve your quality of life and we believe the risk we are asking you to take in experiencing it is small relative to the benefit that awaits.

story:
We are about to change kids footwear industry by creating the first-ever shoe for healthy foot development.

We have created this campaign to fund the production of children's footwear never seen before – the Feelmax® Kids footwear.

HEALTHIEST SHOES FOR THE GROWING FEET

After three years of development – together with foot health specialists and field testing with the most demanding clients (kids) we came up with a shoe which might well change the way kids´ footwear are produced in the future.



WHAT HAS BEEN THE PROBLEM UNTIL NOW?

Here is a shocking fact: 98% of the babies are born with perfect feet. By the age of 10 years, 50% of the kids have already developed deformities or other foot problems!!! And when we grow up this percentage goes even higher.

Terrible, isn´t it? However, people in the third world countries have extremely strong and healthy feet. WHY?

Because they don´t wear shoes! This is a fact backed by various scientific studies.

In reality, we only need shoes to protect us against extreme temperatures, parasites and sharp objects like broken glass.

Shoes can harm the foot, especially when they are not made to fit the human foot. Unfortunately, the majority of the shoes are just made to fit sales strategies or fashion trends. How many of us suffer?

Kid's foot differs in anatomy and function from the adult foot. It is wider on toes, and narrowing down towards the heel.

However, the majority of the kids’ shoes are made by downsizing the adult shoe shape – which makes the shoes extremely stiff, heavy, and of wrong shape. Totally inadequate for a small foot.

During the formative years it is very important to look after kid's developing feet as they easily adopt the shape of a shoe that is too restrictive (narrow in width). Creating problems for the rest of their life... The kid´s bones are mainly soft cartilage until they ossify (harden) by late teens, so even light pressure in wrong place can cause significant alternations in foot anatomy and bone structure.



MISSION

So, kid´s shoes requires a design and shape of their own. But no footwear manufacturer has really taken the mentioned facts into account. Our satisfied adult clients – and foot professionals – have been demanding us for correct and healthy shoes for kids, for years. Until now, there was none on the marketplace. We noticed these problems, and started the development work. The mission was to create first ever HEALTHY FOOTWEAR FOR KIDS.

We came up with a new design of children footwear that will not hamper their natural foot development.

Compared with “normal” shoes, the Feelmax® shoes are very flexible, light, and very roomy on toebox – allowing room for the correct foot development without restrictions and letting the foot muscles and tendons get their daily exercise naturally and without additional effort.


Our shoes feature an ultrathin and ultra-flexible outsole, which allows the foot to work as Mother Nature intended: with natural movement, but protected.


Our shoe construction has been patented. Some of our footwear models feature the world´s thinnest outsole: developed together with world famous tire manufacturer Continental® and made in Germany by them.

Feelmax shoes are much more complicated to produce than “normal” shoes, but we already pose a long track record, reducing the risks associated in this new field. In kid´s shoes, we will use the same proven techniques and materials we currently use in adult´s shoes, to minimize any problems. The materials are tested to be free of harmful or toxic materials – a fact of utmost importance in kid´s footwear.

Feelmax® is a company from Finland, producing the healthiest shoes and toe-socks since 1999: we are really the front-runner in this segment.



YOUR KIDS WILL LOVE FEELMAX SHOES

The Feelmaxes put smile on their face, and it´s easy to see why: They are just so comfortable, they feel so good! They don´t press the toes together, they are light: they work together with the feet, not against it.


It´s just like going barefoot... and we all know this is the way the doctor´s recommend for proper foot development. The kids don´t want to take these shoes off. Some kids of our test group even cried when they have to use normal shoes again when the winter came!


DOCTORS BACK UP FEELMAX SHOE CONCEPT

Since decades the doctors have recommended the kids to go barefoot for proper foot development. However, walking barefoot on dirty pavements exposes children's feet to the dangers of infection through accidental cuts and to severe contusions, sprains or fractures. Not to mention extreme temperatures.

Dr. Lee Bivings, a pediatrician from Atlanta, estimates 99% of new born babies have perfectly normal feet - and in his clinic more than 60% of these same, shoe-wearing babies have acquired foot disabilities at six years of age. An ideal physiological shoe, the equivalent of barefootedness, would keep babies' feet normal!

Tracy Byrne, a podiatrist specialising in podopaediatrics:
"Most children's shoes ought to come with a government health warning, they are like awful little bricks - too stiff, too rigid, with no flexibility at the sole and too much heel raise. “

And when kids are obliged to wear shoes, all one can find are styles which are stiff like casts, heavy, with all kind of unnecessary supports, pointy toeboxes and so on.

The human foot is one of the most complex parts of the body: it has 26 bones, and is laced with ligaments, muscles, blood vessels, and nerves. Because the feet of young children are soft and pliable, abnormal pressure can easily cause deformities. Neglecting foot health invites problems in other parts of the body, such as the legs and back.



 WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT

Yes, we need your support to fund this exiting project and get it running. There are considerable initial expenses connected with running this project; upfront investments must be made in outsole molds, cutting dies, shoe lasts and  material stocks associated with the production.

So we are raising funds which will enable us to produce the first shoes, expand and operate in a broader way. In the meantime, we must count on people like you, almost for the very success of this project.

We would be most grateful if you can support us; either by preordering the kid´s footwear, or... by buying the healthiest shoes or toesocks for yourself. We have several styles for adults; for big variety of uses, for ladies and gents, for old and young... You can see the current styles here:

http://store.feelmax.com/kids

And Please Don't Forget, If you read this and you want to help but you have neither time nor money it doesn’t mean that you can’t help, you can use the social media platform, to share this with your family and friends. Let's make some good noise!

We do hope you will honor our request for help. It will mean a great deal to us if you do so.



THANK YOU AND REWARDS

Please know your efforts, even the smallest, did not go unnoticed. We will continue to keep you posted on what your donation helped us achieve.

Help us get the word out and make some noise about the production of Feelmax Kids footwear campaign! Use the sharing tools on our campaign page to email your friends, tweet our cause on Twitter, or share our page on Facebook! We appreciate all your support.

Help us make it happen!

If you have any questions or need further information, please feel free to contact us


www.feelmax.com

story:
Hello world!

I am Kate, the head of the Beesy team and the creator of our brand new, 100% natural cosmetics product line called "Beesy". I am Greek but I have studied and lived abroad for more than 15 years. 

What comes to your mind when you hear the word "Greece"? (Not the economic crisis i hope....) but a country with ancient history and a tradition in several great herbs, olive oil and of course Honey!

Hippocrates, a doctor in the ancient years, used to say "we are what we eat". Our team's slogan is "we are what we put on our skin". We have all been using facial creams, body lotions, serums and anti-acne products in our lives and so this is what this project is about. 

Being fed up of trying to battle acne or moisture and hydrate our skin with expensive products from big brands containing so many chemical ingredients, we decided to create a completely natural cosmetics line where the only remedies we use are herbs, essential oils, honey, propolis, beeswax and Royal Jelly, all coming from the Greek nature and more specifically from our own beehives in Greece. 

Has it ever occured to you that the more you use "expensive" facial products that are currently on the market, the more your skin reacts to their chemical ingredients or fragrance resulting in more breakouts, allergies, etc?

After we have developed our product line, using our own raw, pure honey, propolis and royal jelly we would never return to the ordinary cosmetics products that are on the market. Our own skin has never been so soft, radiant, and hydrated ever before.

We are 100% sure that you will see the difference on your skin too, and then you will realize that this is one of the best campaigns out there to support and we will be very glad that you have had the chance to experience the difference in our products.  

Beesy raw, fresh Royal Jelly Serum (10ml)

Apply just one drop per area and you will be amazed with results! It comes in a 10ml bottle and it is the ultimate elixir of the Greek nature.  

Our fresh Royal Jelly Serum is the Greek Nature's Elixir in a 10ml bottle.

Our pure Royal Jelly serum is the answer to firming, toning and extreme nourishing for the areas around the eyes, lips and neck.

(Excuse our Greek language on the label, all products will ship in the English language. What we are saying though on the label is that it is completely natural, firming, rejuvenating, and its is raw, fresh, unrefined Royal Jelly Serum).
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Beesy Honey Body Lotion (100ml)

This is our Greek Honey Body Lotion! Raw, pure, Greek Honey, Propolis, Beeswax, Greek herb extracts and essential oils together with vitamins is all you need for a pampered skin in the most natural way. Guaranteed to love, it comes in a 100ml airless plastic dispenser, exactly as shown in the picture. 

A thorough hydrating and and nourishing body lotion, with a velvet sensation on the skin and a pleasant smell of essential oils. 

  • Deep 24hour hydration and moisturizing 
  •  Skin nourishment with only natural ingredients  
  • 100% natural formula, No Parabens, Polyamides, Paraffins or other harmful ingredients
  •  For Day & Night, Daily Use
  •  The best body lotion ever for normal to dry skin
  • 100% natural fragrance of pure essential oils
  • Non-greasy formula that absorbs quickly
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Beesy Anti-Acne Cream (50ml)

This is our Anti-Acne Cream, which naturally heals problematic skin, battles the bacteria on the skin due to the natural antiseptic "Propolis" and at the same time moisturizes and hydrates the skin due to the fresh, raw Greek Honey. It comes  in a 50ml airless plastic dispenser and it contains Grade A' essential oils.

 Deep, 24hour hydration and acne treatment
- 100% natural ingredients 
- Daily use (day/night)
- Ideal skin rebuilding and correcting
- Perfect make up foundation

-100% natural formula, No Parabens, Polyamides, Paraffins or other harmful ingredients

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Beesy Ultra / Light Day & Night Facial Cream (30ml or 50ml)

This is our unique Day & Night Facial Cream for face, eyes, neck. Wear it day and night and you will love your skin! 
It comes in two types and in two sizes:
- Ultra Facial Cream 

(A totally natural, dense, nourishing formula for damaged, dry, or older skin. It comes in a 30ml glass vase or a 50ml plastic airless dispenser). 

- Light Facial Cream
(A totally natural and thoroughly absorbing facial cream that can be used as a day or night cream for all ages, for oily, or younger skin. It comes in a 30ml glass vase or a 50ml plastic airless dispenser). 

Just one cream for face, eyes and neck. 

Just one cream for day and night. 

Just one cream for a million benefits

- Deep, 24hour hydration and moisturizing 
- Skin nourishment with only natural ingredients 
- Firming, toning, and anti-wrinkle action
- Ideal skin rebuilding and relief after being exposed to the sun and fumes
- Perfect make up foundation

- 100% natural formula, No Parabens, Polyamides, Paraffins or other harmful ingredients

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Beesy After-Shave Moisturizing Balsam (50ml)

A good after shave balm should have many attributes such as being able to rejuvenate skin, soothe, protect, relieve redness and irritation. Not only that, but a 100% natural after shave balm should leave skin thoroughly hydrated. We are therefore proud to introduce our Men's Series After Shave Face Cream for a dramatic soft skin on daily use.​

- Deep hydration and moisturizing - ideal as an after shave face cream
- Skin nourishment with only natural ingredients 
- Firming, toning, and anti-wrinkle action
- Ideal skin rebuilding and relief after being exposed to the sun and fumes

- 100% natural formula, No Parabens, Polyamides, Paraffins or other harmful ingredients

- Perfect for daily use 

Our After Shave Facial cream:

Is a  totally natural, dense, nourishing formula for gentlemen's skin

 It comes in a  50ml plastic airless dispenser

Main ingredients: pure Greek honey, propolis, Greek herb extracts, Grade A (highest quality)  healing essential oils and vitamins.


(Remember: These are the actual pictures of the actual products :))


What We Need & What You Get 

While we have already developed the formula of the products and we currently do have a very small production mainly for ourselves, friends and family, we need your help so that we can go into a massive production where people from all over the world can benefit from this incredible line of natural products. 

The funding that we wish to receive from backers will go towards:

-  buying bigger capacity production equipment

-  expanding our facilities

- buying additional equipment so that we can afford to ship bigger quantities sooner. 

  • In exchange of your priceless help, each backer buying our products and supporting us in this campaign, will be assigned a unique PROMO code, where you can be buying our products for up to 3 years with a discount or free shipping!
  • You won't have to wait long after the end of this campaign since we will start shipping immediately!
  • This campaign is flexible, since we will serve each and every backer, regardless of whether we receive the target funding goal or not. Even if we don't make it to the goal, whoever has contributed and purchased a product he is guaranteed to receive it soon after the end of the campaign. So, we 've got you covered!

The Impact of Your Contribution

The impact of your contribution is invaluable since you are basically helping to take the facial cosmetics one step forward, where with the help of the Greek Nature, we no longer need chemicals and other suspicious substances in our facial creams, serums and body lotion in order to make our skin feel good and most of all stay good!


Risks & Challenges

Please, backers, just one thing! We want you to get something that you will love, not something that you will dislike. Do you have any allergies? Then read this:

With the exception of our "No essential oil" Ultra Facial Cream  and the "No essential oil" Light Facial Cream, as well as our Fresh Royal Jelly serum, all other products do contain the highest quality essential oils for a natural fragrance and some more healing properties. 

So if you have allergies to the following:

  • Honey
  • Propolis
  • Beeswax, 
  • Royal Jelly
  • Essential Oils
Then our products are not for you. You can still pledge a dollar though and support our effort to bring to the world a  more natural series of cosmetic products straight from Greece to your door...
For those backers who have allergies Only on the essential oils, and not on the bee's products, then we 've got you covered! You can go ahead and purchase the "No essential oil" series and you can still benefit from the goodness of our products. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you cannot help!

  • Recommending us to a friend of yours would be great! Tell them what you 've found and endorse us to your friends. 
  • Share our campaign 
  • Even a $1 contribution makes a huge difference to us. 
  • Just appreciate our effort and passion for a natural and healing way of life.

Till later then Backers!


With Respect, 

Kate & the Beesy team :)
story_txt:
Hello world!

I am Kate, the head of the Beesy team and the creator of our brand new, 100% natural cosmetics product line called "Beesy". I am Greek but I have studied and lived abroad for more than 15 years. 
What comes to your mind when you hear the word "Greece"? (Not the economic crisis i hope....) but a country with ancient history and a tradition in several great herbs, olive oil and of course Honey!
Hippocrates, a doctor in the ancient years, used to say "we are what we eat". Our team's slogan is "we are what we put on our skin". We have all been using facial creams, body lotions, serums and anti-acne products in our lives and so this is what this project is about. 
Being fed up of trying to battle acne or moisture and hydrate our skin with expensive products from big brands containing so many chemical ingredients, we decided to create a completely natural cosmetics line where the only remedies we use are herbs, essential oils, honey, propolis, beeswax and Royal Jelly, all coming from the Greek nature and more specifically from our own beehives in Greece. 
Has it ever occured to you that the more you use "expensive" facial products that are currently on the market, the more your skin reacts to their chemical ingredients or fragrance resulting in more breakouts, allergies, etc?
After we have developed our product line, using our own raw, pure honey, propolis and royal jelly we would never return to the ordinary cosmetics products that are on the market. Our own skin has never been so soft, radiant, and hydrated ever before.
We are 100% sure that you will see the difference on your skin too, and then you will realize that this is one of the best campaigns out there to support and we will be very glad that you have had the chance to experience the difference in our products.  

Beesy raw, fresh Royal Jelly Serum (10ml)
Apply just one drop per area and you will be amazed with results! It comes in a 10ml bottle and it is the ultimate elixir of the Greek nature.  
Our fresh Royal Jelly Serum is the Greek Nature's Elixir in a 10ml bottle.
Our pure Royal Jelly serum is the answer to firming, toning and extreme nourishing for the areas around the eyes, lips and neck.
(Excuse our Greek language on the label, all products will ship in the English language. What we are saying though on the label is that it is completely natural, firming, rejuvenating, and its is raw, fresh, unrefined Royal Jelly Serum).---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Beesy Honey Body Lotion (100ml)

This is our Greek Honey Body Lotion! Raw, pure, Greek Honey, Propolis, Beeswax, Greek herb extracts and essential oils together with vitamins is all you need for a pampered skin in the most natural way. Guaranteed to love, it comes in a 100ml airless plastic dispenser, exactly as shown in the picture. 

A thorough hydrating and and nourishing body lotion, with a velvet sensation on the skin and a pleasant smell of essential oils. 

Deep 24hour hydration and moisturizing 
 Skin nourishment with only natural ingredients  
100% natural formula, No Parabens, Polyamides, Paraffins or other harmful ingredients
 For Day & Night, Daily Use
 The best body lotion ever for normal to dry skin
100% natural fragrance of pure essential oils
Non-greasy formula that absorbs quickly
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Beesy Anti-Acne Cream (50ml)
This is our Anti-Acne Cream, which naturally heals problematic skin, battles the bacteria on the skin due to the natural antiseptic "Propolis" and at the same time moisturizes and hydrates the skin due to the fresh, raw Greek Honey. It comes  in a 50ml airless plastic dispenser and it contains Grade A' essential oils.

 Deep, 24hour hydration and acne treatment- 100% natural ingredients - Daily use (day/night)- Ideal skin rebuilding and correcting- Perfect make up foundation
-100% natural formula, No Parabens, Polyamides, Paraffins or other harmful ingredients
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Beesy Ultra / Light Day & Night Facial Cream (30ml or 50ml)

This is our unique Day & Night Facial Cream for face, eyes, neck. Wear it day and night and you will love your skin! It comes in two types and in two sizes:- Ultra Facial Cream (A totally natural, dense, nourishing formula for damaged, dry, or older skin. It comes in a 30ml glass vase or a 50ml plastic airless dispenser). 

- Light Facial Cream
(A totally natural and thoroughly absorbing facial cream that can be used as a day or night cream for all ages, for oily, or younger skin. It comes in a 30ml glass vase or a 50ml plastic airless dispenser). 
Just one cream for face, eyes and neck. 
Just one cream for day and night. 
Just one cream for a million benefits
- Deep, 24hour hydration and moisturizing - Skin nourishment with only natural ingredients - Firming, toning, and anti-wrinkle action- Ideal skin rebuilding and relief after being exposed to the sun and fumes- Perfect make up foundation
- 100% natural formula, No Parabens, Polyamides, Paraffins or other harmful ingredients
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Beesy After-Shave Moisturizing Balsam (50ml)
A good after shave balm should have many attributes such as being able to rejuvenate skin, soothe, protect, relieve redness and irritation. Not only that, but a 100% natural after shave balm should leave skin thoroughly hydrated. We are therefore proud to introduce our Men's Series After Shave Face Cream for a dramatic soft skin on daily use.​

- Deep hydration and moisturizing - ideal as an after shave face cream- Skin nourishment with only natural ingredients - Firming, toning, and anti-wrinkle action- Ideal skin rebuilding and relief after being exposed to the sun and fumes
- 100% natural formula, No Parabens, Polyamides, Paraffins or other harmful ingredients
- Perfect for daily use 
Our After Shave Facial cream:
Is a  totally natural, dense, nourishing formula for gentlemen's skin
 It comes in a  50ml plastic airless dispenser
Main ingredients: pure Greek honey, propolis, Greek herb extracts, Grade A (highest quality)  healing essential oils and vitamins.

(Remember: These are the actual pictures of the actual products :))   What We Need & What You Get  While we have already developed the formula of the products and we currently do have a very small production mainly for ourselves, friends and family, we need your help so that we can go into a massive production where people from all over the world can benefit from this incredible line of natural products. 
The funding that we wish to receive from backers will go towards:
-  buying bigger capacity production equipment
-  expanding our facilities
- buying additional equipment so that we can afford to ship bigger quantities sooner.   In exchange of your priceless help, each backer buying our products and supporting us in this campaign, will be assigned a unique PROMO code, where you can be buying our products for up to 3 years with a discount or free shipping!
You won't have to wait long after the end of this campaign since we will start shipping immediately! This campaign is flexible, since we will serve each and every backer, regardless of whether we receive the target funding goal or not. Even if we don't make it to the goal, whoever has contributed and purchased a product he is guaranteed to receive it soon after the end of the campaign. So, we 've got you covered!

With the exception of our "No essential oil" Ultra Facial Cream  and the "No essential oil" Light Facial Cream, as well as our Fresh Royal Jelly serum, all other products do contain the highest quality essential oils for a natural fragrance and some more healing properties. 
So if you have allergies to the following:  Honey
Propolis

Royal Jelly
Essential Oils

Then our products are not for you. You can still pledge a dollar though and support our effort to bring to the world a  more natural series of cosmetic products straight from Greece to your door...
For those backers who have allergies Only on the essential oils, and not on the bee's products, then we 've got you covered! You can go ahead and purchase the "No essential oil" series and you can still benefit from the goodness of our products.    Other Ways You Can Help Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you cannot help!  Recommending us to a friend of yours would be great! Tell them what you 've found and endorse us to your friends. 
Share our campaign 
Even a $1 contribution makes a huge difference to us.  Just appreciate our effort and passion for a natural and healing way of life.   Till later then Backers!With Respect, Kate & the Beesy team :)

story:
Welcome to IDyourStuff  

"The difference between Lost & Found!"


A place that helps good Samaritans, Law Enforcement and Lost & Found Departments return lost items to their rightful owner. From high-end recovery labels for smartphones, tablets, computers, key tags, luggage & bag tags, wallets, purses, outdoor equipment and now our new personal safety GPS tracking & monitoring device, we got you covered!  


IDyourStuff as seen and talked about in:


IDyourStuff is a service disabled veteran owned small business that proudly supports breast cancer awareness and disabled veterans.  We do not have an advertising budget, So we are relying on social media and word of mouth to make our campaign and project known.  Any help would be much appreciated.

We truly believe that we can make a difference in protecting lives and property.

Our new Shadow 3G GPS personal safety device can find you, send help and bring you home from anywhere!

By simply pressing the emergency SOS button, Shadow 3G will automatically SMS text message "help me" to (3) cellphone numbers of your exact location utilizing GPS Satellite and our latest 3G cellular technology via google maps; to family, friends, and/or emergency response personnel; while simultaneously calling the (3) phone numbers stored allowing you to talk with them via two-way voice communication hands free, (just like a cellphone).   In addition, you will be able to log on to our free online GPS tracking platform to track the unit at any time.  The tracking information will provide, location, speed, altitude and much more.

With your help we can provide safety, security and peace of mind!


Features

  • Mini sized, Waterproof, rubber coating that feels comfortable
  • Real time tracking by GPS satellite
  • SOS emergency call button
  • Built-in 3D G-sensor for motion, shock alarm, power management, movement alarm
  • Two-way Voice communication (high quality hands free sound)
  • Voice monitoring
  • Rechargeable 900mah Lithium ion battery (30 day standby time)
  • Built-in vibration sensor
  • Fall down alarm for elderly, children, and medical patients
  • SMS text reply map of current position utilizing Google Maps
  • Geo-zone alarm, over speed alarm
  • Data logging of 60,000 locations
  • GPRS blind area data re-upload function
  • U-blox GPS technology
  • Firmware upgrades over the air
  • Quick Charge Docking Station

Technical Specifications

GPS Specification:
  • GPS chipset: uBlox 0702 (AGPS Support)
  • 50 Channels
  • Receiver frequency: 1575.42 MHz
  • Hot start: approx 1 second, typical TTFF (95%)
  • Cold Starts: approx 32s, typical TTFF (95%)
  • Warm start: approx 32s, typical TTFF (95%)
  • Antenna: Built-in ceramic antenna
Cellular Specs:
  • WCDMA Module: Telit UL865 (900/2100mhz and 850/1900mhz)
North America variants:
  • 2 Bands GSM/GPRS/EDGE 850 /1900 mhz (2G)
  • 2 Bands UMTS/HSPA 850 /1900 mhz (3G)
European Union variants
  • 2 Bands GSM/GPRS/EDGE 900/1800 mhz (2G)
  • 2 Bands UMTS/HSPA 900 /2100 mhz (3G)
Communication: 
  • Embedded TCP/IP over GPRS class 10, SMS messages & Voice
Antenna: Built in FPC antenna
Hardware Specifications:
  • Charging voltage: DC5v
  • Backup battery:  Rechargeable, 3.7v,800mAh (Li-Poly)
  • Connectors:  Micro USB connectors
  • SIM card:  Micro SIM card
  • Accelerometer:  Built in 3G motion sensor
  • 8MB Built-in Flash Memory
  • Normal current consumption: 40~60mAh
  • Sleep current consumption: 5~10mAh (GPS off)
Environment:
  • Operating Temperature: -20 to +80 degrees
  • Storage Temperature: -40 to +85 degrees
  • Humidity: 5%-95% non-condensing
  • Mainframe Dimensions: 61mm X 44mm X 16mm
  • Weight (NET): 35g

Why We Need your support & What you get

IDyourStuff is a new start up.  The money raised through the campaign will be used in the manufacturing of the GPS units with the latest GPS technology with 3G cellular and develop a custom web-based tracking platform with google maps.  4G technology is prevalent in the U.S. but not around the world.  2G technology is phasing out in the U.S, however 3G technology is world wide.  Bluetooth devices only work within so many feet of an object and is not that reliable out side of the range.  We are specifically targeting GPS with the 3G technology range because it is truly worldwide coverage.  We want a global product that works on all networks.  With 3G technology it will allow the unit to work in shielded environments such as indoors and enclosed areas where Satellite does not work so well.  

Perks for your Support

For your support of $25 or more, we will offer an IDyourStuff gift pack with free recovery service for your use. This includes: (1) Indigo Gloss recovery label, (1) Indigo Gloss Circular Label and (1) Recovery Key Tag.  Visit IDyourStuff.com to view products.

For your support of $149 or more we will offer the IDyourStuff gift pack plus the Shadow 3G GPS units which include a free Quick Charge Docking Station.

  • Shadow 3G will retail at $249.00

The Impact

Peace of Mind-Track and monitor anyone or anything, anywhere at anytime!

In the event of an emergency, time is of the essence and choices need to be made quickly.  In a significant emotional event, the average person will lose their fine motor skills and will be left with only gross motor skills and will do one of (3) things e.g. run, fight or freeze.  Get help when you need it.

Why IDyourStuff

Our goal is to provide products and services to help you get lost items back.  Shadow 3G is the newest addition to the IDyourStuff family of products. 
Did you know that each year millions of items are left behind by someone in airports, train stations and just about everywhere.  As seen in the picture below from TSA at LAX, millions of items are found every year.  Airline lost & found departments are full of portable electronics.  
How would you get your lost items back? We aim to solve this problem by providing strong but beautiful recovery labels and tags that can be placed on items to facilitate the return to its owner.  Help us solve this problem.

What would happen if you lost your Keys?

Key can be expensive to replace;  especially Smart Keys for your vehicle(s). The cost of replacing keys can be in excess of $250 and must be replaced at the dealership.  For a peace of mind attach one of our tough IDyourStuff Key Tags to your house or vehicle keys.  

Our heavy duty Recovery key tags solve this problem.  

The front side of the key tag shows the IDyourStuff logo, 1-800 number, web address and with a laser engraved unique serial number. The "Full Recovery Option" located on the back side of the tag displays the U.S. Post office drop off, Scan me and IDyourStuff recovery options. Key tags come with free shipping anywhere in the United States.  We also have key tags for outside of the continental United States.

We also have the ability to Brand any of our products with your logo or information.  Just think your logo and information on the front with IDyourStuff service on the back.

If you have Shadow 3G attached to your keys, you can find them anywhere in the world at a moments notice.

How can Shadow 3G help?  

The versatile usage of our GPS Shadow 3G technology is endless.  

  • Track and monitor your children
  • Senior citizens
  • Equipment
  • and much more!
Did you know that Shadow 3G can be place on your car keys and you can monitor, speed, location etc?  Yes it can do that and much more!
With your contribution we can make IDyourStuff a reality and make millions of people happy!  There are great people out there that will return found items, but only if they knew how to return it.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you still can't help a great cause:

  • Please help us get the word out about IDyourStuff and make some noise about our campaign through Facebook and Twitter etc.
  • Please visit and "Like" our website www.idyourstuff.com 
  • Indiegogo also has share tools that you can use as well!

Any help is much appreciated.  God bless!

story:
Short Summary

  • MYTH has been a part of the Idaho Parkour community since the very start back in 2004
  • We are trying to create a very new and unique gym that no one in Idaho has ever seen. 
  • Helping us achieve our goal will put not only MYTH on the map but will also put Idaho even further on the map for activities. 
  • MYTH has been hosting Parkour jams/event for the last 6 years.
  • We are going to be creating a hub of Parkour and extreme activities in Idaho and part in the North West of America. 
  • MYTH has had a helping hand in creating one of Americas first Parkour parks. Every two weeks we go down and make sure all the equipment is set right.

What We Need & What You Get

  • We are wanting to get wood, rails and various other pieces  of material to build the best gym in Idaho. 
  • We are going to be building items that no other facility in Idaho has. A place where everyone can express them selves. 
  • If we don't reach our goal, we wont be able to put much in our facility. 

The Impact

  • Helping us reach our goal will help get kids off the streets and into a fun environment where they will be mentored by instructors who have been working with kids for over 4 years. 
  • One of our students took first place in Americas first international Parkour competition. 
  • We are building kids and adults confidence in themselves by increasing their speed and strength. 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Talk to your friends and family about this campaign.
  • Please remember to use the indiegogo share tools, so we can reach the world!
