Please remember to use the indiegogo share tools, so we can reach the world!

story:
JUMP TO ENGLISH VERSION

Bereits Leonardo Da Vinci erkannte zu Recht: „Ein natürlicher Huf ist in seiner Perfektion genau so, wie das Pferd ihn braucht.“

Wir haben lange Zeit getüftelt um einen Hufschuh zu entwickeln, der diesem Meisterwerk der Natur angemessen ist.

 
 
 

 

Das alpha horse boots Gründerteam setzt sich zusammen aus Manfred, Araberzüchter und Wanderreiter, Günter, Hufschmied, Hufbearbeiter und Hufschuhfachberater seit es Hufschuhe gibt und Susanne, Pferdefachfrau und Hufschuhfachberaterin.

Mit deiner Hilfe möchten wir den ersten, zum Patent angemeldeten, in Länge und Breite veränderbaren Schuh für Pferde, mit selbstreinigender Profilsohle, auf den Markt bringen. Nach natürlichem Vorbild der Biomechanik von Pferdehufen und Menschenfüßen ist unser Hufschuh konzipiert. Er enthält Technologie aus Luft- und Raumfahrt sowie Materialien aus der Humanorthopädie. Für das Sohlenprofil haben wir die Autoreifenprofile studiert. Die Materialien für unsere Nutzung haben wir selbst geprüft, bei Herausforderungen oder Problemen Spezialisten aufgesucht.

 Ausschlaggebend für die Entwicklung sind 35 Jahre geballte Hufbearbeitererfahrung. 

Einige Partner und Investoren, die uns bei diesem Prozess begleitet haben, waren von unserem Ergebnis so überzeugt, dass sie uns halfen, die Entwicklung und die Prototypen zu finanzieren.

Kunden und Reiterfreunde waren gerne bereit, diesen neuartigen Hufschuh an ihren Pferden einem Dauertest zu unterziehen. Dank ihren wertvollen Anregungen, können wir nun eine optimale Ausführung des Hufschuhs anbieten. Die Ergebnisse sind absolut überzeugend. 

Jetzt ist er fertig und bereit für die Serienproduktion! Dafür brauchen wir Deine Hilfe! Bestelle jetzt die neuen alpha horse boots, damit wir spätestens Ende 2018 mit der Auslieferung beginnen können. Dafür benötigen wir 145.000.-€

 


Die alpha horse boots sind die einzigen in Länge und Breite verstellbare Hufschuhe. Sie sind während allen Phasen der Hufbearbeitung tragbar und bei der Umstellung von Eisen auf Barhuf perfekt anpassbar, verursachen keine Wund- und Scheuerstellen, drehen sich nicht und gehen nicht verloren.

Ihr selbstreinigendes Profil bietet optimalen Grip und höchste Stoßdämpfung. Die umlaufende Mustang Roll unterstützt den natürlichen Hufmechanismus. Ein umfangreiches Padsystem bietet eine optimale Unterstützung auch für gesundheitlich belastete Hufe.


Die neuen alpha horse boots überzeugen auch eingefleischte Hufschuhkritiker, da wir bekannte Schwachstellen herkömmlicher Hufschuhe erkannt und optimiert haben. Unabhänging von der Hufform entsteht kein Verdrehen, kein Verlieren, gibt es keine Druck- und Scheuerstellen. Das An- und Ausziehen geht schnell und ohne Werkzeug, die Reinigung ist einfach, die Optik schick und bunt.

alpha horse boots werden im Herzen Europas gefertigt, um die Belastung von Mensch und Umwelt möglichst gering zu halten. Ausbeuterische Arbeitsverhältnisse wie Kinderarbeit sind garantiert ausgeschlossen. Alle verarbeiteten Materialien sind selbstverständlich hautfreundlich, recycelbar und nachhaltig.


Wir verpflichten uns, sobald die Entwicklungs- und Herstellungskosten abgedeckt sind, von jedem verkauften Paar Schuhe mindestens 2% des Umsatzes an ein soziales Projekt zu spenden. Die Wahl des Projektes möchten wir mit Ihnen, unseren Unterstützern und Kunden, treffen. Wir wünschen uns, dass das Geld Kindern und Tieren zu Gute kommt. 

 

Unsere alpha horse boots sind in 3 Größen in der Länge und sogar 4 Größen in der Breite veränderbar. Dadurch erreichen wir eine Passform, die Verdrehen und Verlieren nahezu unmöglich macht. Die bis ins Detail ausgearbeitete, ergonomische Passform bietet Ihrem Pferd höchsten Laufkomfort und Ihnen die größtmögliche Sicherheit.

 

alpha horse boots bestehen aus 4 hochinnovativen Komponenten, die alle austauschbar / erneuerbar sind.

Halbschale mit Verstellkeilen 
Drei Keile je Schuh sorgen für die optimale Einstellung der Größe. Zum Verschmälern, Verbreitern und Steganpassen.


Geckogrip-Sohle
Höchst flexible Sohle mit selbstreinigendem und extrem rutschsicheren Profil. Auch mit Stollen und Spikes nachrüstbar.


Crossovergaiter
Umschließt nachspannbar den Huf und sorgt für perfekten Sitz. Kein Verlieren, kein Drehen, keine Druck- und Scheuerstellen!


Einlegesohle
Versenkte Einlegesohle, welche nicht verrutscht. Wahlweise in 4 mm, 6 mm für Stoßdämpfung oder mit Strahlunterstützung.

 

Zwei Jahre haben wir sehr intensiv gearbeitet und alle unsere “Hausaufgaben” gemacht sowie reitbare Prototypen gebaut. Jetzt brauchen wir deine Hilfe. Du unterstützt uns, indem du deine neuen Hufschuhe vorbestellst. Da es einige Monate dauern wird, bis deine Bestellung fertiggestellt sein wird, bedanken wir uns für deine Geduld in Form eines unschlagbar günstigen Preises. Wir rufen die Summe auf, die wir für die Produktion brauchen. Mit dem Geld können wir die Produktion finanzieren.

Warum läuft das so? Von dem Geld werden wir zunächst Werkzeuge für jede Größe herstellen lassen und Material vorfinanzieren. Auch die Lohnkosten für die erste Produktion müssen beglichen werden. Wir werden keine Menschen ausbeuten, wer arbeitet, muss sein Gehalt bekommen, jeden Monat, von Anfang an. Wer seinen fairen Lohn bekommt wird sich bemühen, die Qualität zu produzieren, die wir alle voraussetzen!

 

Was du bekommst, wenn du alpha horse boots vororderst:
Du bekommst deine alpha horse boots fertig vormontiert, in der von dir bestellten Größe. Es wird vier Größen geben. Deine Größen- und Farbwünsche fragen wir per E-Mail bei dir an, kurz bevor die Produktion beginnt. Zu jedem Schuh erhältst Du die Keile zum schmäler oder breiter machen. Die dafür benötigten Kleinteile, eine leicht verständliche Anleitung und den Schlüssel, den du zum ändern brauchst.

 

Die Halbschale der Fesselgaiter und die Klettverschlüsse sind immer schwarz gefärbt. Die Geckogrip-Profilsohle ist immer in einem tiefen, dunklen Rot. Die Gaiter sind von innen immer grau gepolstert. Die Gaiter außen gibt es in drei Farbvarianten: Pink, Türkis und Grau.

 

 

Übrigens: Wir sind von der Qualität der alpha horse boots so überzeugt, dass wir darauf eine Garantie von 2 Jahren gewähren. Mit einer kleinen Versicherung ist eine Verlängerung um weitere 12 Monate möglich. Auch unser Service wird Euch überzeugen. Kompetente Beratung, schnelle, profesionelle und kulante Abwicklung aller Angelegenheiten.

 



 

Ein kleiner Auszug aus 30 Jahre Hufschuhe anpassen !

zu finden auf Facebook

LAG Laufstall in Hübingen Westerwald

Den LAG Laufstall von Dagmar Brohl betreue ich seit mehr als 20 Jahren, und da dort immer neue Pferdebesitzer Ihre Tiere eingestellt haben, stellte ich in dieser Zeit sehr viele Pferde von Eisen auf Barhuf mit Hufschuhen um.

O Pica Pau Wandereitstation und Weiterbildungsstätte für den VFD  

Manfred & Jutta Reis mit ihrer Wanderreitstation und ihrem Weiterbildungsstall für den VFD betreue ich seit mehr als 15 Jahren. Dort habe ich Seminare, Workshops und Intensivberatungen zu Barhufpflege durchgeführt. In diesem Zeitraum wurden 40-50 Pferde von Teilnehmern auf Barhuf mit Hufschuhen umgestellt.

Claudia Hack

Danke, ohne Dich wäre ich barhuftechnisch nicht da wo ich jetzt bin. Und ohne Hufschuhe wäre ich natürlich auch nicht dahin gekommen ohne auf das Reiten verzichten zu müssen. Unsere Gegend ist recht barhufunfreundlich. Aber auch hier habe ich durch Deine kompetente Beratung Pferde, die ich nun auch hier zeitweise Barhuf reiten kann. Ich bin überglücklich, dass Du mich an Deinem Wissen teilhaben lässt und ich weiß, dass ich auf dem richtigen Weg bin. Unser Neuzugang wird nun auch mit Hufschuhen versorgt und ich bin gespannt wie schnell sich seine Hufsituation verbessern wird.

Anja Hergenröther, Michaela  Metternich, Sonja Schütz, Tina Wassum-Raab,

Martina Rabe, Laura Scharfenbeck,  und so weiter.

Anja Bernatz

Günter Weißenborn ist einfach toll! Sehr gute Erklärungen habe ich von ihm bekommen, tolle anschauliche „Stunden“ am Pferd gehabt. Meine Pferde, selbst der Rehe-Patient, haben mittlerweile super gute Hufe, dank der Hilfe von dir, lieber Günter! Wir haben viele Schuhe probiert während der Umstellungszeit, jedoch nach ein paar Wochen auch längere Strecken ohne Schuhe reiten können. Zum Fahren verwenden wir noch Schuhe, die ich durch Günters Beratung gekauft habe und bin super zufrieden.

 

ENGLISH VERSION

 

 

Even Leonardo Da Vinci rightly acknowledged: “The perfect, natural hoof is exactly what the horse needs.” For a long time, we researched what it takes to develop a horse boot appropriate for this natural masterpiece. 


 
 

For the alpha horse boots team and its development, 35 years of valid experience in hoof processing are decisive. Meet our team: Manfred, Arabian horse breeder and trail rider; Günter, blacksmith in charge of hoof care and technical horse boot consultant since horse boots exist, and Susanne, technical horsewoman and technical horse boot consultant.

With your help, we would like to launch the first, patent-pending, length- and width-adjustable shoe for horses with a self-cleaning treaded sole onto the market. Our horse boot has been conceived according to the natural model of horses’ hoofs and human feet biomechanics. It incorporates aerospace technology and materials from human orthopedics. For the sole tread, we studied automobile tire treads. We tested the materials that we use and consulted specialists when we had challenges or problems.

Several partners and investors who supported us in this process were so enthusiastic with our result that they helped us to finance the development and prototypes. Customers and equestrian fans were more than willing to subject their horses to an endurance test with this novel horse boot. Thanks to their valuable suggestions, we can now offer an optimal horse boot design.

It is now ready for production in series, but we need your help to start! Order the new alpha horse boots now so we can start manufacturing them by the end of 2017 at the latest. To achieve this, we need €145,000.00. 


Our alpha horse boots can be worn during all hoof processing stages and can be perfectly adapted during the conversion from iron to bare hoof; they do not cause any wounds and abrasion spots, they do not rotate, and do not get lost.


Their self-cleaning tread offers optimal grip and maximum impact absorption. The circumferential mustang roll supports the natural hoof mechanism. An extensive pad system offers the optimal support when the horse’s hoof is placed under pressure.


The new alpha horse boots even impress experienced horse boot technicians because we have detected known weak spots and optimized them. Regardless of the hoof shape, no twisting occurs and there are no pressure and abrasion spots. They are quickly put on and taken off without a tool, are easily cleaned, and have a stylish and colorful appearance.


alpha horse boots are made in the heart of Europe with the help of skin-friendly, recyclable, and sustainable materials that cause the least possible damage to human beings and the environment.


Together, we want to support a social project – as soon as development and manufacturing costs are covered – by donating by 2% of the profits from each pair of horseshoes sold. We would like to decide what project to support together with you, although we would very much like our donations to benefit an children's or animal aid organization.

 

Our alpha horse boots are adjustable in 3 sizes in length and even 4 sizes in width. This allows us to achieve a fit that makes twisting and losing almost impossible. The ergonomic fit developed down to the last detail offers maximum galloping comfort to your horse and the highest possible safety to you.

 

alpha horse boots are made of 4 highly innovative components, all of them exchangeable and renewable.

Half shell with adjusting wedges
Three wedges per shoe ensure the optimal adjustment of the size. For narrowing, widening and stepping.

 

Gecko grip sole
Highly flexible sole with self-cleaning and extremely non-slip profile. Can also be retrofitted with studs and spikes.

 

Crossover gaiter
For the perfect hoof fit. No losing, no turning, no pressure and scrubbing!

 

Insole
Recessed insole, which does not slip. Optional in 4 mm, 6 mm for shock absorption or with frog support

 

 

We worked very intensively the last two years and did all of our “homework”. Now we need your help. You support us by pre-ordering your new horseshoes. Since it can take several months until we complete your order, we thank you for your patience by giving you an unbeatable low price. We retrieve the sum that we need for production and are able to finance it with the money.

Why does it work that way? First, the money is used to purchase tools to manufacture all sizes and the material can be pre-financed. Labor costs for initial production must also be paid. We will not exploit any people. Everyone who works must receive a salary every month from the start. The person who receives a fair wage will make an effort to produce the quality that all of us require!

 

What you receive when you pre-order alpha horse boots:
You receive your finished, pre-assembled alpha horse boots in the size that you ordered. There will be five sizes; we will ask what size and color you want via e-mail shortly before production starts. With each shoe, you get wedges for narrowing or widening, the small parts needed for this, easily understandable instructions, and the key that you need for changing.

 

The half shell of the shackle gaiter and Velcro fastener are always black colored. The gecko grip treaded sole is always deep dark red. The gaiters are always gray padded inside. The exterior of the gaiters comes in three colors: pink, turquoise, and gray.

 


 

Incidentally, we are so convinced of the quality of the alpha horse boots that we guarantee them for 2 years. It is possible to extend the warranty by 12 additional months with a small insurance fee. Our service will also impress you. Expert advice as well as fast, professional and accommodating handling of all matters.

There will be five sizes; we will ask what size and color you want via e-mail shortly before production starts. With each shoe, you get wedges for narrowing or widening, the small parts needed for this, easily understandable instructions, and the key that you need for changing. The half shell of the shackle gaiter and Velcro fastener are always black colored. The gecko grip treaded sole is always deep dark red. The gaiters are always gray padded inside. The exterior of the gaiters comes in three colors: pink, turquoise, and gray.  Incidentally, we are so convinced of the quality of the alpha horse boots that we guarantee them for 2 years. It is possible to extend the warranty by 12 additional months with a small insurance fee. Our service will also impress you. Expert advice as well as fast, professional and accommodating handling of all matters.

story:
Did you know 38% of horses were recorded as suffering from serious health problems in the UK last year? Harrowing stories of torture, cruelty and pure evil inflicted on thousands of horses were reported. We are here to make a difference.

For every pledge you make, we are donating a generous amount to the World Horse Welfare charity. The international horse charity improves the lives of horses in the UK and around the world through education, campaigning and hands-on care.

Your money will have a direct impact on the protection of horses across the UK. Additional profits will go towards the manufacturing and launch of the entire Equizyn range. 





We are the first research based brand focused on clinical study and driving performance through recovery and maximising bioavailability. Our team have worked hard to produce a supplement blend tested at the strictest quality control parameters to guarantee a product clear of contaminants, pesticides and banned stimulants. 


It’s the meticulous attention to detail from initial ingredient sourcing to the final blend production which makes Equizyn not just an ordinary product, but rather an investment in your horses health and performance; a must for anyone in the equine industry.


The first product endorsement we received was from award-winning equestrian and member of the British Royal Family, Zara Tindall MBE, who has been using the product to reach maximum performance with High Kingdom.


 

​

Special Accreditations

Quality, health and safety are priorities here at Equitein. We operate an externally accredited partnership with Nutri-Labs that ensures we only use the highest quality ingredients. We have the following essential accreditations here at Equizyn that means you can be sure we deliver the best products at all times:

Everything you need to know

Our focus for the months ahead is adhering to our above timeline for production and fulfilment. Our team has been dedicated to creating a truly innovative product that plays an impactful role in the lives of equine athletes, and we’ll be listening and learning from the feedback of supporters in these final stages of the process.   

We will be sending regular updates to our backers so that they stay informed on product developments as they occur. We have been and remain open about the Equizyn revolution and will continue to progress with complete transparency when it comes to providing as much information as possible so you can make an informed decision.

Our goal remains unchanged: to deliver an exceptional product to our supporters on time, and with the guarantee that you will notice a difference in the recovery of your horse following extensive training and performance. We can’t thank our backers enough for their belief in Equizyn. Your support is more than just the money contributed; it is your confidence in our team and what we are looking to achieve together, and for that we are eternally grateful. 

Contact Us

To shop our comprehensive range of horse care supplements, please visit our website. For all other questions, comments and concerns, please contact us at info@equizyn.com. We are more than happy to speak with all those who have a genuine passion for the Equizyn product.

Follow us on…

story:
First Impressions - DreamPort™ Sleep Solution

Dr. Hartmut Schneider - Director Sleep Laboratory John Hopkins Bayview Sleep Disorder Centre 


Does it Really Work? Yes, It Really Does.
We received some pretty skeptical remarks from our social media audience early on - and we understand. Like you, we've been told stories of revolutionary products 'just around the corner' that never panned out. Founder & CEO Stuart Heatherington takes a unique approach to answering his critic's questions in his latest video which proves the DreamPort™ Sleep Solution does exactly what he says it will. 


Endorsement: Steve Moore - Respiratory & Sleep Device Professional

"As a 33 year veteran of the sleep therapy business I have seen the entire  progression of CPAP masks. Not much has  changed since 1984 except that manufacturers now use silicone and  somewhat lighter straps.

In  2012 I was part of the development team for the TAP PAP Nasal Pillow Mask, which was the first CPAP mask to completely eliminate headgear. The TAP PAP used a mouthpiece engaged on the upper teeth to secure it in  place. 

While the TAP PAP worked well, I find the DreamPort far more comfortable because it does not engage on the teeth, which often get very sore. The  DreamPort is extremely comfortable since it does not press against or enter my nares. It gives me freedom to move throughout the night without any leaks." 


Can Your Mask Do This? The DreamPort™ Sleep Solution Can

This Is It—The Whole Bleeping Story
Not sleeping sucks. Not sleeping and spending a fortune on CPAP devices that leak, fall off or leave strap marks on your face sucks even worse. At least, that’s the conclusion Bleep Founder & CEO Stuart Heatherington came to one fateful night at 3:30 am from the kitchen table. 

“I tried every mask solution I could find and they all sucked,” said Stuart. “There had to be a better way. Totally frustrated, sitting at the kitchen table one sleepless night I sketched out what would ultimately become the DreamPort™ Sleep Solution – the first maskless CPAP solution that actually works.”

After 8 years in development, Bleep is proud to introduce the lightest, most ergonomically accommodating CPAP solution on the planet – a device that fits comfortably and doesn’t restrict your movement – enabling patients to get a better night’s sleep and stick with their therapy.

 

How it Works
The DreamPort™ Sleep Solution consists of a DreamWay™ base unit and 32 pairs of disposable DreamPorts™(a 1-month supply). The DreamWay™ unit is made up of a 10-inch hose and universal port which connects to your existing 6-foot or 7-foot CPAP supply line. The DreamPorts™ use a hypoallergenic surgical tape, manufactured by 3M, to keep the port in place which works very much like a high quality adhesive bandage. 

Before sleeping, peel the backing off each DreamPort™, position over each nostril and secure the adhesive to the shape of your nose. Once in position, snap the DreamPorts™ into the flexible DreamWay™ unit and connect to your supply line. Once in place, turn on your CPAP pump as you normally would.

What We Will Do With the Funding
Bleep’s goal is simple: To make the best bleeping CPAP solutions on the planet. We won’t stop until every sleep apnea patient is sleeping like a baby.

Every dollar contributed will be used to achieve our four primary objectives:

  • To support product testing
  • To better the user experience
  • To accelerate manufacturing, and
  • To increase consumer awareness

Simply put, the more money we raise, the better we can make our products, the more sleep apnea patients we can reach and the sooner we can put a DreamPort™ Sleep Solution into the hands of patients.
 

What We're Trying to Achieve
We want to give every man, woman and child effected by sleep apnea a great night’s sleep. Our goal is simple: To make sleep apnea solutions that are comfortable enough that people will wear them, and work well enough that people will stick with them.


 

Nothing Motivates Like Personal Experience


A lifelong sleep apnea sufferer, Stuart has a keener interest than most in getting a good night’s sleep. He knows what it’s like to wake up more tired than when you go to bed. He knows what it means to snore so loudly your spouse and family members flee to the far corners of the house or banish you to the spare bedroom to get some relief. He knows the experience of being on the cusp of a deep, restful sleep, only to have it ruined by a few loud snorts and labored breaths of his own making.

Simply put, sleep apnea is no bleeping fun . . . and Stuart knows that first hand.
 


Stuart’s passion for finding a sleep solution that would work quickly became a full-time effort. At the time, his wife-to-be was working in the Carolina health system, caring for patients suffering from various sleep ailments. When she alerted him to an open position on the 3rd shift of a well-respected Carolina hospital, Stuart jumped at the opportunity to help his sleep-deprived brethren find that all-too-elusive good night’s rest.

Study after study, patient after patient, he observed and noted what patients liked and what they struggled with—what worked, what didn’t—and contemplated which things he might be able to improve upon and how. He became a registered sleep technician, and eventually went on to own and operate his own sleep lab. More studies. More patients. More observations.
 



 

This Isn't For Everyone—But It is for Most Everyone
“DreamPort™ isn’t for everyone . . . but it is for MOST sleep apnea sufferers,” Stuart explains of the device:

  • If you perspire a lot, it’s not for you (the adhesive won’t stick - you can sweat it off);
  • If you’re one of the few who are sensitive to tape, it’s not for you (though the tape is high quality hypoallergenic surgical tape); and
  • If you require a full CPAP mask (that’s 15% of all mask-wearing patients), it’s not for you
  • If you don’t like washing your face or taking off makeup at night to apply it, it’s not for you. It won’t stay on nearly that well and do what it’s supposed to, NOT leak.

But for the vast majority of sleep apnea sufferers—next to achieving an outright cure—DreamPort™ is exactly what they’ve been hoping for all their sleep-deprived lives.

There’s no chafing, no hissing due to leaks, no ugly and irritating mask or hair lines (yes, that’s a “thing”), and we believe patients using the DreamPort™ Sleep Solution are more likely to stay compliant, which means better outcomes and better sleep.
 


 

Why We're Better
No headgear means greater comfort and no claustrophobia No straps means you won’t have lines on your face in the morning Our patented DreamPort™ design ensures no leaks during the nightOur disposable design protects against bacteria buildup Bleep CPAP solution is lightweight and flexible enough to be worn before sleepBleep gives new and existing users a better experience – increasing patient success All Bleep solutions are designed to be 100% compatible with any existing CPAP device on the market.


 

FAQ's

Will the DreamPort Sleep Solution work with my existing pump?

Yes. The DreamPort Sleep Solution includes a 10 inch hose and connector which will attach to your existing 6' or 7' supply hose. Just plug it in and you're good to go. If you'd like to see a demonstration, please view the Indiegogo video. Near the end, Stuart connects the hose while on set.

How long does it last? Do I have to wash this thing?

Yes, you should wash your DreamPortSleep Solution each day. While the DreamPort Sleep Solution is disposable by design and intended only to be used for 30-days, you can reduce your risk of nosocomial infection by cleaning before or after each use. Each quarter, you will receive a completely new set. The DreamPorts themselves (the adhesive strips with connectors) are only good for a single use and should be disposed of daily - 1 set per day.

Do I need a prescription for the DreamPort Sleep Solution?

Yes. The DreamPort Sleep Solution is by prescription only.

Will the adhesive really work? More importantly, will it hurt to take off?

Yes, they really work. And no, it shouldn't hurt to take it off. The adhesive tape is a high quality hypoallergenic surgical tape manufactured by 3M and is in use on other medical products. If you would like to see what it's like to apply them, watch our 1 lb. Mask Challenge here.

Are the DreamPorts invasive? Do they go IN my nose?

No. The DreamPorts are designed to meet AT your nostril, but do not enter your body like other nasal pillow designs.

How much will the DreamPort cost?

The cost will be on par with your existing CPAP solution - following Medicare's replacement schedule.

Is the DreamPort device FDA approved?

Bleep's paperwork has been submitted and we are awaiting FDA 510K clearance. We have answered their first round of product questions and are hopeful that we will have approval Q1 of 2018.

Is the DreamPort available Internationally?

Currently, the DreamPort Sleep Solution will only be available in the United States, but we will be considering International sales in the near future.

What is your refund policy?

Our campaign is subject to the standard terms and conditions of Indiegogo which can be reviewed here.

Can I get a DreamPort Sleep Solution today?

Bleep is not soliciting or accepting pre-orders or orders prior to receiving FDA 510K clearance. However, you can purchase a voucher or help us by making a financial contribution on Indiegogo.


Get Involved
Support us on Indiegogo and help us bring the DreamPort Sleep Solution to the 18 million people diagnosed with sleep apnea. If you or someone you know is a sleep apnea sufferer, send them a link to our campaign and let them know a better solution is coming soon.

From everyone at Bleep, thank you for your support. We are committed to our goal: To make the best bleeping CPAP solutions on the planet. And we won’t stop until every sleep apnea patient is sleeping like a baby.
 


 

Meet the Team

Disclaimer: This crowdfunding campaign is subject to the standard terms and conditions for Indiegogo crowdfunding campaigns. The Bleep DreamPort Sleep Solution is awaiting FDA 510K clearance.  We anticipate product launch in the middle or second half of 2018. Additionally, specific product claims are subject to adjustment based upon results of additional testing and studies. Please note that Bleep is not soliciting or accepting pre-orders or orders prior to receiving FDA 510K clearance.

story:
It’s a scientific fact: you’re designed to interact with nature – but you probably don't do it enough. Nature plays critical roles in human health, performance, life quality and happiness. As few as five minutes spent in nature relaxes you, increases mental acuity, makes you happier, smarter, and nicer. Life without enough nature increases stress, anxiety, depression, inhibits cognitive performance and compromises physical and mental health. National Geographic’s story, This Is Your Brain on Nature, explains why nature’s experience is such a big deal to us – and why more than 80% of us don’t get enough of it.

 

 

When getting into nature isn’t convenient or possible, Life Environments™ is the next best thing to being there! Life Environments immerses you in lifelike audio experiences engineered to disrupt the cognitive processes that drive stress, anxiety and depression. From thunderous oceans and lush forests to streams and life as it happens, you’re immersed in deliciously unexpected experiences that de-stress and refresh you naturally. Unlike traditional nature audio where you're simply a listener, Life Environments™ makes you part of ultra-realistic natural spaces whenever, where ever and however you need to escape.

 

 

Life Environments™ is driven by a new type of audio technology. Surroundia™ audio technology, pioneered by Explorers Like Us Cinema and Sound, uses the structures of your head to deliver experiences so lifelike you and your brain will think you’re there. That’s where the therapeutic magic begins! All you need is headphones (preferred) or earbuds to start putting nature to work!

 

 

 

Each Life Environments™ exploration starts as a film-like production with crews and producers and directors. For each hour of finished production, more than 1400 hours of work is performed. Our production crews travel around the globe to capture the extraordinary environments our post-production teams bring to life. It’s rarely easy or pretty – but the results are worth the effort. To make things really interesting, we’ve decided to spice things up a bit by inviting supporters like you to join our production process!

Here’s your opportunity to take part in a first-ever exploration of America’s aural signature in spectacular lifelike 3D sound! Who said that being a backer is solely financial? While your support will help us produce at least 10 finished hours of immersive audio experiences, it’s also your ticket to a behind the scenes look at our crews at work capturing the magic!

 

As a backer, you will…

  • Bring an exciting new technology to life with your gracious support.
  • Receive great discounts for you, your friends, colleagues and family!
  • Receive web credit for your generous support.
  • Have your voice heard and help us choose the new environments we’ll capture and produce.
  • Engage with our production team in the field live via periodic satellite feeds.
  • Enjoy meetup invitations along the way.
  • Enjoy pre-release access to our new productions.
  • And more unexpected surprises!

 

Our technology is built, tested and proven. Our crews are ready. All we need is you!  Now it's your turn to become part of this amazing project!


 

If you’re one of the more than 6 million kids admitted into American hospitals each year, here’s some great news! Research shows there's nothing better, more effective or safer than nature’s experience to de-stress and refresh patients - including medicine. Research also shows reduced stress, anxiety and depression result in superior clinical outcomes. Life Environments™ was developed originally to help healthcare patients heal and feel better using nature’s experience instead of medication. It works beautifully - and it requires no painful needles!

In 2018, Life Environments™ therapeutic audio will be made available to all accredited children’s hospitals in America free of charge! This is made possible by amazing customers and supporters like you! We hope to extend this to other countries soon.

 

 

Whether it’s taking a break from your hectic day at work or home, adding something new to your exercise routine, de-stressing before a medical procedure or presentation you’re heading or simply easing into a more restful sleep, it’s comforting to know you’re just a few clicks away from a healthy and refreshing escape.

Life Environments™ makes it possible to refresh your day your way! We keep things fresh with new explorations and a cost that won’t break the bank. Make your escapes the best experiences of your day with Life Environments™.

 

 

 

It’s simple: we need your help spreading the word – and we’re ready to reward you for your effort! For every 25 referrals you send us, we’ll send you a free non-expiring annual personal gift subscription to Life Environments™ - a $120 value! Send us 100 referrals and we’ll send you 5 non-expiring annual subscriptions to do with what you want! That’s a $600 thank you for helping us spread the word!

Will you drive the most backers to our project? If so, you will receive a spectacular signed and numbered limited edition fine art photographic work from our expedition valued at more than $5,000 – and an invitation to join us on our production location for a very long, tiring and inspirational day - if you’re up to it!

Important: Please remember to use IndieGoGo's sharing tools to refer your friends and receive proper credit for your referrals.

 

We’re looking to raise a minimum of $25,000 to create 10 hours of Life Environments experiences. If we exceed our goal, we’ll extend our production schedule to complete even more segments. If less, we’ll apply those funds to our exploration and start our project as planned.

 

This is an estimated timeline with provisions for inclement weather or other unanticipated events.

 

 

WHY DOESN'T LIFE ENVIRONMENTS USE BREATHTAKING VIDEOS?

We get asked this lots! In short, videos compete for the attention of the same brain centers we work with and inhibits those processes that refresh and rejuvenate your brain. Life Environments™ works in tandem WITH your brain to stimulate and refresh it in healthy ways using specially engineered sound only. Relaxing with video, on the other hand, is highly disruptive. It's like falling asleep with the television on - it never delivers a healthy or restful sleep.

 

DON’T NATURE VIDEOS AND AUDIO RECORDINGS DO THE SAME THING LIFE ENVIRONMENTS™ DOES?

Not even close. Life Environments™ experiences interact with your brain in ways that reduce anxiety, stress and their effects. Part of what makes this possible is the dynamic precision and natural presentation of our sound experience, or soundstage. Traditional nature audio tracks can “bore” your brain quickly with limited soundstages that are not representative of captured environments.

 

IS LIFE ENVIRONMENTS SAFE?

Yes – but use common sense! If you’ve experienced a traumatic event in a particular location or environment, you may not want to experience those Life Environments™ experiences. If you suffer any mental health challenge, always consult with your mental health physician before using Life Environments™.

 

HOW DO YOU DELIVER 3D SOUND FROM STEREO HEADPHONES AND EARBUDS?

Magic and lots of yummy coffee!

 

CAN I DOWNLOAD LIFE ENVIRONMENTS™ EXPLORATIONS AND USE THEM OFFLINE?

No. Life Environments™ audio explorations incorporate special encoding that requires online listening. Traditional audio models and compression algorithms cannot accommodate the amount of digital information required to replicate our environments accurately. The good news is we’re working with Apple to overcome these technical challenges.

 

DO YOU RECOMMEND EARPHONES OR EARBUDS?

We most recommend a quality pair of earphones to receive the most benefit from your Life Environments™ experience; earbuds will do as well but will lack some of the experience of headphones. However, do NOT use noise-cancelling technologies. They destroy the aural experience. We strongly prefer quality wireless (Bluetooth not Radio Frequency or “rf”) noise isolating earphones.

 

HOW EASY IS LIFE ENVIRONMENTS™ TO USE?

Easy Peasy. Simply access your Life Environments™ subscription from an Internet-capable and connected device and choose your experience, add headphones or earbuds, adjust the volume then sit back and immerse yourself in refreshing goodness!

 

SHOULD I USE LIFE ENVIRONMENTS™ WHEN DRIVING?

NOOOOO! Life Environments™ stimulates your brain in ways that distract from your surroundings! Never use Life Environments™ when performing any task that requires your undivided attention. Ever.

 

CAN I EXPERIENCE LIFE ENVIRONMENTS™ USING LOUDSPEAKERS?

You can listen to Life Environments™ through loudspeakers, but you will lose the spatial characteristics and cognitive experience of its sound. For instance, positional, direction and proximal perception cannot be experienced through loudspeakers.

 

WHAT HAPPENS OF I FALLS ASLEEP WHILE LISTENING?

That depends. If you are an airline pilot at work, Life Environments™ will deliver you to the scene of the accident. In a safe location, however, you will hopefully experience a more restful sleep and awesome dreams of faraway places. Each Life Environments™ exploration lasts about 30 minutes. If you fall asleep during this time, the exploration will close out gracefully to silence. Enjoy!

 

WILL LIFE ENVIRONMENTS™ EXPLORATIONS MAKE ME SLEEPY?

Not necessarily. In fact, none will unless you want them too! Unlike traditional audio and videos that are repetitive and BORE your brain (not a healthy or effective way to relax), Life Environments™ STIMULATES your brain in ways that inhibit stress and anxiety. This means that Life Environments™ are adaptive and tend to enhance the activity or outcome you use them with. While many prefer to sit back relax, others use Life Environments™ when running, exercising or other activities to enhance their experience. The choice is yours!

 

HOW ARE LIFE ENVIRONMENTS™ MADE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC?

Life Environments™ is available through a subscription program that allows access using most Internet-capable and enabled devices. Users pay an affordable monthly or annual fee to access Life Environments™ explorations wherever, whenever and however they like.

 

WHY WE GET UP IN THE MORNING?

Coffee ...and to let our chief of morale/official food taster with a fuzzy butt outside for a few moments.

 

We’re Explorers Like Us Cinema and Sound – a cinema innovation company. We develop innovative technologies that make cinematic experiences more engaging. We’re former executives, engineers, doctors, scientists, filmmakers, analysts, consumer experts, geeks - and a chief of morale/official food taster with a fuzzy butt. We’re dedicated rule-breakers and conventional thought slayers with serious science and common-sense addictions we focus on real-world problems in innovative ways. In short, we’re making life a better place to be.

We work every day to make life better to be with advanced science and thinking. Our work is made possible by a cast of hundreds of the brightest minds in the world – and wonderful people like you! Here are the key players that keep this train on its tracks - most of the time.

 

Let's face it, bringing new advanced technology is replete with risks and challenges. The good news is we've eliminated the most important ones.

Life Environments introduces powerful new technologies and capabilities to the market. It is undeniably a complex product. Your first question should be, “is this technically possible – and can this team really do it?” We had the same questions years ago.

We decided the best way to address risks was to build, test and implement Life Environments first – then ask for your support. Over the past three years, we’ve worked hard, failed and worked even harder to make Life Environments a reality. It hasn’t been easy or pretty. However, we ultimately succeeded with perseverance and some of the brightest minds in the world. That’s right – our success has been made possible by experts with lots of letters after their names from around the world in areas of medicine, cognition, neurology, medicine, physics, consumer research, more physics, and entertainment technology geeks like us – and even more physics! In short, the technology development risks have been eliminated and we’re ready for the next step – our premier project!

We’ve worked hard to mitigate the risks and challenges of creating this series. We own all technology and have backups ready for when life happens. Connecting in real time with our supporters can limit access in some areas due to digital and satellite access, but this has no effect on the completion of our project.

One of our greatest threats is noise pollution – it’s a very big deal for us and you too! With more than 87,000 flights in America each day, aircraft represent the single greatest challenge we deal with. Transportation and road noise come in a distant second. However, with our custom-built audio capabilities, we can remove most errant sounds successfully while preserving the realism of the original environment. Naturally, “audio surgery” adds time, but we plan for this when scouting locations and project production.

But, what about lions and tigers and bears and things that go bump in the night? Field dangers are always at the forefront of our production planning. We work with local experts in environmental, wildlife, security and other safety considerations before capturing an environment. For every hour we produce, more than 100 hours goes into risk mitigation. Believe it or not, ticks and mosquitoes are some of our greatest challenges! (You’ll learn how we deal with them in one of our livecasts!) While we cannot eliminate all risks, we work hard to mitigate them as much as possible for the safety of our crews and success of our projects.

Like you, we also worry about things like zombie apocalypses, acts of God and Mountain Dew and Costa Rican Tarrazu coffee shortages.
story_txt:
It’s a scientific fact: you’re designed to interact with nature – but you probably don't do it enough. Nature plays critical roles in human health, performance, life quality and happiness. As few as five minutes spent in nature relaxes you, increases mental acuity, makes you happier, smarter, and nicer. Life without enough nature increases stress, anxiety, depression, inhibits cognitive performance and compromises physical and mental health. National Geographic’s story, This Is Your Brain on Nature, explains why nature’s experience is such a big deal to us – and why more than 80% of us don’t get enough of it.  When getting into nature isn’t convenient or possible, Life Environments™ is the next best thing to being there! Life Environments immerses you in lifelike audio experiences engineered to disrupt the cognitive processes that drive stress, anxiety and depression. From thunderous oceans and lush forests to streams and life as it happens, you’re immersed in deliciously unexpected experiences that de-stress and refresh you naturally. Unlike traditional nature audio where you're simply a listener, Life Environments™ makes you part of ultra-realistic natural spaces whenever, where ever and however you need to escape.  Life Environments™ is driven by a new type of audio technology. Surroundia™ audio technology, pioneered by Explorers Like Us Cinema and Sound, uses the structures of your head to deliver experiences so lifelike you and your brain will think you’re there. That’s where the therapeutic magic begins! All you need is headphones (preferred) or earbuds to start putting nature to work!   Each Life Environments™ exploration starts as a film-like production with crews and producers and directors. For each hour of finished production, more than 1400 hours of work is performed. Our production crews travel around the globe to capture the extraordinary environments our post-production teams bring to life. It’s rarely easy or pretty – but the results are worth the effort. To make things really interesting, we’ve decided to spice things up a bit by inviting supporters like you to join our production process!Here’s your opportunity to take part in a first-ever exploration of America’s aural signature in spectacular lifelike 3D sound! Who said that being a backer is solely financial? While your support will help us produce at least 10 finished hours of immersive audio experiences, it’s also your ticket to a behind the scenes look at our crews at work capturing the magic! As a backer, you will…
Bring an exciting new technology to life with your gracious support.
Receive great discounts for you, your friends, colleagues and family!
Receive web credit for your generous support.
Have your voice heard and help us choose the new environments we’ll capture and produce.
Engage with our production team in the field live via periodic satellite feeds.
Enjoy meetup invitations along the way.
Enjoy pre-release access to our new productions.
And more unexpected surprises!
 Our technology is built, tested and proven. Our crews are ready. All we need is you!  Now it's your turn to become part of this amazing project! If you’re one of the more than 6 million kids admitted into American hospitals each year, here’s some great news! Research shows there's nothing better, more effective or safer than nature’s experience to de-stress and refresh patients - including medicine. Research also shows reduced stress, anxiety and depression result in superior clinical outcomes. Life Environments™ was developed originally to help healthcare patients heal and feel better using nature’s experience instead of medication. It works beautifully - and it requires no painful needles!In 2018, Life Environments™ therapeutic audio will be made available to all accredited children’s hospitals in America free of charge! This is made possible by amazing customers and supporters like you! We hope to extend this to other countries soon.  Whether it’s taking a break from your hectic day at work or home, adding something new to your exercise routine, de-stressing before a medical procedure or presentation you’re heading or simply easing into a more restful sleep, it’s comforting to know you’re just a few clicks away from a healthy and refreshing escape.Life Environments™ makes it possible to refresh your day your way! We keep things fresh with new explorations and a cost that won’t break the bank. Make your escapes the best experiences of your day with Life Environments™.   It’s simple: we need your help spreading the word – and we’re ready to reward you for your effort! For every 25 referrals you send us, we’ll send you a free non-expiring annual personal gift subscription to Life Environments™ - a $120 value! Send us 100 referrals and we’ll send you 5 non-expiring annual subscriptions to do with what you want! That’s a $600 thank you for helping us spread the word!Will you drive the most backers to our project? If so, you will receive a spectacular signed and numbered limited edition fine art photographic work from our expedition valued at more than $5,000 – and an invitation to join us on our production location for a very long, tiring and inspirational day - if you’re up to it!Important: Please remember to use IndieGoGo's sharing tools to refer your friends and receive proper credit for your referrals. We’re looking to raise a minimum of $25,000 to create 10 hours of Life Environments experiences. If we exceed our goal, we’ll extend our production schedule to complete even more segments. If less, we’ll apply those funds to our exploration and start our project as planned. This is an estimated timeline with provisions for inclement weather or other unanticipated events.  WHY DOESN'T LIFE ENVIRONMENTS USE BREATHTAKING VIDEOS?We get asked this lots! In short, videos compete for the attention of the same brain centers we work with and inhibits those processes that refresh and rejuvenate your brain. Life Environments™ works in tandem WITH your brain to stimulate and refresh it in healthy ways using specially engineered sound only. Relaxing with video, on the other hand, is highly disruptive. It's like falling asleep with the television on - it never delivers a healthy or restful sleep. DON’T NATURE VIDEOS AND AUDIO RECORDINGS DO THE SAME THING LIFE ENVIRONMENTS™ DOES?Not even close. Life Environments™ experiences interact with your brain in ways that reduce anxiety, stress and their effects. Part of what makes this possible is the dynamic precision and natural presentation of our sound experience, or soundstage. Traditional nature audio tracks can “bore” your brain quickly with limited soundstages that are not representative of captured environments. IS LIFE ENVIRONMENTS SAFE?Yes – but use common sense! story:
This campaign is near and dear to my heart, because I have had to personally experience the problem at hand. I was in a house fire that resulted in amputations of two of my limbs. Having lived the limitations from wearing Prosthetics due to constant pain, I decided to turn my pain into purpose by coming up with a solution to the problem.

Through the frustrations of not being able to attend many important events or just take a short walk, I tried several homemade solutions. Then the idea for a product came to mind, but I realized I would need professional help to bring it to life. Now I have retained the service of a company that would be in charge of production. However, I would need funding to make that idea a reality, hence the reason for this campaign. Any contribution will be greatly appreciated, as it will transform the lives of many. Thank you in advance for your support.

However, I would need funding to make that idea a reality, hence the reason for this campaign. Any contribution will be greatly appreciated, as it will transform the lives of many. Thank you in advance for your support.

story:
Help us scale up and phase out single use plastic bottles... and get some of our awesome natural bugspray at great savings!

We are in the process of doing some more field testing, adding products, re-vamping our bottling process, and phasing out single-use plastic bottles, replacing them with aluminum travel-size (which are 35% bigger too!) and blue glass.  Whew! It's been a busy summer! We are also working to create relationships with local farmers to grow and distill the essential oils for our products, so that we can ensure that the ingredients are organic and of the highest quality.

When you support our campaign, we will send you some of our amazing and all-natural bug spray as perks (at great discounts from the retail price)!  We are sending these perks out immediately.  We also offer some fun perks to help you celebrate the summer and enjoy your time outdoors!

It's been a rainy, mosquito and tick filled season in many parts of the country, and we've heard that mosquito activity is up about 30% in some places! Yikes! It's a huge tick season as well. The good news is that you don't need to soak yourself in toxic chemicals to keep the mosquitoes and ticks at bay. Years of informal field testing have given us some astonishing results, and we are continually improving our recipes. We've had some very promising USDA testing as well, with some of our preliminary tests in the Florida mosquito testing station yielding over 4 hours of complete protection! We recommend you re-apply every 2 hours for best results, however, especially if you are outside engaged in outdoor activities. Our water-based repellent is light and non-greasy, can be applied to clothes and skin. Our oil-based Wildthings Extreme is our fiercest potion (for skin only), lasting a few hours, with a light citrus scent. 

Two of the bigger costs on the horizon for us are:

Bottling equipment

Distilling equipment for essential oils

We have a commitment to locally made, small-batch, high-quality products, and we do all of our manufacturing in-house. Your contribution to our campaign will help make these dreams a reality for us! :)

 

About Wildthings...

We make 100% Natural, Wildly Effective, Insect Repellent 

We believe in keeping ingredients simple and pure. Our bug repellent is made from the highest quality essential oils,  which are both non-toxic and nourishing for the skin. Originally made as a safe and effective bug repellent for our own children, Wildthings is 100% natural, and contains no synthetic chemicals or artificial additives. And it is wildly effective!

Studies have shown that one of our plant ingredients is stronger than DEET at repelling mosquitoes. Rose geranium, catmint and witch hazel  are known for their skin-healing, soothing properties. Our essential oils are also commonly used in aromatherapy mixtures to bring a sense of calm and well-being. Keeps bugs away, 

Working with essential oils means working with some of nature's most divine scents. Wildthings comes in 3 varieties: Lavender, Citrus Wildflower, and Forest, which has a hint of patchouli. 

Our immediate goal is to provide the best possible products and to raise awareness of the efficacy of natural ingredients.  These products are not only healthier for our bodies and the earth, but we believe that they actually work better than the synthetic, toxic alternatives. We are also expanding our product line to include insect repelling products for the home, as well as pets, reducing the chemical load our bodies are exposed to on a daily basis. 

www.wildthingsbugspray.com

*  5% of the  proceeds from our fundraiser will be donated to support charities we love: Panthera and Arcadia Center for Food and Agriculture

Who we are...

Wildthings  grew out of founder Monica Campbell's lifelong passion for herbal remedies and natural skin products. We believe that the products that you put on your skin, and on your children's skin, should be totally natural and as pure as possible.  A family-owned business, we craft our bug spray and other products in small batches, using essential oils sourced from sustainably grown herbs, organic whenever possible. After 19 wonderful years at Cedarberry Farm, we have moved our small startup business to the Allegheny mountains of West Virginia. We are grateful for the community of artists, musicians, outdoors enthusiasts, and organic farmers that is thriving here, surrounded by spectacular wilderness and nourished by the blessing of this good Earth.

**We can only ship Wildthings insect repellent within the United States at this point.

Toward a greener and healthier world...

story:
Summary

We are coming up on our 2 year anniversary this April! We often hear from people that they really want to check us out but just haven't taken the leap. We still hear from people who are only hearing about us for the first time! We have a great community already and it is growing. Our mission is life changing. We are just getting started!

FLY is fully independent and locally owned. We offer classes for adults of all ages, kids and teens including: pole fitness, aerial hoop, aerial hammock/sling, pole silks, and a full spectrum of fitness and wellness/recovery options.

What We Need

It's no secret that new businesses are vulnerable in the first few years. In the first 18 months of business FLY has endured and survived changes in ownership and management, however those changes caused a spiral effect of costs. The mounting costs have put FLY in a particularly vulnerable position. We've worked hard to recover but have reached a critical point where we have to show some vulnerability and need to request short term support to come through so that we can keep providing amazing opportunities and expanding our community focus.

The Impact

Our mission is focused on all aspects of wellness. Our "First. Love. Yourself." motto represents:

  • promoting mental wellness through creative outlets;
  • keeping active through both the fun and serious sides of fitness;
  • caring for and accepting yourself where you are now;
  • loving the skin you are in;
  • striving to feel good inside and out;
  • improving yourself compared only to yourself;
  • living well through safe and functional movement; and
  • ditching unattainable ideals.

We network with experts and service providers to bring personal growth opportunities through our space and community. We are absolutely changing lives!

Other Ways You Can Help

Any and all support is greatly appreciated! We are also planning events and experiences over the next few months which are also aimed at surviving the current crunch. If you have been procrastinating trying out our classes, don't hesitate any longer, take advantage of the perks with this campaign! We seriously can't wait to meet you!

  • Any donation amount helps!
  • Share this campaign to get the word out!
  • Watch for more exciting boosting events coming to FLY soon!

We've worked hard to recover but have reached a critical point where we have to show some vulnerability and need to request short term support to come through so that we can keep providing amazing opportunities and expanding our community focus.

The Impact
Our mission is focused on all aspects of wellness. Our "First. Love. Yourself." motto represents:

promoting mental wellness through creative outlets;
keeping active through both the fun and serious sides of fitness;
caring for and accepting yourself where you are now;
loving the skin you are in;
striving to feel good inside and out;
improving yourself compared only to yourself;
living well through safe and functional movement; and
ditching unattainable ideals.

We network with experts and service providers to bring personal growth opportunities through our space and community. We are absolutely changing lives!
Other Ways You Can Help
Any and all support is greatly appreciated! We are also planning events and experiences over the next few months which are also aimed at surviving the current crunch. If you have been procrastinating trying out our classes, don't hesitate any longer, take advantage of the perks with this campaign! We seriously can't wait to meet you!

Any donation amount helps!
Share this campaign to get the word out!
Watch for more exciting boosting events coming to FLY soon!

story:
I've spent more than a decade working in the healthcare world, and I'm passionate about solving the Vitamin D deficiency and stopping human trafficking.  

To me, Vitamin D to the Rescue is a win-win situation.  We've created a Vitamin D service that will deliver high quality Vitamin D3 right to your door.  We've even got an auto-ship program called "Team Rescue".  It drives me crazy to think that millions of people are plagued with health problems that really could be remedied with a simple, safe and inexpensive Vitamin D supplement.  

With Vitamin D to the Rescue we can harness the power of millions of people improving their health with Vitamin D by giving $5 from every bottle sold to organizations who are making a difference in the fight against human trafficking. 

Ending human trafficking is an incredibly complex problem with many aspects to it.  No matter how you look at it, the organizations that are making a difference need money.  This is a mechanism for funding the good work.

We need to be able to tell our story on the national stage....and eventually the international stage.

 

Making compelling video content for social media platforms cost money.  So does manufacturing high quality Vitamin D3 and upgrading our website.  

We need $20,000:

  • Place our first mass quantity bulk order from our manufacturer.
  • Upgrade our website and social media. 
  • Create professional videos featuring real stories of human trafficking survivors, real testimonies of Vitamin D supplementation improving health and telling the story and mission of Vitamin D to the Rescue.

We were inspired by Tom's Shoes, Charity: Water and Bombas Socks. 

 

You could donate money directly to a non-profit fighting human trafficking or better yet, you can help us create a massive platform for raising a lot of money to fight human trafficking while also creating awareness of the epidemic of Vitamin D deficiency and the atrocity of human trafficking. We can take your donated dollar and multiply it.

Risks & Challenges

One of the challenges we face is that many people have no idea of the importance of Vitamin D.  I have spent the past decade learning how to educate people about this and I'm happy to share that awareness is growing.  

Another challenge is that many people are unaware of the magnitude of the problem of human trafficking, but the awareness is growing!  I sit on the board of a local non-profit that fights human trafficking in my area, and we've learned that initially our primary mission is to spread awareness in our community.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute to this crowdfunding campaign, you can go to our website www.vitamindtotherescue.com and get yourself a high quality bottle of Vitamin D3 to supplement your health.  At the very least, like our facebook page @VitaminDtotheRescue and help us get the word out!

story:
AERO-SWING Training Approach Introduction

My name is Bill Orosz and I am the inventor of the AERO-SWING Training Approach for Golf.  

I am an Engineer and an avid golfer.  The Aero-Swing is a patented swing speed product I invented over a year ago.  I have multiple patents in technical fields and also in the golfing world.

This campaign is dedicated to taking Aero-Swing to the next level;  AERO-SWING TRAINING APPROACH - Providing a Swing Speed shaft "Aero-Shaft" specifically made to hold Aero-Swings to help increase a golfer's swing speed.  A higher swing speed translates into a golf ball going further.  This system will come with a complete video tutorial on how to use the products and obtain your maximum swing speed.

Any funds generated from this site will help the Aero-Swing Training Approach (TA) reach the next level in helping golfers attain their ultimate swing speed levels.  I am passionate about taking this next generation of Aero-Swing to the golfing world.  There are many other swing speed products on the market today.  Aero-Swing Training Approach is the most versatile and effective swing speed trainer.  I want all of the golfers around the world to take notice of our product, and join us in this swing speed revolution!

I am relentless in my work ethic and effort.  In order to maximize the impact of launching this new product, I need help to roll out to the golfing community.  Although Aero-Swing has grown very quickly; product idea in fall 2019, Aero-Swing in all Golf Galaxies Summer of 2020, patent awarded in fall 2020, we still need all the energy and motivation that comes from a successful crowdfunding campaign.  It is extremely important that we gain as much momentum as possible and launch the Aero-Swing TA in an expedient, but well thought out approach.

What We Need & What You Get

Our funding goal will contribute to the following:

  • Our goal in this campaign is $2,000.  We expect our costs to be more than our goal.
  • The stopper at the end of the Aero-Shaft has been 3D printed/prototyped and we are securing a U.S. based company to mold this piece.  We expect to have this out of production and delivered by mid March.
  • All assembly of this product will be in Louisville, KY.
  • We currently have our Aero-Shaft in production.  Expected delivery time is mid March.
  • New shipping boxes are already designed and on order.
  • We intend to advertise our Aero-Swing TA on all of the following platforms: Facebook Ads, YouTube Ads, Google Ads, Instagram, Pinterest and Amazon.
  • The ultimate offer will include an Aero-Shaft with stopper, 2 full sized Aero-Swings, 1 Aero-Swing Mini, one logo'd nylon component bag that will be used to hold all 3 Aero-Swings and the associated Aero-swing pieces that can be used for installing Aero-Swing on your own clubs.
  • The original Aero-Shaft will be 43.5 inches long, and will be made of graphite, 65 gram shaft with regular flex.  Our Aero-Swing logo will be imprinted on each shaft.  The Aero-Stopper will be epoxied at the end of the shaft.
  • We are also having our grips custom made.  Our Aero-Swing logo will be displayed on each grip.
  • Custom sized shipping boxes have been designed and are awaiting production.
  • Finally, when you order an Aero-Swing Training Approach system, you will get everything that is included in the first Aero-Swing offer, that is, you will get Aero-Swings with the components that allow a golfer to place Aero-Swing on their own clubs and train while hitting balls.  It is important to note that Aero-Swing TA items can also be used on a golfer's own clubs.
  • We fully expect to reach our funding goal.  If the funding goal isn't met, we will still proceed with our Aero-Swing Training Approach system.

Risks & Challenges

  • There really don't seem to be any hurdles to overcome with the Aero-Swing Training Approach.  All pieces are either in stock, in production, or in the final stages of design.  A previous product, Aero-Swing has already proven itself to be a successful swing speed product, having been launched in 96 Golf Galaxy stores shortly after its availability.

Other Ways to Help

If you cannot contribute to our launch, or if you are not a golfer, please forward this campaign to any of those who you might think could benefit from our Aero-Swing TA product!!!

story:
No child should sleep on the floor.

This summer, many of us have taken a break from work for some good old rest and relaxation. Whether it's down the Jersey shore, hitting the Outer Banks of South Carolina, or a weekend getaway, there's one thing we've all had in common: a bed.

But for thousands of children and adults, tonight will be another night when they sleep on the street, on a bench or on the cold, hard floor. For them, a vacation is not only impossible, the thought of a soft place to lay their heads at night is simply unbelievable. 

If you believe that no child should sleep on the floor, please help today!

The Need

100 BEDS for 100 people currently sleeping on the floor.

“The mother, whose identity I'm withholding for obvious reasons, fled an abusive relationship last year when the man she was living with pointed a loaded handgun at her. She ran in the middle of the night with her children and whatever belongings she could stuff into two garbage bags.” 
As seen in a 3/6/15 Philly.com article published about how PFB helped this family.

Every day, families like this sleep on layers of blankets piled on the floor. They need your help! They're ready to restart their lives, move to new homes, go back to school and ensure better lives for their kids. 

Through our resources, we are able to purchase quality, durable mattresses, box springs and bed frames at wholesale cost. But without help from you, we can't afford the new beds. And even better - not only are the mattresses handmade in America, they're made right here in Philadelphia! Your donation helps families in need and creates jobs in our neighborhood!

Who You're Helping

  • Single mothers and their children fleeing from abuse
  • Veterans returning from duty with nowhere to go
  • Individuals who are moving off the streets and out of shelters
  • Victims of fires, natural disasters and domestic violence
In our 1st year alone, we will serve over 1,000 people in need in Philadelphia. 

For two months, 62-year-old Cynthia and her grandson slept on the cold, hard floor of their new apartment…until now. Thanks to you, this family and many others can have brand new beds of their own.

What You Get

Along with great perks, you'll also know that you changed someone's life forever. Of all the things you could spend your money on - this might just be the best!

You will give families with nothing a fresh start in a new home. You'll ensure that they get off the floor and into warm, cozy beds. Parents can tuck their children in at night and everyone can get a good night's sleep.

More about the Philadelphia Furniture Bank (PFB)

No child should sleep on the floor. No family should be without a dinner table. Everyone should have a place to store clean clothes and treasured belongings. These are the simple, human goals of the PFB – turning empty houses into cozy, welcoming homes by providing no-cost furnishings to those in need.

The Philadelphia Furniture Bank is a project of Pathways to Housing PA, a Philadelphia nonprofit.

Other Ways You Can Help

It's ok! Sometimes, you just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Donate your gently used furniture.
  • Volunteer your time.
  • Simply share this message with the people you know.

And that's all there is to it.

*While our goal is to purchase 100 beds for families in need, these funds may be used as general support for the Philadelphia Furniture Bank's mission if enough money is not raised or operations require using the funds raised for general operations.

story:
What is that crazy Mexican doing now...

Ladies & gentlemen, friends and family,

My name is José E. Guillén, and I'm a Physician Assistant student on a mission. As some of you already know, I have a history of coordinating and carrying out sustainable public health/medical projects in low resource parts of the world. I helped design and build a medical supplies depot in Haiti; carried out important sexual health research in the townships of South Africa, and helped provide medical care to migrant workers in Southern Georgia. 

I'm now coordinating with a clinic in Nicaragua that provides care to a community of trashpickers; families that were resettled by the government, and in many cases have had to turn to extremes to get by. With your help, I hope to work as a medical provider for the clinic, and conduct research which will empower local government to provide the sort of sustainable change that the community both desires and needs. Aides from within the community will be sought out and trained, so that the knowledge we glean will stay within the population. 

Ok, how can I help, and what shinies can I unlock?

I will be traveling to Nicaragua with a team in late May, and staying until early July. The total cost is estimated to be around $3000, broken down into:

  • Flight --------------------------$800
  • Housing-----------------------$700
  • Food---------------------------$300
  • Car rental/taxi/etc---------$500
  • Aide wage---------------------$500
  • Misc expenses----------------$200
Now, what do you get for helping me with this excellent humanitarian endeavor? Apart from having done your good deed for the season, donors will receive the following according to their highest level of contribution:
  • Access to my hilarious, well written, and highly lauded travel blog------------$5
  • A handwritten postcard. Snailmail! Stamps with real spit!----------------------$25
  • I will write an insightful (?) and fantastic (!) limmerick/haiku with you as the source material, which you can elect to have featured on the blog-----------$100
  • A "poster" from Nicaragua. I have no idea what, but it will be great-----------$250
  • One bizarre item which I find in the formidable depths of the Managua marketplace, with its picture taken in various places in and around the country, and a song written by the team detailing its adventures abroad--------------$500
  • A local craftsman will create an item worthy of your generosity, with your name engraved upon it, and all manner of praise be heaped upon you-------------$1000
MOREOVER
If the $3000 is raised in full, I will "convince" the team (read: get the team drunk and suggest in an off-hand fashion how hilarious it would be were they) to perform a song on video about our various, accidental and inevitable mis-adventures interacting with local culture/customs! I make no claim as to the quality of said video, given that none of us have musical training, but I feel this will only make it more exciting for all donors.

Ok, ok, so you have ideas...but what exactly will you be doing while you're in Nicaragua? 

There is a massive document detailing our exact rationale, plan of action, and in country deliverable, but the short version is:
  • A door to door survey collecting qualitative data about general health, sexual health options, domestic violence and food security. This data will be analyzed and given back to community leaders so that they have a better sense of what issues are most pressing, and/or most important to the population.
  • Focus groups exploring views on domestic violence in the community.
  • A medical rotation at the local community health clinic, with a focus on OB/GYN and infectious diseases. 

Sounds like a lot; what's the DC of this endeavor?

You are right, dear reader, to wonder about the difficulties inherent in this project. Thankfully, I am a well practiced researcher (going on 12 years experience), a burgeoning medical provider (this will also serve as my 6th medical rotation), and a seasoned (spicy) traveler. More to the point, I am part of a team of equally qualified individuals, all with the benefit of Emory University and the Global Health Institute's backing.
In other words, we got this. 

What if I'm also a dirt poor student and can't give you any of my hard earned monies because I don't want to eat ramen and Elmer's Glue for the next month?

I've been there, dear reader. If you support this project with your heart, but your wallet isn't up to it, please do your best to spread the word. Facebook, emails, Tweets and word of mouth go a long way!

story:
Time Turners Quidditch was founded in November of 2013 by a group of friends looking to make a difference in the sports environment on our campus.  A year and a half later, we're doing just that.  But we need your help to continue.

Quidditch is an incredibly rewarding sport, no matter the level at which you're involved.  It's fun to play and to watch, inclusive, and a great way to get involved on campus.  Unfortunately, it's also fairly expensive - especially for a group of college students.
Last year, you helped us raise over 500 dollars, and that went towards our travel expenses, league dues, equipment upkeep, games we hosted, and events we organized.  Your help was - and is - crucial in our continuation as a team.

Eyes on the prize.

Next year, we're hoping to be able to afford to get our team to the USQ Southern Regional Championships and place well enough to earn a bid to the 2016 World Cup.  In order to do that, we need to start fundraising and saving right now. That's where you come in!
Sponsoring us financially means a huge weight will be lifted from our shoulders and we'll be able to focus on training for these events.  Even if it's just a dollar, your support means the world to us.

Thank you.
story_txt:
Time Turners Quidditch was founded in November of 2013 by a group of friends looking to make a difference in the sports environment on our campus.  A year and a half later, we're doing just that.  But we need your help to continue.
Quidditch is an incredibly rewarding sport, no matter the level at which you're involved.  It's fun to play and to watch, inclusive, and a great way to get involved on campus.  Unfortunately, it's also fairly expensive - especially for a group of college students.
Last year, you helped us raise over 500 dollars, and that went towards our travel expenses, league dues, equipment upkeep, games we hosted, and events we organized.  Your help was - and is - crucial in our continuation as a team.

Eyes on the prize.
Next year, we're hoping to be able to afford to get our team to the USQ Southern Regional Championships and place well enough to earn a bid to the 2016 World Cup.  In order to do that, we need to start fundraising and saving right now. That's where you come in!
Sponsoring us financially means a huge weight will be lifted from our shoulders and we'll be able to focus on training for these events.  Even if it's just a dollar, your support means the world to us.

Thank you.

story:
The outcome of this prototype will be mechanized handcuffs which will retract with the same force and speed no matter what the situation. Law enforcement will no longer have to think in distress about how much force to apply to an individual. These handcuffs will put the suspects hands behind their back after law enforcement locks the handcuffs in the individuals wrists. Law enforcement will no longer have to struggle with suspects resisting arrests. No need to have multiple officers to move a suspects hands behind their back. 

   This is a garage made prototype, its bulky and not as practical as the final product. The end goal is to  make it portable and practical for daily use for law enforcement across the nation. Currently working on a faster, smaller and portable system. Everyone will benefit from this product even if you're not in law enforcement. Not only is it going to prevent officers from getting hurt during a struggle, but its also going to benefit suspects even if they are resisting arrest since the equalizer handcuffs will put their hands behind their back in a matter of seconds.

story:
Water fasting has been a passion of mine for the last two years and I have fasted a total of 21 days before. I have also participated in the 30hr famine campaigns and have had fun experiences with the people I was with. I thought why not combine the two to create a positive change in the society and world that we live in. 

How this campaign will work is for each day there is a donation, I will continue to water fast (only drinking plain water, no tea, no juice) until I reach a day in which no contributions have been made. How long I can go, depends on how much we can help those in need, and hopefully that will be at least 30 days! 
100% of the proceeds will go to this cause and will be using the donations to help the hungry children in Africa(http://www.savethechildren.org/site/c.8rKLIXMGIpI4E/b.8197811/k.31C7/Helping_Starving_African_Children.htm)and local shelters that feed the homeless (https://www.siloam.ca/).  There may be other organizations added to the donation list. Photos of receipts for donations will be posted.

I will make daily updates on the progress of my health and donations, with pictures, info, etc.  

Please feel free to share this and spread the word, thanks! =)
