story:
What is Hoop Mania?

Since March 2013, Hoop Mania has been a vibrant and game-changing monthly 3 on 3 basketball tournament in the Johannesburg inner-city. Hoop Mania has created a culture of self-managed space, where the people who live in the neighbourhood and use the park and court daily are the ones who create events and ensure that the space is clean and safe and an asset to the local community. The people who play at the court consistently are the ones running the tournaments, learning new management skills, building their CVs, and growing networks.

These tournaments are part of Boundless City’s larger vision of community-based urban development. 

Why a League?

Up to now, Hoop Mania has operated as monthly tournaments. We would like to expand this to be more consistent and valuable to the local community: this will take the format of a 3 on 3 league. This provides greater opportunity for consistency, skills development, impact, and growth of the sport.

The basic structure is:

  • 8-12 teams of 5-6 players per team
  • 8 week season (6 weeks of regular season games, 2 weeks of playoffs)
  • Operating under FIBA 3x3 Rules
  • Saturday morning free basketball clinics for neighbourhood youth

What We Need

We hope this league can be run for many seasons, and can become self-sustaining, needing little or no sponsorship in order to exist. For this reason we will be charging registration fees for the opening season which will feed into continuing in future seasons. Assistance with funding is needed this first season to get the league off the ground.

A breakdown of estimated costs:

  • Sound: $200
  • Team Uniforms: $800
  • Officiating: $400
  • Staff: Scorekeepers, Stats, Management, MC: $1,000
  • Lighting: $300
  • Water bottles: $100
  • Trophy/Champion Prize: $100
  • Advertising: $320
  • Phone expenses (SMS to players): $100
  • Contingency (10%): $340
  • Admin (10%): $340
  • Total: $4,000
  • Total needed from this campaign: $2,000*
*WE ARE FORTUNATE TO HAVE THE SUPPORT OF A GENEROUS ANONYMOUS DONOR, WHO HAS OFFERED TO MATCH THE FUNDS WE RAISE, HELPING US TO REACH OUR GOAL. Any amount you contribute will be doubled!

More about Hoop Mania by the Numbers

12 Tournaments over the past 2 years
  • Every 1 or 2 months
  • This includes major year-end (November) and year-start (February) tournaments (larger prizes, entertainment, and turn-out)

115 Players

  • Over 115 players have participated in the tournaments
4 Major Media Outlets
  • Hoop Mania has received coverage from the BBC, SuperSport, SABC, and CityBuzz Newspaper
  • With the Basketball National League continuing and growing this year, there are great opportunities for extended media coverage
6+ Jobs Created
  • 6 team members run the tournaments, and the system that has been created results in some of the best organised tournaments in South Africa (feedback from players, referees, and BballSA Mag, and more confirms this)
  • Hoop Mania staff are local residents who have been actively seeking jobs but cannot find them, or who have jobs but need supplemental income.
  • Additional jobs are created on a flexible basis depending on what is needed tournament-to-tournament (referees, cleaning, music performances, etc.)
100+ Public Interaction
  • We estimate that around 100 passers-by stop to watch the tournament each month.
  • Last year we focused our marketing on getting players involved and creating brand recognition, moving forward we are focusing on building our audience.
Local Business Engagement
  • We use only local businesses for all administrative duties: printing, food, supplies, and more. We have built good relationships with retail stores and informal vendors in the area.
  • Players at the tournaments go to local shops and vendors to get food, drink, and more.
Location Diversity
  • We attract players primarily from the CBD, who are very appreciative of having an event like this in their neighbourhood.
  • We also have a wide range of outside participants from Tembisa, Randburg, Sandton, Soweto, Germiston, and we have received interest from players in Botswana and Zimbabwe who are willing to travel to Johannesburg for the next “big bang” tournament.
  • Many outsiders say that this is their first time in the CBD, and they are very impressed with how nice it is, many plan to return to play basketball and shop.
FIBA 3x3 Endorsement
  • We have received an endorsement from FIBA, and are now a part of their 3x3planet, where players can register on 3X3planet.com. This allows players to collect points for every game they play.
  • FIBA then automatically ranks the players according to how many games they have played and how many wins registered. The number of points earned will increase the players' chances of being invited to international tournaments and travelling the world to play the 3x3 format professionally.
  • This will draw more players, coverage, and potential sponsorship for future seasons.

Risks & Challenges

Since we have been running the tournaments already for the past two years, we have worked through most of the challenges that we expect to face. This includes player involvement, fair officiating, access to resources: water, toilets, lighting, and electricity, and more.

We are confident in our abilities to confront the challenges we might face due to our experience in the space and the sport.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't offer cash, but still want to help, email us at info@boundlesscity.com if you can help with any of the following:

  • Pro-bono officiating (must be a registered basketball referee in South Africa)
  • Team uniforms
  • Donation of a league champions prize
  • Water bottles

story:
Our Mission

We are Associated Energy Developers, LLC (AED) and we have taken the initiative to partner with a non-profit organization Forward in Health to complete the first sustainable solar powered medical clinic outside of Les Cayes, Haiti. Our campaign only pertains to the off-grid solar electricity system. Separate fundraising for the clinic itself has been underway for a number of years. It is important to understand that this clinic is miles from the closest electrical utility line, so without a sustainable and locally sourced form of energy the clinic is at risk of operating without electricity. In countries like Haiti where over 80% of people lack access to reliable electricity, off grid Solar PV systems are the only logical source of energy.

Who We Are 

AED is a renewable energy company based in Plymouth, Massachusetts. With expertise in sustainable energy and a passion for developing projects that aid water production to regions in need, AED has developed it's “PV4Water©” (and Wind4Water©) systems. These systems provide sustainable, fresh water and power to campuses and villages utilizing the sun’s energy. The PV4Water© solution is a solar photovoltaic array which powers pumps for the clinic’s well system, but is sized large enough to provide additional electricity to the medical clinic itself.  Batteries will store enough electricity for 24 hours of operation for the mission's critical equipment before a small backup diesel generator is needed. The PV4Water© project will continue to provide this power to the clinic with little or no maintenance requirements for the next 25 years or more.

About Forward in Health

Forward in Health’s (www.forwardinhealth.org) mission is to improve the health conditions and dignity of the people in and around Les Cayes, a remote, impoverished area of Haiti without adequate access utility grids. Comprised of several Doctors of Medicine, the Forward in Health team has been working to improve health of Haitian citizens since 2006.

(Full video profiling the Forward In Health organization)

Since the first time members of the nonprofit FIH traveled to Haiti, the need for a permanent, modern medical presence in the area was obvious. Today, work is being completed on  a primary care medical clinic to bring lifesaving health care to the people in this region of the country, who simply can’t travel the estimated 3 – 4 hours to Port-au-Prince.  The Forward in Health clinic occupies 3 ½ acres of land.  This concise and extremely efficient building will provide a nurse station, physician exam rooms, a laboratory, pharmacy, dental office, and radiology.  Boston based designers and structural engineers have developed blue-prints to maximize the use of the space. 


(Fonfred Clinic Floor Plan)

Raising Money: Why We Need Your Help

In order for our campaign to be successful we need to raise a sum of $15,000. AED has launched a fundraising capital drive to help pay for the PV4Water© system. Engineering for the system is already completed, and it has already received commitments for installation labor and travel costs.

The funds raised will be used to procure the photovoltaic panels, inverter, and batteries for the system at the medical clinic. Please help us reach our goal of 15,000We are trying to raise the capital cost so the solar system can be the 'spotlight' for the clinic’s grand opening on August 3, 2015. 

Spread the Influence

Your contribution will not only bring lifesaving health care through affordable, sustainable solar energy to the primary care medical clinic in Fond Fred, but it will also help create a model for health care facilities in other developing nations around the world!  

Globally, 99% of the earth’s water is not fit for consumption and needs to be processed. Further, 1.1 Billion of the earth’s inhabitants (1 in 6) do not have access to fresh water, according to the World Health Organization. This is especially true in the country of Haiti, where an estimated 7,500 children and families live without fresh water or medical care - just in the Fonfred area, located outside of Les Cayes.




Our Plan

AED has been fortunate enough to have received (and has provided) donations in labor, but we still need funding to procure the system and integrate it to the medical clinic. Our goal is $15,000 to complete the construction of the clinic with PV4Water©.

Many people have already donated to the medical clinic project, which has funded the construction of the clinic building and drinking water wells. Our focus is to raise additional funding for the PV4Water© components of solar panels, batteries, and inverter.  Vendors of these products are providing steeply discounted prices for the project. We also face cost needs for shipping costs.

With the support we have been given to date, we firmly expect to reach our goals for this special project.  If the goals are not reached immediately, the system will be expanded as funds allow.  All funds raised will go directly to AED’s Forward in Health medical clinic project account.

We have arranged a special gift for those who can contribute at any level, a personalized ‘Thank You’ letter suitable for framing. 

Other gifts include:

  • Personalized plaque displayed at the clinic and online
  • Internet access  to project's updates
  • System dedications at clinic


The Impact

Your campaign contribution to this world-class project is important – not only to the people of Fonfred, Haiti, but all around the world.  By creating self-sustaining, low maintenance clinics, remote villages everywhere become accessible.  Only such ‘distributed energy’ projects such as solar PV systems are able to quickly rebound from natural disasters and provide modern assistance to those in need.

Even a small donation to the Fonfred PV4Water© clinic goes a long way.  Each solar panel costs about $250 USD.  Each battery also costs about $250.  The people of Les Cayes area are counting on your generosity to allow us to finish the project in one phase – and enjoy a healthier life.

Transparency

There is a chance our goal is not reached; if that is the case we will be required to downsize the initial solar system at the clinic and continue fundraising, adding to the system as funds allow.  Until the entire system is installed, the clinic will need to make hard choices with the limited amount of energy it can generate.

Because we are asking for your donation, it is reasonable for you to know the risks we face.  From a technology perspective, the risk is slight.  Solar panels and storage batteries are well known and proven devices.  The location has a plentiful solar resource to power the clinic at optimal levels.  Our biggest risks are centered around the transportation of the equipment to Haiti. We are making special provisions to be such that no theft or vandalism occurs during transit, including working with other NGO and non-profits who import materials to Haiti regularly.  After construction, two local members of the on-site team will be trained to handle the little maintenance that these solar systems require, with assistance from AED.

Other Ways You Can Help

Despite your financial situation, your help means a lot to us! The share tools shown below make sharing our campaign easier: Please share our campaign on social media and to your friends and family. Thank you for your consideration!


forwardinhealth.org

associatedenergydevelopers.com

story:
Imagine a situation where your children disappear in a crowd.

Imagine a situation where your  dog got lost. 

You can find yourself in the stress of frantic searching. 

We all know that sense of panic when we realize that our wallet, purse, keys or phone is missing.

With Watcher you will be able to neutralize the panic with the press of a button to lead you directly to them and save valuable time and unnecessary stress.

Watcher is a smart watch designed to help the owner keep track of important items by sending alerts and notifications to a smartphone when the item is out of range. 

Watcher is a well-designed smartwatch with E-paper display that  enables you to think beyond your life. 

Coupled with dedicated accessories, it can help you to keep track of your personal belongings, how long you've spent time with your lovers, your fitness information, your baby's body temperature and offer  other useful features.

Watcher  is ideal for a wide range of items including keys, remote control, glasses, textbook and planner, umbrella, wallet, camera, laptop, tablet, bike, or luggage. 

Watcher prevents you from losing your things by alert that warn when you leave your phone or other items behind. Watcher - The first anti-loss smart watch.

This is not a slogan - it's a promise !

Imagine being able to find lost keys, bag, or phone with the simple touch of a button. .


Or finding your children in a large crowd without the stress of frantic searching. 
You can even attach the pendant to children’s clothing to keep track of their location in a crowded space.

Introducing Watcher, the world’s first anti-loss smart watch that is about hit the global market in the summer of 2015. 

The Watcher does make life simpler - preventing the wearer from losing items by sending alerts about its location to their smartphones. 

When you are with your kids, Watcher will help you keep an eye on your running kids. Just put a pendant on your kids, your Watcher will remind you once they are out of range. 
You can even attach the to your children’s clothing to keep track of their location in a crowded space. 
Just attach the accessory to your valuables and pair it with Watcher, will keep track of them all the time. 

Watcher comes with a kit that helps you attach to important items such as a wallet, key ring, laptop, car, dog or cat collar, camera bag or suitcase.

Once the accessory is out of range, your Watcher will vibrate to remind you, preventing you from losing or forgetting your phone, wallet, key case, kids or anything else with the accessory attached. 

If your Watcher is connected to iPhone or Android phone by Bluetooth, the GPS location will also be recorded by app to help you recover your lost stuff.

When you are waiting for your baggage at the airport, you don't need to walk back and forth around the luggage tag, Watcher will vibrate to notify you the moment your luggage comes within range.

You can attach the pendant and use it to easily find luggage at the airport. Watcher sends the alerts on its E-paper display.


Your smart watcher -Fitness Tracking

Fitness Tracking - Watcher can keep track of how many steps you've made and how long you've walked or run. It can also calculate how many calories you've burned. 


Your smart Watcher - Sweet time

Watcher can help you get to know how long you have stayed with your lover. Just connect two watches, and Watcher will count your sweet time automatically. You can even view the statistics on your watch or via Watcher app. 

By setting birthday or anniversary via Watcher or mobile app, Watcher will remind you ahead and display the reminder on the watchface on that day.


When connected to your iPhone or Android phone by Bluetooth, the Watcher app will remind you of important dates or anniversaries, and vibrate to notify you when of a call or SMS on your mobile phone. 


Your smart watcher - Thermometer

Once you connect Watcher to our thermometer,put the thermometer on your baby's arm,our thermometer will automatically keep track of your baby's body temperature and send the data to Watcher or your mobile app. 

If the temperature is abnormal in a  short period of time,Watcher will vibrate to remind you to take action if necessary.

The kit also includes a thermometer that can automatically keep track of baby’s body temperature and send data to your Watcher or mobile app.

This is possible with a pendant that is attached to your pet such as a dog or cat collar,  which then vibrates when them moves beyond 10 meters. 

You can even view the statistics on your watch or via Watcher app. By setting birthday or anniversary via Watcher or mobile app, Watcher will remind you ahead and display the reminder on the watchface on that day.


product line of Watcher includes a smart watch, a pendant, a card and a thermometer. 

Our dedicated card can easily fit into your wallet. 


Our dedicated pendant can get attached to your keys or other stuff. 

product line of Watcher includes a smart watch, a pendant, a card and a thermometer. 

Other products  that come with RF technology and with additional low-energy bluetooth chip. 

Watcher can work with up to 5 accessories connected simultaneously. 

They all are equipped with a rechargeable Lithium battery, once fully charged, the accessories can work up to half a month.

Using a special patented technology, Watcher sends alerts on its E-paper display, and also features a fitness tracker and thermometer. 

The device carries an accessory that can be attached to a wide range of items including keys, wallet, camera, luggage, or a pet. 


“Wouldn’t it be great to never lose your keys, bag, phone or anything ever again? 

This innovative device is useful in many situations. After two years of research and development, the prototyping and FCC/CE certification phases have already been completed. 


Watcher will vibrate to notify you once the accessory moves beyond the range of 10 meters, and you will be able to neutralize the panic.

Watcher can work with up to 5 connected accessories simultaneously, and, when connected to an iPhone or Android smartphone by Bluetooth, the GPS location will also be recorded by the Watcher app. 

The accessory is equipped with a rechargeable Lithium battery, which when fully charged can work for up to two weeks. 


About the company 

    


Elink IOT is an intelligent hardware company established in 2014 and based in Shenzhen, China. 

Founded by Chinese entrepreneur Sunman Liu, the company is focused on "Internet of Things", and works with a team of engineers with the goal to create technology to make life simpler.  

This revolutionary product is uses a patented technology to keep track of important items by sending alerts and notifications to the owner’s smartphone. 

The company is now ready to introduce the Watcher to the global market, and will use the funds raised to begin mass production and marketing in June 2015. 

The company has already invested thousands of dollars into the research and development of the product, and the prototyping and FCC/CE certification phases have already been completed. 


Our product line includes a smart watch,a pendant,a card and a thermometer. Other products  that come with RF technology. Our dedicated card can easily fit into your wallet. Our dedicated pendant can get attached to your keys or other stuff.

Watcher prevents you from losing your things by alert that warn when you leave your phone or other items behind..

Watcher is a smart watch with anti-loss, notification, fitness tracking, sweet time features.

Special features

  • Watcher can help you get to know how long you have stayed with your lover. Just connect two watches, and Watcher will count your sweet time automatically. 
  • You can even view the statistics on your watch or via Watcher app. 
  • Watcher vibrates to notify you when you receive a call on your mobile phone.
  • By setting birthday or anniversary via Watcher or mobile app, Watcher will remind you ahead and display the reminder on the watchface on that day.
  • Once you connect Watcher to our thermometer, put the thermometer on your baby's arm, our thermometer will automatically keep track of your baby's body temperature and send the data to Watcher or your mobile app. 
  • If the temperature is abnormal in a  short period of time, Watcher will vibrate to remind you to take action if necessary.
  • Watcher vibrates to notify you when you receive SMS on your mobile phone.
  • If you connect Watcher to your iPhone or Android phone by Bluetooth, Watcher will vibrate when receive a call or SMS. For Android 4.3+ users, the watch can also display Caller ID and SMS content.
  • Fitness Tracking - Watcher can keep track of how many steps you've made and how long you've walked or run. It can also calculate how many calories you've burned.
  • Watcher connects with our dedicated  accessories and another Watcher by 2.4G RF. 
  • Watcher can work alone with the features of anti-lost and sweet time, even if there's not connection with your mobile phone. 
  • Watcher connects to your phone by Bluetooth 4.0, if your phone supports Bluetooth 4.0(iPhone or Android 4.3+), you can download Watcher app and manage the Watcher via your phone. 


Project Timeline

June 2013~Nov. 2014: HW/SW development

August 2014: Molding

Oct. 2014: Testing

Dec. 2014: FCC/CE certification

April 2015~May 2015: Indiegogo campaign

July 2015: Mass production

August 2015: Shipping

Specifications

Watcher:

Dimensions: 42*34*12mm

Display: Sharp 1.28inches Memory LCD

Resolution: 128* 128px

Certification: FCC/CE

Waterproof: IP67

Operating time:

3-5 days

Charge mode:

magnetic contact

Card:

Dimensions：85* 54* 2mm

Operating time: 30 days

Waterproof : IPX6

Charge mode:

magnetic contact

Pendant:

Dimensions: 36 * 36 * 7mm

Operating time: 30 days

Waterproof : IP67

Charge mode: magnetic contact

Thermometer:

Dimensions: 28* 30 * 6mm

Operating time: 20 days

Waterproof : IPX6

How many accessories can connect to watcher simultaneously？

Watcher can work with up to 5 accessories connected simultaneously. We have three types of accessory: smart card, pendant, wireless thermometer.

Without connecting to smart phone, what features do the Watcher support？

Watcher can work alone with features: anti-loss, body temperature monitoring, fitness tracking, sweet time, event reminder, silent vibrating clock alarm.

How often should I replace the battery for the accessories?

 All the accessories are equipped with a rechargeable Lithium battery, once fully charged, the accessories can work up to half a month. So no need to replace the battery.
What’s the waterproof performance of Watcher？

Watcher watch: IPx7

Watcher card: IPx6

Watcher pendant: IPx7

Watcher thermometer: IPx3

How does the Watcher watch managing the accessories?
Watcher watch manages the accessories by 2.4G radio frequency.
Can Watcher watch receive a call or dial out?
No, there is no cellular module inside 
What’s the standard set?
 One Watcher watch, one card, one pendant and one charger are included in the standard Watcher set.
Does the Watcher comes with a warranty?
 Yes, a limited 1 year warranty is provided.

Where can I download the APPs?

You can download the IOS version from Apple store and Android version from Google play. We’ll provide the download link soon.
Do you have color display version?
No, we’ll develop the color display version after the campaign. 
How many certifications does Watcher applied?
We passed the FCC and CE certification now, if more certifications are requested by market, we’ll apply it.
What’s the display of Watcher watch?
We’re using Sharp 1.28 inch memory LCD for it.
How long does the watch work?
With 5 accessories connected simultaneously, watch can work 3 - 5 days. If the belonging management feature was disabled, Watch can work 12 - 15 days.

Why do we need your support?

After two years of research and development, and  private investment of hundreds of thousands of dollars on the development and testing phase, We decided to raise money and to launch a campaign Crowdfunding. We're need to focus on mass-produced, and we'll can launch it and market it all over the world.

We have already finished the prototyping and FCC/CE certification. We need your support to do mass production and market promotion.

We hope you will love this well-designed and easy to use product and help spread the word, and It will be the first batch of  mass production for smart watch. 

Why do we wanna do this?

We are a team of people who are tech-savvy and true believers of the notion  that technology should simplify and facilitate our lives by make things easier to use .

How do we make this happen?

We've been doing research and developing of RF and low-energy based devices like OBD and other electronics for years and therefore have had rich experience  of making devices. All of our products are integrated with RF chips（Smartwatch comes with additional low-energy bluetooth chip) that enable them to connect with each other .

Thank you for taking the time to read the our campaign page.  

We hope that you feel inspired by what we have to offer and take away some essential information about new possibilities for the future of your life.


You're feel free contact us any time,

and ask us any question !

elink-iot@elink-iot.com
story_txt:
Imagine a situation where your children disappear in a crowd.Imagine a situation where your  dog got lost. You can find yourself in the stress of frantic searching. We all know that sense of panic when we realize that our wallet, purse, keys or phone is missing.With Watcher you will be able to neutralize the panic with the press of a button to lead you directly to them and save valuable time and unnecessary stress.

Watcher is a smart watch designed to help the owner keep track of important items by sending alerts and notifications to a smartphone when the item is out of range. 
Watcher is a well-designed smartwatch with E-paper display that  enables you to think beyond your life. 
Coupled with dedicated accessories, it can help you to keep track of your personal belongings, how long you've spent time with your lovers, your fitness information, your baby's body temperature and offer  other useful features.

Watcher  is ideal for a wide range of items including keys, remote control, glasses, textbook and planner, umbrella, wallet, camera, laptop, tablet, bike, or luggage. 

Watcher prevents you from losing your things by alert that warn when you leave your phone or other items behind. Watcher - The first anti-loss smart watch.
This is not a slogan - it's a promise !

story:
I was diagnosed with Uterine Cancer last Spring. Before I was diagnosed I was dealing with severe anemia because of the cancer.

Since being diagnosed I have had a complete hysterectomy, chemo and radiation. I finished treatment and am now getting back a little energy and ready to move forward with my life.

I am the single mother of 3 kids and throughout all of this, they have been real troopers. Samantha is 18, Quinn is 15 and Donovan is 8. They have been very understanding that often I was too sick to do a lot of the activities that they would have enjoyed.

As I'm sure most of you know, cancer can be very financially devastating. Which is why I am doing this campaign. I am trying to rebuild my life and my finances but any extras are out of the question right now.

That being said, I really want to do something for my kids and the one thing I know they all enjoy is the Bristol Renaissance Fair but it can be costly to attend. Tickets alone for one day will be close to $100 for the 4 of us.

The $600 that I am looking to get for this will go to the following:

1. Tickets to the fair.

2. Gas (3 hour drive one way)

3. A hotel room for one night.

4. Food while at the fair, before and after fair. (You cannot bring in outside food.)

5. Activities during the fair.

Here is a link to the website so you can get an idea of what RenFair is like: http://www.renfair.com/bristol/

There is a map of the fair and it is over 15 acres big!

This really will be like a mini vacation for my kids who deserve to have a great time after the last year + of dealing with all this. We would like to attend the fair on August 1st.  Any money raised beyond the $600 will be used for other activities over the summer with the kids.

story:
Introduction

Hello, my name is Sherry Lydon and I work as a Medical Assistant for a major cancer clinic in the mid-south. On a daily basis I see what cancer does to sweet, loving people and to their families. Even though I feel my job is rewarding in a way, doing my part to comfort my patients, I have always longed for other ways to contribute towards preventing such horrible diseases from ever starting.  To me, cancer, autoimmune disorders, Parkinson’s, as well as other life-threatening diseases sometimes can actually be PREVENTABLE!  Most of the health issues facing our society today has a lot to do with how we treat our bodies. Every day we repeat the same bad habits by eating the same wrong things or we apply the same toxic products to our super-absorbent skin. It is for this very reason I decided to make my own healthy, all-natural makeup.

Actually, I got the courage to start making my own foundation soon after Proctor & Gamble decided to no longer sell any of their Max Factor products here in the United States.  Having worn Max Factor pan-stick all my life I knew nothing else out there was for me. I am well aware of the dangers involved with wearing most anything else on the market because of all the harmful ingredients big corporations like to use. So with all that in mind, I convinced myself I would have no choice but to make my own.  I was convinced I could make something that millions of other women would love to use because it would be the safest, most natural, full coverage foundation available today! My pan stick only has (7) ingredients. They are: Coconut Oil MCT, Kaolin Clay, Argan Oil, Carnauba Wax, Ozokerite Wax, Titanium Dioxide, and Iron Oxides for color. For a more detailed explanation of each please go to my website's ingredients page by clicking here http://www.factornaturals.com/ingredients.html

Do current Sherry Lydon Cosmetics customers like my product?

Yes, they do! The best way to see what others think of my Factor Naturals pan-stick is to simply view my unbiased eBay feedback.  http://feedback.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewF...   Here are just a few their comments. Karen wrote: “This is the creamiest stick makeup, color is perfect…love it!” Kellie wrote: “My favorite foundation ever!! Thank you Sherry!” Susan wrote: Perfect makeup!!! I will be a regular customer.” Cherie wrote: “This is the nicest eBay seller and the product is a dream come true.”  My customers love the safety of my product so well that several of them have shared horror stories about how other products have caused them harm in all sorts of ways. They have even asked me if I could make other products like lipstick and hair coloring that were as safe to use as my pan stick.

The reason for this campaign.

Right now, I am only selling my product on my website, www.factornaturals.com and on eBay but to me this is just not good enough because not enough women are being reached and informed about my safe product.  My ultimate goal is to reach the entire country through selling to national chains like Whole Foods Market which specializes in only offering products that meet their strictest safety standards. The only problem with my ability to expand is my current production level. Currently, the largest batch I am able to make is only 24 tubes. I need the capital to purchase the equipment to make batches that will yield 150 to 200 tubes at a time. The funds would also go towards professional photography, new labels and packaging, advertising, insurance, and to hopefully move into a slightly larger building.

What you can receive for donating at least $30.

I will be glad to send a tube of our wonderfully safe makeup as a gift for your gratuity, just let us know by going to the "PERKS" page and then just select the color that you would like. Even though I do have ten colors that I have UPC bar codes for, the gift shades that are available are the same six shown on eBay. They are: Nude Ivory, True Beige, Medium Beige, Medium Olive, Sun Tone, and Rich Beige.

What happens if we don’t reach our goal?

Whatever amount is attained will indeed help me nevertheless. For instance, instead of being able to move into a larger building right away, we will just continue to make things work where my laboratory is right now. What is most important is to be able to purchase the equipment to make larger quantity batches so that we can be ready to reach more and more women with my safe product which is by far, the ultimate goal. If my cause only helps to prevent just one person from being stricken down with any kind of otherwise preventable disease, my ultimate goal will be met. Won’t you please help me to make that happen? Thank you for your support!
story_txt:
Introduction
Hello, my name is Sherry Lydon and
I work as a Medical Assistant for a major cancer clinic in the mid-south. On a daily basis I see
what cancer does to sweet, loving people and to their families. Even though I feel
my job is rewarding in a way, doing my part to comfort my patients, I have
always longed for other ways to contribute towards preventing such horrible
diseases from ever starting.  To me, cancer,
autoimmune disorders, Parkinson’s, as well as other life-threatening diseases
sometimes can actually be PREVENTABLE! 
Most of the health issues facing our society today has a lot to do with
how we treat our bodies. Every day we
repeat the same bad habits by eating the same wrong things or we apply the same
toxic products to our super-absorbent skin. It is for this very reason I
decided to make my own healthy, all-natural makeup. 
Actually,
I got the courage to start making my own foundation soon after Proctor &
Gamble decided to no longer sell any of their Max Factor products here in the
United States.  Having worn Max Factor
pan-stick all my life I knew nothing else out there was for me. I am well aware of
the dangers involved with wearing most anything else on the market because of
all the harmful ingredients big corporations like to use. So with all
that in mind, I convinced myself I would have no choice but to make my
own.  I was convinced I could make
something that millions of other women would love to use because it would be
the safest, most natural, full coverage foundation available today! My pan stick only has (7) ingredients. They are: Coconut Oil MCT, Kaolin Clay, Argan Oil, Carnauba Wax, Ozokerite Wax, Titanium Dioxide, and Iron Oxides for color. For a more detailed explanation of each please go to my website's ingredients page by clicking here http://www.factornaturals.com/ingredients.html 
Do current Sherry Lydon Cosmetics customers
like my product?
Yes,
they do! The best way to see what others think of my Factor Naturals pan-stick is to simply view my unbiased eBay feedback.  http://feedback.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewF...   Here are just a few their comments. Karen
wrote: “This is the creamiest stick makeup, color is perfect…love it!” Kellie
wrote: “My favorite foundation ever!! Thank you Sherry!” Susan wrote: Perfect
makeup!!! I will be a regular customer.” Cherie wrote: “This is the nicest eBay
seller and the product is a dream come true.” 
My customers love the safety of my product so well that several of them
have shared horror stories about how other products have caused them harm in
all sorts of ways. They have even asked me if I could make other products like
lipstick and hair coloring that were as safe to use as my pan stick.
The reason for this campaign.
Right now, I am only selling my
product on my website, www.factornaturals.com and on eBay but to me this is
just not good enough because not enough women are being reached and informed
about my safe product.  My ultimate goal
is to reach the entire country through selling to national chains like Whole
Foods Market which specializes in only offering products that meet their
strictest safety standards. The only
problem with my ability to expand is my current production level. Currently, the largest batch I am able to make
is only 24 tubes. I need the capital to purchase the equipment to make batches
that will yield 150 to 200 tubes at a time. The funds would also go towards professional
photography, new labels and packaging, advertising, insurance, and to hopefully move into a slightly
larger building.
What you can receive for donating at
least $30.
I
will be glad to send a tube of our wonderfully safe makeup as a gift for
your gratuity, just let us know by going to the "PERKS" page and then just select the color that you would like. Even though I do have ten colors that I have UPC bar codes for, the gift shades that
are available are the same six shown on eBay. They are: Nude Ivory, True
Beige, Medium Beige, Medium Olive, Sun Tone, and Rich Beige.
What happens if we don’t reach our
goal?
Whatever
amount is attained will indeed help me nevertheless. For instance, instead of being
able to move into a larger building right away, we will just continue
to make things work where my laboratory is right now. What is most important is to be
able to purchase the equipment to make larger quantity batches so that we can be
ready to reach more and more women with my safe product which is by far, the
ultimate goal. If my cause only helps to prevent just one person from being stricken
down with any kind of otherwise preventable disease, my ultimate goal will be met. Won’t you please help me to
make that happen? Thank you for your support!

story:
Facebook!   Twitter! Youtube! 

Squeak's Tweaks, a serviced-based tech company, jailbreaks and customizes your iPhone and iPod** for you! We do NOT sell the jailbreak tool; we jailbreak and install "tweaks" or customization settings for each jailbreak service.

**Due to legal considerations, we only jailbreak iPhones and iPods for customers until we get a formal debrief from within our own company of the 18-page Digital Millennium Copyright Act. Then, we can determine what other Apple devices we can legally jailbreak in addition to the iPhones and iPods. The debrief will be released for free on all of our social media sites, including Indiegogo.

Tweak compatibility varies due to iOS version and device model, so some tweaks on Cydia, the jailbroken "App Store", are not compatible with certain specifications. By selectively organizing pre-determined package plans that contain either around 50, 110, 180, or 230 tweaks, you can essentially save 30+ hours of frustration!

Screenshot of our demo jailbroken iPhone!

A screenshot can only say so much, so please watch our brief video! We present jailbreak in a user-friendly manner that hopefully gives off that "warm feeling" that a standard Apple iPhone commercial does. We describe all aspects of jailbreak and what makes our company unique! Our team is working hard to make Squeak's Tweaks a one-stop destination for streamlined jailbreaking. We are working tirelessly on producing more videos that will showcase our services more in depth!

For each jailbreak service, your Apple device can be shipped to us, jailbroken in a public setting, or in your own hands! You have the option to request face-to-face instruction from one of our certified jailbreakers through Skype. Our jailbreakers will walk you through the steps, providing simple instructions over Skype and providing live assistance upon request. We aim to provide you excellent customer service! Here's a small graphic summarizing all of it!

The money raised from crowdfunding will allow us to buy our website domain, purchase SSL and other needed web certificates, attain a web host, and support our partners in business! In addition to the fees associated with trademark, copyright, and LLC protection, we are pledging portions of our profits in accordance with our mission statement.

We aim to revolutionize the jailbreak market not only with a user-friendly video presentation, but also with charitable contributions!

Click here for a message from our company's founder and CEO Kevin Pang! We emphasize the need for companies to be transparent as possible, so please take a look at our rationale behind all our services and all of our charitable donations!

Click here for the 'Girls who Code' website!


Additionally, we shall use a portion of our raised money to fund other start-ups and crowdfunding projects! By helping us out, you are also helping out other creators make their dreams come true! :)

We will also donate (either directly or indirectly due to rigid school policies) 5-10% of our 2-week debut profits toward local public high school education and other related academic activities, such as the PTA, Model UN, Science Olympaid, etc.

We are hoping that our contributions will help Jay Freeman, creator of Cydia, significantly reduce the ads, and entice popular developers (such as Ryan Petrich) to continue making wonderful tweaks! We are contacting 40+ jailbreak bloggers and 20+ tweak developers for their support and for some social media promotion so we may donate more funds and grow the jailbreak community substantially!

The EFF is now petitioning yet again to renew the exemption in October 2015, and are most-likely going to be successful. Hopefully, our contributions will help them succeed in providing legal protection for not only iPhones and iPods, but also iPads, iPad-minis, iPad-airs, etc. In addition, before we make this permanent contribution, we request that the EFF back our company, promote us on their website and other related social media, and make a statement not only to the jailbreak community, but to the public population of the United States that we are a legitimate company with good, ethical emphasis on social responsibility. Additionally, Apple actually CANNOT sue nor do anything to the jailbreak community due to the DCMA exemption. Before the exemption, when jailbreak was indeed illegal, Apple has never came close to suing for jailbreak, so we are very much protected due to the DCMA and (hopefully) EFF.

Click here to read an EFF page that describes the legality of jailbreak!

If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to our team here at Squeak's Tweaks! Thanks, and we hope to gain all of your support! In all due honesty, we need more reputation as opposed to starting capital, hence the relatively small project goal. Please donate and/or spread word on social media of our company's mission to change the way we think of private corporations! THANK YOU!


Inquires can be made to our Indiegogo account or at: squeakstweaks@gmail.com


Opportunity to join company given appropriate qualifications. This includes frequent bloggers, Youtubers, tweak developers, and other dedicated jailbreak users. You do NOT have to fit into one of those above categories.

LIMITED SPOTS AVAILABLE DUE TO ALREADY LARGE SIZE OF COMPANY!


Email us at {squeakstweaks@gmail.com}. Include in subject line: Your name, your Indiegogo name, and the words "EMPLOYMENT REQUEST". You do not have to include a cover letter or resume upon the first email. You may freely ask questions and we will answer them before requiring your cover letter and/or resume.

Hence, we will take high school students (and of course, older individuals) with no previous work experience; you just need to meet the qualifications and have the appropriate work ethic. Understand we need professionalism and maturity!


Our home page! NOTE: Still in development.

Information about our tweak packages will be very clear and interactive!

Our online payment methods are complete!

We shall have an "About" page where we can make personal connections to the consumer! Additionally, we are working on a "Meet the Developers!" page that will give faces to our company!

The biggest challenge that our company faces is simply not having enough employees! In essence, we are employing people with certain skill-sets for internal function, and training non-specialized people how to do step-by-step jailbreak for our customers either in person, at our company's headquarters, or over Skype and other forms of online communication! Considering how we are tapping into the ENTIRE market of iPhones and iPods all over the United States, we need many people to do the jailbreaking efficiently and quickly!

Our training sessions and certification of jailbreakers will most definitely be a challenge, especially if we have employees from across the country and/or the world! However, we believe that online communication via Skype and the prospect of our current company employees going off to colleges around the country will allow for us to conveniently orientate new members into our family! We shall enforce consistency when it comes to jailbreak procedures by producing specific copyrighted instructions for each iOS and device model! It will take patience and experience to orientate employees, but with enough diligence and the right work ethic, we are sure that we can make a successful business model!

Click here to read the DCMA debrief!


For those that cannot watch the video or want quick facts:

Q: Is jailbreak legal in the United States?

A: Yes! Jailbreaking your iPhone and iPod is kept legal through 2015 under an exemption in the Digital Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA).

Q: Is jailbreak safe for my iPhone and/or iPod?

A: In professional hands, jailbreaking is absolutely safe! After customizing your Apple device with a trusted jailbreak tool, you have the option to enter "Substrate Safe Mode" by holding the volume up button while rebooting. This turns off all the tweaks installed on a jailbreak, leaving only Cydia functioning for troubleshooting. Otherwise, the Apple device essentially returns to "vanilla" or un-jailbroken iOS, and all iOS functions work perfectly. You can exit out of Substrate Safe Mode upon rebooting.

Q: Is jailbreak reversible?

A: Yes, and very easily too! Once you restore to the newest iOS via iTunes, your jailbreak shall be removed, leaving no indication that your phone was ever jailbroken in the first place! Your warrenty (if it didn't expire already) is instantly renewed!

Q: Is my data secure after jailbreak?

A: On multiple tests, we discovered that data is NOT erased upon jailbreak! However, as an additional precautionary measure, we require that you back-up all of your data on your phone to a PC and find the back-up folder and know what to do with it before we proceed with the jailbreak.

Q: What if I have troubleshooting issues?

A: We are making customer support and troubleshooting support a core service in our company! Along with troubleshooting guides for each questionable tweak, we intend on making Skype live-assistance readily available. We intend on providing a copyrighted document detailing the possible (if any) bugs of every tweak, what you should avoid, and you should do in case problems arise. And of course, we will make it mandatory for our jailbreakers to show you how to respring, enter temporary safe mode, and substrate safe mode as additional cautionary measures. That way, you can still use your iPhones and iPods, tweaks enabled or disabled!

Q: Isn't 230+ tweaks just...too much?
A: Yes, 230+ tweaks might be overwhelming for some users on their first jailbreak. Hence, we introduce four different tweak packages. The Basic package has ~50 tweaks, Plus has ~110, Premium has ~180, and Ultimate has 230+. The Basic and Plus packages contain some very lightweight, but powerful tweaks such as Activator, Browser Changer, ShowCase, and Swipe Selection, which are all tweaks that have very little to no bug problems. Additionally, many of the tweaks are behind-the-scenes (such as NoAppStoreRedirect), so you won't be too overwhelmed. The Plus and Premium packages have some bulkier tweaks that require some time to get familiar with, but are very useful and time-savers in the long-term. Also, we will allow you to opt-out of tweaks that you might not necessarily want or will ever find use for (such as Twitter++ if you don't tweet) when we do jailbreak your device.


***2011 iPhone 5 iOS 8.1.2 jailbreak layout seen in the video is HEAVILY inspired by one of iTwe4kz's Youtube videos! Credit to iTwe4kz and reddit user xSignificant for the awesome layout!

story:
We're Green&Co startup and we’re developing healthcare mobile app called FirstAid. 

- - -

Mission

Working in a close cooperation with doctors with a mission to combine digital opportunities with traditional know-how and doctors’ expertise. Obviously, we can't treat the pain with a mobile app, but we can prevent possible health complications. The main idea is thus to save lives or at least to improve a quality of life of our users. We want to take this collaboration further and provide a high-quality product which will help to make all our lives better.


- - - 


Product

We’re developing a mobile app called FirstAid. This medical diagnosis mobile tool will help our users to determine the nature of any kind of pain and also motivate people to visit a doctor and to keep your health on track. There’s no more need to waste time searching the web or encyclopedias and guessing what you ought to do. The app is handy to keep on your smartphone, so you can immediately find out what’s going on if you suddenly start to feel pain. In case you need doctor's consultation right now - our doctor can help you remotely.  

So what is really cool about the FirstAid app? 

- It's a simple to use, powerful diagnosis tool right in your pocket, on your smartphone. So it's always with you. 

- Doesn't matter where are you now. Your personal doctor is always in your app. Just tap the button, write a message to the doctor and we will do our best to instruct you with what you should do regarding your pain or disease. Or you can download the anamnesis and visit your local doctor.



- - - 

Fundings

To finish our product and to spread the word after we need your help.

  • 90% will be spent on further developing and promotional activities.
  • 5% PayPal fee.
  • 5% Indiegogo fee.

We need your help to finish the product development and to spread the word after the release.


- - - 

Schedule

Here is the plan:


- - -


Meet the Team

Now we are a small team of IT and medical specialists, located in Germany, Ukraine.

  

Vadim Grynchenko

Co-Founder, Product Designer

I have been working as a designer in the IT field for a long time. Designing websites, illustrations, different interfaces and participating in the development of a great many products, I have learned how to encode large amounts of information in a clear and convenient visual format. It is a great source of satisfaction for me that, using my skills, I can make people’s lives easier and more enjoyable.


Dr. Liliya Kurilets

Co-Founder, Medical Advisor, PhD

I have been practicing medicine for 13 years now. For already nine of those years, I have been working as a pulmonologist and allergologist. Besides that, I maintain a teaching practice at the State Medical University. My main task is to make medicine clearer and more accessible for my patients, and I want you all to be healthy!


- - - 

Challenges

We're an experienced team of IT specialists and medical advisors. We have been working in digital products development for the last 8 years. So we know how to make the product useful, easy to use and to solve our user's problems. 

The only thing that is a challenge for us it's to tell the world about the product after it will be ready. We need some resources to cooperate with a marketing agency and thus we can make the world a better place when everybody can make a simple test and to know if everything is ok with his health and contact the doctor no matter where you are. 


- - - 


Spread the word!

Help us to promote our product and this campaign. If you can't help, you can share this page with your social networks and ask your friends to share it as well. And then we will be able to finish the product and to help a lot of people to feel better, to supply them with a light but so effective tool of increasing life quality! 

Many thanks for your help!

story:
As it can be observed, trauma is nowadays one of the most troublesome problems in any community and also of the most important causes of morbidities and mortalities.

Trauma can be defined as a bodily harm to a vital or non-vital organ during an accident. The main objective of the medical staff and emergency ward in such cases should be preventing from mortality or morbidity in the injured person.

To save the injured person’s life is one of the medical principles that should be observed when encountering such a person. This can be achieved to a great extent by avoiding unnecessary transferences of the injured one.

Trauma occurs by several reasons such as:

1)  Car accidents  2) Downfall from height  3) Severe industrial traumas  4) Harms caused by sudden deceleration and similar reasons that exceed the limited space of this section.

Among the mentioned cases above, the highest figure of morbidities and mortalities returns to car accidents, having taken this figure from all of the industrialized and non-industrialized countries.

Medical staff and emergency ward play an important role in harm reduction and mortality reduction.  If we intend to deal with the most important harms caused by trauma, cervical, pectoral, and backbone traumas of the spinal cord are doubtlessly the most prominent ones.

In severe types of trauma, harms to spinal column and then to spinal cord are known as the main complications.

According to the reports and figures, harms to the spinal cord occur during the following steps:

1)  Harms during accident

2)  Harms after accident

For example someone who is harmed by a traumatic injury in his/her car and then gets sudden extensions while rescuing by emergency staff or common people, will have severe and irrecoverable harms to the spinal column; a technical flaw or an action that is done for rescuing purpose, may result in rupture or lesion of the spinal cord and the injured person will lose his/her ordinary life; for example fails to walk, control the urination and excretion and many other problems.


Harms to the backbone spinal column are numerous and any heaving of them may cause irrecoverable harms some of which include:

1)  Fracture

2)  Sliding of the spines on each other because of ligament harms (sub-luxation).

3)   Smashing in the form of compression fracture

4)  Wedge fracture

5)  Torsion

In an injured person with any of these harms, it is naturally impossible to diagnose the kind of harm before transporting to hospital and taking accurate examinations and necessary medical imaging.Therefore the injured rescuing process, placing on the stretcher, transporting to the hospital, and displacements that take place in the meantime are of a high significance.Because the above-mentioned harms are out of sight, the injured person will receive an again trauma during the rescue and transportation stages; this trauma will cause irrecoverable harms on the vital organs like spinal cord.

Newspaper & Media

In other words, transportation of the injured person must be done in a way that no displacement will be seen from the created state of the injured. When, for instance, the injured person suffers from any degree of vertebral rotation in the spinal column, the rotated parts should not be returned to the previous state under any circumstances; or in case of vertebral flexion, vertebral extension, and lateral flexion, the injured should not be positioned to upright status. Observing this principle is practically difficult (if not impossible), since the injured will be dislocated anyway while transportation and involuntary harms will be inevitable.

There is no suitable and yet practical solution for such these cases all over the world and sorry to say that the main harm of these technical and practical flaws will fall directly on the injured person and its irrecoverable damages are for the injured at first and then for the society and its economic and health system.  

By designing the Protective Spinal Cord device, the undersigned hope to solve this problem in the best way and offer a worthy help in preventing permanent damages to these injured ones.

With its complicated and unique design, this device can not be described in details, but I can say in short that it is designed so that moves along three axes of X, Y, and Z and can be fixed at any form imposed on it.


In other words, it works as a linear flexible fixative that takes form at any angle and position and then fixes in that state.

Suppose, for example, a traumatic person that is unconscious and injured from the spinal column part, positioned in the state of flexion (leaned forward) and a slight rotation in spinal column part, laid on the ground, inside the car, or any other place that does not allow any movement.

The PSC device rests flexibly on the current axis of patient’s spinal column; that is it lays fittingly just like a band on leaning and rotating zones of the spinal column and fixes in that position using its simple mechanism; the device takes the injured person’s position so that it will be impossible to move it. Then by means of the lateral flexible cranks it fastens around the body; these cranks bend from the two sides of the body and tie together.

In this manner one can take the injured easily and without any change in his/her status, carry on the bed and move him/her simply, no need to change the position.

The other notable point that is a fundamental capability of this device is that its parts are not insulated against radiology rays; this capability makes it possible for PSC device to remain on the injured body until the finalization of medical imaging. This device has no domestic or foreign parallel and it is hoped to use it all of the mobile and non-mobile emergency systems to prevent harms resulted by spinal column traumas.

My story 
I have been conducting medical research regarding spinal cord injuries for years. The amount that is needed for our project is more than $300K to manufacture this device. We use highly expensive and unique material in order to build our spinal protection system. The Full Mechanical System will be used for protecting the Spinal Cord, a specially designed device that provides maximum and complete protection to the spinal cord and vertebral columns for injured patients while being rescued from accidents and transported by medical teams to hospitals and medical facilities for urgent treatment. If we do not reach our fund goals to manufacture this device we would use the rest of fund to create and design a new medical device. Our goal is to invent unique devices to save people.


The Full Mechanical System for Protecting the Spinal Cord (PSC) not only utilizes the latest and most advanced theories, studies, and practices in the field, but it also embodies in its design, creation and development important original research carried out by our team.

PSC differs from all prior and existing devices for protecting the backs of patients in need of emergency transportation in significant ways.  Unfortunately, the mechanical spinal cord protection systems currently available and used in the field all apply some stress and pressure to patients’ spinal cords and have at times caused irreversible damage to patients’ backs. Our device is the only invention that provides total and complete protection of patients’ spinal cords and backs while being transported for urgent medical care.


Some of the awards of Full Mechanical Spinal Cord Protection System has won in major international competitions include the Gold Medal, Diploma and Special Award (the highest award in the medical field) at the EuroInvent competition in 2011, Diploma (High Scientific & Technological level) from the Romanian Scientific Community at the Technopol Moscow Competition (presented at the X Moscow International Salon of Innovations and Investments) in 2010, Silver Medal at the Korea Cyber International Genius Inventor Fair & Competition in South Korea in 2010, Gold Medal in the International Invention, Innovation and Technology Exhibition in Malaysia in 2011, Leonardo Da Vinci Special Diploma and Scientific Order in  2011 at the EuroInvent competition, and Gold Medal at the 110th World Patents Entrance & International Competitions of Concours Lepine in Paris 2011.

The medical community has for many years attempted to develop and create a device to reduce the pressure and stress applied to patient’ backs while being transported to the hospital.  However, the various inventions that have been created over the years, have failed to significantly relieve the pressure and stress that patients experience in their backs while being transported to hospitals.

Given the Full Mechanical Spinal Cord Protection System’s ability to provide full protection to individual’s backs and to prevent any harm, displacement, stress and pressure on the spinal cords and vertebral columns of patients, this invention is a significant and major contribution to the medical field.  Our project’s original and groundbreaking work in this area will ensure the safety and wellbeing of millions of patients throughout the world.

story:
Octobre 2015 : six élèves en première année de l'EDHEC de Nice s’indignent.     

500, c’est actuellement le nombre de licenciés jouant au Tennis Fauteuil en France.

La décision fut prise : créer notre propre association, pour soutenir un projet qui nous tient à cœur.

Tous joueurs de tennis depuis de nombreuses années, nous ne pouvions accepter que des sportifs, passionnés comme nous, mais en situation de handicap, ne puissent pratiquer leur activité favorite pour cause de moyen. 

Notre objectif est de lutter contre cette injustice et faciliter l'intégration du Tennis Fauteuil dans les clubs de tennis de la région de Nice.

Chaque don que vous pourrez faire nous aidera à financer l'achat de fauteuils roulants, matériel assez onéreux que beaucoup de sportifs ou de clubs ne peuvent acquérir.

HANDITEN est une association loi 1901 à but non lucratif. Vos dons ouvrent droit à réduction d'impôt estimée à 75 % des sommes versées jusqu'à 530 €. 

Un grand merci à tous pour votre soutien !

L'équipe HANDITEN

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

In October 2015, six students at EDHEC Business School got outraged.

Indeed, they realized that France only counted 500 disables licensed wheel chair tennis players.

Decision was made : create our charitable association to support a great cause that needs our attention.

All members of our charity have been playing tennis for many years, and we could not accept that disables to be precluded to practice their favorite sport because they cannot afford to purchase a tennis wheel chair.

Every donation you make will help us purchase tennis wheel chairs, which are expensive sport equipment many tennis club or people cannot afford.

Thank you very much for your support !

The HandiTen Team

______________________________________

HANDITEN poursuit son action de collecte en lançant sa propre ligne de parfums exclusif. 
"Business Women" et "Business Men" by HandiTen, deux fragrances originales aux senteurs de "bergamote, lavande, et cèdre" pour le parfum homme, et "ambre, vanille, et jasmin" pour le parfum femme.

Commander dès aujourd'hui votre parfum en nous contactant sur la page facebook d'HANDITEN 
https://www.facebook.com/handiten/

______________________________________

HANDITEN signe un partenariat exclusif avec l'US CAGNES TENNIS. 

Jean-Marc Rouge, Président de la Commission Handisport du club, et Hadrien Martin, Vice-Président d'HANDITEN se félicitent de cette association, qui permettra à HANDITEN de reverser tous les bénéfices de sa campagne de dons à l'US CAGNES TENNIS.

Ces moyens financiers permettront au club de continuer à soutenir le programme Handisport. Il est ainsi prévu d'acheter de nouveaux fauteuils roulants et d'aider les joueurs Handitennis du club à financer leurs frais d'inscriptions aux tournois.

L'US CAGNES TENNIS club est un acteur majeur du Handitennis en France. Il organise de nombreux tournois dont l'Open BNP PARIBAS Handisport au mois de juin (9-12 juin 2016), trois jours de compétition regroupant une quarantaine de joueurs et joueuses français et étrangers. 

Jean-Marc ROUGE, également directeur du tournoi précise que cette compétition fait partie du circuit mondial UNIQLO Wheelchair Tennis Tour, et regroupe chaque année des joueurs de haut niveau. Le tournoi est doté d'un Prize Money de $2500.
http://www.uscagnestennis.org/

______________________________________

iEco Concept soutient l’action HANDITEN et devient partenaire sponsor de l’opération.

La société innovante implantée à Nice, iEco Concept, a développé et commercialise ecobal® une plateforme de services connectée dédiée au tennis.

Leader dans la conception d'équipements de services dédiés aux sports et loisirs, iEco Concept met en avant l'action HANDITEN grâce à l'écran tactile multimédia intégré sur les machines ecobal®, véritable plateforme de communication connectée pour la diffusion d'informations, de communication et de services en ligne.


Grâce au soutien d'iEco Concept, l'action HANDITEN sera visible sur l'ensemble des machines ecobal® installées dans les clubs de tennis à travers la France.

http://www.iecoconcept.com/

story:
Alex Gordon Gray is an electrical engineer, programmer, mathematician, and theoretical physicist, who repairs medical devices for a living, and loves the smell of solder.

Tony Ganner is a 3D Generalist / VFX Artist, Teacher, and an expert in 3D printing, with a computer setup that rivals a small intelligence agency.

Together, they form Locatech, a start-up technology firm, with big plans.

Following the success of the Locationiser, they intend to create robot legs to enable Alex to walk, and something resemblant of Dr. Octavius's tentacles, the purpose of which they have not yet decided.

But enough about that, you're probably wondering "what the hell is a Locationiser, and why would I want one?"

The answer to such a question is this:
Once built, the Locationiser will be a multi-purpose device, capable of both mapping out a location, and recording/measuring distances & locations within. It can be used for planning the design of internal structures, the re-organisation of workspaces, but also for more technical things; if you're an engineer, you will probably have a use for it.

The physical device will simply require being placed anywhere in a room, before taking a reading. Advanced logical algorithms will deal with variations in data, and potentially with obstructions, to calculate the blueprints of the location you are in, and to record coordinates.

The software side of it will have many functions for measuring and planning, which will develop based on user requests, as will all other features.

The main purpose for this device is to be useful from an engineering/technical standpoint.

The output data will be 3D schematics with accurate measurements, unlike most environment mapping techniques, which result in in-accurate photo-montages.

The money raised for the development and production of this device will enable us to repair our 3D printer, take the time away from our regular jobs, and put in the hours needed to bring this to completion, along with covering the costs of the parts & prototyping materials.

If we don't reach our goal, depending on how close we get to it, we shall either attempt to do it with what we get, or refund our backers.

Some of the challenges we face are designing the pieces to fit together.

Mechanical clearance can be painful to plan for, but thankfully we have our own 3D printer to test with before injection mould pieces are made for the finished product.

On the programming side of things, smoothing algorithms and ensuring accuracy will be the toughest things to achieve, but in spite of all this, we can definitely do it.
