story:
Michael Obermayer and Peter Davis are about to set out to explore the country as the modern day Lewis & Clarks. Instead of fighting, bears, natives that they pissed off, and disease (hopefully) we are going to be facing different challenges. It is now that we ask for your support. It will not be easy to conquer all the hangovers, poor cell service, bad decision making, traffic, having to slow down in the EZ pass lane,  and monotonous spotify playlists that we will encounter. You can be our Thomas Jefferson! Tommy J baby! We ask that you support us the same way that he supported them. Through love and money. You can stay at home, as the powerful respectful people you are. We will brave the storm and do all the questionable things this country has to offer.

 We tried to get sponsorship for our trip, and initially we had many. Diet Coke, GoPro, Patagonia, Fischer-Price, Fresca, Match.com, Google,  John Lefner Inc.,

 A representative of Lefner said " What do you mean by sponsor?"

After telling our story his rep said "I will absolutely...sponsor you!"

 


We were set... until the incident.

Now that Peter lives in the shadow of his own mistakes, we have lost all of our sponsorship. Much like Ricky Bobby of Talledega nights.

So we turn to you in this time of opportunity. Your sponsorship ranks you right up there with the best of the best. It not only helps fund our campaign but also allows you to be a part of our adventures. You can choose a package and receive all of the perks for your donation. These perks will make you feel like you are in the car, and across the country with us. We'll even give you shotgun.

 

Hey if Jesus could do it for 40 days and 40 nights, before GPS and the iPhone, i think we will be ok.

 Help us, help you, be a part of our trip! Live our trip from the comforts of home.


We plan on staying with long lost friends stationed around the continental USA, explore the West, hike through the wilderness of the National Parks, see the sites, and live a dream. We know nobody is trying to give their money to a couple of guys looking to blow it. We are trying to do this trip on as little money as possible after living on a daily wage for the last few months. We will do anything for a few bucks, and that's why we ask for your Official Sponsorship.

 So if you want influence over the decisions we make, and daily inside access to our adventures including Boston, Burlington, VT, Ithaca, Ohio, Notre Dame, Chicago, Wisconsin, Mount Rushmore, The Grand Tetons, Yellowstone, Glacier National Park, Seattle, Oregon, San Francisco, The Redwoods, LA, San Diego, Hoover Dam, The Grand Canyon, Four Corners, Zion, Colorado, Texas, New Orleans, Tampa, Washington DC, and many other stops along the way, feel free to donate to our campaign.


Help solve our quarter-life crisis.



NOTE:

If we do not reach our goal of $1,000,000 all proceeds will be donated to the Y Annual Fund to send kids to camp at YMCA Camp Chingachgook.
story_txt: Michael Obermayer and Peter Davis are about to set out to explore the country as the modern day Lewis & Clarks. Instead of fighting, bears, natives that they pissed off, and disease (hopefully) we are going to be facing different challenges. It is now that we ask for your support. It will not be easy to conquer all the hangovers, poor cell service, bad decision making, traffic, having to slow down in the EZ pass lane,  and monotonous spotify playlists that we will encounter. You can be our Thomas Jefferson! Tommy J baby! We ask that you support us the same way that he supported them. Through love and money. You can stay at home, as the powerful respectful people you are. We will brave the storm and do all the questionable things this country has to offer. We tried to get sponsorship for our trip, and initially we had many. Diet Coke, GoPro, Patagonia, Fischer-Price, Fresca, Match.com, Google,  John Lefner Inc., A representative of Lefner said " What do you mean by sponsor?"After telling our story his rep said "I will absolutely...sponsor you!" We were set... until the incident.Now that Peter lives in the shadow of his own mistakes, we have lost all of our sponsorship. Much like Ricky Bobby of Talledega nights. So we turn to you in this time of opportunity. Your sponsorship ranks you right up there with the best of the best. It not only helps fund our campaign but also allows you to be a part of our adventures. You can choose a package and receive all of the perks for your donation. These perks will make you feel like you are in the car, and across the country with us. We'll even give you shotgun. Hey if Jesus could do it for 40 days and 40 nights, before GPS and the iPhone, i think we will be ok. Help us, help you, be a part of our trip! Live our trip from the comforts of home.We plan on staying with long lost friends stationed around the continental USA, explore the West, hike through the wilderness of the National Parks, see the sites, and live a dream. We know nobody is trying to give their money to a couple of guys looking to blow it. We are trying to do this trip on as little money as possible after living on a daily wage for the last few months. We will do anything for a few bucks, and that's why we ask for your Official Sponsorship. So if you want influence over the decisions we make, and daily inside access to our adventures including Boston, Burlington, VT, Ithaca, Ohio, Notre Dame, Chicago, Wisconsin, Mount Rushmore, The Grand Tetons, Yellowstone, Glacier National Park, Seattle, Oregon, San Francisco, The Redwoods, LA, San Diego, Hoover Dam, The Grand Canyon, Four Corners, Zion, Colorado, Texas, New Orleans, Tampa, Washington DC, and many other stops along the way, feel free to donate to our campaign.Help solve our quarter-life crisis.NOTE:If we do not reach our goal of $1,000,000 all proceeds will be donated to the Y Annual Fund to send kids to camp at YMCA Camp Chingachgook.

story:
For the full story of how we began, scroll down. In the meantime, this is where you come in (check out the Gallery for pictures!):


On March 31, 2015, thanks to the funds raised through our indiegogo campaign last year, the inaugural Nikumbuke World Cup was held in Lunga Lunga, Kenya. 8 teams participated (7 villages and one adolescent-aged girls team). The women played soccer for over 8 hours that day! We were able to provide transportation, soda, bread, new gear, indestructible soccer balls, goal nets, and more to the women. The games and heat were so intense that the women were eating pure sugar in between matches! We would like to raise money to do the same in 2016. Hosting the 2nd Annual Nikumbuke World Cup 2016 is our goal. To do so, we need your help! 


THIS IS WHERE YOU COME IN: 

Nikumbuke is a Swahili term meaning,  “Remember Me”. This holiday season YOU can be remembered for making a difference. 

Julie Foudy and Brittany Ammerman invite YOU to help make a difference. By contributing to raising our goal of $8,000 you can change a woman’s life, a village’s life, even an entire community’s life. 


WHAT WE NEED:

Let’s break it down:

-We need AT LEAST $8,000 to maintain the League, host the Nikumbuke World Cup 2016 and initiate new teams. Maintaining the League means new jerseys and gear for the women every couple of years (2 teams are due for new jerseys and gear), provide incentives of sugar and food per each team's competitions and practices, provide transportation, and plan the annual Nikumbuke World Cup.

-MOST IMPORTANTLY: the women need shoes to play soccer in. We are trying to raise funds to purchase rubber-soled sneakers for the women to wear while playing. 

-PER ONE PLAYER:

  -To provide the BASICS (jersey, sneakers, socks, shorts, transportation, and food) to one player = $100

DONATE THE FOLLOWING AMOUNTS TO PROVIDE THE CORRESPONDING EQUIPMENT:

  -Jersey: $24

 - Sneakers: $50

  -Socks: $5 

  -Shorts: $14

  -Transportation: $5

  - Food: $2

  -Completely fund 1 player: $100

Donate $150, provide the gear for one woman AND receive a custom USA-themed Nikumbuke Jersey for yourself.



OTHER WAYS TO HELP:

REMINDER: small donations contribute to BIG CHANGES! 

Can't donate much? Remember that YOU can be remembered for giving women the opportunity to play, no matter how small the contribution. Brittany Ammerman provided one ball and it helped change the world for these women. Little donations can be the difference and allow YOU to be REMEMBERED!

SHARE THIS CAMPAIGN! Tweet this! Facebook this! Email this! Instagram this! Do it all, SPREAD THE WORD! BE REMEMBERED

   

HOW DID WE BEGIN?

Former University of Wisconsin hockey standout Brittany Ammerman and former US soccer team captain and now ESPN analyst Julie Foudy, partnered in 2014 to outfit seven underprivileged women’s soccer teams for the first time in Kenya. Now, they need your help to maintain the Soccer League, add more teams, provide clean water to the women and their families, and more. Currently, there are seven village teams participating and two adolescent-aged girls teams. 

Brittany Ammerman, a University of Wisconsin alum and aspiring surgeon, first visited Kenya in 2013 as a member of the nonprofit organization Health by Motorbike. Accompanied by 11 other UW students and founder of Health by Motorbike (and UW Professor) Araceli Alonso, the goal was community outreach in southeastern rural Kenya, with the aim to educate and share knowledge about health and women’s health, specifically.

While there, Brittany Ammerman-and the athlete inside of her-bought a soccer ball in the Kenyan city of Mombasa. Originally, the intention was to keep busy during downtime and entertain some of the children. Surprisingly, the women were the most interested in playing. After the month-long trip concluded, the women asked Professor Alonso if they could be provided the means for a soccer league to compete against one another.

Brittany saw an opportunity– women in many rural communities in Kenya are overlooked with little opportunity to learn a skill, earn for their families, and build the types of relationships and confidence that come from participating in sports. Soon emerged a subdivision of Health by Motorbike: the Nikumbuke Women’s Soccer League.

When she returned in 2014, Brittany introduced soccer to two villages. She was able to fundraise $2000 to provide customized jerseys for two village teams, for a total of 40 women. The money also allowed the women to receive shorts, shoes, and socks. 

On June 14th, 2014 the first Nikumbuke Women’s Soccer League game was held between two of the villages, Mpakani and Jirani. Hundreds of villagers, especially women, watched the game. (The captain of Jirani Village, Esther, makes $15 per month- she used $5 to hire a coach for her team). Following the game, from seeing the joy in the women who were competing and the fun in competition, the remaining villages that Health by Motorbike communicates with asked to join the league and be provided the means to field teams. In March/April 2015 we provided six more teams with gear and hosted the inaugural Nikumbuke Women's World Cup in Lunga Lunga, Kenya, as mentioned above.

THANK YOU, for your contribution to the Nikumbuke Soccer League. We truly appreciate it! The women of the Nikumbuke Soccer League sincerely thank you as well. Asante sana!

xo,

Brittany Ammerman

Founder/President, Nikumbuke Soccer League

story:
The company founder, Ross Foox, has been in business for over 10 years. Just over a year ago, while travelling in Morocco, he came across a fascinating product. The product was hair building fibres made from a plant that grows only in the arid regions of Morocco, which the locals were using to conceal their hair loss area. He decided to introduce this amazing product to the world and help millions of people suffering from hair loss, Alopecia and other hair loss conditions.




Dushi® Moroccan Hair Building fibers have been developed which is the ONLY 100% natural hair building fiber on the market that give users INSTANT RESULTS. The fibers attach to thinning hair like magnets to give a fuller hair look. It is neither a "spray paint" nor "shoe polish". It is like nothing you have used before.


Dushi Moroccan Hair Building fibers is a breakthrough product for hair loss sufferers that

  • Instantly eliminates bald spots or appearance of thinning hair.
  • Gives you a perfectly natural look.
  • Last all day, all night, through wind, rain and sweat.
  • Will not smear or stain your skin or clothing.
  • Works for both men and women.
  • Can be used to cover regrowth & for quick colouring.

Unlike ordinary products on the mass market, Dushi is a professional grade product:

  • Made of natural ﬁbers from plants, safe even for sensitive scalp.
  • Bonds to hair more securely.
  • Free of animal ingredients, synthetic dyes, ﬁllers and preservatives.
  • Comes in 9 different colours.


The fibres are made from a plant, which is the only plant in the world to mimic human hair. That’s because the fibers from this plant have surface optical properties very similar to human hair. But this plant also provides another great benefit. The fibers of this plant carry a negative electrical charge. Human hair is positively charged. The result is attraction through natural electromagnetic forces.


How Dushi Fibers Work

The product is very easy to use. Just shake onto the area of thinning hair, gently pat and with a quick spray of Dushi Locking Spray – it will give you a full head of perfect hair all day, all night, through wind, rain and sweat.




Your help will mean that we can make this 100% Natural product available to people all over the world and give them back their confidence.  You will also help us launch our shower hair care range which helps stimulate hair growth using natural ingredients. 

We want Dushi and our line of products to add to your quality of life and give you back your confidence. By pre-ordering Dushi Moroccan hair building fibres or one of our brand new products below, you will forever be a part of taking Dushi to the next level. We will be able to:

You can support the campaign through a number of different perks ranging from receiving our newsletter, to enjoying the difference our product can make to your life or the life of a loved one. You can also donate to Miracle Babies foundation via Dushi Wax Challenge fundraiser - #dushiwaxchallenge. Half of donations for this particular perk will go directly to Miracle Babies foundation.


1) Dushi Hair Locking Spray 100ml {$6}:

Use Dushi Hair Locking Spray with Dushi Hair Building Fibers for added control. For extra hold, lightly spray the areas where Dushi Hair Building Fibers are applied, holding the bottle about 10-15cm away from the scalp. For just $10 you can begin the start of your Dushi kit with the Dushi Hair Locking Spray


2) Dushi Brow Enhancer {$15}:


Dushi Brow Enhancer gives you natural, thicker brows by boosting volume. Perfect for shaping and definition to get those "model eyebrows" we all desire.

No more unnatural looking effects from brow pencils. Dushi Brow Enhancer creates a more defined look without clumping, smudging or smearing.

Totally natural fibers made from Moroccan plant with no added chemicals.

Dushi Brow Enhancer comes in 4 colours to suit every woman - Black, Cocoa, Chestnut & Hazelnut (pictures above).


3) Dushi Moroccan Hair Building Fibers {$25}:

Size: 25 grams (0.88 oz), 50-75 day supply

Dushi is 100% natural hair loss breakthrough for Men and Women. Dushi Moroccan Hair Building Fibers will give you a fuller hair look and lasts all day, all night, through wind, rain and sweat. Works for both men and women. Can also be used to cover regrowth.

Dushi is made of natural ﬁbers from plants, safe even for sensitive scalp and bonds to hair more securely. Can use with Dushi Hair Locking Spray for extra hold. Dushi is free of animal ingredients, synthetic dyes, ﬁllers and preservatives. Comes in 9 different colours.



4) Dushi Moroccan Hair Building Fibers 25g + Hair Locking Spray 100ml {$28}:


The set contains Hair Building Fibers 25 grams (0.88 oz), 50-75 day supply + 100ml Hair Locking Spray. Fibers will give you a fuller hair look and lasts all day, all night, through wind, rain and sweat. Works for both men and women. It's made of natural ﬁbers from plants, safe even for sensitive scalp. Use Dushi Hair Locking Spray for added control. We'll email you after purchase to ask for your colour choice. Colour chart above.


5) Dushi Shampoo & Conditioner Pack 1 {$36}:

This perk gives you Shampoo & Conditioner from our new Shower Hair Care range.

Dushi Give Me Hair™ Stimulant Shampoo is an invigorating shampoo designed to improve the circulation to the scalp, with essential oils of Cedarwood, Rosemary, Geranium and Coconut (virgin). Cedarwood helps with the growth of hair and for those with Alopecia. Rosemary has traditionally been used in aromatherapy to help stimulate hair growth.

That Feels Nice™ Conditioner with Argan Oil, Shea Butter, Jojoba Oil & Rosehip Oil will make your hair feel extra nice.

Features: Paraben & Sulphate-free, Silicone-free & Artificial colour-free

250ml (8.79fl.oz) each bottle


6) Dushi Shampoo & Conditioner Pack 2 {$36}:

This perk gives you Shampoo & Conditioner from our new Shower Hair Care range.

Dushi No More Snow™ Stimulant & Anti Dandruff Shampoo is an invigorating shampoo designed to improve the circulation to the scalp & reduce dandruff with Caffeine, Coconut Acid & Caramel.

That Feels Nice™ Conditioner with Argan Oil, Shea Butter, Jojoba Oil & Rosehip Oil will make your hair feel nice.

Features: Paraben & Sulphate-free, Silicone-free & Artificial colour-free

250ml (8.79fl.oz) each bottle


7) Dushi Starter Pack {$65}:

Get your Confidence back with Dushi Starter Pack

What you get:
1. Hair Fibers 25 grams (0.88 oz) (we will email you and check your colour choice)
2. 100ml Hair Locking Spray
3. 250ml (8.79fl.oz) Give Me Hair™ Stimulant Shampoo OR No More Snow™ Stimulant & Anti Dandruff Shampoo (we will email you and check your choice)
4. 250ml (8.79fl.oz) That Feels Nice™ Conditioner

Easy 4 step system:
1. Apply Hair Fibers over thinning areas
2. Use Hair Locking Spray for added control
3. Wash off fibers with one of above Shampoos
4. Apply above Conditioner for final treatment


8) #DushiWaxChallenge fund raiser {$150}:


The #DushiWaxChallenge for Men and Women is a fun way to raise money and awareness for Miracle Babies Foundation by Waxing a part of your body (or at least 1 strip) and nominating via social media at least 3 other friends for the challenge. If you're nominated but do not complete the challenge then you should donate to this wonderful charity.  

We're inspired by the work that Miracle Babies Foundation do so we wanted to support them by raising money and awareness. The more people that know about Miracle Babies Foundation, the greater their impact, so please spread the #DushiWaxChallenge by sharing our page with your friends and family. Thank you in advance for your generosity, it means a lot!

Half the proceeds from this perk will go directly to the charity.

www.miraclebabies.org.au

We understand the emotional toll hair loss can cause. Hence we are determined to create products which are not only better for us but also provide effective solutions for hair loss sufferers. We want to give people back their confidence which one looses during hair loss, especially at younger age.

Hair loss affects people at various ages for a number of reasons…

Thinning hair can be caused by a change in hormones, improper diet, stress, unhealthy hair habits, genetics, medical conditions, illness, and even cosmetic procedures such as bleaching or perming hair.

Many people assume hair loss is a problem that primarily affects older men and even fewer older women, and while there is some truth to that – generally speaking as you age your rate of hair growth slows – hair falling out and thinning hair can affect men and women of any age.

Thinning hair, hair loss, and other hair-related issues can affect people as young as in their teens and early twenties. Some cannot begin to imagine what this must be like, as it is discouraging enough to think about hair loss as we get older, but hair falling out and hair loss at a young age is more common than you might think. In fact, an estimated 40% of men will have noticeable hair loss by age 35, and an estimated 40% of women will have visible hair loss by the time they are 40.

While hair loss at a young age can be alarming, it’s important to remember that the earlier thinning hair is noticed and any potential issue is diagnosed, the easier it may be to treat. The solution may be as simple as replacing products that cause hair loss with products that contain natural ingredients and which stimulate hair growth.

Whether or not there is a hair loss cure for your particular situation, you can discover how to take better care of yourself and your hair by knowing what to look for early on, and taking preventative measures to help minimize future damage.

What to Look For

Being aware of your hair’s health and its growth pattern is the first step to getting ahead of hair loss.

Ask yourself: Are there more strands of hair falling out in your hair brush than normal? Is there a large amount of hair on your pillow when you wake up in the morning?

Visual cues are a great way to determine if you’re beginning to lose more hair than normal.

You may feel alone if you are experiencing hair loss, but after looking at statistics, we hope you’ll see that almost everyone is affected by some type of hair loss in their lifetime.

For women, thinning hair and hair loss affects roughly one in four women, and 95% of those affected suffer from androgenetic alopecia. On average, women dealing with hair loss are between 25 and 35 years old. This is a big contrast from the perception that thinning hair and hair loss is only related to older men and women.

Furthermore, 24% of women equate losing hair to losing a limb. This is how deeply emotional thinning hair and hair loss can be, especially for women.

By the age of 35, 66% of American men will experience some type of hair loss, and by the age of 50, about 85% of men will have significantly thinning hair.

For men with male pattern baldness, 25% will begin to see thinning hair or hair loss before they reach the age of 21.

These numbers prove that hair loss is not just an issue for older men and women, but in fact affects many men and women in their early twenties and thirties as well.


One of the challenges at Dushi is to create a larger range. Our fibres are currently available in 9 different colours and in the future we would also like to develop a sample pack, a travel pack and accessories to apply the fibres more efficiently. We have done our research into marketability and manufacturing of these products and have budgeted accordingly. The funds raised will go into product development and marketing of these products to the consumer.

Our aim and vision at Dushi is to prevent or prolong hair loss as much as possible. Our Shower Hair Care range will prevent hair loss by stimulating hair growth. The challenge is to create natural products which are better for us rather than products which contain chemicals that cause hair loss. We’ve formulated products which are both natural and stimulate hair growth and your funds will help launch our new range.

Another challenge is to make more people aware of our product and to get them to discuss thinning hair and hair loss without embarrassment. We would like to encourage people to offer solutions to each other, like Dushi and to get people to support our products, not just through Perks but also through a social media rumble so that we, at Dushi, can offer more products to more people at a more competitive price each and every time.


What People Are Saying.

Fantastic product, been using it for 3 months and love the results!

- Jamie from Melbourne


My hair is thinning but Dushi gave it more volume and thickness. Highly recommend it.

- Elizabeth from Sydney




I am completely bald, should I buy Dushi?

Sorry, no. We do not recommend Dushi to those who are completely bald. In addition, Dushi may not work for people with advanced hair loss level/class – Norwood scale 7 or Ludwig scale Advanced (basically very bald). If you are not sure where you fall on the scale, check with your Salon professional.

What about a large scar on the scalp?

If your scar is more than 2 inch in diameter, and it is shiny (no hair whatsoever),  we do not recommend this product. Sorry.

Who is the typical candidate for Dushi?

Early this year, we sent out 600 surveys to our customers who volunteered to participate. The survey asked them if they were satisfied with the performance of Dushi and collected information about their age, gender, hair loss levels based on Ludwig or Norwood scale. Here are the results:

Men (breakdown by Norwood Scale)

Women (breakdown by Ludwig Scale)

As you can see, if you are completely bald or have a large bald spot where there is little hair left, you should NOT try this product.

But if the thinning area on your scalp still has reasonable amount of hair, Dushi will do wonders for you.


Can others tell I am using Dushi?

If your hair loss level has not reached Norwood scale 7 or Ludwig scale Advanced (see below), Dushi will instantly eliminate the bald spot and the appearance of thinning hair, your hair will look completely natural, undetectable, even from close up, outdoor and under bright light.

Dushi is not the typical hair loss products (paint-like or shoe polish-like) you normally see on the mass market that were invented in the 80s of last century. Dushi is a new, breakthrough product that quickly became a staple among professionals in theatrical and movie industry.

Professionals love Dushi because it is HD-movie-camera-proof:  high definition cinematic camera can capture pores or small wrinkles on an actor/actress’s face, however it can not tell natural hair from hair enhanced with Dushi.

Can I use Dushi by myself?

Yes, you can put Dushi on the scalp yourself by standing in front of a mirror.

Can Dushi be used with any hair type or any hairstyle?

Dushi works for any hair type, ranging from normal coarser hair to vellus hair (fine, non-pigmented hair, often called “peach fuzz”) and everything in between. Dushi application is flexible to accommodate any hair style including shaved, short, long, curly, kinky, wavy, braided, frizzy, straight, colored, highlighted or frosted hair.

How long does it take to apply Dushi?

It varies, from a few seconds to a few minutes, depending on the size of thinning area and your skill level. You will get better at applying Dushi after a few uses.

What is the minimum hair length for it to work?

For best results, we recommend 0.5 inch (1 -2 cm) or longer. Dushi will NOT work on shaved head, use it after your hair grows out.

Will Dushi fall out?

Not if you follow the instructions (come with the product) and apply correctly. Dushi bonds to your hair 200% more secure than any other fiber based thickening products on the mass market. It better withstands wind, sweat and rain.

Does Dushi stain?

Absolutely not. Dushi fibers are 100% colorfast, it will never stain clothes, bed linen or your scalp. If the fibres accidentally drop onto a surface, simply dust them off.

Can I comb my hair after applying Dushi?

Yes. For best results, you should dry and style your hair before applying Dushi. However you can still comb your hair afterwards, just use a wide toothed comb. It is more for shaping than fine grooming. You can also use your hand and fingers to pat their style into place.

How long does one application last?

Each application can last for days until you decide to remove it by shampooing your hair.

Do I need special shampoo to remove Dushi?

No. You can use regular shampoo.

How long does one bottle of Dushi last?

Depending on the size of the thinning area, the 25 Gram size last approximately 50 – 75 days.

How do I use Dushi and Minoxidil at the same time?

Apply Minoxidil (or any topical treatment) first, wait for your scalp to dry completely and then apply Dushi.

What about Propecia? Can I continue to take it while using Dushi?

Absolutely. Dushi does not interfere with Propecia whatsoever.

Can I use hairspray, hair gels or hair oil?

Hairspray – use it AFTER Dushi.

Hair gels – wait for hair gel to dry BEFORE applying Dushi.

Hair Oils – It depends on types of hair oil. You can experiment. If you do, use hair oil BEFORE using Dushi.

Does Dushi change normal hair growth pattern?

No. Dushi is not a medicine or drug, it consists of natural fibres extracted from plants, it does not promote or slow down normal hair growth.

Does it work for women?

Dushi is equally effective for women as for men. In fact, approximately 30% of our customers are female. Check out the video demo for women.

Does Dushi work for facial hair and eyebrows?

Yes, many salon professionals and makeup artists also use Dushi to give eyebrows a more fuller and natural look.

How many colors are there?

Dushi offers nine colors. One of them will match your hair color.

How to choose a color for my hair?

(1) Look in the mirror. Look at your hair root color in the thinning area. This is the color to order.
(2) If you have highlighted ends with darker roots, match the root color.
(3) When in doubt, choose the darker shade. For example if you have trouble deciding between medium brown and light brown, choose medium brown.

Can I mix two colors, how?

Yes. Follow the following steps:

Step 1: Apply a thin layer of darker shade Dushi, lightly pat your hair to disperse the product, and then

Step 2: apply the lighter shade Dushi, again gently pat your hair to disperse the product.

Step 3: Repeat step 1 and 2 if necessary to get the desired coverage.

Can I use a curling iron or hair straightener with this product?

Yes, but you should use styling iron first before applying Dushi.
story_txt:
The company founder, Ross Foox, has been in business for over 10 years.
Just over a year ago, while travelling in Morocco, he came across a fascinating
product. The product was hair building fibres made from a plant that grows only in the arid regions of
Morocco, which the locals were using to conceal their
hair loss area. He decided to
introduce this amazing product to the world and help millions of people
suffering from hair loss, Alopecia and other hair loss conditions.








Dushi® Moroccan Hair Building
fibers have been developed which is the ONLY 100% natural hair building fiber
on the market that give users INSTANT RESULTS. The fibers attach to thinning
hair like magnets to give a fuller hair look. It is neither a "spray
paint" nor "shoe polish". It is like nothing you have used
before. 



Dushi Moroccan Hair Building
fibers is a breakthrough product for hair loss sufferers that 


Instantly eliminates bald spots or appearance of thinning hair. 

Gives you a perfectly natural look. 

Last all day, all night, through wind, rain and sweat. 

Will not smear or stain your skin or clothing. 

Works for both men and women. 

Can be used to cover regrowth & for quick colouring. 


Unlike ordinary products on the mass market, Dushi is a professional
grade product: 

Made of natural ﬁbers from plants, safe even for sensitive
scalp. 

Bonds to hair more securely.
Free of animal ingredients, synthetic dyes, ﬁllers and preservatives.
Comes in 9 different colours.



  



The fibres are made from a plant, which is the only plant in the world
to mimic human hair. That’s because the fibers
from this plant have surface optical properties very similar to human hair. But
this plant also provides another great benefit. The fibers of this plant carry
a negative electrical charge. Human hair is positively charged. The result is attraction
through natural electromagnetic forces. 



How Dushi Fibers Work

The product is very easy to use. Just shake
onto the area of thinning hair, gently pat and with a quick spray of Dushi
Locking Spray – it will give you a full head of perfect hair all day, all
night, through wind, rain and sweat. 




 Your help will mean that we can
make this 100% Natural product available to people all over the world and give
them back their confidence.  You
will also help us launch our shower hair care range which helps stimulate hair growth using natural
ingredients. 
We want Dushi and our line of products to add
to your quality of life and give you back your confidence. By pre-ordering
Dushi Moroccan hair building fibres or one of our brand new products below, you
will forever be a part of taking Dushi to the next level. We will be
able to:

You can support the campaign through a number of different perks ranging
from receiving our newsletter, to enjoying the difference our product
can make to your life or the life of a loved one. You can also donate to
Miracle Babies foundation via Dushi Wax Challenge fundraiser -
#dushiwaxchallenge. Half of donations for this particular perk will go directly
to Miracle Babies foundation.

1) Dushi Hair Locking Spray 100ml {$6}:


Use Dushi Hair Locking Spray with Dushi Hair Building Fibers for added control. For extra hold, lightly spray the areas where Dushi Hair Building Fibers are applied, holding the bottle about 10-15cm away from the scalp. For just $10 you can begin the start of your Dushi kit with the Dushi Hair Locking Spray

2) Dushi Brow Enhancer {$15}:

Dushi Brow Enhancer gives you natural, thicker brows by boosting volume. Perfect for shaping and definition to get those "model eyebrows" we all desire.No more unnatural looking effects from brow pencils. Dushi Brow Enhancer creates a more defined look without clumping, smudging or smearing.Totally natural fibers made from Moroccan plant with no added chemicals.Dushi Brow Enhancer comes in 4 colours to suit every woman - Black, Cocoa, Chestnut & Hazelnut (pictures above). 


3) Dushi Moroccan Hair Building Fibers {$25}:


Size: 25 grams (0.88 oz), 50-75 day supply
Dushi is 100% natural hair loss breakthrough for Men and Women. Dushi Moroccan Hair Building Fibers will give you a fuller hair look and lasts all day, all night, through wind, rain and sweat. Works for both men and women. Can also be used to cover regrowth.
Dushi is made of natural ﬁbers from plants, safe even for sensitive scalp and bonds to hair more securely. Can use with Dushi Hair Locking Spray for extra hold. Dushi is free of animal ingredients, synthetic dyes, ﬁllers and preservatives. Comes in 9 different colours.



4) Dushi Moroccan Hair Building Fibers 25g + Hair Locking Spray 100ml {$28}:

The set contains Hair Building Fibers 25 grams (0.88 oz), 50-75 day supply + 100ml Hair Locking Spray. Fibers will give you a fuller hair look and lasts all day, all night, through wind, rain and sweat. Works for both men and women. It's made of natural ﬁbers from plants, safe even for sensitive scalp. Use Dushi Hair Locking Spray for added control. We'll email you after purchase to ask for your colour choice. Colour chart above.5) Dushi Shampoo & Conditioner Pack 1 {$36}:
This perk gives you Shampoo & Conditioner from our new Shower Hair Care range.Dushi Give Me Hair™ Stimulant Shampoo is an invigorating shampoo designed to improve the circulation to the scalp,
with essential oils of Cedarwood, Rosemary, Geranium and Coconut (virgin).
Cedarwood helps with the growth of hair and for those with Alopecia. Rosemary has traditionally been used in aromatherapy
to help stimulate hair growth.
That Feels Nice™ Conditioner with Argan Oil, Shea Butter, Jojoba Oil & Rosehip Oil will make your hair feel extra nice.Features: Paraben & Sulphate-free, Silicone-free & Artificial colour-free250ml (8.79fl.oz) each bottle6) Dushi Shampoo & Conditioner Pack 2 {$36}:
This perk gives you Shampoo & Conditioner from our new Shower Hair Care range.Dushi No More Snow™ Stimulant & Anti Dandruff Shampoo is an invigorating shampoo designed to improve the circulation to the scalp & reduce dandruff with Caffeine, Coconut Acid & Caramel. That Feels Nice™ Conditioner with Argan Oil, Shea Butter, Jojoba Oil & Rosehip Oil will make your hair feel nice.Features: Paraben & Sulphate-free, Silicone-free & Artificial colour-free250ml (8.79fl.oz) each bottle7) Dushi Starter Pack {$65}:
Get your Confidence back with Dushi Starter PackWhat you get: 1. Hair Fibers 25 grams (0.88 oz) (we will email you and check your colour choice)2. 100ml Hair Locking Spray 3. 250ml (8.79fl.oz) Give Me Hair™ Stimulant Shampoo OR No More Snow™ Stimulant & Anti Dandruff Shampoo (we will email you and check your choice)4. 250ml (8.79fl.oz) That Feels Nice™ ConditionerEasy 4 step system:1. Apply Hair Fibers over thinning areas2. Use Hair Locking Spray for added control3. Wash off fibers with one of above Shampoos4. Apply above Conditioner for final treatment 8) #DushiWaxChallenge fund raiser {$150}:

The #DushiWaxChallenge for Men and Women is a fun way to raise money and awareness for Miracle Babies Foundation by Waxing a part of your body (or at least 1 strip) and nominating via social media at least 3 other friends for the challenge. If you're nominated but do not complete the challenge then you should donate to this wonderful charity.  We're inspired by the work that Miracle Babies Foundation do so we wanted to support them by raising money and awareness. The more people that know about Miracle Babies Foundation, the greater 
their impact, so please spread the #DushiWaxChallenge by sharing our 
page with your friends and family. Thank you in advance for your 
generosity, it means a lot!Half the proceeds from this perk will go directly to the charity. www.miraclebabies.org.au

We
understand the emotional toll hair loss can cause. Hence we are determined to
create products which are not only better for us but also provide effective
solutions for hair loss sufferers. We want to give people back their confidence
which one looses during hair loss, especially at younger age. 

Hair loss affects people at
various ages for a number of reasons…
Thinning hair can be caused by a change in hormones, improper diet,
stress, unhealthy hair habits, genetics, medical conditions, illness, and even
cosmetic procedures such as bleaching or perming hair.
Many people assume hair loss is a problem that primarily affects older
men and even fewer older women, and while there is some truth to that –
generally speaking as you age your rate of hair growth slows – hair
falling out and thinning hair can affect men and women of any
age.


Thinning hair, hair loss, and other hair-related issues can affect
people as young as in their teens and early twenties. Some cannot begin to
imagine what this must be like, as it is discouraging enough to think about
hair loss as we get older, but hair falling out and hair loss at a
young age is more common than you might think. In fact, an estimated 40% of men will have noticeable hair
loss by age 35, and an estimated 40% of women will have visible hair
loss by the time they are 40.
While hair loss at a young age can be alarming, it’s important to remember
that the earlier thinning hair is noticed and any potential issue is diagnosed,
the easier it may be to treat. The solution may be as simple as replacing
products that cause hair loss with products
that contain natural ingredients and which stimulate hair growth. 
Whether or not there is a hair loss cure for your particular
situation, you can discover how to take better care of yourself and your hair
by knowing what to look for early on, and taking preventative measures to help
minimize future damage.
What to Look For

Being aware of your hair’s health and its growth pattern is the first
step to getting ahead of hair loss. 
Ask yourself: Are there more strands of hair falling out in
your hair brush than normal? Is there a large amount of hair on your pillow
when you wake up in the morning?
Visual cues are a great way to determine if you’re beginning to lose
more hair than normal.
You may feel alone if you are experiencing hair loss, but after looking
at statistics, we hope you’ll see that almost everyone is affected by some type
of hair loss in their lifetime.
For women, thinning hair and hair loss affects roughly one
in four women, and 95% of those affected suffer from androgenetic
alopecia. On average, women dealing with hair loss are between
25 and 35 years old. This is a big contrast from the perception that
thinning hair and hair loss is only related to older men and women.
Furthermore, 24% of women equate losing hair to losing a limb. This
is how deeply emotional thinning hair and hair loss can be, especially for
women.
By the age of 35, 66% of American men will experience some type of hair
loss, and by the age of 50, about 85% of men will have
significantly thinning hair.
For men with male pattern baldness, 25% will begin to see thinning hair
or hair loss before they reach the age of 21.
These numbers prove that hair loss is not just an issue for older men
and women, but in fact affects many men and women in their early twenties and
thirties as well.



 

One of the challenges at Dushi is to create a larger range. Our fibres
are currently available in 9 different colours and in the future we would also
like to develop a sample pack, a travel pack and accessories to apply the
fibres more efficiently. We have done our research into marketability and
manufacturing of these products and have budgeted accordingly. The funds raised
will go into product development and marketing of these products to the
consumer. 
Our aim and vision at Dushi is to prevent or prolong hair loss as much
as possible. Our Shower Hair Care range will prevent hair loss by stimulating
hair growth. The challenge is to create natural
products which are better for us rather than products which contain chemicals
that cause hair loss. We’ve formulated products which are both natural and
stimulate hair growth and your funds will help launch our new range. 
Another challenge is to make more people aware of our product and to get
them to discuss thinning hair and hair loss without embarrassment. We would
like to encourage people to offer solutions to each other, like Dushi and to
get people to support our products, not just through Perks but also through a
social media rumble so that we, at Dushi, can offer more products to more
people at a more competitive price each and every time.

What People Are Saying.Fantastic product, been using it for 3 months and love the results! - Jamie from MelbourneMy hair is thinning but Dushi gave it more volume and thickness. Highly recommend it.- Elizabeth from Sydney





I am completely bald, should I buy Dushi?
Sorry, no. We do not recommend Dushi to those who are completely 
bald. In addition, Dushi may not work for people with advanced hair loss
 level/class – Norwood scale 7 or Ludwig scale Advanced (basically very 
bald). If you are not sure where you fall on the scale, check with your 
Salon professional.
What about a large scar on the scalp?
If your scar is more than 2 inch in diameter, and it is shiny (no hair whatsoever),  we do not recommend this product. Sorry.
Who is the typical candidate for Dushi?
Early this year, we sent out 600 surveys to our customers who 
volunteered to participate. The survey asked them if they were satisfied
 with the performance of Dushi and collected information about their 
age, gender, hair loss levels based on Ludwig or Norwood scale. Here are
 the results:
Men (breakdown by Norwood Scale)




Women (breakdown by Ludwig Scale)

As you can see, if you are completely bald or have a large bald spot 
where there is little hair left, you should NOT try this product.
But if the thinning area on your scalp still has reasonable amount of hair, Dushi will do wonders for you.

Can others tell I am using Dushi?
If your hair loss level has not reached Norwood scale 7 or Ludwig 
scale Advanced (see below), Dushi will instantly eliminate the bald spot
 and the appearance of thinning hair, your hair will look completely 
natural, undetectable, even from close up, outdoor and under bright 
light.
Dushi is not the typical hair loss products (paint-like or shoe 
polish-like) you normally see on the mass market that were invented in 
the 80s of last century. Dushi is a new, breakthrough product that 
quickly became a staple among professionals in theatrical and movie 
industry.
Professionals love Dushi because it is HD-movie-camera-proof:  high 
definition cinematic camera can capture pores or small wrinkles on an 
actor/actress’s face, however it can not tell natural hair from hair 
enhanced with Dushi.
Can I use Dushi by myself?
Yes, you can put Dushi on the scalp yourself by standing in front of a mirror.
Can Dushi be used with any hair type or any hairstyle?
Dushi works for any hair type, ranging from normal coarser hair to 
vellus hair (fine, non-pigmented hair, often called “peach fuzz”) and 
everything in between. Dushi application is flexible to accommodate any 
hair style including shaved, short, long, curly, kinky, wavy, braided, 
frizzy, straight, colored, highlighted or frosted hair.
How long does it take to apply Dushi?
It varies, from a few seconds to a few minutes, depending on the size
 of thinning area and your skill level. You will get better at applying 
Dushi after a few uses.
What is the minimum hair length for it to work?
For best results, we recommend 0.5 inch (1 -2 cm) or longer. Dushi 
will NOT work on shaved head, use it after your hair grows out.
Will Dushi fall out?
Not if you follow the instructions (come with the product) and apply 
correctly. Dushi bonds to your hair 200% more secure than any other 
fiber based thickening products on the mass market. It better withstands
 wind, sweat and rain.
Does Dushi stain?
Absolutely not. Dushi fibers are 100% colorfast, it will never stain 
clothes, bed linen or your scalp. If the fibres accidentally drop onto a
 surface, simply dust them off.
Can I comb my hair after applying Dushi?
Yes. For best results, you should dry and style your hair before 
applying Dushi. However you can still comb your hair afterwards, just 
use a wide toothed comb. It is more for shaping than fine grooming. You 
can also use your hand and fingers to pat their style into place.
How long does one application last?
Each application can last for days until you decide to remove it by shampooing your hair.
Do I need special shampoo to remove Dushi?
No. You can use regular shampoo.
How long does one bottle of Dushi last?
Depending on the size of the thinning area, the 25 Gram size last approximately 50 – 75 days.
How do I use Dushi and Minoxidil at the same time?
Apply Minoxidil (or any topical treatment) first, wait for your scalp to dry completely and then apply Dushi.
What about Propecia? Can I continue to take it while using Dushi?
Absolutely. Dushi does not interfere with Propecia whatsoever.
Can I use hairspray, hair gels or hair oil?
Hairspray – use it AFTER Dushi.
Hair gels – wait for hair gel to dry BEFORE applying Dushi.
Hair Oils – It depends on types of hair oil. You can experiment. If you do, use hair oil BEFORE using Dushi.
Does Dushi change normal hair growth pattern?
No. Dushi is not a medicine or drug, it consists of natural fibres 
extracted from plants, it does not promote or slow down normal hair 
growth.
Does it work for women?
Dushi is equally effective for women as for men. In fact, 
approximately 30% of our customers are female. Check out the video demo 
for women.
Does Dushi work for facial hair and eyebrows?
Yes, many salon professionals and makeup artists also use Dushi to give eyebrows a more fuller and natural look.
How many colors are there?
Dushi offers nine colors. One of them will match your hair color.
How to choose a color for my hair?
(1) Look in the mirror. Look at your hair root color in the thinning area. This is the color to order.
(2) If you have highlighted ends with darker roots, match the root color.
(3) When in doubt, choose the darker shade. For example if you have 
trouble deciding between medium brown and light brown, choose medium 
brown.
Can I mix two colors, how?
Yes. Follow the following steps:
Step 1: Apply a thin layer of darker shade Dushi, lightly pat your hair to disperse the product, and then
Step 2: apply the lighter shade Dushi, again gently pat your hair to disperse the product.
Step 3: Repeat step 1 and 2 if necessary to get the desired coverage.
Can I use a curling iron or hair straightener with this product?
Yes, but you should use styling iron first before applying Dushi.

story:
Grow Thicker Fuller Healthier Hair

You don't have to lose your hair - HairGains' proven technology  will stop hair loss and start growing thicker, fuller, natural hair - without harmful chemicals or painful surgery.  


                  


Our diode technology creates the proper wavelength and intensity to go deep into the scalp where the light can increase the metabolism of the cells.  The diodes used to create a broad pattern of light to effectively treat the areas where thinning occurs. This not only makes for efficient treatment but allows fewer diodes to be used for cost-effectiveness.  HairGain is simple, safe and easy to use. Simply plug it in (to a standard outlet) and turn on the switch. HairGain is smart enough to automatically turn off after a 25-minutetreatment and cannot activate unless it is on your head.


                             



We deliver constant and consistent energy by not using battery power. Therefore, every treatment delivers the right amount of energy. Our treatment time has been determined to accomplish the optimum stimulation without becoming tedious.


 “ HairGain will be a perfect addition to my hair restoration program. It will be a cost-effective method for those who want to simply slow down their hair loss to those who will use it to enhance their hair transplants.” 

                                                                                      - Kenneth L Stein M.D.



                                                


HairGain offers the following advantages:

  • Cleared for sale over the counter eliminating the need for a prescription.  
  • Uses the most effective light technology to achieve desired clinical goals. 
  • Simple to use design with an on and off switch to administer a timed 25-minute treatment, then automatically turns off. 
  • One size fits all shell with removal foam pads to achieve a more custom fit. 
  • Durable product with years of usability. 
  • The most affordable LLLT device cleared for promoting hair growth available on the market.

                      BEFORE                                                                                  AFTER

   *Individual results will vary 


We have eliminated the greatest hurdles of product research and development, FDA clearances, and appropriate pricing to open this product to virtually anyone wanting to reduce the amount of hair loss and promote new hair stimulation. This is an affordable option for anyone losing hair to begin the process of hair restoration.



HairGain helps save your thinning hair and grows thicker fuller healthier hair naturally through low-level light therapy, gently stimulating natural nutrients to the follicles.  HairGain retails for $450.00 at www.ForHairGain.com.

                                   

       

We Guarantee you will be satisfied with your HairGain product. We offer a no-nonsense money-back guarantee. If the product is received by HairGain LLC within 6 months from the noted date of purchase. *see our web-site for full details.

                                  


Learn more at;             www.ForHairGain.com


                           We are a proud US Company

story:
www.AquaTrust.org

The Short Version

My name is Cori MacNaughton-Rzeczkowska, aka Cori MacNaughton, and, with my husband, Marek Rzeczkowski, we have developed a small, structured water unit that is easily portable, easy to use, requires no filters or ongoing maintenance, and is more affordable than most of the structured water units currently on the market. 

We already have working prototypes, and are ready to incorporate significant improvements into our first production units, which we plan to begin shipping the first week in June.

Because we strongly believe that everyone has the right to clean, healthy water, and because we believe that structured water is a huge step in the right direction, for every unit that is claimed through our campaign, we pledge to donate another unit to a person or family who is in need. 

Further, once the campaign is finished and we go live, we pledge to continue giving at least one unit to a person or family in need for every unit sold through our website.  There is a reason that we chose "dot org" for our website, rather than "dot com" or "dot net," because we intend for our for-profit business to have a fully non-profit division, to help to get this technology and knowledge out there, to make it better known, and to improve peoples' lives.

So in short, you can help our company get off the ground and complete our first production run, and hopefully provide some local jobs, while doing good for someone else at the same time, taking control of your own water supply, and potentially even improving your own health. 

In the process, you can help us by suggesting features and improvements that we can incorporate into future units down the road.  Sounds like a win/win to me.

My personal goal is to donate 10,000 structured water units to people in need, all around the world, and wouldn't it be awesome if we could accomplish that in our first year?  Hey -- nothing wrong with dreaming big -- right?  ;-)


*** Please Note: We expect it to cost approximately $10 to to $12 to ship a single portable unit within the 48 contiguous United States, and there may be additional charges to ship to Alaska, Hawaii, Puerto Rico, or elsewhere outside the country. 

We will email everyone who claims one or more units with the actual shipping charges prior to shipping your units.  We will only charge our actual out-of-pocket cost for shipping.  Please email us if you have further questions.

The Longer Version

I'm here to talk to you about water. Our water.

The water that belongs, rightfully, to each and every one of us.

Water is life, literally. Without access to clean, pure water, we die within days, along with all other life on our planet. Life, as we know it on Earth, cannot exist in the absence of water.

Between transport, sewage, dumping and other pollution, we humans have been trashing our waterways for literally thousands of years.

Have we improved things with technology?

Not so far.

In fact, in the past twenty years and more, huge multinational companies have been buying up water rights to potable water all over the world, from Third World countries to right here in America, only to deny access to the local people who had depended on it for centuries; or even for thousands of years.

Yes, Nestlé, we're looking at you.

Toxic chemicals such as chlorine and chloramines are commonly put in public water supplies in order to make the water safer, by killing bacteria and viruses, but at what cost? Fluoride is commonly added in the United States, even though it is banned in most countries, in a misguided effort to prevent dental cavities, even though research consistently shows that fluoridated water not only does not prevent cavities, but causes a whole host of health issues, including increased osteoporosis, and lowered IQs in children.

Much of the freshwater in this country, and around the world, has been contaminated with mercury, lead, E. coli,  prescription drugs including anti-depressants and birth control pills and much more, and our water treatment plants are not removing much of this contamination.

Treated water in plastic water bottles is not the answer, either, as they are not only one of our most common and widespread forms of solid waste pollution, but the longer the water is in a plastic bottle, especially when exposed to heat such as in a hot car, the more toxic chemicals are leached directly into the water.

There has to be a better way. 

And there is. Things are changing, and we want to help bring about that change. And we want to do that by making structured water much more widely available, starting with our basic structured water unit, and moving onward from there.

Structured Water is Not New – Nature Has Been Doing it This Way All Along

Structured water, or ordered water, was discovered by Sir William Hardy, a British physical chemist, over a century ago. He revealed evidence of a fourth phase of water, in-between the known phases of liquid and solid (ice), and realizing the potential importance of his discovery, he published his findings.

Unfortunately, a century ago, the technology to prove his theory did not yet exist, and much like Galileo and Copernicus before him, he was ridiculed, and his theory was passed off as absurd.  But a few scientists took notice and, over the years, began on their own to test his theory.

Dr. Gerald Pollack and the Fourth Phase of Water

One of the most prominent is Dr. Gerald H. Pollack, Professor of Bioengineering and head of Pollack Laboratory, at the University of Washington in Seattle.

Many years ago, Dr. Pollack and his staff began a study of how muscles contract, a simple concept you would think was already well known to medical science, but it is not. In consulting the published literature, Dr. Pollack realized that although our bodies consist of roughly 70% water by volume, none of the scientific literature took the water into account when describing the functioning of the body, its cells, organs or muscles.

This is even stranger once you realize that, due to how large some of our molecules are, such as proteins, and how tiny water molecules are by comparison, fully 99% of our bodies' molecules are water. So, for biology, medicine, chemistry and other physical sciences to completely ignore the presence of water when determining the functioning of our bodies, with the knowledge that 99% of the molecules in our bodies are water molecules, seems ridiculous, if not outright insane.

Could this be why modern medicine is so terrible at keeping people healthy?

Dr. Pollack and his staff, following in the footsteps of Sir William Hardy, confirmed that there is indeed a fourth phase of water, with chemical and physical characteristics all its own, and he published their findings not only in scientific journals, but also in his 2013 book, "The Fourth Phase of Water," which is written for the general public.

In one of his lectures on YouTube, Dr. Pollack states that one of the reasons why so many scientists still don't acknowledge a fourth phase of water, despite overwhelming evidence, is that the theory is too simple. It has been right in front of us all along, and yet we have missed it completely, for literally thousands of years.

So what does structured water mean to you and me?

Quite simply, although structuring water neither adds anything nor takes anything away from water, it changes the structure of the water in a way that better hydrates the body and its tissues. According to Dr. Pollack, the primary feature of structured water is that it profoundly excludes soluble chemicals and particulate matter on a molecular level, which is why he generally refers to it as EZ (Exclusion Zone) water.

According to some sources, this means that by structuring the water, it surrounds any contaminants in the water, thus making them unavailable to the body.

Still other sources suggest that the structured water, which is energized through structuring, is intelligent, and gives the human body precisely what it needs; in other words, it will allow the body to absorb needed minerals from the water, while excluding chemical contaminants and pathogens.

Naturally these claims are difficult, if not impossible to test for, although there is years of anecdotal evidence that peoples' health generally improves when drinking structured water. Some claim to have reversed obesity, or even gone into remission from cancer, and other serious health ailments, just by drinking structured water.

I don't personally know if these claims are accurate, nor do I make any health claims for these units, because I am not a doctor or medical professional, and it is illegal for me to do so.

I can say that I personally feel better hydrated since I started drinking structured water.  The first thing I noticed, aside from the fact that the water feels wetter, was that my eyes no longer felt dry. I have been wearing contacts since my mid-twenties, so for me, this is huge.

My husband has also felt a difference, and since I started giving it to our animals, their fur has become noticeably softer and more silky to the touch.

I have also noticed a difference in my plants, and I'll be doing some side by side comparisons in growing sprouts and microgreens with structured water versus regular water.

I've already started side by side comparisons in brewing water kefir and kombucha; if you send us an email, and I'll keep you posted on the results, as well as keeping you in the loop on any more information I am able to uncover.

So who are we and why are we doing this?

My name is Cori MacNaughton-Rzeczkowska, aka Cori MacNaughton, and I've been learning about and paying attention to water for decades; first when I majored in Marine Biology in college, and later when I worked for a company that sold five-stage electrostatic water filters.

Growing up in the Desert Southwest, I was already well aware of the importance of water in the environment, and years later, I was reminded again while living in Florida, when a several-year-drought literally caused Green Swamp near our home in the Tampa Bay area to dry up almost completely.

In addition to owning and operating my own art and framing studio in Florida for several years, I spent many years building unique and amazing aquariums with my former husband, an avid inventor, and learned a great deal about physically working with water, plumbing and dental fittings and hydraulic pressure in the process.

I am a longtime sailor and SCUBA diver, and having dealt with restricted water supplies on a small sailboat, particularly on long trips, it inspired me to write an article about some of the many ways of ensuring a safe and healthy water supply in the event of contamination from a hurricane or other disaster, following our brushes with Hurricanes Charley, Frances, Jeanne and Ivan in 2004.

Finally, I have earned Beginning and Advanced Certificates in Aquaponics, which is the marriage of aquaculture and hydroponics, or growing fish and vegetables together in a closed-loop system, which I firmly believe will revolutionize agriculture as it is more widely adopted.  Oh boy . . . more plumbing fittings!  ;-)

All of these experiences and more have made me excited and passionate about structured water, what it can do for people and our planet, and the urgency of getting it into the hands of as many people as I possibly can.

My husband, Marek Rzeczkowski, has a different perspective, having grown up in Poland, where he frequently went fishing with his father. Like me, he is happiest on the water, and like me, he has been frustrated with the usual options for making chemically-treated water safer, tastier and more enjoyable to drink.

Although Marek doesn't have as extensive a background in working with water as I do, he has also owned and operated several businesses, and has an amazing work ethic.  It was his idea, in fact, for us to take the research I had been doing to develop the prototypes, and turn this into an actual business.  He knows what it takes to start and grow a business, and is every bit as passionate and committed as I am to seeing this venture through.
story_txt:
www.AquaTrust.org
The Short VersionMy name is Cori MacNaughton-Rzeczkowska, aka Cori MacNaughton, and, with my husband, Marek Rzeczkowski, we have developed a small, structured water unit that is easily portable, easy to use, requires no filters or ongoing maintenance, and is more affordable than most of the structured water units currently on the market.  We already have  working prototypes, and are ready to incorporate significant improvements into our first production units, which we plan to begin shipping the first week in June.Because we strongly believe that everyone has the right to clean, healthy water, and because we believe that structured water is a huge step in the right direction, for every unit that is claimed through our campaign, we pledge to donate another unit to a person or family who is in need.  Further, once the campaign is finished and we go live, we pledge to continue giving at least one unit to a person or family in need for every unit sold through our website.  There is a reason that we chose "dot org" for our website, rather than "dot com" or "dot net," because we intend for our for-profit business to have a fully non-profit division, to help to get this technology and knowledge out there, to make it better known, and to improve peoples' lives.So in short, you can help our company get off the ground and complete our first production run, and hopefully provide some local jobs, while doing good for someone else at the same time, taking control of your own water supply, and potentially even improving your own health.  In the process, you can help us by suggesting features and improvements that we can incorporate into future units down the road.  Sounds like a win/win to me.My personal goal is to donate 10,000 structured water units to people in
 need, all around the world, and wouldn't it be awesome if we could 
accomplish that in our first year?  Hey -- nothing wrong with dreaming 
big -- right?  ;-)*** Please Note: We expect it to cost approximately $10 to to $12 to ship a single portable unit within the 48 contiguous United States, and there may be additional charges to ship to Alaska, Hawaii, Puerto Rico, or elsewhere outside the country.  We will email everyone who claims one or more units with the actual shipping charges prior to shipping your units.  We will only charge our actual out-of-pocket cost for shipping.  Please email us if you have further questions. The Longer VersionI'm here to talk to you about water. 
Our water.  The water that belongs, rightfully, to each and every one
of us.  Water is life, literally.  Without access to clean, pure
water, we die within days, along with all other life on our planet. 
Life, as we know it on Earth, cannot exist in the absence of water.
Between transport, sewage, dumping and
other pollution, we humans have been trashing our waterways for
literally thousands of years.
Have we improved things with
technology? 

Not so far.
In fact, in the past twenty years and
more, huge multinational companies have been buying up water rights
to potable water all over the world, from Third World countries to
right here in America, only to deny access to the local people who
had depended on it for centuries; or even for thousands of years. 
Yes, Nestlé, we're looking at you.
Toxic chemicals such as chlorine and
chloramines are commonly put in public water supplies in order to
make the water safer, by killing bacteria and viruses, but at what
cost?  Fluoride is commonly added in the United States, even though
it is banned in most countries, in a misguided effort to prevent
dental cavities, even though research consistently shows that
fluoridated water not only does not prevent cavities, but causes a
whole host of health issues, including increased osteoporosis, and lowered IQs in children.Much of the freshwater in this country, and around the world, has been contaminated with mercury, lead, E. coli,  prescription drugs including anti-depressants and birth control pills and much more, and our water treatment plants are not removing much of this contamination.Treated
water in plastic water bottles is not the answer, either, as they are
not only one of our most common and widespread forms of solid waste
pollution, but the longer the water is in a plastic bottle, especially when
exposed to heat such as in a hot car, the more toxic chemicals are
leached directly into the water.
There has to be a better way.  And
there is.  Things are changing, and we want to help bring about that
change.  And we want to do that by making structured water much more
widely available, starting with our basic structured water unit, and
moving onward from there.Structured Water is Not New –

theory.

story:
My Natural pain relief Story

After years of back pain pills ,I finally got natural pain relief from stretching.But there wasn't a product out there to help me stretch faster and easier.

So I designed and built myself the Stretchmi, Now I get My 6 Major stretches done in 8 minutes and I'm pain free.

Feel the difference 

It's a totally new way to stretch! Now you can finally:

-Relax and breathe while in stretch,giving yourself a better connection to your muscles.

-No more holding yourself up and straining other muscles to stretch.

-Save time and energy with your stretching routine

-Bring your flexibility and performance to the next level

-Soft comfy fabric makes for a pleasant stretching experience

-Recover from injuries faster while being comfortable stretching

-Natural pain relief,No more pain pills!

Change the Way We Stretch

 Now with your help, We can let everyone enjoy their own special benefits of using the Stretchmi, we need to hit our goal of the first 5,000 units sold so everyone can feel the difference.

Choose from our soft and comfy terry cotton or our soft and smooth bamboo spandex ,order yours today and change the way we stretch.

Stretchmi Hamstring

"Having played at a High level of sports over the years, wear and tear finally caught up to my body, Constant pain and numerous knee,shoulder and hip surgeries only left me with arthritis and soreness.After 3 weeks of  using the Stretchmi,I feel stronger ,less sore, and more flexible.The Stretchmi is a game changer for me."

Ron Vaive / former college hockey player/school teacher/avid golfer

I.T Band/glutes stretch

"I've been using the Stretchmi for a month now and I love it!.The more I use it the better I feel. I would recommend this product to anyone at any fitness level for all over body wellness."
Cyndi / Nurse

Q.L stretch

"It was quite comforting to have something different, it allows you to get a stretch and kinda push it to the limit, it was a great relaxing type of stretch"

 Vince Murdocco / North american kickboxing champion

Stretchmi toes

"It was great, I got a deeper stretch,and it freed me up so I could focus on my breathing"

Emily / waitress

Stretchmi Chest

"I can see how it works really good for piriformis stretch and QL stretches"

Professional Physiotherapist

Stretchmi glutes

"I love it , i don't think I will stretch without it now"

Marina  / nanny

Stretchmi Quadriceps

"Stretchmi really made it easy to remember my stretches,and using it felt like i was getting more out of every stretch"

Dan / Plumber

Piriformis Stretch 

"you inspire me"

professional physiotherapist

Pelvic bridge the easy way

"you're a great guy, with a great product"

Matt / Bodybuilder

Knee to chest/adductors stretch

"I pulled my back out working, I used it a couple of times and I was back to work"

Andrew/Framer

Stretchmi Calfs

Yoga with stretchmi

Stretchmi Triceps

Lower back/hamstring stretch

Stretchmi Lats

story:
Benvenuti al Wearable Tech Torino 2016, la seconda edizione della fiera sulle tecnologie indossabili!

Wearable Tech Torino è la prima fiera in Italia e una delle più grandi in Europa dedicata interamente alle Wearable Technologies, organizzata da JEToP - Junior Enterprise Torino Politecnico.

L'edizione del 2016 sarà ad ingresso gratuito e si terrà il 18 e 19 novembre al Padiglione 1 del Lingotto Fiere di Torino e punta a migliorare, con il tuo aiuto e la tua partecipazione, i risultati ottenuti nel WTT 2015.

"La prima fiera sulla tecnologia indossabile è stata premiata come miglior progetto europeo del network internazionale delle Junior Enterprise."  La Repubblica


Le wearable technologies raggruppano una vasta categoria di dispositivi come:

  • visori per la realtà aumentata e virtuale
  • smartwatch e smartband
  • tecnologie per il supporto alla disabilità

Edizione 2016:

Il nostro obiettivo per questa edizione è ingrandire la fiera, aumentando il numero di espositori e di prodotti, per farvi toccare con mano e provare ancora più novità.

Stiamo coinvolgendo scuole, enti del territorio e avvicinando il pubblico di ogni età ai wearable devices, indipendentemente dal tuo livello di conoscenza e di abilità potrai fare esperienza e imparare con queste tecnologie.

I numeri della prima edizione:

Abbiamo organizzato la prima edizione nel Novembre 2015 presso il padiglione 5 di Lingotto. Hanno partecipato 26 aziende e start up in rappresentanza delle ultime novità del mondo wearable. La fiera ha visto un susseguirsi di 6 Workshop e 28 Talk tenuti da esponenti di aziende quali: Samsung, Microsoft, Banca Mediolanum, Telecom, STMicroelectronics e Google Devéloper Group; alcuni orientati alla programmazione, al crowdfunding e alla realtà virtuale; altri dedicati sia più specificatamente al Wearable in ogni suo ambito, passando, per esempio, da quello medico a quello tessile, sia all’analisi dei suoi effetti sui Social Media e sulla nostra quotidianietà. 

La fiera ha vantato l’ingresso di ben 6000 persone in sole 48 ore.

CHI SIAMO

JEToP, Junior Entreprise Torino Politecnico, è un’associazione no profit e apolitica gestita da studenti, con l’obiettivo di creare un contatto diretto tra il mondo del lavoro e il mondo dell’università.

I membri dell’associazione hanno piena autonomia nella gestione di progetti che oggigiorno coprono i seguenti ambiti: analisi di mercato, gestione risorse umane, servizi IT per le imprese, competenza nell’ambito di simulazione di gestione aziendale e, soprattutto, organizzazione di eventi.

Le competenze si sono concretizzate nel corso degli anni in attività come lo sviluppo di progetti commissionati da aziende, corsi di formazione, ma soprattutto organizzazione di eventi. JEToP é infatti stata la prima a portare un career day a Torino con Carriera&Futuro, che per oltre oltre vent’anni ha rappresentato un punto di incontro tra aziende e studenti neolaureati e laureandi. L’evento ha raccolto negli anni grandi successi, in particolare la XV Edizione, che ha conferito un importante riconoscimento: la medaglia offerta dalla Presidenza della Repubblica Italiana a seguito della concessione dell'alto patronato.

Il nostro tempo è a disposizione di un'idea in cui crediamo fortemente e alla quale dedichiamo ogni nostra risorsa.

Se credi anche tu in questo progetto e vuoi aiutarci a far sì che diventi sempre più grande puoi aiutarci con una donazione.

Il nostro giudice sei tu, ti aspettiamo in fiera.

Grazie!


Always one step forward
