Edizione 2016:Il nostro obiettivo per questa edizione è ingrandire la fiera, aumentando il numero di espositori e di prodotti, per farvi toccare con mano e provare ancora più novità.Stiamo coinvolgendo scuole, enti del territorio e avvicinando il pubblico di ogni età ai wearable devices, indipendentemente dal tuo livello di conoscenza e di abilità potrai fare esperienza e imparare con queste tecnologie.I numeri della prima edizione:Abbiamo organizzato la prima edizione nel Novembre 2015 presso il padiglione 5 di Lingotto. Hanno partecipato 26 aziende e start up in rappresentanza delle ultime novità del mondo wearable. La fiera ha visto un susseguirsi di 6 Workshop e 28 Talk tenuti da esponenti di aziende quali: Samsung, Microsoft, Banca Mediolanum, Telecom, STMicroelectronics e Google Devéloper Group; alcuni orientati alla programmazione, al crowdfunding e alla realtà virtuale; altri dedicati sia più specificatamente al Wearable in ogni suo ambito, passando, per esempio, da quello medico a quello tessile, sia all’analisi dei suoi effetti sui Social Media e sulla nostra quotidianietà. La fiera ha vantato l’ingresso di ben 6000 persone in sole 48 ore.CHI SIAMOJEToP, Junior Entreprise Torino Politecnico, è un’associazione no profit e apolitica gestita da studenti, con l’obiettivo di creare un contatto diretto tra il mondo del lavoro e il mondo dell’università.I membri dell’associazione hanno piena autonomia nella gestione di progetti che oggigiorno coprono i seguenti ambiti: analisi di mercato, gestione risorse umane, servizi IT per le imprese, competenza nell’ambito di simulazione di gestione aziendale e, soprattutto, organizzazione di eventi.Le competenze si sono concretizzate nel corso degli anni in attività come lo sviluppo di progetti commissionati da aziende, corsi di formazione, ma soprattutto organizzazione di eventi. JEToP é infatti stata la prima a portare un career day a Torino con Carriera&Futuro, che per oltre oltre vent’anni ha rappresentato un punto di incontro tra aziende e studenti neolaureati e laureandi. L’evento ha raccolto negli anni grandi successi, in particolare la XV Edizione, che ha conferito un importante riconoscimento: la medaglia offerta dalla Presidenza della Repubblica Italiana a seguito della concessione dell'alto patronato.Il nostro tempo è a disposizione di un'idea in cui crediamo fortemente e alla quale dedichiamo ogni nostra risorsa.Se credi anche tu in questo progetto e vuoi aiutarci a far sì che diventi sempre più grande puoi aiutarci con una donazione.Il nostro giudice sei tu, ti aspettiamo in fiera.Grazie!Always one step forward

story:
Short Summary

I'm Anderson Jones III, 25 years old, from Birmingham, Al and I'm a fitness nut! 

How I feel in love with Athletic Training (Fitness)

Growing up I wasn't the most athletic of my peers, I was a tall chubby kid in the early years of my life. In middle school, I was the tallest kid there and would be frustrated looking at the shorter (thinner)kids as they were dunking the basketball (me not being able to touch the rim) and out running me in races. Well I decided I wasn't going to be the slow, chubby, non-athletic kid ANYMORE! So started saving the money I made from my candy selling business and purchased me a pair of Jumpsoles. That following summer leading into my 8th grade year I worked out in those jumpsoles 4 days a week and on my rest days I would still walk around with them on. I was hoping doing that would give me an extra boost. Needless to say I wasn't dunking going into my 8th grade year but I was grabbing the rim on a constantly basis. Though that was cool to me, I wasn't going to stop until I was able to dunk. Though out the school year I would still workout in my jumpsoles. Some morning I would wake up at 5:30 am and sprint the hills of my neighborhood. Honestly I believe that is where I started to develop a love for working out (fitness). It was clear what my goal was, but the process is what I feel in love with. Seeing improvement, jumping higher, getting stronger, running faster, seeing muscles beginning to develop in my legs. By the way, my 1st dunk was during a basketball game and the crowd went CRAZY!!!

Fast Forward 

After playing college and some international basketball I'm now the #1 Basketball Skills Trainer in the state of Alabama. (According to coachup.com) I take my love for fitness and knowledge for basketball, apply the two and do what I can to help serve others. Basically I love what I do! I know this opportunity can and will open more doors for me in this athletic training/Health/Fitness Industry.

Mission of #iAmTheAthlete

1. Travel and train at the facilities where the professional athletes train during their off-season.

2. Record my workout, the food that I eat, the transformation my body goes through and the ways how the pros recover from a strenuous workout.

3. Give my review, the benefits of what I experienced at each site, and place it on social media. (Youtube, Instagram, Facebook)

My Main objective is to be a spokesperson for athletic training/fitness and hopefully be able to build my own successful brand in which I can inspire and motivate to reach their goals. 

What We Need & What You Get

Stretch goal is $37,000
1. We Travel Safely!
My cameraman and I will have to book flights to these places. In some cases these facilities do not have a residential area. So my cameraman and I will have to purchase hotel rooms on our visit( three weeks at each site). Also we will be renting a vehicles for travel in these cities.
2. A picture is worth a 1000 words!
Along with me, my cameraman will be away from home and I'd REALLY like to tell a story of this adventure. I myself don't have a great amount of responsibilities but my cameraman (children, apartment, fiance',job, etc) is different on the other hand. Help me by being able to compensate my cameraman/photographer for his time and efforts.
3. We Sleep Soundly 
In the original budget, I didn't set money aside for any "worst case scenarios."  With this extra funding, we'll have a security net to be able to sleep soundly and know that we won't be paying out of pocket for anything uncontrollable. 

What will this money cover?

  • Training at each site
  • Stay on campus at these facilities
  • Cameras/Equipment 
  • Nutrition
  • Transportation
  • Hotel Cost (Some sites don't have a residential area)
  • Branding, Tools, Supplies
What you get for donating?
This is just as much about you guys as it is about us. I love and believe in fitness and want to do all I can to help others live a more healthy active lifestyle. So along with this project, i'm offering unique perks for guys. Check em out!!


The Impact

This is just the beginning!  
I have plans to take this project to a different level. Even though, I was a chunky kid growing up, my parents kept me very active with different sports and activities.It wasn't until college I understood the importance of proper nutrition  One way I want to make an impact is by highlighting the main objectives of being fit. Nutrition and Training!! 
How? 
Nutrition: 
  • Eating The Right Foods
  • Protein Powders
  • Eating Organic food
  • Supplements
My plan is to explain why I consume these items (food, protein powders,supplements, etc), the benefits my body receive, how can they help you and where they can be found.
Training: 
  • Pool Workouts
  • Yoga
  • Pilates 
  • Boxing
  • Martial Arts 
My plan to showcase the other ways to get a physically fit athletic body. The benefits and how they can help you mentally as well as physically. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Everyone might not be able to contribute (I understand that), but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Since we'll be flying if anyone can donate buddy passes or flight passes that'll help
  • Any Hotel discounts would DEFINITELY HELP 
  • BOOKS! I'm not much of a TV person so my main sources of entertainment are books and music. If you have any good books you're willing to donate SEND EM MY WAY! (Preferably Self-help, business or personal development)  
  • PLEASE folks get the word out and make some noise about this campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
We need your support to fund safe passage and airfares, for 25+ Yoga Teachers from war zones. 
Here these teachers can complete their training in a safe environment free from the terror, noise and pressure of war. These students can then return and teach yoga, as a way to bring together opposing communities and start the process of positive change.
Peace is possible, but we are going up against vast forces, forces that do not want change. We need to show the world that love matters and that change is possible.
Choose love, choose peace!
"I have started doing yoga since 2 years, I want to participate in this yoga training with David, the amazing teacher who helped us to think positively. Moreover, yoga helps me a lot to find my inner peace and to reduce my daily stress, and let me be positive, love people more, love my community even we are living in the most conflict place “ Palestine “ helping me to find the happiness, and appreciate what I have ! I’m a trainer, I have provided and will provide training (conflict resolution, stress management, self-esteem…) to the most marginalized women in our community who suffered from a big stress, poverty and lack of self-esteem, I have used yoga to help them to think positively to their self and in to the world around them and I succeed in many cases. The training will provide with more skills to work with these marginalized women and to have a chance to change their lives positively. Thanks for giving me the chance. "

 

Why donate to YogaBeats Conflict?

If you have ever experienced yoga, the you will understand its incredible power of positive change.

Its time to see beyond what we can take from yoga and to share our practice and give something back.

For the first time in YogaBeats history, we will help students travel from conflict areas that we are not able to access and bring them to a safe place to learn from  David Sye & Sama Fabian, internationally renowned Yoga Teachers. 

  • In November 2015, we will bring together 25+ students to complete their yoga teacher training in the safe haven of Fuerteventura at Azul Fit. 
  • Yogabeats Conflict is the premier yoga form for Conflict Resolution available in the world today.  This non-profit work is recognised by his Holiness the Dalai Lama.  
  • From your donation, we can train this group of 25 students living in conflict areas so they can bring this powerful, healing method back to their communities.  'One soul brought into the light potentially alters the entire destiny of the species.'

About David:

David Sye, a yoga elder, developed a healing method called YogaBeats. His mission is to train teachers and students living in conflict areas to spread the peaceful method and message of yoga and to bring about change in those communities. Through his work, he is showing communities that yoga can be a tool for social change. Since 1995 he has been working with diverse groups using YogaBeats as a means to break down barriers and change perceptions.   

‘Whether this means drugs, crime or war, Yoga is 100% effective in empowering and transforming lives and circumstances into joy and happiness. Collectively this is the only way that we can achieve change that lasts within our communities.’ - David Sye

About Sama:

When David Sye invited me to join him in Palestine in November 2013 for a teaching tour, I immediately sensed the potential of this work.We travelled tirelessly for 10 days to a number of places across Palestinian territories. The experience revealed a desire from the local people to understand other ways of remaining sane and healthy, and a sensing that learning from different cultures helps us understand ours better and offers a way forward out of dualistic and confrontational perspectives that can only lead to more conflict and more suffering. 

This past May, I have celebrated my 30th year of teaching Yoga.Yoga came into my life serendipitously as I was serving a 3 months jail sentence in Amsterdam. When I was released there was nothing for me to hold onto but these few postures and a short meditation practice. I held onto these with my heart and soul, deeply sensing that this was my way out.This was going to see me through...and it did.Yoga has a way of keeping its promise, if in turn you keep your commitment. 

I was given an opportunity then and today I have the humbling work of giving opportunities to many. When in Palestine with David, I saw so much energy, desire, intelligence, generosity and heart. I also saw much confusion, disorientation and suffering. Today is the time to share this wondrous thing we call Yoga to a new generation of people who can themselves offer a new opportunity to their people. 

The Yoga Beats Conflict foundation course in Yoga teaching represents an invaluable resource for Palestinian trainees. It will give them the inner understanding to withstand the difficult external circumstances in which they will be operating asYogaTeachers. They will gain experience in delivering safe, precise and intelligent guidance to help people deal with the effects of living under siege. Yoga is a path of freedom, this is what both myself and David are committed to pass on. This is our message, our motivation for setting up this new project. 

So the impulse is there, but the financial means are scarce and we need your support to bring over some of these students. We hope to be able to pay for their visas and flights to Spain’s Islas Canarias, where a wonderful couple running a Yoga Centre there have offered us a free of charge stay for the group and teachers. Of course there will be many overheads to cover. Neither myself nor David or his assistants will receive a teaching fee. We are giving for free our expertise and experience as Yoga Elders with over 50 years of Yoga teaching between the two of us. And we need your help to make this happen. Please give as little or as much as is available to you, your company, your business. Thank you! 

You will find information about me and aurolabyoga on my web site. Sama Fabian www.aurolabyoga.net 


Where your donation will go...

This year, Yoga Beats Conflict continues its work with a further project to introduce the foundations of Yoga teaching to a group of 25+ Palestinian women and men who would like to be able to offer Yoga in their respective communities.They come from different backgrounds including sports, education, social welfare, journalism and the arts. Whether working people or housewives they all have a profound desire to be of service to their communities in a way that is innovative, creative and challenging and also that can potentially bring solace, inner peace and healing to a people deeply traumatised by years of conflict and war. 

These aspiring Yoga teachers are all committed to learn and experience the benefits of Yoga and return home to support a new vision, a new way of seeing. A refreshing method to connect with the deeper layers of our organic and spiritual reality in order to give a fresh voice to the soul of their people, especially the younger generations. 

The retreat, accommodation and meals have been donated to Yogabeats Conflict project, free of charge by Azul Fit, so we are now looking to fund all other associated costs to make this foundation course training possible for these students. 


  • We need funds to financially underwrite safe passage, flights and visas out of conflict areas.
  • We will also cover expenses of the film crew who will be travelling to the retreat to film this incredible experience. This will help us spread the word and create more opportunities for YogaBeats Conflict foundation course trainings in safe havens in the future. 
  • The funds will also cover associated costs for students travelling to the course, such as meals and accommodation during travel, and transit costs.  
  • If we don't reach our  goal, we will allocate the funds to the visa and flight expenses of the students travelling from conflict areas to ensure the students get to us. We will look to make up the remainder of the costs with the help of private donors and sponsors. 
  • If we exceed the goal, we can fund future Yogabeats Conflict foundation course trainings - spreading the love and light of yoga. We can be the social change we want to see in the world. 

The Impact

Your contribution will train a yoga teacher, who can bring back this powerful method to their underserved communities. 

'It is a great privilege and honour to me that you come to Fuerteventura to participate in the Yogabeats Foundation Course,  my deep hope is that the Foundation Course will provide the nourishment and enlightenment that we all need to have and share amongst our own communities!

This is how Yoga is able to transform our world into a more loving happier and intelligent place,  I am personally very excited that you are coming inshallah.'

The YogaBeats conflict method has been used successfully since 1994. David Sye has piloted programs to train teachers aimed at helping their communities disadvantaged by circumstance. He works with people suffering from the side effects of war, gang related crime and victims of domestic violence. 

  • Yogabeats conflict was developed in Bosnia in 1994: working with Bosnian troops David found that music helped to mask the background noise of the war, enabling his students to tune in and alleviate stress. 
  • Yogabeats method is used in Brixton, Southend and Glasgow to allow young people to move away from drug use, gun and knife crime. 
  • In Liverpool, Yogabeats has helped victims of domestic violence heal and gain self confidence to help them re-claim their lives. 
  • Colorado - Yogabeats USA leads kids away from drug use and teaches them the benefits of yoga & community. 
  • West Bank & Israel - Yogabeats conflict has been working since 2006 to bring groups from both sides together for peace and yoga. In 2012, groups have met in Tel Aviv and in the no man's land of Beit Jala with the intention of bringing the groups together in celebration of love and healing through yoga. 
The mission continues!! With this initiative we are training more teachers to spread the peaceful message of yoga in conflict or disadvantaged areas, where its needed most. You can play a vital role in literally achieving world peace - that sacred stillness, those peaceful seconds and minutes achieved in a yoga session, in a hug between two sides... you can help make this a reality.  

Risks & Challenges

  • Obtaining visas and making travel arrangements for these students will be challenging as there are many circumstances working against them in these conflict areas.  However, the YogaBeats conflict team are experts in coordinating events in extreme circumstances. Together with the team from Azul, with their strong project management experience we are certain we will be able to get all the students out of their conflict zones, safely, discreetly and to a place of safety so that they can attend this course without fear. 

How can you help achieve world peace?

If you can't contribute, it doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Spread the word - share this on social media as much as you can. Ask friends to share as well. Like our Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/yogabeatsconflictfuert...
  • Print a flyer from our Facebook page, and hang it up in your local coffee shop. World peace is just a Cafe au Lait away. 
  • Have your local yoga studio run a fundraiser for the event, or encourage them to donate - every cent counts! 
  • Tweet about it! #yogabeatsconflict 
  • Dedicate your yoga practice to these communities and to the Yogabeats conflict mission. 
  • Join in any of the fundraiser events taking place around the UK. Visit www.yogabeats.com for more info, or keep up to date on our FB page: https://www.facebook.com/yogabeatsconflictfuert...
  • http://azulfit.com/special-retreats/yogabeats-foundation-course-with-david-sye/

'It is a great privilege and honour to me that you come to Fuerteventura to participate in the Yogabeats Foundation Course,  my deep hope is that the Foundation Course will provide the nourishment and enlightenment that we all need to have and share amongst our own communities!
This is how Yoga is able to transform our world into a more loving happier and intelligent place,  I am personally very excited that you are coming inshallah.'
The YogaBeats conflict method has been used successfully since 1994. David Sye has piloted programs to train teachers aimed at helping their communities disadvantaged by circumstance. He works with people suffering from the side effects of war, gang related crime and victims of domestic violence. 
 Yogabeats conflict was developed in Bosnia in 1994: working with Bosnian troops David found that music helped to mask the background noise of the war, enabling his students to tune in and alleviate stress. 
Yogabeats method is used in Brixton, Southend and Glasgow to allow young people to move away from drug use, gun and knife crime. 
In Liverpool, Yogabeats has helped victims of domestic violence heal and gain self confidence to help them re-claim their lives.  Colorado - Yogabeats USA leads kids away from drug use and teaches them the benefits of yoga & community. 
West Bank & Israel - Yogabeats conflict has been working since 2006 to bring groups from both sides together for peace and yoga. In 2012, groups have met in Tel Aviv and in the no man's land of Beit Jala with the intention of bringing the groups together in celebration of love and healing through yoga.  
The mission continues!! With this initiative we are training more teachers to spread the peaceful message of yoga in conflict or disadvantaged areas, where its needed most. You can play a vital role in literally achieving world peace - that sacred stillness, those peaceful seconds and minutes achieved in a yoga session, in a hug between two sides... you can help make this a reality.     Risks & Challenges  Obtaining visas and making travel arrangements for these students will be challenging as there are many circumstances working against them in these conflict areas.  However, the YogaBeats conflict team are experts in coordinating events in extreme circumstances. Together with the team from Azul, with their strong project management experience we are certain we will be able to get all the students out of their conflict zones, safely, discreetly and to a place of safety so that they can attend this course without fear.     How can you help achieve world peace? If you can't contribute, it doesn't mean you can't help:  Spread the word - share this on social media as much as you can. Ask friends to share as well. Like our Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/yogabeatsconflictfuert...

Print a flyer from our Facebook page, and hang it up in your local coffee shop. World peace is just a Cafe au Lait away.  Have your local yoga studio run a fundraiser for the event, or encourage them to donate - every cent counts! 
Tweet about it! #yogabeatsconflict 
Dedicate your yoga practice to these communities and to the Yogabeats conflict mission. 
Join in any of the fundraiser events taking place around the UK. Visit www.yogabeats.com for more info, or keep up to date on our FB page: https://www.facebook.com/yogabeatsconflictfuert...


http://azulfit.com/special-retreats/yogabeats-foundation-course-with-david-sye/

story:
Short Summary

Hi all! My name is Emily Anton, I am a freelance professional ballet dancer living in New York City. I dance, I write and I am the owner and sole proprietor of a beautiful holistic healthcare business.  Mainly, I just want to share my gifts with the world in whatever way I can and am called to do with so much joy, love and grace.  My life's goal is to make the ballet world a healthier and happier place for dancers.   

My junior year of high school I answered the call to become a professional ballet dancer and despite many, many, many rejections I did just that 3 years later.  

A year later, I answered the call to move to NYC - buying myself a one-way plane ticket, packing up two suitcases and moving across the country from California to NYC (in the middle of winter 2011).  

During my first year in NYC, I completed the Franklin Method year one teacher training.  I  work studied my way through the training, all while living, dancing and audtioning in New York City.  Also, I workstudied my way to two trainings in BodyTalk Access that same year.  

In 2012, craving more education and figuring I might as well finish the Bachelors degree I was already 3 years invested into (at 4 different universities!) - I enrolled at Empire State College (SUNY).  After 2 years of independant studies, blood, sweat, tears and lots of times I wanted to give up - I graduated with my BA in Dance and Movement Studies in 2014.  

Also in 2012, I started dancing professionally for the NYC-based Ballets with a Twist (who I still dance with to this day). 

Always loving and seeing the power of the BodyTalk System, in the fall of 2014 I took an intensive training in BodyTalk to further expand my knowledge base.  This was of course in addition to performing ballets (as a freelance dancer) in Winston-Salem, North Carolina as well as Grants Pass, Oregon. 

Then 2015 hit and I decided that this would be the year my business would be a success and I would help performing artists and other creatively-inclined individuals access the brilliant health of their bodies through my knowledge of the Franklin Method, dance, movement, anatomy, kinesiology, the BodyTalk System and my own continuous studies in this field. 

And yet - the universe/God had bigger plans for me and so in 2015, I answered the strong calling to pursue the Hellerwork Structural Integration training, applied and was accepted!  

This training is giving my holistic healthcare business a solid base and this means the world to me because I can see the importance of my work.  I know I have a gift to share with the world and I know I can make a difference on this planet. This training will allow me to integrate the aspect of touch more into my practice because I can see the power of touch in the world.  

Ballet and the performing arts are so beauitful and so needed, so it is my mission to free the artists from their tension, stress and dis-ease which so easily plagues them so that they can produce even more beauty with much more ease and resiliency.  

Hellerwork is completely brilliant and totally heart-centered which I believe is greatly needed in the world.  I am blessed by the opportunity to be pursuing it.  The process to get to this point has not been easy, before I applied to training and even while I was applying, working my way through the application process itself, I went through so much soul searching and yet I also felt my calling to this work more and more strongly.  And the training is hard and yet I am growing so much through this training both in what I offer through my own dancing and to my clients.  

And this all brings me to funding.... 

The program is expensive and let's face it, I'm not pulling in the big bucks as a freelance ballet dancer and my new business is also just starting to get off the ground... So I need YOUR help.  

5 years ago when I decided to move to New York City, I gave my finances over to the Universe/God and since then I have always had a place to sleep and food to eat.  And on top of that I've accomplished my dreams.  I'm always shooting for the moon and reaching really big.  Though this may be my biggest reach yet, I'm totally trusting.  

What I Need & What You Get

Here's a break down of where the funding will go:

Tuition: about $4000

Travel Expenses to fly from NYC to Omaha, Nebraska ($400 per intensive x 4): $1600

Books (the most amazing book list which has already started to change my holistic health care practice): $500

You will get my eternal gratitude, as well as a number of fun benefits listed in the perks! 

Any amount of money helps so MUCH!

The Impact

Hellerwork is heart-centered work which I believe is needed in world. This work, especially when combined with everything I have already studied and continue to study can make a huge impact on the world.  The ballet world needs help and so do other performing artists and creatively-inclined individuals.  This is a group of society that is often overlooked, yet they need support and it my goal to do just that - help and support the health and wellness of dancers, performing artists and other creatively-inclined individuals who give so much beauty, happiness and love to world, it's their turn to receive!! 

As far as my successful track record/your risk factor in investing in me - I have succeed at every other similar venture in my life.  I have always found a way/been guided to a way.  I .... became a working professional ballet dancer, moved to New York City on my own, completed the Franklin Method teacher training, completed several BodyTalk trainings.....

Risks & Challenges

I know this training IS extremely challenging and IS completely pushing me. (Isn't that what life is meant to do? Always push you to the edges of your comfort zone and knowledge base? I have certainly found this true in my life)  I also know that I am more than capable of the challege this training presents me.  Additionally, the amazing training team of this program knows that I am capable or they wouldn't have accepted me into the program after a very intensive application and interview process.  

Other Ways You Can Help

I know that not everyone viewing this can contribute money.  So, if my campaign touched you ~ please share it on your social media channels!!  Indiegogo has some spiffy share tools! :) 

Also, if you are a dancer, performing artist or creatively-inclined individual I'd love to help YOU access the brilliant health already in your body.  Come have a session with me!! http://emilyanton.com/holistichealthcarepractice/

story:
Who we are and why we need you?

Our names are Seagyn Davis, Tylan Croukamp, Grant Rex and Aimée Dixon-Cronje. We've been playing touch rugby for over 10 years and got selected to represent South Africa at the 2015 Touch Rugby World Cup in Australia. This is a huge honour for us and comes after much effort. Together, we represent the Gauteng Touch Association as players going to Australia next year.

Unfortunately, touch rugby is a self-funded sport in South Africa - even when you play for your country. This means players rely on sponsorships or their own money for the entire tour.

Contributing towards us getting to Australia will not only make us indebted to you, but it will also make sure that we live the dream that we have worked towards achieving for over a decade.

What I Need & What You Get

To make it to Australia we need to cover an estimated R53 000 each which includes the following items.
  • Accommodation / meals R 11 500. 00 (about US$1150)
  • Registration Fees (team + individual) R 3 000. 00 (about US$300)
  • Kit R 5 000 (about US$500)
  • 1st Aid R 500 (about US$50)
  • Sundries R 1 000 (about US$100)
  • Staff (coaches, managers, medics) R 7 000 (about US$700)
  • Flights / Visa (estimated) - R25 000 (about US$2500)
The tour does come with some awesome kit and as a contributor, towards one of the perks, we will make some of this kit available to you. All of this kit will be signed by us and sent to you as soon as we receive it.
If we do not raise all the funds on Indiegogo, we will still continue in other fund raising efforts to make sure we are able to reach our dream. If we do raise our target funds, we have opted in to InDemand so that you can continue contributing and all the extra funds will go towards the South African Touch Association and getting other players to the 2015 Touch Rugby World Cup.

If you can't contribute...

Then please share this campaign. Indiegogo has some awesome sharing tools that will help you to help me spread the word.

Other than that, we really do appreciate you taking the time to read this and, hopefully, make a contribution.

story:
The Roseland Cup Futbol Tournament is an event that brings together the region's best soccer players from the community and the Sonoma County Sheriff's Office for a day of fun, camaraderie, and competition!

Last year, the FC Giants of Petaluma, led by Team Captain AJ Martinez, won the Roseland Cup Perpetual Trophy in a final match against Roseland favorites, La Canchanillas, led by Efren Carrillo Sr. It was a brilliant match that was neck and neck until the very end! However, the Roseland Cup Perpetual Trophy is once again up for grabs and tournament organizers would like to open registration to 300 players this year!

The Roseland Cup Trophy represents the greatness of Santa Rosa and its people. It represents the skill, determination, and diversity of those who call Santa Rosa home. It represents our ability to overcome challenges in the face of adversity through collaboration and teamwork. The winners of the Cup is always the team who best represents these values, exemplified by their victory. On September 26th, at 9:00 am, soccer players from throughout the North Bay area and beyond will descend upon Roseland to showcase their talent during the 2nd Annual Roseland Cup Tournament. 

Last year, the Roseland Cup hosted 260 players of all ages, but we had over 300 people register to play. Given our limited amount of resources, we had to register players on a first come, first serve basis. However, this year, we hope to raise our capacity to 16 teams competing, for a total of roughly 300 players. But to do this, we need the community's  help raising additional funds. 

Please help us reach our goal of $2,000 so we can provide each player with a custom jersey and provide attendees with food and entertainment for the best community sporting event of the season!

If you have questions or comments, please direct your inquiries to roselandcup@gmail.com or visit our Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/roselandcup/

Also, to see press coverage of last year's event, see below: http://www.pressdemocrat.com/news/3050778-181/soccer-tournament-brings-together-deputies 

See you on the field!

story:
Whether you want to improve your health, support mineral research, enjoy savory flavor, or have a "once-in-a-lifetime" Viking experience on a pristine archipelago, this is the project for you!



The most mineralized salt in the world

Here at Saltbrennslan, our goal is to improve your (and others‘) mineral nutrition, and we hope to improve public health by moving the focus to prevention instead of treatment of disease. We strongly believe our organic salt, Viking Silver, to be the simplest and tastiest solution to improve your mineral status.

It is difficult to even scratch the surface of how important trace elements are to the human diet, and how many of them western people usually lack, with the notable exception of sodium (common varieties of salt are almost pure sodium chloride).

We measured 72 different mineral elements in the salt and the results are phenomenal.  Thanks to the wonderful ability of algae to concentrate essential minerals, Viking Silver salt contains 1.7% iodine, while iodized salt contains 0.0025%, or 680 times less. Our salt, contrary to regular salt, has only 8.8% sodium, and a whopping 20.6% of potassium.  


For mothers to be

Some say that iodine is the most important supplement for women of childbearing age. Their future children would certainly make sure they get enough, as deficiency can cause mental and physical retardation, lower birth weight and IQ. Iodine also reduces the risk of breast cancer and increases the fertility of the mother.

Iodized salt and wheat has made great advancements for children and mothers all over the world. Before iodization, thyroid and developmental disorders were even more common than today. However, these programs just provide a bare minimum and only work for 26% of the US population. Japan has one of the lowest breast cancer rates and is the world leader in algae and therefore iodine consumption, and plenty of research suggests much higher intake of iodine to be beneficial.

                                               


The problems of modern diet

We all know that the food industry has created some problems. One of the most serious is the limited variety of minerals in our diet. More than two billion people suffer from severe iodine deficiency, 98% of americans lack potassium and 9 out of 10 consume, on average, twice the recommended maximum of sodium.

Sadly, 86% of Europeans die from preventable lifestyle diseases, which are all worsened by mineral deficiencies. Scientists tell us that heart disease, cancer, obesity, chronic fatigue, infertility, depression and many other conditions are impacted by excess sodium or lack of minerals. Unfortunately, little is being done to mend the situation. Keep reading to learn how we can change that, with your help.     

         


Supporting mineral research

www.vikingsilversalt.com is our publishing platform for mineral research articles. There you will also find useful life-hacks to save you money, time, or even your life. Learn to prevent radiation sickness after a nuclear accident and why iodine can prevent the early stages of breast cancer. We plan to add many more articles during the campaign, and after.
2% of the total income of this campaign and all future sales, will go towards a research fund supporting mineral research, one third of which will go to students. Anyone can apply for a grant, and we want to have a public voting system to select the recipients of these grants.

A Viking Legacy

                     

Salt was a precious commodity on the misty islands of the Viking era. There were no salt mines, collecting dried salt from rocks was a painstaking process and importing was expensive. But the Vikings discovered another way of producing salt. By the power of fire, they burned seaweeds to extract their salty mineral content!

The Vikings were healthy people and knew about some of the benefits of ash salt. Viking Silver marks a rebirth of the tradition and now we have finally determined the composition of their wonderful salt and can surely call it the healthiest in the world.

The method was used in Iceland until the middle ages, when it was abandoned due to improved transportation. Like the ancient silver of the vikings, this salt is precious and has a beautiful greyish black color. We will produce your Viking Silver on the only known site of salt burning in Iceland, The Sleeping Islands (Svefneyjar) of Breidafjordur. Depending on your perk, you may have the chance to visit these islands and have a true Viking adventure.


100% organic kelp

Seaweeds naturally concentrate almost all of the essential minerals, especially iodine. By burning the organic matter in the kelp, the minerals are concentrated even further. The black color derives mostly from coal, which is thought to ease digestion, similar to fibers. The raw material is gathered by an existing algae powder producer in Breidafjordur, Iceland. Their production is certified as sustainable, organic and fit for human consumption.

         



Soon after starting production, we would like to harvest the kelp ourselves, increasing quality and lowering cost. Operations will take place on the magnificent islands of Svefneyjar, and in the capital of Breidafjordur; Stykkishólmur.


Approved by the consumers

We have had over 100 people try the Viking Silver Super Salt, and not one has been dissatisfied by the taste. The look and taste are unlike any other salt and it is definitely the best seasoning for fish. It can be used to replace salt in any dish, is great on steaks and stews alike!


Who are we?

We are young entrepeneurs who believe that our salt could help many people. We have studied chemistry, ecology, medicine, coastal and marine management, design and history and we have a broad knowledge of environmental and public health issues. The Sleeping Islands of Breidafjordur will be our future residence and we love the direct contact with nature, the birds and the sea.


Help us bring Viking Silver to the world

By spending some of our savings, and a lot of work, we have recreated the forgotten salt of the Vikings. The chemical analyses have been made and we are ready to sail to market. We have all of the needed supply lines and have our action plan ready. We chose to use preorders and crowdfunding to finance the required factory equipment, because we did not want to hand control of our vision to venture capitalists. We ask your help to bring Viking Silver Salt to the world, and will instead provide great rewards (mostly salty ones :-). We would be even more grateful if you helped spread the word about mineral nutrition!


...and experience Viking Adventure

We offer you unique and interesting rewards for supporting this campaign. A taste of the super salt as soon as it is ready, volume discounts and other rewards. And, if you dare, you can explore the Viking Legends yourself! 

We think the most inspiring experience of all may be to visit the beautiful archipelago of Svefneyjar, especially in the summer. The bird life is incredible with tens of thousands of nesting seabirds and around seven thousand eiders. There are sheep and other farm animals, plenty of fish in the ocean, and endless beaches full of algae and sea critters. Breathtaking mountain view, sustainable living and the golden silence... We are honored to welcome high level supporters to join us for a unique Viking experience on this paradise.

$15 and above allows you to experience the unique flavor and benefits of our super salt yourself. We offer increasing value at each perk level, you can get the salt in reusable, BPA-free jars and even a life-time supply for $8000!

                              

$50 and above get the Viking Silver t-shirt. You can choose your size from S to XXL, women or men and in black, white, red or blue. There will be two or three design options that you can choose from (we will e-mail you for the choice).

                             


The $100+ perk is this handmade, Icelandic, real silver necklace on a leather string, with the engraving of your choice in viking runes (we will e-mail you for the choice).

                                                            

The perks from $500 dare you to visit our facilities in Iceland. Meet the team and learn everything about the product, its fabrication and its history. 

$3000 and above gets you this hand-smithed, low maintenance, stainless steel viking cutlery in stainless steel in a leather poach with belt loops.

                                                             

For $8000, receive this high quality hand-made drinking horn. Engraved with the Hammer of Thor and made of actual cow horn, so yours may look slightly different. It has leather straps and can hold 24 oz or 709 mL of liquid.

                                                                      


Risks and challenges

Too few preorders. This is a possibility, but we have a backup plan! We can scale down the production to home-industry level at an approved facility, and make the salt by hand.

Too many preorders! If we start to feel overwhelmed by the number of pre-orders, we may have to take the difficult steps necessary to upscale the production at a faster pace (getting outside investment).

Fulfillment timing. Since the setting up of equipment, licensing, material deliveries and production are not entirely predictable, we have a buffer zone for the timing of perk deliveries, although delays may be inevitable.


FAQ‘s

How much should I consume of Viking Silver daily?

When you start using Viking Silver, you should start by using no more than 1g for a few days, then gradually increase the dosage as you see fit, but no more than 10g per day (1 tablespoon). The recommend usage as a salt substitute should  be in the range of 0.5-10g per day.

Did Vikings actually use this salt?

The Icelandic Book of Settlement (ca. 1100 AD) talks about Svefneyjar as a site of salt burning, and other ancient manuscripts describe ash salt being used for food.

Is the product safe?

Yes. Though algae contain some arsenosugars, they are not nearly as toxic as inorganic arsenic. The measured quantity of arsenic in the salt is also well within safe limits. Even more comforting is the fact that kelp concentrates antidotes to arsenic; like sulphur, selenium and iodine. The salt is safe with regard to all heavy metals and chemicals.

I thought you were not supposed to eat burnt things?

When organic matter is burnt, some side products of the combustion can be harmful. The measured amounts of PAH (Poly-aromatic hydrocarbons) in our salt are similar to grilled meat, but the actual levels needed to show detectable effects are hundreds of times higher. If you follow our recommended usage, you will not significantly increase your PAH intake.

How do I pay for the shipping?

Worldwide shipping is included in most perks except the "Viking" perk. Depending on your location, you may have to pay tariffs or other fees for your perk rewards.

How will the products be delivered?

They will arrive in a letter or package, depending on the perk and will be delivered with the assistance of the Icelandic Postal Service (Posturinn).

Is the flight included in the factory visit and island stay perks?

No. We prefer to let you decide yourself if, when and how you come to Iceland. This way you can organize a long or a short tour, with whom you like, going where you want. We welcome you at Stykkishólmur or Flatey. Do not hesitate to ask us for advice on how to get there.

When are the factory tours and island stays scheduled?

We will make sure you know when exactly well in advance, but they will most likely be in June. If you can not come in June 2015, we can accommodate you in May 2015, or another time if you inform us well in advance.

Where will the production take place?

Your Viking Silver may be produced on the archipelago of Svefneyjar, Iceland or on the mainland, depending on the scale of manufacture. Viking Jarl ($250) and above will receive the hand made  early production run made on the island. Packaging and other operations will take place in the capital of Breidafjordur, Stykkishólmur.

When will the rewards be delivered?

Deliveries are planned for June 2015 to August 2015, depending on the perks and date of ordering.

Where will I find the product after the end of the campaign?

We will select physical retailers during the campaign, and it will be available for ordering at www.vikingsilversalt.com as well.


Other Ways You Can Help

Share the campaign on social media and get educated on mineral deficiencies yourself. The most important part of this campaign is getting the word out about the serious mineral unbalance existing in the western diet.


                            Thanks!
story_txt:
Whether you want to improve your health, support mineral research, enjoy savory flavor, or have a "once-in-a-lifetime" Viking experience on a pristine archipelago, this is the project for you!




The most mineralized salt in the world
Here at Saltbrennslan, our goal is to improve your (and others‘) mineral nutrition, and we hope to improve public health by moving the focus to prevention instead of treatment of disease. We strongly believe our organic salt, Viking Silver, to be the simplest and tastiest solution to improve your mineral status.
It is difficult to even scratch the surface of how important trace elements are to the human diet, and how many of them western people usually lack, with the notable exception of sodium (common varieties of salt are almost pure sodium chloride).
We measured 72 different mineral elements in the salt and the results are phenomenal.  Thanks to the wonderful ability of algae to concentrate essential minerals, Viking Silver salt contains 1.7% iodine, while iodized salt contains 0.0025%, or 680 times less. Our salt, contrary to regular salt, has only 8.8% sodium, and a whopping 20.6% of potassium.  



For mothers to be
Some say that iodine is the most important supplement for women of childbearing age. Their future children would certainly make sure they get enough, as deficiency can cause mental and physical retardation, lower birth weight and IQ. Iodine also reduces the risk of breast cancer and increases the fertility of the mother.
Iodized salt and wheat has made great advancements for children and mothers all over the world. Before iodization, thyroid and developmental disorders were even more common than today. However, these programs just provide a bare minimum and only work for 26% of the US population. Japan has one of the lowest breast cancer rates and is the world leader in algae and therefore iodine consumption, and plenty of research suggests much higher intake of iodine to be beneficial.
                                               



The problems of modern diet
We all know that the food industry has created some problems. One of the most serious is the limited variety of minerals in our diet. More than two billion people suffer from severe iodine deficiency, 98% of americans lack potassium and 9 out of 10 consume, on average, twice the recommended maximum of sodium.
Sadly, 86% of Europeans die from preventable lifestyle diseases, which are all worsened by mineral deficiencies. Scientists tell us that heart disease, cancer, obesity, chronic fatigue, infertility, depression and many other conditions are impacted by excess sodium or lack of minerals. Unfortunately, little is being done to mend the situation. Keep reading to learn how we can change that, with your help.     

         

Supporting mineral research

www.vikingsilversalt.com is our publishing platform for mineral research articles. There you will also find useful life-hacks to save you money, time, or even your life. Learn to prevent radiation sickness after a nuclear accident and why iodine can prevent the early stages of breast cancer. We plan to add many more articles during the campaign, and after.

2% of the total income of this campaign and all future sales, will go towards a research fund supporting mineral research, one third of which will go to students. Anyone can apply for a grant, and we want to have a public voting system to select the recipients of these grants.

A Viking Legacy
                     
Salt was a precious commodity on the misty islands of the Viking era. There were no salt mines, collecting dried salt from rocks was a painstaking process and importing was expensive. But the Vikings discovered another way of producing salt. By the power of fire, they burned seaweeds to extract their salty mineral content!

The Vikings were healthy people and knew about some of the benefits of ash salt. Viking Silver marks a rebirth of the tradition and now we have finally determined the composition of their wonderful salt and can surely call it the healthiest in the world.
The method was used in Iceland until the middle ages, when it was abandoned due to improved transportation. Like the ancient silver of the vikings, this salt is precious and has a beautiful greyish black color. We will produce your Viking Silver on the only known site of salt burning in Iceland, The Sleeping Islands (Svefneyjar) of Breidafjordur. Depending on your perk, you may have the chance to visit these islands and have a true Viking adventure.



100% organic kelp
Seaweeds naturally concentrate almost all of the essential minerals, especially iodine. By burning the organic matter in the kelp, the minerals are concentrated even further. The black color derives mostly from coal, which is thought to ease digestion, similar to fibers. The raw material is gathered by an existing algae powder producer in Breidafjordur, Iceland. Their production is certified as sustainable, organic and fit for human consumption.
         

Soon after starting production, we would like to harvest the kelp ourselves, increasing quality and lowering cost. Operations will take place on the magnificent islands of Svefneyjar, and in the capital of Breidafjordur; Stykkishólmur.

Approved by the consumers
We have had over 100 people try the Viking Silver Super Salt, and not one has been dissatisfied by the taste. The look and taste are unlike any other salt and it is definitely the best seasoning for fish. It can be used to replace salt in any dish, is great on steaks and stews alike!


Who are we?
We are young entrepeneurs who believe that our salt could help many people. We have studied chemistry, ecology, medicine, coastal and marine management, design and history and we have a broad knowledge of environmental and public health issues. The Sleeping Islands of Breidafjordur will be our future residence and we love the direct contact with nature, the birds and the sea.

Help us bring Viking Silver to the world
By spending some of our savings, and a lot of work, we have recreated the forgotten salt of the Vikings. The chemical analyses have been made and we are ready to sail to market. We have all of the needed supply lines and have our action plan ready. We chose to use preorders and crowdfunding to finance the required factory equipment, because we did not want to hand control of our vision to venture capitalists. We ask your help to bring Viking Silver Salt to the world, and will instead provide great rewards (mostly salty ones :-). We would be even more grateful if you helped spread the word about mineral nutrition!


...and experience Viking Adventure
We offer you unique and interesting rewards for supporting this campaign. A taste of the super salt as soon as it is ready, volume discounts and other rewards. And, if you dare, you can explore the Viking Legends yourself! 

We think the most inspiring experience of all may be to visit the beautiful archipelago of Svefneyjar, especially in the summer. The bird life is incredible with tens of thousands of nesting seabirds and around seven thousand eiders. There are sheep and other farm animals, plenty of fish in the ocean, and endless beaches full of algae and sea critters. Breathtaking mountain view, sustainable living and the golden silence... We are honored to welcome high level supporters to join us for a unique Viking experience on this paradise.


$15 and above allows you to experience the unique flavor and benefits of our super salt yourself. We offer increasing value at each perk level, you can get the salt in reusable, BPA-free jars and even a life-time supply for $8000!


                              
$50 and above get the Viking Silver t-shirt. You can choose your size from S to XXL, women or men and in black, white, red or blue. There will be two or three design options that you can choose from (we will e-mail you for the choice).

                             

The $100+ perk is this handmade, Icelandic, real silver necklace on a leather string, with the engraving of your choice in viking runes (we will e-mail you for the choice).
                                                            
The perks from $500 dare you to visit our facilities in Iceland. Meet the team and learn everything about the product, its fabrication and its history. 
$3000 and above gets you this hand-smithed, low maintenance, stainless steel viking cutlery in stainless steel in a leather poach with belt loops.
                                                             
For $8000, receive this high quality hand-made drinking horn. Engraved with the Hammer of Thor and made of actual cow horn, so yours may look slightly different. It has leather straps and can hold 24 oz or 709 mL of liquid.

story:
Contents

      Evnik Simulator   

    Professional sportsmen

    New fitness!

    Who are we? Our ideas! 

     Methodology   

     Science from Saadvakass

History

  Risks



   Evnik Simulator

                     Evnik replaces many - Nothing replaces Evnik

         

   Professional sportsmen

We are proud that professional sportsmen need Evnik!

It is difficult to imagine, how these boys and girls had been training without Evnik…


          THE VARIETY OF MANEUVERS WITH EVNIK IS AMAZING!

                  


                                SAAD’VAKASS IS REVOLUTION IN SPORT


  New Fitness! 

From now on, the most difficult hand movements, requiring quickness, power and accuracy of the trajectory, can be practiced with the help of Evnik!

   

My name is Anzha, i participate in the world Kung FU championship, full contact in a adult league when i was 15 years old. I took a bronze medal. Every day i train with evnik simulator.

My name is Evnika and people usually tells me that i am the fastest boxing girl ever. I am training with evnik simulator for 4 years, this is my favourite training tool.         

SAAD’VAKASS IS REVOLUTION IN SPORT

My name is Rush, i am 13 years old, nobody believes that i do not workout with bars and dumbbells, but i am training only with Evnik. Evnik can make your muscles work, and make your muscles more fast and strong. I am boxer and i am always win.



 I’m a mother of seven and have a big experience in visiting hospitals. While talking to doctors you find out, that one of the biggest young mother’s problems is overweight, that according to doctors is harmful for fetus. Doctors say that due to my sportive way of life I can hide my numerous pregnancies.                                                                                                                  
If they only knew, that all my sport is 5-10 minutes every day trainings with Evnik.



With Evnik you can do everything you want: you can slim, you can become more strong and fast, you can heal muscles, back and neck pain.


                                                           

WE WILL REFUND YOU MONEY if you don't like the simulator.

                                           


CHOOSE YOUR OWN EVNIK MODEL. 

Detalize your dreams and follow it, with Evnik it is easy




  

    Who are we? Our ideas!

 We are friendly and happy family! An interesting story has happened with us. For many years we used our own invention for training of our children, so we didn't think, that we had a unique simulator. We also didn't understand, that we are the creators of technology without analogues in the world. Many sportsmen, children and elderly people need in this technology. Today we want to share our thoughts and ideas with you, and also offer you cross together this stormy ocean, full of adventures, difficulties and hopes...


I see a new period in human development, when every person since the moment of birth can achieve  exceptional abilities, which will let people to be superheroes with their prefect physical data.  It's every child's right to be taught to be strong, dexterous and fast before his 5 years old to teach him to use getting skills during his whole rest of life.



      



 

                                      

   Imagine if in our childhood there was this kind of professional simulator for kids like Evnik, and our parents would introduce sport to us, and we could have such skills as Evnika demonstrates us. What would our life be, how brighter we would be able to shine in it and easier to overcome natural difficulties of life? Time passed, like you I didn’t get such skills in my childhood, but today I give this opportunity to my kids and willingly share my experience with you. 

           The idea of sharing this information with you was suggested by my friends. Every time my friends visit me, they see the energy my children throw out, their movements, emotions and ardor, so they always say the same: “Wish my parents have taught me so!…” But really, the human nature itself suggests us caring about our children since childhood, giving them everything we can. 

Take 10 minutes of your precious time to study the Evnik simulator’s miracle effect   and you will be surprised at its usefulness and convenience!





CLASSIC Evnik simulator model is “classical” special “lean” model, which thank to its ergonomics is able to teach you to use your potential energy, which is in different levels of organization of biomechanics of your body. This particular simulator model can be widely used in all spheres of SHAPING, AEROBICS, PILATES, STRETCHING, and also in play, field-and-track kinds of sport and sporting fighting. We recommend to everybody the very this simulator model because it will teach the best to use your potential energy, increase your speed and power characteristics. This model almost doesn’t have restrictions in using and it is useful with achieving of any your goals (see below “goals”). The warranty of the simulator is 3 years (will work more than 10 years).


The Evnik simulator, SSS model is a special model for professional sportsmen with outstanding skills, which are able to create more powerful primary impulse. Only having the skill to create the powerful primary impulse (giving jerking movement to the simulator), you are able to make the simulator work.  This simulator by contrast with the classical model doesn't teach you to extract the potential energy, it is  more focused on the perfection of the process of releasing the potential energy. The simulator is made from several special elastic alloys and has big system hardness with high elastic coefficient. The simulator is directed to the development of skill of neuromuscular apparatus, reducing time of transiting of a muscle from relax condition to intense and lets make more powerful maneuvers. The warranty of the simulator is 3 years (will work more than 10 years).


  Methodology




                   

        

Help us to finish patenting of the Evnik simulator.

According to World Intellectual Property Organisation's (WIPO) report, our project doesn't have even close substitutes in the whole world! during the limited time we should make an application in the all rest of countries for implementation of project's patenting. Nowadays, we have patented our Evnik simulator in 9 countries in the world. we are consumed with desire to have a product, patented in the whole world. we want you to never regret that you have spent your time in our company.


    Science from Saadvakass


Saadvakass’s effect is new phenomenon in sport practice, which is expressed in more powerful and fast-moving maneuvers (striking, swinging, jerking and other impulsive and combined explorations).

 


                 

Saadvakass’s effect unites and consolidates the efforts of other effects (see below), which awake in different levels of organism organization, with innovative devise “Accumulator of mechanical energy Evnik”, hereafter Evnik simulator.

Evnik simulator not only awakes the energies in its body and in the organism, but it, by consolidation of muscular efforts, can transform receiving energy into force-speedy results of individual. That’s why the maneuvers of trainee become more powerful and fast-moving, so Saadvakass’s effect becomes definitely perceptible.


Thank to predictable reactions of neuromuscular system in response to stimulation, made by Evnik simulator, and Evnik ability to generate the energy at the moment of eccentric muscular contraction (hereafter MC), accumulate the energy at the moment of  isometric MC and enforce the release of energy at the moment of concentric MC (transforming the whole generated energies into force-speedy results).  That’s why the Saadvakass’s effect is an important acquisition for healthful prophylactic and sport practice. 

Extremely fast, powerful, exact and accent maneuvers, made in such level as Saadvakass demonstrate us, are available only with using of “Accumulator of mechanical energy Evnik”. Our assiduous searches together with  World Intellectual Property Organization (WIPO), show us that there isn’t technology or simulator in the world, which can inculcate you such progressive sport skills.





 History 


     

    We are united family team. We are consumed with desir to implement everything we planned!



 

 Risks

We are responsible family company,  we are going to make every possible effort to reach our goal. The producers believe in us, they promise to produce all products on term. But we understand, we should do much work, so we want not only to produce good simulator, but also place it into practical packing, we want to make beautiful user’s manual, shoot fantastic motivational videos and a host of other things.

The most of our ideas implemented 80-90%, so we are sure, that we will be able to finish work on term. Our office is situated in the same territory as our gym, photo and video-studio, laboratory. We have all necessary professional equipment for realization of our goals.

Of course, release of innovational products demand much more efforts than producing of existent products, so sometimes we face with unexpected circumstances, but we make every effort, and now we can meet the challenges.

Also, we fully understand that 100% realization of our ideas is possible only with your help and support, we rely on your intelligent assistant. We believe, that you like we have caught fire of the idea of new product and new training method. If you don’t be indifferent to our ideas, we’re sure in our success! 

Thank you so much!

Nowadays, we have patented our Evnik simulator in 9 countries in the world. we are consumed with desire to have a product, patented in the whole world. we want you to never regret that you have spent your time in our company.





    Science from Saadvakass



Saadvakass’s effect is new phenomenon in sport practice, which is expressed in more powerful and fast-moving maneuvers (striking, swinging, jerking and other impulsive and combined explorations).

 

                 
Saadvakass’s effect unites and consolidates the efforts of other effects (see below), which awake in different levels of organism organization, with innovative devise “Accumulator of mechanical energy Evnik”, hereafter Evnik simulator.



Evnik simulator not only awakes the energies in its body and in the organism, but it, by consolidation of muscular efforts, can transform receiving energy into force-speedy results of individual. That’s why the maneuvers of trainee become more powerful and fast-moving, so Saadvakass’s effect becomes definitely perceptible.

Thank to predictable reactions of neuromuscular system in response to stimulation, made by Evnik simulator, and Evnik ability to generate the energy at the moment of eccentric muscular contraction (hereafter MC), accumulate the energy at the moment of  isometric MC and enforce the release of energy at the moment of concentric MC (transforming the whole generated energies into force-speedy results).  That’s why the Saadvakass’s effect is an important acquisition for healthful prophylactic and sport practice. 
Extremely fast, powerful, exact and accent maneuvers, made in such level as Saadvakass demonstrate us, are available only with using of “Accumulator of mechanical energy Evnik”. Our assiduous searches together with  World Intellectual Property Organization (WIPO), show us that there isn’t technology or simulator in the world, which can inculcate you such progressive sport skills.















 History 


     

    We are united family team. We are consumed with desir  to implement everything we planned!






 

 Risks
We are responsible family company,  we are going to make every possible effort to reach our goal. The producers believe in us, they promise to produce all products on term. But we understand, we should do much work, so we want not only to produce good simulator, but also place it into practical packing, we want to make beautiful user’s manual, shoot fantastic motivational videos and a host of other things.
The most of our ideas implemented 80-90%, so we are sure, that we will be able to finish work on term. Our office is situated in the same territory as our gym, photo and video-studio, laboratory. We have all necessary professional equipment for realization of our goals.
Of course, release of innovational products demand much more efforts than producing of existent products, so sometimes we face with unexpected circumstances, but we make every effort, and now we can meet the challenges.
Also, we fully understand that 100% realization of our ideas is possible only with your help and support, we rely on your intelligent assistant. We believe, that you like we have caught fire of the idea of new product and new training method. If you don’t be indifferent to our ideas, we’re sure in our success! 
Thank you so much!

story:
Freedom is something most of us take for granted. The ability to go outside, feel the sunshine and breathe fresh air. But what if you couldn't?

Our friend Kayed suffers from muscular dystrophy. He depends on constant care from his family and can't move without a wheelchair or breathe without an oxygen tube. 

Life is uncertain and medical care is expensive for many Palestinians. Kayed's parents struggle to keep his vital breathing equipment running. And because his oxygen supply can't travel with him, he is trapped inside his home.

You can help. Every donation brings us closer to raising enough money to give Kayed a portable, battery-powered oxygen concentrator. That means he will be free to see the world outside.


#HELPKAYED 

Your donation will directly help Kayed. Every penny we raise will pay for the vital equipment he desperately needs.

If we raise more than the goal amount, any extra money will go into an emergency fund that Kayed's parents can use for things like medical costs.

And you can also help us to share the campaign and spread the word. Share this page on Facebook, Twitter and Google Plus. Tell everyone to #HelpKayed.


HE NEEDS YOUR SUPPORT

Kayed's parents are doing everything they can, but it's just not enough. Every day is a struggle as they take care of Kayed and his younger brother Nadji who suffers from the same condition. And Kayed has also contracted pneumonia, so life is harder and time is more important than ever. 

If we can raise enough money, we will personally deliver the oxygen machine to Kayed as soon as possible. We'll also give you regular updates to show you how it will change his life. 

In our previous campaign, we raised enough money to give Kayed a laptop computer. You can find out more here. It is his only window to the world, but now with your help we can truly set Kayed free.


ABOUT KAYED'S CONDITION 

Kayed was born with a genetic disorder that means his body is literally wasting away. He is growing weaker and less able all the time as his condition deteriorates. 

First he lost mobility and had to use a wheelchair, but could still attend university and live a normal life. Later his lungs began to fail, so now Kayed has to rely on oxygen equipment to breathe. He also has water in his lungs that needs to be removed many times every day so it won't choke him. 

Now, the only way Kayed can travel outside is using expensive bottles of oxygen. They don't last very long, and even a small trip is difficult to arrange and cost-intensive. That means he had to abandon his education and can't visit his friends. Normal life has stopped completely. 

But Kayed still has dreams. He wants to finish studying, find work and support his family, and most of all travel and experience more of the world. And the first important step is getting a better air supply. 


WHAT IS A MOBILE OXYGEN CONCENTRATOR? 

Unlike Kayed's oxygen bottles, you don't need to refill an oxygen concentrator. Using the surrounding air, it creates the oxygen-rich air supply that he needs to breathe.

We want to give Kayed a battery-powered oxygen concentrator. He can recharge it anytime and anywhere, so he'll have an unlimited supply of oxygen, That means he will be free to leave his home much more and won't have to worry about running out of air.

It won't just give him oxygen. A portable oxygen concentrator will give Kayed freedom to have a normal life.

story:
The Most Overlooked Health Issue

Today you can't turn on  the TV without seeing an infomercial for a new health care or fitness product.

But with everything that is out there to tone and strengthen all of the different muscle groups of the body... ONE muscle has never been addressed and it is one of the most important muscles in our entire body.

It is called the Pubo-coccygeus muscle or... PC Muscle.

It is a deep tissue muscle and it is located in the pelvic floor. It is responsible for supporting all of our internal organs so that they can function properly and efficiently as well as being responsible for sexual sensitivity and sexual function.

This little muscle also controls the flow of urine and feces. But because it is a deep tissue muscle, it is the most difficult muscle in the body to tone and strengthen.

AND... the old saying "Out-of-sight... Out-of-mind." applies here.

It is something that we simply do not think about.

We seldom recognize what an important role this little muscle plays not only in our intimate life but our everyday function and our over-all well-being.

As this little muscle deteriorates it becomes more difficult to feel making it more difficult to isolate and work. By the time this happens, not even Kegel exercises will help.

The KIE is designed to alleviate the symptoms of Urinary Stress Incontinence and help to redevelop the Pelvic Floor after Childbirth. The KIE also increases circulation to the Groin Area in Men to help relieve certain type of Prostate Conditions and in many cases PREVENT them altogether and the list goes on.

* 56% of Men will have a Prostate Disorder by the time they are 50 
* 32% of Men will become Incontinent by the time they are 50
* 36% of Men will have ED by the time they are 40
  • All of these disorders BEGIN with a lack of circulation to the groin area.
  • Because the KIE is an EXTERNAL EXERCISE DEVICE it is the ONLY tool available on the market that men can use to increase circulation to the groin area to help prevent or alleviate certain types of prostate conditions,   incontinence and ED.

New Moms need strong healthy muscles in the Pelvic floor

The KIE can help with that.

* Helps to Alleviate Prenatal Discomfort.

* Helps to Facilitate an easier delivery.

* Shortens Post-natal Recovery time.

* Restores strength and elasticity to the pelvic floor after child birth.

Also know as USI.... or Urinary Stress Incontinence

For years the Diapers for Adults Industry has been telling us that this is something that we have to expect and it is just part of getting older. This is not true.

93% of ALL INCONTINENCE is STRESS Incontinence.... this means that this little muscle has gotten weak and just like with any other muscle, it can be redeveloped.

* 52,000,000 people are Incontinent.

* The Diapers for Adults Industry is LARGER than the Diapers for babies industry.

Men's #1 Complaint about their Intimate Partner is that their 'Grip' is never tight enough.

A strong, healthy PC Muscle not only increases Sexual Sensitivity, it increases the strength of a woman's grip on the penis for maximum pleasure for your intimate partner... and no more worries about embarrassing vaginal air.

A Woman's #1 complaint about their intimate partner is two-fold: Premature Ejaculation and the Inability to Sustain an Erection.

The KIE helps to tone and strengthen the PC muscle to help men control ejaculation and to help sustain a erection.

Now you can get the Fantasy Bootie of your Dreams WITHOUT Squats or Lunges. The KIE helps to tone and tighten, shape and define the Gluts in just a few minutes a day.

The KIE is based on the same Principal body builders use:

Isolate the Muscle... Apply Resistance... Achieve Development...

                                                         Enough said...

            If you don't have any of these problems.... you don't want them...

                                                     You NEED the KIE




Since the mid 1950's doctors have been recommending that women do the Kegel exercise after childbirth to help restore the muscles of the pelvic floor, but in recent years we have discovered that these exercises are a valuable health benefit to men as well.

The Kegel exercise is where you contract and release the principal muscle of the pelvic floor... the Pubo-coccygeus or PC Muscle.

To locate and flex this muscle, when you begin urinating... first, you let a small amount of urine out, then squeeze this muscle to stop the flow of urine. Then you continue to repeat this over and over until the bladder is empty.

THAT is the PC Muscle... and THOSE are the Kegel exercises.

This sounds simple, but it is not.

The problem with the Kegel exercise is, that once this little muscle is damaged or begins to deteriorate or atrophy, it becomes more and more difficult to isolate and flex this muscle. THEN, this muscle becomes more difficult to even FEEL. 

This is where the KIE comes in.

Precision positioning along with exact execution of the KIE Method AUTOMATICALLY isolates and forces this deep tissue muscle into action.

The KIE not only provides solid results, it also provides something that regular Kegel exercises do not.

The KIE provides an Adjustable Resistance Device so that you can continue to increase your personal level of development.

And... the KIE is safe, fun and easy to use.

The KIE is the first product that meets an incredible need, one that has been neglected for decades.

It has tremendous health benefits and both medical and therapeutic applications.

The KIE is a really smart fitness product that can also be used in the prevention of many related problems.

It is Patented, Proven and Tested and truly helps people.

It improves intimate relationships as well as doing away with feelings of sexual inadequacy.

And where once there was only the quick fix of an adult diaper that is momentary at best there is now peace of mind and personal confidence... and no more "Giggle and Piddle" Syndrome.

It is a safe, natural and effective fitness product that allows both men and women to enjoy the incredible health benefits that result from stronger pelvic floor muscles.



          

The Intimate Exerciser has waited a long time to come to the public. Until just a few short years ago no one talked about sexual dysfunction or problems in their intimate lives. Nor did they discuss the intimate health issues that they faced daily. For decades incontinence was known as 'The Closet Epidemic' and for years the Fitness Movement was considered a trend.

At one time the KIE would have been a product that was ahead of its time but today it is a product whose time has come. Today people are more aware of their bodies and the health issues that face them.

The KIE is the solution to so many of our everyday issues that before now had gone unaddressed.
