story:
Short Summary

As a licensed hair stylist with more than 25 years experience, I've come to realize a "need" that was not being met while working with seniors or anyone confined to a bed.  There was no easy or comfortable way for them to have their hair shampooed!  With the aging population, it is my desire to see that our seniors or anyone confined to a bed receive better hair care.  I'm sure you will agree (especially if you are female), if your hair isn't clean, you don't feel good either!  Plus, having clean hair is important to hygiene and good health!

The Shampoo Station is the solution!  It has been specifically designed for bed-ridden individuals in skilled nursing facilities, nursing homes, assisted living, and private residences with home healthcare needs.  This product is different because it is fully contained and does not require an attached plumbing source.  It is also ergonomically designed to support the back; allowing for the individual to be comfortably positioned without strain to their neck.  And, it weighs less than 8 lbs so it is easy for the caretaker to lift or transport. 

"The need for home/assisted living healthcare/hygiene aid to assist in day to day living will increase by 75% in the next 10-15 years," according to the Bureau of vital statistics.

Help us bring a very useful hygiene aid to market so that everyone can age gracefully with dignity.  I personally wish I had this product as I cared for my own aging parents. 

 What We Need & What You Get

We have spent that past year finalizing our product design, product testing, getting the product patent and setting up our company structure and marketing strategy.  We are ready to manufacture our tool and then begin production...we're almost there but need some additional funds to finalize the manufacturing of the tool to get the product out  the door .  100% of this funding is going to the tool manufacturing and first production run.  Please note that on the attached video, the water source was used for demonstration only and is being custom designed.

In the event, we don't receive all of the funds with this campaign, all monies will be put towards the manufacturing of this tool and we will continue the quest to finish raising more capital through other sources.  

Of course, we want to thank you for your donation.  Here's what's in it for you. 

If you donate:

  • $25.00  - Kudos 2 U! You will receive accolades on our Facebook Page to share with your friends.
  • $50.00 - $100.00 -Receive a special "I Helped Put a Smile on Someone's Face" ballpoint pen and a mention on our Facebook Page.
  • $250.00 -  Receive a special "I Helped Put a Smile on Someone's Face" ballpoint pen, a mention on our Facebook Page and a letter from the founders of the Shampoo Station. 
  • $500.00 and over - recyclable shopping bag, a special "I Helped Put a Smile on Someone's Face" ballpoint pen, a mention on our Facebook Page and a letter from the founders of the Shampoo Station. Your name will also be entered into a drawing to receive a Shampoo Station unit.   (Drawing will be held once product is manufactured).

The Impact

We have all known someone who was unable to shower or bathe themselves and were confined to bed due to illness, surgery, or injury.  They were not able to cleanse themselves properly and were given the option of dry shampoos which do not properly cleanse the hair.  Ask anyone in this situation and they will tell you they want nothing more than a their hair to be properly shampooed!  Imagine being part of the solution!

Risks & Challenges

 The only foreseeable risk we see would be if someone built a similar product and tries to work around our patent.  We are prepared to have our legal team file the necessary papers to cease and desist on anyone attempting to infringe upon our patent. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't help us bring a smile to someone's face,  we are sure you know someone who would love to see this product available for use.  Help us spread the word...share this campaign with all your friends and family.  All you have to do is hit share!

story:
My name is Aiyétòrò Frazier. I was born and raised in the United States and with that I was privileged with simple amenities. Some you might think are trivial – Having access to electricity, decent food, and clean running water to do day-to-day tasks. Like most people, you use water for taking showers, drinking a glass of water, washing dishes and clothes, or even playing outside during the hot summer. As long as my family paid their water bill, water would flow.

As I began to travel to other parts of the world, I noticed that not everyone was as fortunate as those of us living in the U.S. Many people don’t have access to clean water much less in-door plumbing to get that clean water. Some people have to walk the distances football fields in order to get water for their families.  Even with this distance, the water fetched must be carried on the top of someone’s head, in a bucket back to their home. So, if you have a lot of water that you need, it is a lot of work to bring multiple buckets to a home for a family to drink, prepare food and clean. Access to clean water is necessity for everyone’s life, it should not be accessible to only a few.

We would like to introduce our project, Operation Water Flow: Northern Ghana. We would like to raise funds to dig bore holes and construct water wells in as many villages in the Bolgatanga region or northern Ghana as our donations would allow. For every $4000 that is raised, thousands of people will have easier access to clean drinking water. We need your support today. Any donation amount will help us to achieve our goal.


For more info or questions, send email to aiyetoro@hotmail.com .

If you would like to mail in your contribution payable to A. Frazier, it can be sent to:

Mr. Frazier

Attn: operation water flow

P.o. Box 115152

Atlanta, ga 30310

Some you might think are trivial – Having access to electricity, decent food, and clean running water to do day-to-day tasks. Like most people, you use water for taking showers, drinking a glass of water, washing dishes and clothes, or even playing outside during the hot summer. As long as my family paid their water bill, water would flow.As I began to travel to other parts of the world, I noticed that not everyone was as fortunate as those of us living in the U.S. Many people don’t have access to clean water much less in-door plumbing to get that clean water. Some people have to walk the distances football fields in order to get water for their families.  Even with this distance, the water fetched must be carried on the top of someone’s head, in a bucket back to their home. So, if you have a lot of water that you need, it is a lot of work to bring multiple buckets to a home for a family to drink, prepare food and clean. Access to clean water is necessity for everyone’s life, it should not be accessible to only a few.We would like to introduce our project, Operation Water Flow: Northern Ghana. We would like to raise funds to dig bore holes and construct water wells in as many villages in the Bolgatanga region or northern Ghana as our donations would allow. For every $4000 that is raised, thousands of people will have easier access to clean drinking water. We need your support today. Any donation amount will help us to achieve our goal.For more info or questions, send email to aiyetoro@hotmail.com .If you would like to mail in your contribution payable to A. Frazier, it can be sent to:Mr. FrazierAttn: operation water flowP.o. Box 115152Atlanta, ga 30310

story:
How do you feel about food? Many see it as a necessary evil; it'll make us fat or sick (hence all the fad diets) not to mention the rising cost of it.  For centuries, Syrians enjoyed a very healthy diet full of flavor and variety for the rich and poor alike. It has the solution for our modern food dilemmas with thousands of recipes that can meet any dietary need and budget. So how come no one knows about it? 
Remember the blind men who tried to describe an elephant? Judging Syrian food from conventional cookbooks or Houmos & Shawrma is the same, you'd have to go to Syria ( a war zone now) or we can deliver its magic to your inbox. 


Dervish Kitchen taps a network of women from all regions and classes. We "translate" authentic recipes to YOUR local ingredients with tips to save time and money.
Our ultimate goal is not just to bring exotic dishes to your table. We'd like you to make peace with what you put in your mouth and learn to  cook and eat like Syrians, with heart!
What we need the money for:
The amount I am aiming to raise will help to complete what I've started: Launching two websites and a newsletter about Syrian food in English and Polish,as well as a website in Arabic dedicated to collecting authentic Syrian recipes as a first step towards an archive of Syrian culinary heritage. 
The money will go towards paying the people who have so far volunteered their time and resources to birth Dervish Kitchen. Most of these people are still living in Syria, but are so motivated by the idea of bringing recognition to our amazing cuisine, they have been collecting recipes and researching and documenting the history of our food culture under very difficult circumstances. 
Finally, raising the capital for this project will give me the chance to give it my full attention, to have the time to write and research about something that is very dear to my heart and to be able to feed more people than I could possibly host in my small flat. The world will be my kitchen and the nurturing food of my people will be yours to enjoy.

story:
Meet Elite Rider, and Olympic Hopeful, Cheryl Fairweather

Cheryl Fairweather is a U.S. trained professional, elite athlete who is earning the privilege to represent her family's country, Belize, in The Olympic Games. If she raises the funds in this campaign, Cheryl will qualify to represent Belize as the first female sprint track cyclist, putting within reach her goal to become the first female to medal for Belize. Determined to ride to win in Rio de Janeiro in 2016, Cheryl is requesting your financial support - any amount you are able and moved to give. For most Olympic athletes like Cheryl, the road to Olympic greatness is self-funded, and requires expensive professional gear, intense training, and travel. With your support, Cheryl will achieve her ultimate goal of being awarded a medal in 2016.

Here is a breakdown of Cheryl's training, travel and equipment needs:

Training Gear is ~$12,765 USD, specifically funding the cost of:

  • A bike. Cheryl has her eye on a high-performance carbon bike made by Dolan that costs ~$5,000. Currently, Cheryl is training on a non-UCI certified, heavier aluminum bike, which makes training more arduous and is not approved for all competitions.
  • Track disc wheels from Zipp. It costs ~$4,000 for both the back and front disc wheel.
  • A Power Meter, by SRM Science Accuracy, which costs $3,425.  Cheryl says, "A power meter is beyond important. It allows my coaches to understand how I distribute power during racing and training. It also tells them if I need to change my training. This is highly needed piece of equipment for any Olympic hopeful."

  • A Casco Warp Sprint Carbon helmet, which costs ~$340.

Physical Therapy and Coaching Fees ~$13,800 USD

  • Coaching Fees for 17 months, which is required for professional athletes who compete at high-performance levels, will cost Cheryl $3,400 USD
  • Physical Therapy, Sports Performance and Rehabilitation: $10,400 USD. This includes Trigger Point Dry Needling, (MFR), Graston Technique, and other procedures associated with recovery and performance.

International Travel is ~$14,000 USD to race in these Olympic-qualifying events:

  • Pan Am Games  Hotel and airfare will cost ~$4,000 and provides valuable UCI Points
  • Manchester England World Championships March 2016 It will cost ~$5,000 in hotel and airfare for this week of competition.
  • Bike baggage fees and ground transportation will cost ~$1,000 for International trips
  • Other UCI-qualifying travel and lodging expenses required for Olympic qualification. Estimated at $4,000.

Cheryl's minimal estimated travel, training and equipment expenses total ~$40,565 USD. We rounded the campaign goal up to $45,000, so Cheryl can have some coin for an extra soft pillow and a few gluten-free snacks on her road to Rio 2016.


Cheryl's Story and Journey To Rio 2016

A former Team USA track and field star and women’s league football player, Cheryl steered her career into professional cycling in order to take Belize - and track cycling - into the international spotlight. A qualified UCI competitor, Cheryl's campaign will fund travel, training and equipment needs so she can get the qualifying points which open the road Rio.

In addition to her professional accomplishments, Cheryl's personal story is  nothing short of heroic. Cheryl has overcome challenges since childhood that made her the equally fierce and gracious competitor and champion she is today.

A huge motivation for representing Belize in Rio 2016 is her father-in-law, who is currently racing against his own challenge of chemotherapy.

"A main reason I am so motivated to compete in the Olympics is because of my father-in-law. His dream has been for one of his children to do what I'm doing now," says Fairweather. "He believes in me, and I would love to give him the gift of seeing my years of training end with his eyes seeing me competing in the Olympics."

Motivated both personally and professionally, Cheryl is training harder than ever to qualify for the Olympics. Inspired by her drive and potential, one of her long-time supporters, Oxygen Plus (O+) - a health-and-wellness company offering 95% portable oxygen for energy and recovery - is wanting to help make Cheryl's Olympic dream a reality. To that end, Oxygen Plus is offering product in some Perks, and will periodically help Cheryl close the funding gap by campainging throughout the duration of the campaign.


About (one of) Cheryl's Biggest Supporters, Oxygen Plus:

Oxygen Plus (O+) is proud to be the part of what keeps Cheryl Fairweather feeling and performing her best when she’s training and competing with professional, elite athletes around the globe. Pro and everyday athletes alike have discovered that using O+ oxygen products enhances their performance, recovery and mental concentration, giving that welcomed extra edge.

Here's what Cheryl has to say about how O+ oxygen keeps her powering through on her road for Gold:

  • “O+ is my go-to recovery and performance enhancer in competition, training and travel. All-natural and easy-to-carry, it’s a great energy refresher that’s now a part of my everyday life.” 
  • “I've been able to recover so much faster and mentally pull it together in between my run sets. Who would have thought O+ helped build confidence!” 
  • “I use O+ like water and I don’t waste any of it. There are times when I DESPERATELY need my O+ (like running at max heart rate). After learning how to train with O+, my max output increased tremendously."

story:
“Ka lā hiki ola, the dawning of a new and sweeter day”

Who are we?


“ALOHA: Aloha is a value, one of unconditional love.

Aloha is the outpouring and receiving of the spirit”

Aloha and thank you for checking out our campaign! First off, let us tell you a little bit about who we are and how Sweet Aloha got started. Co-founders Simi Rodgers (Irmo, South Carolina) and Devon Harris (South Berwick, Maine) met on Oahu while wwoofing on an organic kale farm this past fall (what is wwoofing, you may ask? Check out www.wwoof.net for more info!). Both young women taking time off from school and interested in organic farming and healthy, holistic lifestyles, we became friends immediately. And after trying some of our friends's delicious sugarcane juice, we discovered another common interest: we were both completely hooked on the delicious drink that tasted like liquid sunshine and was a healthier alternative to the refined sugar drinks that we saw offered everywhere else. After getting to juice our own cane, experiment with our own flavors, and learn from our master sugarcane-juicing friends, we decided to turn our love for this delicious drink into a business. But we would not take the easy route. From the very beginning the Sweet Aloha girls pledged that our sugarcane juice would be made from organic, all natural, and local ingredients—setting us apart from our competitors and ensuring that our personal values would not get lost in the hype of selling our product. 

Sweet Aloha is about more than just juice, it is a business committed to the progress of organic, healthy eating and the spread of the “aloha spirit”—putting love and respect first and foremost when it comes to our juices, our customers, our bodies, and our 'aina (land).


What are we selling? 


Sweet Aloha sugarcane juices will start with fresh-pressed juice from only organic and sustainably grown sugarcane from Maui. Without giving too much away, our variety of flavors will come from organic fruits and ingredients, such as hibiscus bud, lavender, strawberry guava, lilikoi, and more. Our juices can either be purchased in biodegradable cups or reusable glass jars.

Our unique flavors will highlight the tropical tastes of the islands, while providing your body with essential vitamins and nutrients in every sip. 


STOP Cane Burning

We want it to be known to all of our customers that Sweet Aloha will be sourcing our sugarcane from farms that do not participate in the harvesting technique used by companies like Hawaiian Commercial & Sugar Company known as cane burning.

Cane burning is an old farming technique that uses controlled fires to prepare the cane stalks for harvest. These fires are extremely detrimental to the air quality of Maui and are directly affecting the health of the people of Hawaii. Black ash, what is referred to as “Maui Snow” is produced, certainly not helping the over 106,000 people in Hawaii who suffer from asthma.* 

Fortunately there are many wonderful farms that have found organic and eco-conscious ways to harvest this wonderful healing sugarcane, and we look forward to working with them. We plan to collaborate with the fantastic campaign Clean Air for Keiki, in order to spread the word about cane burning, and work towards a Maui without this problem.


Health Benefits* 

Unlike other sweet treats, sugarcane juice is as good for you as it tastes.

Sugarcane juice…

  • Is rich in calcium, chromium, cobalt, copper, magnesium, manganese, phosphorous, potassium and zinc
  • Contains iron and vitamins A, C, B1, B2, B3, B5, and B6
  • Has high levels of antioxidants, proteins, and soluble fiber
  • Is an alkaline creating food, which creates a hostile environment for cancer cells in the body
  • Has a low glycemic index (30-40) compared to refined sugar (64), which makes it a good option for diabetic patients
  • Is a natural remedy for sore throats, colds, and flu symptoms
  • Protects against tooth decay
  • Boosts the immune system and speeds the metabolism

We’re not kidding. It’s really that awesome.


Where are we located?

                                   “‘Ohana: Those who are family, and those

                                             you choose to call your family.

                        As a value, ‘Ohana is a human circle of complete Aloha”

Sweet Aloha will start selling on the beautiful island of Maui. We feel this is a good starting location because of the incredible support we have received from our ‘ohana there, as well as the need for a sugarcane juice business on island. We plan to start as a farmer’s market stand, and eventually hope to open our own permanent beachfront stand as well. Our goal is to begin selling by Summer 2015.

In the future we see Sweet Aloha spreading to the mainland—the other 48 states (we haven’t forgotten about you either, Alaska!). We plan to use Maui as a launch pad and, if all goes well, we’d love to expand by 2017.

Too stoked to wait until we're in your area? No worries! Sweet Aloha's online store will be up and running by the end of 2015, and we're committed to making our juices available to those near and far.  

How are we giving back?


                          “Malama: The value of stewardship. To take care of.

                             To serve and to honor, to protect and care for.”

The Sweet Aloha girls, Simi Rodgers and Devon Harris, commit to spending 10 hours a month giving back to the community that we are so blessed to be a part of. We will do this in the form of volunteer work on a variety of organic farms around the island.  Our work will be documented on our website through pictures and videos! We can’t wait to share what we learn with all of you.  

We also pledge to keep our environmental impact as small as possible by recycling and/or composting whenever possible. That means ABSOLUTELY ALL OF OUR JUICED SUGARCANE STALKS will be disposed of in an environmentally conscious manner.


Why do we need your help?

                                           “Lokahi: The value of teamwork:

                          Collaboration and cooperation. Harmony and unity.

                             People who work together can achieve more.”

Fortunately the start up costs for a food stand are not too bad, but we will need help getting our business off the ground. We have calculated that we need $10,000 to be best positioned to open by May, and we are asking $18,000 so that we can cover operating costs for the first 6 months. Our biggest expenditures will be our sugarcane juicer, ice chests, physical market stand, commercial kitchen fees, and our sugarcane and fruit. With your help we know we can make this happen. 


           Risks and Challenges

We are young, we are new to the business world, and we have a lot to learn. 
But we are passionate. We are creative. We are determined. And we are eagerly awaiting each and every success, obstacle, and learning experience sure to come. 

“Mahalo: ‘Thank you’, as a way of living. Live in thankfulness for the richness that makes life so precious.”

From the bottom of our hearts we would like to thank you for taking the time to read about Sweet Aloha, watch our video, and help in any way you can, whether that be a financial donation, sharing the link to our campaign on Facebook, or sending us some love and positive vibes. We couldn’t do it without your help.

XOXO THE SWEET ALOHA GIRLS

* Health information from www.processedfreeamerica.org

story:
Our Story

Ask yourself how often do you still deal with written text in this, supposedly digital, age. Do your fingers ache at the mere thought of manually inputting that pile of printed content lying on your desk into the computer, just so you can start getting some actual work done?

How tedious is it to use online word-for-word translation services, especially for non-digitized text? What if it’s in Russian or Japanese? Will you use an on-screen keyboard or character map for every letter?

Let’s get even more profound and down-to-earth: what if your grandpa can’t read his newspapers this morning because he forgot to take his glasses with him to the park, or has eyesight issues?

Chances are you’re a regular Joe like us. Chances are you and the people you care about have been in situations like these many times over. Whether you’re a student or an office worker, a journalist in the field or a businessman dealing with an international client - think of all those times when you submitted to this tedium with a sigh... Yes, we didn’t have to look much further than ourselves and our own families to find examples, too.

Our Reasoning

How fast do you type? Here’s a few websites that offer free tests. I do around 40 words per minute (WPM) myself. Not terribly fast, but not too slow, either. At an approximate 500 words per standard A4 page, I spend a theoretical minimum of 12 minutes typing any one page. And since I’m no professional typist, I then have to check and edit it for errors. Only after all this is done can I actually start working on whatever it is that I needed the text digitized for in the first place.


Our Optical Character Recognition (OCR) hardware, which forms the core of TheRightPen, can process up to 1000 WPM, without making any mistakes (chance of false scan is 1 in 10.000.000 words). You’d actually have to lay down more than two standard A4 pages filled with text side-by-side and be continuously using the device REALLY fast in order to even theoretically approach its processing limits. This, we feel, could happen only if you’re a super secret agent-man on a perfectly-timed spying mission, in which case come talk to us afterwards and we’ll discuss product improvements in private. ;)

"Being an early tester of TRP really gave me the edge in my study efficiency. This is FAST!" - Paolo Maria Filacchione, PhD candidate from Rome

You’ll agree that we are discussing quite a leap in productivity, regardless of how you look at it. Add to that the ability to choose from over 200 languages for input, output and instant audio translation, enough storage to hold 1,400 books worth of content, a battery that lasts for weeks on end - and you have a ridiculously powerful gizmo in your pocket. It is often said that knowledge wants to be free. We like to think that this is our small way of contributing to a global knowledge revolution, helping information get free from the shackles of paper and foreign languages, becoming more immediately useful to everyone, everywhere, at any time.

But wait - there’s more, as they say! Really, though  - we have tested TheRightPen asa visual aid for people with impaired sight and reading-related conditions. We were overjoyed and very proud with the results and their reactions. Check our testimonials and video section for ideas on how TheRightPen can be used in both familiar and new situations, to help with everyday tasks and make life easier for you, your colleagues, friends, elderly and the visually impaired.

"TheRightPen gave me the ability to read the newspapers again. Having it read to me without effort was really wonderful!"  - Ida Fedeli , 74, retiree from Rome

Features


Technical specifications


Software for Win/Mac/Android

TheRightPen connects to any of your other devices that run on Windows, OS X or Android. It will register itself as a keyboard device, so the text input is completely handled by the factory drivers - no need to install anything! TRP will input the scanned text to any program that will take textual input (MS Office, notepad...) as if it was coming from a (REALLY fast) keyboard. We will supply you with our own software for fast reading training, which you can see in action in the video above.


"Even if OCR is now an established technology, TheRightPen sets new standards" - HDblog

Where YOU come in

TheRightPen has already been extensively tested and has reached production stage. We have sourced all previous funding for R&D, prototyping and testing from our own money - what you see in our videos is a finished, working device in real-world situations. We are offering you a feature-complete package. This campaign is a way for us to gauge the interest of the global market for TheRightPen and try to achieve higher economies of scale in our manufacturing process, which would enable us to improve TheRightPen even further. You, will receive your product no matter what! Regardless of the final sum that we manage to raise, you will have your very own TheRightPen in your hands and on time.


Perks and Packages

TheRightPen makes for an excellent productivity tool. This time-saving, headache-avoiding little wonder can easily get you away from a tedious chore into enjoying your newly found free time, as well as help you out in many stressful situations. TheRightPen does what we think all technology should do - it empowers you to actually take command of your life and do the things that matter to you most.Ordering one for yourself will make you deal with text and translation-related work up to 400% faster, compared to manual labour. Ordering two or more -  for that special someone, for your family and friends or your office team, will make you a hero in both their eyes and ours!

We have devised several perk levels for you to choose from, depending on how benevolent and generous you feel.






Referral program

Keep in mind that we track referrals - what this means for you is that when five of your friends follow through and order TheRightPen from a link you sent them, you are liable for a FREE additional device, sent to you completely without charge together with the ones you ordered. Ten referrals will net you two, and so on and so forth.

Join our cause and

  • Be one of the first people to utilize this incredible tool. Play it cool and grab one just for yourself, or be a darling and make someone else’s life easier as well

  • Be safe in the knowledge that any improvements we are working hard to implement during the campaign period (thinner case, improved CPU, more colors etc.) will be yours

  • Make your voice heard: we are very responsive and look forward to meeting as many of you, so write to us with your questions and opinions both here and on info@therightlifestyle.it and we’ll make sure to get back to you ASAP

Production and Shipment stages

  • February/March: Make lots of new Indiegogo friends, execute manufacturing agreements/standards.

  • First Half of April: Ordering and assembling.

  • Second Half of April: Storing and preparing for shipment!

Risks & Challenges

The initial technological challenges are all behind us - we have a finished product in our (and select few other) hands as I write this. The Chinese typography recognition proved a fun challenge in its time, but we’re good to go and all we need now is the actual number of preorders. You will get what you have seen in our feature videos and nothing less. We are happy to offer a 30-day money-back guarantee on all our devices, should you be in any way dissatisfied with your purchase.
story_txt:

How tedious is it to use online word-for-word translation services, especially for non-digitized text? What if it’s in Russian or Japanese? Will you use an on-screen keyboard or character map for every letter? 
Let’s get even more profound and down-to-earth: what if your grandpa can’t read his newspapers this morning because he forgot to take his glasses with him to the park, or has eyesight issues?
Chances are you’re a regular Joe like us. Chances are you and the people you care about have been in situations like these many times over. story:
Thunder Thighs: Anti Chub Rub Scrub

Both my girlfriend and I have grown up in hot climates and know the pain that being a big girl during summer can be. Raw, itchy red skin can happen to anyone and everyone who moves but take comfort, chafe sufferers! Our Anti Chub Rub Scrub can help keep your skin protected. 

A huge part of staying fresh is combating friction.  If you have parts of your body that touch/rub together our scrub can help keep you pain-free year round. At the end of your shower or bath, scoop a generous amount of the sugar scrub into hands and massage into skin, buffing in a circular motion. The oil blend will help create a skin barrier to protect against irritation where skin to skin contact occurs. 

Why IndieGoGo?

We value our customers and want to make as unique a product as you. Great scents, vibrant colors and a product that works are only the foundation of the company we would like to build. To do this we want you to invest in us by not only helping launch out company but also get a great product out of it. 

Start-up costs include:

  • Insurance. 
  • Fragrance oils: in order to make the unique scents we love, we need oils, and they need to have great scent throw, staying power and are safe for the skin.
  • Organic and Fair Trade Ingredients: We strive to make our products as sustainable and ethically as possible. This means you will never find microbeads in our scrubs. 
  • Packaging and printing.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you don't buy now, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Like and Follow us on facebook at Thunder Thighs. 
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
WHO IS BEHIND BENERGY?

We are a young and enthusiastic team on a mission to make healthy behaviours fun through the use of gaming techniques. Our background is in gaming, nursing, art and app development. Benergy is our branchild and the app that brings all this knowlege together. 

To build Benergy we created a smart universe full of characters that are unique, just like us. Each one has a different goal regarding his or her own health, each one has a different background and history, and what suits one character may not suit another.

In this universe, you’re invited to go on a journey that will motivate you into building a healthier lifestyle without burning yourself out with crazy diets or buying expensive gadgets.

HOW DO I GET STARTED?

​

 

WHAT WILL I FIND INSIDE BENERGY?

Benergy is based on gamification and engagement design. It uses deep psychology techniques of motivation and willpower to deliver challenges that will boost your energy. It works like this:

You tell us very little about your habits so that Benergy knows your starting point.

The app develops a Journey for you that focuses on food, exercise, sleep, bowels, mindset and your physical environment. The Journey is made of small steps with scientific information delivered in video, audio, infographic and comics formats for ease of consumption. Each step in the Journey closes with a challenge to help you start building your new habits.

 

  • Your daily challenge may be surprising and funny actions that tackle your relationship with others, food habits, fitness efforts, peace of mind, work-life balance and even your physical environment, like the set-up of your desk or the lights in your bedroom.​
  • You track 4 basic wellbeing variables: mood, food, exercise and bowels. Simple and useful. If Benergy finds something abnormal, depending on its seriousness, you’ll be advised to follow a home remedy or see your doctor.

​

 
  • You check your progress with the help of the weekly charts.​
  • You also have access to extra bits that offer specific advice on one-off or temporary issues, such as getting over jet-lag or dealing with stressful situations, like a jet-lag situation or the nerves of an important meeting.

And, finally, you like Benergy so much that you share it with friends or give it as a gift to your loved ones :)

 

HOW DO I BENEFIT FROM BENERGY?

  • You’ll deconstruct myths about health and wellbeing with science-based information.
  • You’ll feel motivated rather than forced to do your best.
  • If there is a history of chronic diseases in your family, you’ll start to act upon it - before it happens to you.
  • Everyone is different, and Benergy understands that. You’ll feel respected in your singularities and find an answer that suits you.
  • You’ll achieve a better version of yourself!
  • You’ll contribute to the advancement of the digital health field, which is, well, the future!

​

 

WHAT AM I BACKING WITH THIS CAMPAIGN?

We’re crowdfunding because we want to spread our message. Benergy will be released in English and Spanish, and we have planned a worldwide release in March 2017, but we need more fuel to reach a broader audience. We’re a small startup with a highly motivated team, but we need more marketing resources to spread our message far and wide.

What does Benergy ask and deliver?

Benergy has 19 free steps for everyone that wishes to use it, and all the other dozens of steps along the journey are unlocked through subscription. It is great fun and also super useful, and we’d like you to be an early subscriber. You can also get one of our super cute and exclusive branded items, designed by our talented art team. Even better, you can actually to become a character in this exciting adventure to self-improvement!

 

TIMELINE

MEET THE TEAM

PlayBenefit was founded by Anna Sort (a nurse) and Jordi Muñoz (an engagement design expert) in Barcelona. They brought together a multidisciplinary team made of health, design, web development and marketing professionals to create Benergy.

PASS IT ON

If you know someone in need of a more energetic or healthier lifestyle, don´t hesitate: share this campaign! Help us make health fun.

story:
Invention

BackBaller my Invention, was born from a background in competitive athletics and an enduring period of back pain after rupturing the disc between L5 & S1 vertebrae. Following a grueling search for a sustainable & safe relief I found that the answer lay within us via self-myofascial release. I felt compelled to design a product that facilitated SMR of the back with greater effect than regular rollers. I knocked up a crude prototype using a wooden frame to mount 2 make shift rollers, it fixed me permanently after a short period of consistent use. I became completely free of pain, I lost weight & returned to a reasonable state of health. I commercialized my invention and now countless others have got the same results https://www.backballer.com/backballer-foam-roll...  so now its time to roll BackBaller all over the world.

 
I'm not alone, lower back pain is an injury of epidemic proportions and unfortunately may are turning to a massive but dangerous industry that has sprung up, administering epidural steroid injections for back pain. This is not a solution as they will only relieve pain for maximum of three months & the long-term consequences are quite alarming.
 
 

Going Beyond Back Pain

BackBaller delivers a complete body release if the accompanying 20 Min. program is followed. It's a rigorous massage tool that brings unprecedented Control & Stability to self-myofascial release & has quickly become the go too foam roller for many of the world's elite athletes including Laura Muir, Roger Federer & Mo Farah.

 

What We Need!

We seek $60,000 funding from this campaign, this will enable us to bring BackBaller globally in a cost efficient manner. Your support here will make that a reality and help many who suffer injury by creating awareness of the product & making it affordable for people to order & to get efficient delivery via Amazon's fulfillment program.

 

Your Impact

BackBaller provides a healthy alternative, its hard work, it requires commitment to use regularly and a degree of core strength but after every single use muscular tension is released and pain/injury lessened. 
 
I've traveled the road of invention & getting products to market for 16 years now, (Bricky - A wall building tool was my first and today we sell it all over the world). New products are met with skepticism and can take many many years to prove themselves. This is our first venture where we seek crowd funding but feel compelled as this product must be shown to the world. Its simple yet provides a practical solution to a massive health problem.
 
Irregardless, should we reach our goal or not, every piece of funding raised will have an impact, every journey is a process of steps and they all count no matter if big or small. Every backing will help bring a truly great product into the world.
 
 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you're not is a position to fund, it doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Please help us get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools, tags any friend you know who suffer back pain or are involved in competitive sport!
​

story:
we are a team of six dedicated people from different fields with one vision. our team incorporates a neurosurgeon, a Cardiovascular Surgeon, a geologist, an athlete and a designer. our different backgrounds and potentials were fused in reflexology. From our belief that health comes first, and that the busy daily life routine drifts people away from giving sufficient attention to their health; hence came our Reflexocks idea.

The idea of smart socks that triggers certain organs in the body and reliefs the pain from the feet, which are a widely ignored organ, is the final outcome of months of brainstorming and trying. our idea of combining reflexology within socks came from our vision of practicality and providing an easy solution with zero time, energy or money waste. How we wish to bring this project to life and be able to walk relaxed, while maintaining a healthy stand is how much we wish for you to bring this project to life, and obtain a pair for yourselves.

 

 

 

These amount of money you will help with will be spent on:

1- Socks Sewing machines

2- Fabrics and raw materials.

3- workforces to create large quantities.

4- Motors and cables.

5- Renting.

6- Miscellaneous.

This project means everything for us, as we believe in the value of it, and so far we have overcome many technical difficulties. Your support at this stage is crucial to bring it to life.

we are a team of six dedicated people from different fields with one vision. our team incorporates a neurosurgeon, a Cardiovascular Surgeon, a geologist, an athlete and a designer. our different backgrounds and potentials were fused in reflexology. From our belief that health comes first, and that the busy daily life routine drifts people away from giving sufficient attention to their health; hence came our Reflexocks idea.

The idea of smart socks that triggers certain organs in the body and reliefs the pain from the feet, which are a widely ignored organ, is the final outcome of months of brainstorming and trying. our idea of combining reflexology within socks came from our vision of practicality and providing an easy solution with zero time, energy or money waste. How we wish to bring this project to life and be able to walk relaxed, while maintaining a healthy stand is how much we wish for you to bring this project to life, and obtain a pair for yourselves.

 


 

 
These amount of money you will help with will be spent on:
1- Socks Sewing machines
2- Fabrics and raw materials.
3- workforces to create large quantities.
4- Motors and cables.
5- Renting.
6- Miscellaneous.
This project means everything for us, as we believe in the value of it, and so far we have overcome many technical difficulties. Your support at this stage is crucial to bring it to life.

story:
The Facts

People are working more and more and spending less time taking care of their bodies. Society has made the unnatural LED screen their second nature.  According to Nielsen Insights, people aged 18 and older spend on average 11 hours a day staring at an LED screen. That's nearly 170 days worth of eye strain you experience year after year. For some people those effects can be debilitating. The OCULI wearable is here to help.

 

The Features 

The OCULI wearable is able to run a combination of different modes to help alleviate all of your symptoms and puts you into a new state of relaxation. The features include:

  • Acupressure System - This mode simulates a kneading massage around your eye's        acupoint muscles by safely using our innovative air massage system. This mode will help massage those headaches away.
  • Air Pressure Compression - This mode uses air pressure, creating a safe compression on your face. Compression of course is known help soothe your muscles.
  • Heating System - The built in heating system simulates a hot towel. This mode, in combination with the kneading massage is the most beneficial. Like a hot towel, this mode helps alleviate conditions and symptoms like eye tiredness/soreness, dry eyes, red eyes, inflammation, Meibomian gland dysfunction,  blepharitis, and more.
  • High Frequency Vibration - The high frequency mode can be added to any mode you're already using. It is a component that will leave you feeling new and refreshed.
  • Music Therapy - There is built in music to help complement your massage, and there is even an option to upload your own. 
  • Cleanliness - The OCULI comes with a washable protectant that protects the massager's soft lining for those who want to share or have sensitive/oily skin.
  • Unplugged - Our built in rechargable battery is capable of providing hours of relaxation.
  • Traveling - The OCULI wearable is foldable and comes with a carrying pouch for those long travel trips.

All in all, the team here at iVIZEN is sure you will be 100% satisfied with our product, and we stand behind all our products with a 1 year warranty.

 

The Funding

Designs are mostly finalized, we just lack funding for the initial mass manufacturing costs including the mold injections. We need your help! We are so confident in you and our own capabilities that we will offer FREE shipping and a 100% refund on any unreceived products. 

 

Make sure to visit us at www.ivizen.com

Follow us on Intagram @i.Vizen

Follow us on Facebook www.facebook.com/lVIZEN/

story:
Everybody loves shrimp....but what's Shrimp Oil?

The average North American does not get enough omega-3 and antioxidants in their diet. Supplementing your diet with natural health products such as shrimp oil can help boost overall health and vitality. Shrimp oil is a superior natural health product compared to traditional sources of omega-3 such as krill oil and fish oil:

  • SUSTAINABLY SOURCED. Shrimp oil is made from the leftover shell of sustainably sourced North Atlantic shrimp whereas most krill and fish are not sustainably sourced. 
  • 10X MORE ANTIOXIDANT POWER. Shrimp oil has over 10 times more of the most powerful antioxidant called astaxanthin, compared to krill oil and fish oil (fish oil has none), therefore providing even more health benefits.
  • SUPERIOR NUTRIENT ABSORPTION. Shrimp oil contains phospholipid omega-3s which have been proven to absorb 2.5 times better in the body for maximum health benefits, compared to traditional fish oil omega-3 which are not in phospholipid form (they usually come in triglyceride or ethyl ester form which have poor absorption).
  • MEDICAL DOCTOR FORMULATED. Our products are formulated by our CEO, Dr. Marvin Heuer who is a Medical Doctor and formulator of natural health products for over 25 years. Our products combine the unique benefits of shrimp oil with sustainably sourced premium grade fish oil and krill oil in order to deliver maximum health benefits from all those ingredients.
  • HEART, BRAIN, JOINT, MUSCLE & FITNESS, EYE, SKIN and IMMUNE HEALTH. The combination of omega-3s, phospholipids and astaxanthin in shrimp oil provide numerous health benefits beyond those offered by traditional fish oil and krill oil.

 

Unfortunately most people do not know what shrimp oil is, therefore we must market and educate consumers about the health and environmental benefits of shrimp oil. We have begun developing our social media platform through Facebook and Instagram to educate consumers, run TV and YouTube videos to educate consumers, and magazine/newspaper advertorials to educate consumers.

You can support our mission to produce the highest quality products from the most innovative sustainable sources, by purchasing our products and liking & sharing our page.

 

Where does shrimp oil come from?

Shrimp oil is made from the LEFTOVER SHELLS from shrimp processors in Newfoundland, Canada. The shrimp are originally caught in a SUSTAINABLE CERTIFIED fishery in the North Atlantic Ocean.  Once caught in the ocean, the shrimp are brought to on-shore processors who cook & peel the shrimp, sell the meat and discard the shell waste in landfills. This has been standard practice for decades. 

In this video from the popular Discovery Channel Show, "Coldwater Cowboys", you will get a glimpse of how the North Atlantic Shrimp are caught by Newfoundland fishermen:

 

Here's where Pure Polar Labs changes the course of history. We now take the shells from the processors before they are discarded and produce the shrimp oil. It's hard to imagine that there is oil in the shells. In fact the oil is less than 1% of the shells, but is highly nutritious (you'll learn more about shrimp oil's health benefits further below). 

We are just getting started on this journey to better your health and the health of our oceans. With your support, we believe that eventually we can convert 100% of all the shrimp shells from Newfoundland into shrimp oil products. Together we can ensure that over 10% of the total omega-3 market will be from SUSTAINABLE SHRIMP OIL.

 

This is a great story of how together we can use all of our resources including waste resources to make great products to benefit both people and the environment.

 

Our current brands: Pure Polar, Joint AX and Sport AX

 

For more information visit purepolarlabs.com

 

Here are some reviews from happy Pure Polar Shrimp Oil customers:

SATISFIED 1ST TIME CUSTOMER (Bob McPherson on Apr 07, 2017)

As a 60-year old former hockey player with several knee issues over the years and a weight problem to boot, I suffer from severe knee pain and have for the last year. My left knee has felt like a knife was imbedded in it. By starting a regular routine of taking the Pure Polar product, my knee pain has been reduced to the point where I can start to take long walks and not limp or experience long-standing periods of sharp pain. I believe that this product will enable me to battle the weight issue I have more effectively and continue to make all my joint problems a thing of the past. Thanks to Pure Polar and to Lou for the recommendation.

SINGER (Madison Watkins on Mar 16, 2017)

I am a singer who is on the road a lot. These pills have controlled my adrenals, allowed me to have more energy, and have made my body overall healthier. I am so grateful for these!

NO MORE KNEE PAIN (Mark Ross on Mar 15, 2017)

I just started running again after a long hiatus. I was afraid to start due to knee pain. I started running and started taking Polar on a recommendation from a friend. After a VERY short time - no more knee pain. Nothing - NADA. I feel 20 years younger.

NO MORE JOINT PAIN (Jim Hall on Mar 02, 2017)

I have suffered for years with a sore right shoulder joint. It is no longer painful and the only change is I have taken Pure Polar 2 pills per day for 3 months.

A BRILLIANT SUPPLEMENT FOR A HEALTHIER LIFE (M A, MD on Feb 18, 2017)

The amount of stress we place on our bodies during the course of lives is immense.
We can all make due with a product that can help us revitalize. It has been clinically demonstrated that omega fatty acids can help improve our cholesterol levels, and thereby save us from experiencing debilitating diseases such as myocardial infarctions [commonly known as heart attacks] and cerebrovascular accidents [commonly known as strokes]. It can help improve mood by providing us with the adequate nutrtion that keep our nervous system intact. It can also help boost our immune systems.
As a physician I would recommend Pure Polar to anyone looking to improve their health.

HIGHER ENERGY LEVEL (Jeff Nielson on Jan 20, 2017)

I have a number of chronic health issues, and as a result, health supplements are an important part of my health maintenance regimen. When I heard about Pure Polar, and the purported benefits of astaxanthin, I decided that I had to give this new product a try.

I'm glad I did! Almost from the first day that I started taking Pure Polar shrimp oil I noticed an increase in my energy level. I've only been consuming shrimp oil supplements for about a week, and am very hopeful of noticing additional improvements in my overall health with continued use.

I LOVE THIS PRODUCT (Christine on Nov 19, 2016)

I have been taking these Omega supplements for many months now. I enjoy their health benefits. I no longer have back aches and find I have a lot more energy as well. I am a new life long client.

GREAT RESULTS! (Greg Aubry on Oct 18, 2016)

Unfortunately I suffer from a medical condition that causes swelling of my feet and extreme pain in my knees. Some attacts last a day while others last a week. The severity ranges from limping to being totally bedridden. My Dr. suggested adding Omega 3 and after research I found Pure Polar Double Strength.
I have been taking 2 pills daily for about a year and double the dosage if I start to feel swelling. Have not used a cane or crutches since I started .
Personally I think this is a wonder drug and I tell friends to try it for a month. Everyone who does swears by it.
As a side note this is the first time I have every written a review so sorry it was so long.

MY ANKLES DON'T ACH ANY MORE (William Curry on Oct 15, 2016)

I’m 68 and have been suffering for years with aching ankles after every round of golf or after playing tennis or taking long walks. A friend recommended Pure Polar and I have been taking it for about 3 months instead of my normal vitamins and energy supplements. It must be the reason why my muscles and ankles don’t ache after sports. Glad I found this product and my wife is finding the same success for her shoulders and arms. (She recently beat me in badminton. Not pleased about this.)

The statements on this webpage have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. These products are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

story:
Who is HANGONATOR?

There are four owners, we are all professionals ranging in age 25 to 50.  Erik and Jason Davila brothers who are successful product development specialists and manufacturers with 25 years of experience. Neff Torres is sales manager and our CEO, Ron Harris is a business veteran with 20 years experience launching products and solutions, both domestically and internationally.  

We have known each other for about 10 years, we all drink, we all have families and two of us have children attending university.  We have worked together in different capacities over the years, however in recent years HANGONATOR has become our common passion.

About three years ago we decided to use our resources in the science community to find a way to increase our personal productivity by removing the word hangover from our vocabulary.  Ironically we now talk about hangovers more than ever, the difference is now we are talking about helping you with yours.

Please meet our hangover terminator the HANGONATOR!

Please Let Neff Explain?

About the HANGONATOR Patch!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

HANGONATOR Blocks Causes of a Hangover

Most scientists believe that a hangover is driven by alcohol interfering with your body's natural balance of chemicals in a complex way. One hypothesis is that in order to process alcohol, your body must convert the enzyme NAD+ into an alternate form, NADH. With an excess buildup of NADH and insufficient quantities of NAD+, the thinking goes, your cells are no longer capable of efficiently performing a number of metabolic activities, everything from absorbing glucose from the blood to regulating electrolyte levels. But this hypothesis, has been contradicted by data: In studies, people with severe hangovers weren't found to have lower levels of electrolytes or glucose in their blood.

The simplest and most familiar explanation is that drinking alcohol cause’s dehydration, both because it acts as a diuretic, increasing urine production, and because people who are drinking heavily for multiple hours probably aren't drinking much water during that time period. But studies examining the link between dehydration and hangovers have turned up some surprising data. One, for instance, found no correlation between high levels of the hormones associated with dehydration and the severity of a hangover. It's most likely that dehydration accounts for some of the symptoms of a hangover (dizziness, lightheadedness and thirst) but there are other factors at work as well.

The most compelling theory, is that hangovers result from a buildup of acetaldehyde, a toxic compound, in the body. As the body processes alcohol, acetaldehyde is the very first byproduct, and it's estimated to be between 10 and 30 times as toxic as alcohol itself. In controlled studies, it's been found to cause symptoms such as sweating, skin flushing, nausea and vomiting.

Hangovers could also be driven by the way alcohol affects your immune system. Studies have found strong correlations between high levels of cytokines (molecules that the immune system uses for signaling) and hangover symptoms. Normally, the body might use cytokines to trigger a fever of inflammatory response to battle an infection, but it seems that excessive alcohol consumption can also provoke cytokine release, leading to symptoms like muscle aches, fatigue, headache or nausea, as well as cognitive effects like memory loss or irritation.

What this shows is; alcohol stops the healthy exchange of information between cells, contributing to hangover symptoms.

HANGONATOR keeps your body in balance and functioning as normal.​

How does the HANGONATOR work?

Terminates Hangover Symptoms.

HANGONATOR, kills most hangover symptoms before they start, programming your cells to keep the body in balance and functioning as normal.

The technology blocks the signs and symptoms of a hangover, those that generally start to occur when your blood alcohol drops considerably.

HANGONATOR stops the symptoms that typically happen in the morning after a night of high alcohol consumption, including:

  • accelerated heartbeat
  • anxiety
  • bloodshot eyes
  • body and muscle aches
  • diarrhea
  • dizziness
  • halitosis (bad breath)
  • headache
  • hypersalivation
  • flatulence
  • lethargy, tiredness, fatigue, listlessness
  • nausea
  • photophobia (sensitivity to light)
  • problems focusing or concentrating
  • sensitivity to loud sounds
  • depression (dysphoria)
  • irritability
  • moodiness
  • stomachache
  • thirst
  • trembling or shakiness, erratic motor functions
  • vomiting

What are Real People Saying?

 

I drink almost every weekend, I’ve tried many so called hangover remedies, and nothing worked like the HANGONATOR.  –Tim Small, Long Beach, CA—

I travel all around Latin America on business, I want to make the HANGONATOR my travel buddy.  –Jose Hernandez, Miami, FL—

 

 

I spread the word with people I meet at parties and night clubs, it’s actually a great conversation opener.  –Terry Hollis, Riverside CA—

I’m a waitress at a bar, when I hear customers talking about hangovers, I immediately tell them about the HANGONATOR.  —Emily Watson, Las Vegas, NV—
 

 

I’m a pretty big drinker, I tried a few supplements and none had any effect, the people from HANGANATOR were in a club I went to, got a patch for free now I want more. —Ferguson Jennings, Santa Ana, CA—

It’s crazy, I walked into a bar one night and a friend put one on my back, I could use a patch every weekend.  Where can I get more?  —Samantha Ward, Woodland Hills, CA—

Why Are We On Indiegogo?

We have been working on the HANGONATOR for nearly 3 years, investing our time and salaries on research and development. Over the past year we have crashed parties, invaded night clubs, attended events and given out thousands of patches.  We've followed up with and interviewed 100s of participants, all in an effort to test and perfect the product. Our activities have proven over and over that the HANGONATOR works, it eliminates the symptoms of hangovers. 

During the last six months we have confirmed relationships with all of our vendors, including 3M.  We have done industry studies, and we all know how big this market is. We've communicated with multiple retailers, we've traveled around the world, created relationships with international alcohol resellers and developed international sales and marketing strategies. Last week we hosted a webinar, spoke to entrepreneurs, international resellers, nightclub owners, hospitality industry and alcohol retailers who have tested the product, they were all impressed with the results and are ready to purchase quanities.

We are ready to place our first volume order and launch HANGONATOR to the public.  We need to raise $110,000 to order, receive a container of the product and ship patches to backers, resellers and customers.  The container will allow us to develop a relationship with you, our backers, we will fill thousands of orders and it will fund our next container.

If we happen to fall short of our goal, we will ship orders to the backers who contributed as we believe the word of mouth from that alone, will give us the demand we need to continue on.

We are providing an opportunity here for you to help us bring this valuable product to the public, by getting your own supply at a huge discount.  So if you drink and you want to reduce the impact of hangovers in your life, take advantage of one of our packages.

This product will help you keep your lifestyle and be more productive.

Backer Perks

 

 

 

 

LA Night Club Test No. 46

Launch Timeline

  • January 2015 began research
  • June 2015 met with 3M
  • December 2015 created prototypes
  • March 2016 tested on ourselves
  • June 2016 first production 2500 Patches
  • July 2016 began early beta tests
  • February 2017 Neff Torres Joins Team
  • March 2017 created the brand HANGONATOR
  • April 2017 confirmed our relationship with manufacturers
  • May 2017 second production run under HANGONATOR
  • June 2017 Started testing HANGONATOR in LA Night Clubs
  • July 2017 decided to use Indiegogo to raise funds
  • October 2017 launch Indiegogo Campaign
  • November 2017 order container of HANGONATOR
  • December 2017 begin ship orders to backers
  • January 2018 we will complete shipping Campaign orders
  • January 2018 we will order our 2nd container of HANGONATOR

The Team

It is Not Our Goal to Contribute to Alcohol Consumption,

A Mission to Improve the Lives of Those that Do Drink!

Statistics and information from experts around the world, send many mixed signals when it comes to drinking and your health. The truth is, all of this information means little in the real world, because hangovers have little to do with your overall health. 

According to the 2015 National Survey on Drug Use and Health (NSDUH), 86.4 percent of people ages 18 or older reported that they drank alcohol at some point in their lifetime; 70.1 percent reported that they drank in the past year; 56.0 percent reported that they drank in the past month. The numbers around the world are similar.

The real question is not do you drink?  We know the answer is probably yes. 

Assuming you do and hangovers are a concern. Wouldn't you want to be hangover free, especially if you could do it without side effects? 

Every other hangover remedy asks you to put something else in your body, a pill or some type of supplement, the HANGONATOR has no ingredients and there is  nothing to ingest.

So, in the real world, if you are off work leaving the office or in the middle of your weekend, there are 2 questions that really matter. 

1. Are you going to drink tonight?
2. Do you have to wake up early tomorrow?

There are times when the answer to both questions is yes. Your intention may be not to have more than one or two drinks, sometimes two can be more than enough, but there are those nights when the morning comes faster than you want. 

You can be sure that the HANGONATOR is seeking to block your hangover with relentless precision.

We do not promote alcohol consumption, whether or not you drink, it is your choice, we know this personal decision is out of our control, we are neutral and non judgmental when it comes the topic, we stress that everyone drinks responsibly.

Our mission is to help you minimize the effect of a hangover when you do.  

So become a backer and refer your friends or just refer your friends to us.  You can always help people that you know who may struggle with hangovers, and tell them about the HANGONATOR, they will be happy you did.

Your contribution will have an effect on the lives of people around the world, for years to come.

As Seen On!

story_txt:
Who is HANGONATOR?
There are four owners, we are all professionals ranging in age 25 to 50.  Erik and Jason Davila brothers who are successful product development specialists and manufacturers with 25 years of experience. Neff Torres is sales manager and our CEO, Ron Harris is a business veteran with 20 years experience launching products and solutions, both domestically and internationally.  
We have known each other for about 10 years, we all drink, we all have families and two of us have children attending university.  We have worked together in different capacities over the years, however in recent years HANGONATOR has become our common passion.
About three years ago we decided to use our resources in the science community to find a way to increase our personal productivity by removing the word hangover from our vocabulary.  Ironically we now talk about hangovers more than ever, the difference is now we are talking about helping you with yours.
Please meet our hangover terminator the HANGONATOR!


Please Let Neff Explain?




About the HANGONATOR Patch!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


HANGONATOR Blocks Causes of a Hangover
Most scientists believe that a hangover is driven by alcohol interfering with your body's natural balance of chemicals in a complex way. One hypothesis is that in order to process alcohol, your body must convert the enzyme NAD+ into an alternate form, NADH. With an excess buildup of NADH and insufficient quantities of NAD+, the thinking goes, your cells are no longer capable of efficiently performing a number of metabolic activities, everything from absorbing glucose from the blood to regulating electrolyte levels. But this hypothesis, has been contradicted by data: In studies, people with severe hangovers weren't found to have lower levels of electrolytes or glucose in their blood.
The simplest and most familiar explanation is that drinking alcohol cause’s dehydration, both because it acts as a diuretic, increasing urine production, and because people who are drinking heavily for multiple hours probably aren't drinking much water during that time period. But studies examining the link between dehydration and hangovers have turned up some surprising data. One, for instance, found no correlation between high levels of the hormones associated with dehydration and the severity of a hangover. It's most likely that dehydration accounts for some of the symptoms of a hangover (dizziness, lightheadedness and thirst) but there are other factors at work as well.
The most compelling theory, is that hangovers result from a buildup of acetaldehyde, a toxic compound, in the body. As the body processes alcohol, acetaldehyde is the very first byproduct, and it's estimated to be between 10 and 30 times as toxic as alcohol itself. In controlled studies, it's been found to cause symptoms such as sweating, skin flushing, nausea and vomiting.
Hangovers could also be driven by the way alcohol affects your immune system. Studies have found strong correlations between high levels of cytokines (molecules that the immune system uses for signaling) and hangover symptoms. Normally, the body might use cytokines to trigger a fever of inflammatory response to battle an infection, but it seems that excessive alcohol consumption can also provoke cytokine release, leading to symptoms like muscle aches, fatigue, headache or nausea, as well as cognitive effects like memory loss or irritation.
What this shows is; alcohol stops the healthy exchange of information between cells, contributing to hangover symptoms.
HANGONATOR keeps your body in balance and functioning as normal.​

How does the HANGONATOR work?


Terminates Hangover Symptoms.
HANGONATOR, kills most hangover symptoms before they start, programming your cells to keep the body in balance and functioning as normal.
The technology blocks the signs and symptoms of a hangover, those that generally start to occur when your blood alcohol drops considerably.HANGONATOR stops the symptoms that typically happen in the morning after a night of high alcohol consumption, including:

accelerated heartbeat
anxiety
bloodshot eyes
body and muscle aches
diarrhea
dizziness
halitosis (bad breath)
headache
hypersalivation
flatulence
lethargy, tiredness, fatigue, listlessness
nausea
photophobia (sensitivity to light)
problems focusing or concentrating
sensitivity to loud sounds
depression (dysphoria)
irritability
moodiness
stomachache
thirst
trembling or shakiness, erratic motor functions
vomiting


What are Real People Saying?



 

I drink almost every weekend, I’ve tried many so called hangover remedies, and nothing worked like the HANGONATOR.  –Tim Small, Long Beach, CA—

I travel all around Latin America on business, I want to make the HANGONATOR my travel buddy.  –Jose Hernandez, Miami, FL—
 

 
I spread the word with people I meet at parties and night clubs, it’s actually a great conversation opener.  –Terry Hollis, Riverside CA—
I’m a waitress at a bar, when I hear customers talking about hangovers, I immediately tell them about the HANGONATOR.  —Emily Watson, Las Vegas, NV— 

 
I’m a pretty big drinker, I tried a few supplements and none had any effect, the people from HANGANATOR were in a club I went to, got a patch for free now I want more. —Ferguson Jennings, Santa Ana, CA—
It’s crazy, I walked into a bar one night and a friend put one on my back, I could use a patch every weekend.  Where can I get more?  —Samantha Ward, Woodland Hills, CA—

Why Are We On Indiegogo?
We have been working on the HANGONATOR for nearly 3 years, investing our time and salaries on research and development. Over the past year we have crashed parties, invaded night clubs, attended events and given out thousands of patches.  We've followed up with and interviewed 100s of participants, all in an effort to test and perfect the product. Our activities have proven over and over that the HANGONATOR works, it eliminates the symptoms of hangovers. 
During the last six months we have confirmed relationships with all of our vendors, including 3M.  We have done industry studies, and we all know how big this market is. We've communicated with multiple retailers, we've traveled around the world, created relationships with international alcohol resellers and developed international sales and marketing strategies. Last week we hosted a webinar, spoke to entrepreneurs, international resellers, nightclub owners, hospitality industry and alcohol retailers who have tested the product, they were all impressed with the results and are ready to purchase quanities.
We are ready to place our first volume order and launch HANGONATOR to the public.  We need to raise $110,000 to order, receive a container of the product and ship patches to backers, resellers and customers.  The container will allow us to develop a relationship with you, our backers, we will fill thousands of orders and it will fund our next container.
If we happen to fall short of our goal, we will ship orders to the backers who contributed as we believe the word of mouth from that alone, will give us the demand we need to continue on.
We are providing an opportunity here for you to help us bring this valuable product to the public, by getting your own supply at a huge discount.  So if you drink and you want to reduce the impact of hangovers in your life, take advantage of one of our packages.
This product will help you keep your lifestyle and be more productive.

Backer Perks

 

 

 

 



LA Night Club Test No. 46




Launch Timeline

January 2015 began research
June 2015 met with 3M
December 2015 created prototypes
March 2016 tested on ourselves
June 2016 first production 2500 Patches
July 2016 began early beta tests
February 2017 Neff Torres Joins Team
March 2017 created the brand HANGONATOR
April 2017 confirmed our relationship with manufacturers
May 2017 second production run under HANGONATOR
June 2017 Started testing HANGONATOR in LA Night Clubs
July 2017 decided to use Indiegogo to raise funds
October 2017 launch Indiegogo Campaign
November 2017 order container of HANGONATOR
December 2017 begin ship orders to backers
January 2018 we will complete shipping Campaign orders
January 2018 we will order our 2nd container of HANGONATOR


The Team


It is Not Our Goal to Contribute to Alcohol Consumption,
A Mission to Improve the Lives of Those that Do Drink!

Statistics and information from experts around the world, send many mixed signals when it comes to drinking and your health. The truth is, all of this information means little in the real world, because hangovers have little to do with your overall health.  
According to the 2015 National Survey on Drug Use and Health (NSDUH), 86.4 percent of people ages 18 or older reported that they drank alcohol at some point in their lifetime; 70.1 percent reported that they drank in the past year; 56.0 percent reported that they drank in the past month. The numbers around the world are similar.
The real question is not do you drink?  We know the answer is probably yes. 
Assuming you do and hangovers are a concern. Wouldn't you want to be hangover free, especially if you could do it without side effects? 
Every other hangover remedy asks you to put something else in your body, a pill or some type of supplement, the HANGONATOR has no ingredients and there is  nothing to ingest.
So, in the real world, if you are off work leaving the office or in the middle of your weekend, there are 2 questions that really matter. 
1. Are you going to drink tonight?2. Do you have to wake up early tomorrow?
There are times when the answer to both questions is yes. Your intention may be not to have more than one or two drinks, sometimes two can be more than enough, but there are those nights when the morning comes faster than you want. 
You can be sure that the HANGONATOR is seeking to block your hangover with relentless precision.
We do not promote alcohol consumption, whether or not you drink, it is your choice, we know this personal decision is out of our control, we are neutral and non judgmental when it comes the topic, we stress that everyone drinks responsibly.
Our mission is to help you minimize the effect of a hangover when you do.  
So become a backer and refer your friends or just refer your friends to us.  You can always help people that you know who may struggle with hangovers, and tell them about the HANGONATOR, they will be happy you did.
Your contribution will have an effect on the lives of people around the world, for years to come.
