story:
This is about www.gmedicaltreatment.com an AI-powered search engine founded by ITBD Group, that offers all details about the best surgeons, treatments and accredited hospitals across the world, at one go. This can help any patient, suffering from any ailment, residing in any part of the world, receive barrier-free access to safe, affordable, high quality, medical treatments of his/her choice. It can be of immense benefit to patients in developing countries where advanced treatments are not available, and to uninsured patients in the developed countries, where medical treatments seem unaffordable.  

Global Medical Tourism established in September 2014, by The ITBD Group, an international healthcare business consultancy with a strong presence in India, Panama, Colombia, Costa Rica, Mexico, Brazil, Singapore, Thailand, and Malaysia. The online platform www.gmedicaltreatment.com was formed on September 2016, the main objectives of the project are:

  • To help people choose the right hospital, surgeon and treatment that matches their medical needs and budget
  • To help them receive best treatment advice & second opinion from any well-known doctor/specialist across the world, absolutely free
  • To enable patients to compare different treatment options and quotations from top facilities in the world, before they can make informed decisions about the treatments they wish to avail
  • To book appointments with doctors of their choice and avail treatments without wasting time. This is especially useful in critical cases such as organ transplant, cardiac, neurological and cancer treatments.

We make it possible for people to compare hospitals, check out doctor profiles, write to hospitals and set up video calls with healthcare professionals, to clarify their queries and take informed decisions about their treatments in a hassle-free manner.

Before setting-up the Global Medical Tourism project, in 2013-2014, an expert team from The ITBD Group visited a cross-section of medical facilities in India, Panama, Costa Rica, Mexico, Brazil, Singapore, Thailand, Malaysia and a few other developing countries. They were surprised to find that the standards of care in these countries were not just compatible, but at times, even better than those received by patients in the developed parts of the world. Indeed most of these hospitals were already receiving thousands of referred patients from USA, Canada, and UK and had set up separate departments to attend to them. 

The ITBD Group has strong tie-ups with all these establishments. The entire database is available on gmedicaltreatment.com.  

Product Stage

The gmedicaltreatment.com project is already up and running. It has a full repository of medical treatments offered by 500 registered hospitals across 30 different countries that can be searched with our intelligent, artificial-intelligence driven search engine.

Users can search for any treatment or diagnostic facility in any part of the world, write to hospitals, book appointments and talk to healthcare professionals through video conferencing, all in one click.

Project Overview

Global Medical Tourism strives to provide end-to-end assistance to patients by offering the following services in our online platform:

  • We recommend accredited, well-established surgeons based on their reputation in any specific medical procedure or treatment.
  • We forward your medical records to your chosen healthcare facility in confidence and let you know the approximate cost of your treatment so that you can prepare for your travel
  • We set up video calls with your chosen doctor/surgeon/healthcare facility to help get your queries clarified
  • We provide assistance with regard to visa formalities, flight tickets and hotel bookings to make your travel hassle-free. We make sure you are received at the airport and well-supported throughout your stay in the foreign country.
  • We can also arrange for an interpreter to help you discuss things with your doctor and negotiate with the hospital facilities in case you don’t understand the language.
  • We can also help you plan a recuperation trip once the medical treatment is completed, in case you wish to explore the country as a tourist.
  • We provide the required assistance with regard to post-discharge follow-up, both in the foreign country as well as your home country.

All these services offered was on a conventional way but with introducing gmedicaltreatment.com everything now performing in a digital way.

 

A Brief Introduction About the Founder

This project is the brainchild of Mahboobur Rahman, the founder president and CEO of Global Medical Tourism. Coming from the pharmaceutical industry, Mr. Rahman has an in-depth knowledge of the healthcare industry, across the world.

Having completed his Bachelor of Pharmacy, Masters of Pharmacy and a Post-Graduation in Brand Management from Canada, Rahman went on to earn his Masters in Business Administration (Marketing) from the United States of America. He has had extensive training in pharmaceuticals including “Pharmaceutical Practice” at the University of Arizona, University Medical Center; Marketing training on Ethical Pharmaceutical Products under International Medical Statistics (IMS Health).

With a rich work experience in the pharmaceutical industry, across organizations such as Eskayef Bangladesh Ltd, Taro Pharmaceuticals & Patheon Pharmaceuticals & Sobeys Pharmacy Group of Canada. Through his association with USA, Canada and Europe based consultancy firms, he has provided the necessary guidance and support for foreign Pharmaceutical Companies to build Pharmaceutical plants (as per US & UK GMP standards). He has devised excellent business strategies for them to tap into the markets of USA, Canada & Europe and promote their pharmaceutical products.

Apart from being a member of various pharmaceutical organizations, Mr. Rahman is also the Regional Head of Asia for Regulatory Affairs Associate (RAA), a USA-based regulatory consulting firm. After having launched Global Medical Tourism (gmedicaltreatment.com), Mr. Rahman is currently working on "Digital Healthcare for Bangladesh".

Directors

Mr. Ashis Dutta is also a leading business process consultant and trainer. He has co-authored a book on ERP software and has published research papers on User Experience Design at management conferences across the world. During his personal time, Ashis writes extensively on travel, music and culture. His articles are published in research and trade journals, magazines and newspapers in North America, Europe and Asia.

Dr. Sumona Maherun Nessa is Medical Graduate with extensive training and work experience in medical science and healthcare system.

Why this campaign?

An average American spends over $10,000 per year on his healthcare. He can save anywhere between 30% to 90% of this amount by availing his medical treatments abroad, especially in countries like Mexico, Brazil, Costa Rica, Turkey, Malaysia,  Singapore, South Korea, Thailand and India.

How?

Here are the details:

Savings on HealthCare by Availing Medical Treatments Abroad

Keeping US costs across a variety of treatments and procedures as a benchmark, the average range of savings one can expect for some of the most-traveled destinations in the world are:

Brazil

20 – 30%

Costa Rica

45 – 65%

India

65 – 90%

Malaysia

65 – 80%

Mexico

40 – 65%

Singapore

25 – 40%

South Korea

30 – 45%

Thailand

50 – 75%

Turkey

50 – 65%

 

The biggest driver for the medical tourism industry is the cost factor (30 to 90% cost savings on medical treatments). The following table gives a clearer picture by helping you compare the costs of medical treatments:

Some Startling Facts & Figures

  • Although health insurance is one thing Americans rely upon for the medical treatments, there are about 30 million Americans who are not insured.
  • 270 million Americans have to pay a major portion of their medical costs from their pockets, despite being insured. While some of these are on limited benefit medical plan, the others have restricted coverage because of pre-existing conditions.
  • 334 million North Americans who have been seeking cosmetic and dental surgeries are discouraged from availing treatments because they are highly expensive in their country.
  • 34 million Canadians have to wait for long periods even for common surgeries.

A platform like gmedicaltreatment.com gives easy access to affordable, safe and quality healthcare beyond linguistic, geographic, race and cost barriers. Patients from anywhere in the world can now choose any hospital based on their search on gmedicaltreatment.com site, create their health profiles, upload their health reports,  book appointments and do a lot more, with just one click.

 

The Requirement

A sum of $ 150,000 has already been invested into the development of the portal, gmedicaltreatment.com. This amount has been used to create the search engine that provides information about treatments and diagnostic facilities offered by 500 hospitals across 30 different countries. We intend to extend our network so as to include all top hospitals across the world.

We are presently short of just $10,000 more to hire a few experts who can fine-tune the system and market the whole concept to create awareness among patients and include a maximum number of hospitals in the network.

If 100 people can make a contribution of $100 each towards our system, the objective of providing access to safe, affordable and quality healthcare to everyone across the world, can be achieved successfully.

How Does It Work?

Almost every top hospital across the world would want to cater to international patients on a regular basis. Most top hospitals allocate about 15% to 25% of their budget for international marketing. By joining hands with gmedicaltreatment.com these hospitals can be saving up on their marketing expenses and get international patients on a regular basis.

In return, we negotiate with these hospitals to offer us a discount of 15% only. Out of this, 10% discount will be offered to the patients (users of gmedicaltreatment.com), 3% will be distributed among the group of Global Medical Tourism for administrative cost and 2% will be adjusted towards the system cost. So, if a patient who goes through gmedicaltreatment.com spends about $20,000 on his medical treatment, he will get a discount of $2,000.

Those who donate $100 through this campaign will be given the complete discount of 15%. So the savings they get on a treatment cost of $20,000 increase to $3,000.

Why Contribute?

By donating a mere $100 towards this campaign, you can help us achieve the following objectives:

  • Put an end to deaths that happen due to unavailability of medical treatments
  • Help more and more people afford quality medical treatments
  • Enable people to undergo elective/optional treatments that are not covered by their insurance policies
  • Create a one-window healthcare system that people from the entire world can benefit from
  • Make sure health choices are not left to chance outcomes, anymore

What’s In It For You?

The $100 that you contribute towards this campaign can get you a whopping 15% discount on your own medical treatments, which you can avail through gmedicaltreatment.com. This translates to a huge savings of $3,000 on a treatment that costs $20,000.

Also you will receive a nice T-shirt in your mailing address as a gift.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot contribute $100 towards this campaign, you can even contribute $50, $25 or $10. There are also other ways you can help.

You can share the campaign details on your social media page, email to your friends and spread to the word across. If anyone from your social media network makes the $100 and more contribution towards this campaign, Please report us or we will track and we will make sure your incentive in exchange for your support.

All Perks:

$500 and more: One-night free stay at 4 or 5-star hotel and 15 % discount on treatment if you take services through our portal and that is $3000 saving*

(Offer from selected hotels only)          (Qty – 5)

 

$ 100: 15 % discount on treatment if you take services through our portal and that is $3000 saving* and a T-shirt will be ship to your mailing address (Qty – 300)

$ 50: 10 % discount on treatment if you take services through our portal and that is $2000 saving* and a Hat will be ship to your mailing address     (Qty –100)

$ 25:- 10 % discount on treatment if you take services through our portal and that is $2000 saving*

 

 

 

 

 

 

$ 10: Thanks with e-card 

 

 

 

 

 

 

* We are assuming treatment cost is $ 20,000. Real saving will be calculated on the basis of your actual treatment cost. We don't own any hospitals, we just connect patients with right hospitals, as per their needs. You can donate us only if you believe our idea is good and we should succeed in our project development but you are not buying any product or services from us through this contribution but we are providing some gifts or rewards or trying to arrange discount for you if you take any treatment in any hospitals through our portal, in case any hospital disagree to give highest 15% discount, we will inform you that and we will try to give services to other hospital you prefer. 

The Worst Case Scenario

All that we are asking is a $100 contribution by 100 people or any other contribution we mentioned in our parks. However, in case we are unable to collect this $10,000 or even $5000 through this campaign, we will still keep working towards achieving our objectives. It might only take a little longer.

That said, we sincerely believe that a campaign as noble as this deserves success.

The Impact

Making this world healthy is not something that is in our hands. But through this platform, we can definitely make sure people can get access to safe, affordable and quality medical treatments whenever they are in need, irrespective of where they are.

  • Not being able to afford medical treatments will not be the cause of death anymore, with this campaign becoming successful
  • Not having health insurance or adequate coverage will no longer discourage people from availing critical or for that matter even elective or optional treatments
  • Traveling to other countries for medical treatments becomes easier, convenient and hassle-free. For instance, a patient from Asia (Bangladesh) or Africa (Ethiopia) can easily avail medical treatments at India, Thailand or Malaysia if those treatments are not available or affordable in their country.
  • No longer would people, especially Canadian patients, have to wait for long periods to get their surgeries done. They can get them done at Singapore, Thailand or Mexico without wasting any time.
  • Patients from USA can enjoy huge savings on their treatments by availing them in other countries.
story_txt:
This is about www.gmedicaltreatment.com an AI-powered search engine founded by ITBD Group, that offers all details about the best surgeons, treatments and accredited hospitals across the world, at one go. This can help any patient, suffering from any ailment, residing in any part of the world, receive barrier-free access to safe, affordable, high quality, medical treatments of his/her choice. It can be of immense benefit to patients in developing countries where advanced treatments are not available, and to uninsured patients in the developed countries, where medical treatments seem unaffordable.  Global Medical Tourism established in September 2014, by The ITBD Group, an international healthcare business consultancy with a strong presence in India, Panama, Colombia, Costa Rica, Mexico, Brazil, Singapore, Thailand, and Malaysia. The online platform www.gmedicaltreatment.com was formed on September 2016, the main objectives of the project are:
To help people choose the right hospital, surgeon and treatment that matches their medical needs and budget
To help them receive best treatment advice & second opinion from any well-known doctor/specialist across the world, absolutely free
To enable patients to compare different treatment options and quotations from top facilities in the world, before they can make informed decisions about the treatments they wish to avail
To book appointments with doctors of their choice and avail treatments without wasting time. This is especially useful in critical cases such as organ transplant, cardiac, neurological and cancer treatments.
We make it possible for people to compare hospitals, check out doctor profiles, write to hospitals and set up video calls with healthcare professionals, to clarify their queries and take informed decisions about their treatments in a hassle-free manner.Before setting-up the Global Medical Tourism project, in 2013-2014, an expert team from The ITBD Group visited a cross-section of medical facilities in India, Panama, Costa Rica, Mexico, Brazil, Singapore, Thailand, Malaysia and a few other developing countries. They were surprised to find that the standards of care in these countries were not just compatible, but at times, even better than those received by patients in the developed parts of the world. Indeed most of these hospitals were already receiving thousands of referred patients from USA, Canada, and UK and had set up separate departments to attend to them. The ITBD Group has strong tie-ups with all these establishments. The entire database is available on gmedicaltreatment.com.  Product StageThe gmedicaltreatment.com project is already up and running. It has a full repository of medical treatments offered by 500 registered hospitals across 30 different countries that can be searched with our intelligent, artificial-intelligence driven search engine.Users can search for any treatment or diagnostic facility in any part of the world, write to hospitals, book appointments and talk to healthcare professionals through video conferencing, all in one click.Project OverviewGlobal Medical Tourism strives to provide end-to-end assistance to patients by offering the following services in our online platform:We recommend accredited, well-established surgeons based on their reputation in any specific medical procedure or treatment.
We forward your medical records to your chosen healthcare facility in confidence and let you know the approximate cost of your treatment so that you can prepare for your travel
We set up video calls with your chosen doctor/surgeon/healthcare facility to help get your queries clarified
We provide assistance with regard to visa formalities, flight tickets and hotel bookings to make your travel hassle-free. We make sure you are received at the airport and well-supported throughout your stay in the foreign country.
We can also arrange for an interpreter to help you discuss things with your doctor and negotiate with the hospital facilities in case you don’t understand the language.
We can also help you plan a recuperation trip once the medical treatment is completed, in case you wish to explore the country as a tourist.
We provide the required assistance with regard to post-discharge follow-up, both in the foreign country as well as your home country.
All these services offered was on a conventional way but with introducing gmedicaltreatment.com everything now performing in a digital way. A Brief Introduction About the FounderThis project is the brainchild of Mahboobur Rahman, the founder president and CEO of Global Medical Tourism. Coming from the pharmaceutical industry, Mr. Rahman has an in-depth knowledge of the healthcare industry, across the world.Having completed his Bachelor of Pharmacy, Masters of Pharmacy and a Post-Graduation in Brand Management from Canada, Rahman went on to earn his Masters in Business Administration (Marketing) from the United States of America. He has had extensive training in pharmaceuticals including “Pharmaceutical Practice” at the University of Arizona, University Medical Center; Marketing training on Ethical Pharmaceutical Products under International Medical Statistics (IMS Health).With a rich work experience in the pharmaceutical industry, across organizations such as Eskayef Bangladesh Ltd, Taro Pharmaceuticals & Patheon Pharmaceuticals & Sobeys Pharmacy Group of Canada. Through his association with USA, Canada and Europe based consultancy firms, he has provided the necessary guidance and support for foreign Pharmaceutical Companies to build Pharmaceutical plants (as per US & UK GMP standards). He has devised excellent business strategies for them to tap into the markets of USA, Canada & Europe and promote their pharmaceutical products.Apart from being a member of various pharmaceutical organizations, Mr. Rahman is also the Regional Head of Asia for Regulatory Affairs Associate (RAA), a USA-based regulatory consulting firm. After having launched Global Medical Tourism (gmedicaltreatment.com), Mr. Rahman is currently working on "Digital Healthcare for Bangladesh".Directors Mr. Ashis Dutta is also a leading business process consultant and trainer. He has co-authored a book on ERP software and has published research papers on User Experience Design at management conferences across the world. During his personal time, Ashis writes extensively on travel, music and culture. His articles are published in research and trade journals, magazines and newspapers in North America, Europe and Asia.Dr. Sumona Maherun Nessa is Medical Graduate with extensive training and work experience in medical science and healthcare system.Why this campaign?An average American spends over $10,000 per year on his healthcare. He can save anywhere between 30% to 90% of this amount by availing his medical treatments abroad, especially in countries like Mexico, Brazil, Costa Rica, Turkey, Malaysia,  Singapore, South Korea, Thailand and India.How?Here are the details:

Savings on HealthCare by Availing Medical Treatments Abroad
Keeping US costs across a variety of treatments and procedures as a benchmark, the average range of savings one can expect for some of the most-traveled destinations in the world are:


Brazil
20 – 30%


Costa Rica
45 – 65%


India
65 – 90%


Malaysia
65 – 80%


Mexico
40 – 65%


Singapore
25 – 40%


South Korea
30 – 45%


Thailand
50 – 75%


Turkey
50 – 65%

 The biggest driver for the medical tourism industry is the cost factor (30 to 90% cost savings on medical treatments). The following table gives a clearer picture by helping you compare the costs of medical treatments:

*all figures in US DollarsSome Startling Facts & Figures
Although health insurance is one thing Americans rely upon for the medical treatments, there are about 30 million Americans who are not insured.
270 million Americans have to pay a major portion of their medical costs from their pockets, despite being insured. While some of these are on limited benefit medical plan, the others have restricted coverage because of pre-existing conditions.
334 million North Americans who have been seeking cosmetic and dental surgeries are discouraged from availing treatments because they are highly expensive in their country.
34 million Canadians have to wait for long periods even for common surgeries.
A platform like gmedicaltreatment.com gives easy access to affordable, safe and quality healthcare beyond linguistic, geographic, race and cost barriers. Patients from anywhere in the world can now choose any hospital based on their search on gmedicaltreatment.com site, create their health profiles, upload their health reports,  book appointments and do a lot more, with just one click. The RequirementA sum of $ 150,000 has already been invested into the development of the portal, gmedicaltreatment.com. This amount has been used to create the search engine that provides information about treatments and diagnostic facilities offered by 500 hospitals across 30 different countries. We intend to extend our network so as to include all top hospitals across the world.We are presently short of just $10,000 more to hire a few experts who can fine-tune the system and market the whole concept to create awareness among patients and include a maximum number of hospitals in the network.If 100 people can make a contribution of $100 each towards our system, the objective of providing access to safe, affordable and quality healthcare to everyone across the world, can be achieved successfully.How Does It Work?Almost every top hospital across the world would want to cater to international patients on a regular basis. Most top hospitals allocate about 15% to 25% of their budget for international marketing. By joining hands with gmedicaltreatment.com these hospitals can be saving up on their marketing expenses and get international patients on a regular basis.In return, we negotiate with these hospitals to offer us a discount of 15% only. Out of this, 10% discount will be offered to the patients (users of gmedicaltreatment.com), 3% will be distributed among the group of Global Medical Tourism for administrative cost and 2% will be adjusted towards the system cost. So, if a patient who goes through gmedicaltreatment.com spends about $20,000 on his medical treatment, he will get a discount of $2,000.Those who donate $100 through this campaign will be given the complete discount of 15%. So the savings they get on a treatment cost of $20,000 increase to $3,000.Why Contribute?By donating a mere $100 towards this campaign, you can help us achieve the following objectives:
Put an end to deaths that happen due to unavailability of medical treatments
Help more and more people afford quality medical treatments
Enable people to undergo elective/optional treatments that are not covered by their insurance policies
Create a one-window healthcare system that people from the entire world can benefit from
Make sure health choices are not left to chance outcomes, anymore
What’s In It For You? The $100 that you contribute towards this campaign can get you a whopping 15% discount on your own medical treatments, which you can avail through gmedicaltreatment.com. This translates to a huge savings of $3,000 on a treatment that costs $20,000.Also you will receive a nice T-shirt in your mailing address as a gift.Other Ways You Can HelpIf you cannot contribute $100 towards this campaign, you can even contribute $50, $25 or $10. There are also other ways you can help.You can share the campaign details on your social media page, email to your friends and spread to the word across. If anyone from your social media network makes the $100 and more contribution towards this campaign, Please report us or we will track and we will make sure your incentive in exchange for your support.All Perks:$500 and more: One-night free stay at 4 or 5-star hotel and 15 % discount on treatment if you take services through our portal and that is $3000 saving*(Offer from selected hotels only)          (Qty – 5) $ 100: 15 % discount on treatment if you take services through our portal and that is $3000 saving* and a T-shirt will be ship to your mailing address (Qty – 300)$ 50: 10 % discount on treatment if you take services through our portal and that is $2000 saving* and a Hat will be ship to your mailing address     (Qty –100)$ 25:- 10 % discount on treatment if you take services through our portal and that is $2000 saving*      $ 10: Thanks with e-card       * We are assuming treatment cost is $ 20,000. Real saving will be calculated on the basis of your actual treatment cost. We don't own any hospitals, we just connect patients with right hospitals, as per their needs. You can donate us only if you believe our idea is good and we should succeed in our project development but you are not buying any product or services from us through this contribution but we are providing some gifts or rewards or trying to arrange discount for you if you take any treatment in any hospitals through our portal, in case any hospital disagree to give highest 15% discount, we will inform you that and we will try to give services to other hospital you prefer. The Worst Case ScenarioAll that we are asking is a $100 contribution by 100 people or any other contribution we mentioned in our parks. However, in case we are unable to collect this $10,000 or even $5000 through this campaign, we will still keep working towards achieving our objectives. It might only take a little longer.That said, we sincerely believe that a campaign as noble as this deserves success.The ImpactMaking this world healthy is not something that is in our hands. But through this platform, we can definitely make sure people can get access to safe, affordable and quality medical treatments whenever they are in need, irrespective of where they are.
Not being able to afford medical treatments will not be the cause of death anymore, with this campaign becoming successful
Not having health insurance or adequate coverage will no longer discourage people from availing critical or for that matter even elective or optional treatments
Traveling to other countries for medical treatments becomes easier, convenient and hassle-free. For instance, a patient from Asia (Bangladesh) or Africa (Ethiopia) can easily avail medical treatments at India, Thailand or Malaysia if those treatments are not available or affordable in their country.
No longer would people, especially Canadian patients, have to wait for long periods to get their surgeries done. They can get them done at Singapore, Thailand or Mexico without wasting any time.
Patients from USA can enjoy huge savings on their treatments by availing them in other countries.

story:
Why School Health?

Almost 37 million school going children in Pakistan are deprived of healthcare services at their schools. Hence, numerous illnesses are overlooked in the formative years. Clinic5 - School Health Initiative aims to combat this problem.

 

What We Do

Clinic5 - School Health Initiative is a program through which we partner with schools to provide a holistic healthcare program to their students. Our services include:

 

The ASK

Through your support we will be able to reach out to 80,000 children/year with good quality, affordable & sustainable primary healthcare services.

 

$25,000 

Crowdfunding To Build

 1 Medical Center

 

The amount we raise through this crowdfunding campaign will be supplemented by a generous contributor to our cause to raise a total  $75,000 to setup a total of 3 clinics.

 

Breakdown of the cost of one clinic:

CAPITAL COST

  • ($1500) Upfront Rent 3 months
  • ($1500) Security deposit 3 months
  • ($5000) Construction of a Clinic
  • ($2000) Medical Equipment

CAPITAL EXPENDITURE: $10,000

OPERATIONAL COST (One year)

  • ($6000) Rent
  • ($3600) Utilities
  • ($5400) Staff Salaries

OPERATIONAL EXPENDITURE: $15,000

 

TOTAL COST OF SETTING UP ONE CLINIC & RUNNING IT FOR ONE YEAR

$25,000

 

Clinic5 will sustain the clinic operational costs beyond the first year through subscriptions with schools. We already have partnerships to provide service to over 10,000 children.

 

The Impact

This is an opportunity to transform the way primary care is practiced in Pakistan by increasing access that focuses on quality and convenience. Research shows that schools with healthcare programs reduce absenteeism up to 20% (Online J Health Allied,2012) and their students' IQ results are higher by 5-6 points (School-Based Health and Nutrition Programs, Donald A.P. Bundy,Sheldon Shaeffer, et al.) when compared with student of schools that do not have a health program.

Pakistan has over 200,000 schools and more than 37 million children that go to school(Pakistan education statistics 2015-2016).

We aspire to service this large gap of healthcare provisioning with the belief that we:

Think Big, Start Small, Scale Fast  

ACT NOW

 

$1 will help us serve 3 children

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

There are many ways you can help if you cannot contribute to the campaign financially.

  1. Volunteer with us to educate school children with health sessions if you're a health professional
  2. Connect us to schools where you feel a school health program will be rolled out. Just a note there - all schools need it across the socioeconomic strata. You can connect us on email at mohsin.ali@clinic5.org 
  3. Help us get the word out about the crowdfunding campaign by sharing the campaign on social media

 

About Us

Clinic5 was established in December 2016 by two doctors who care deeply about the future of Pakistani children. The co-founders bring together years of experience in public health,emergency medicine and pediatrics. Through this venture they aim to realize their vision of transforming the healthcare system in Pakistan.

Dr Mohsin Ali Mustafa 

  • MBBS Aga Khan University - Class of 2012
  • Bernard Lown Scholar at the Harvard School of Public Health (2018)
  • Acumen Pakistan Fellow (2016)
  • Asia Society, Asia21 Young Leader (2015)
  • Dr Mohsin has worked at a non-profit organization in Pakistan, where he was involved in forming a public – private partnership with the Government of Sindh,  which aimed to provide ambulance coverage to a population of 20 million people across the province.

Dr Naseeruddin Mahmood

  • MBBS Aga Khan University - Class of 1988
  • Residency in Pediatrics - Hershey Medical Center (USA) American Board Certified,Fellowship in Neonatology - Canada,Practicing pediatrics in Pakistan and Canada
  • Founding trustee of Childlife Foundation - A non profit that treats over 1 million children/year in Karachi Pediatric ERs (Approximately 75% of pediatric cases in Karachi)
  • Trustee of SINA - A non-profit that treats over 0.5 million/year patients through 27 clinics in urban slum communities

The co-founders bring together years of clinical & public health experience in pediatrics  and the will to transform the lives of children in Pakistan.

story:
For English version please click here

 

Schluss mit Schwindel!

Schwindel – also die Wahrnehmung von Scheinbewegungen zwischen sich selbst und der Umwelt – ist keine Krankheit.

Schwindel ist ein Symptom, wegen dem rund 30 % aller Menschen einmal im Leben in Behandlung sind – viele von ihnen dauerhaft.

Schwindel ist das zweithäufigste Symptom in Arztpraxen – übertroffen nur von Schmerzen.

Unser Gleichgewichtssinn ist das Ergebnis eines äußerst komplexen Zusammenspiels verschiedener Sinne. Neben unserem Innenohr, sind auch unsere Augen und zahllose Lagerezeptoren in unseren Muskeln und Gelenken beteiligt. Die Ursache für Schwindel ist oftmals eine Störung des Gleichgewichtsorgans im Innenohr. Man spricht genauer vom vestibulären Schwindel. Er ist häufig chronisch, mit enormen Auswirkungen auf die Lebensqualität. Einfachste alltägliche Aktivitäten wie Fahrradfahren und Treppen steigen werden für Betroffene unmöglich.

EQUIFit bringt dich ins Gleichgewicht!

Glücklicherweise ist der vestibuläre Schwindel sehr gut behandelbar, denn das menschliche Gehirn ist extrem anpassungsfähig und kann den Ausfall des Gleichgewichtsorgans ausgleichen. Die Therapieform mit den besten Aussichten auf langfristigen Erfolg ist strukturiertes Gleichgewichtstraining, wodurch unser Gehirn lernt die Informationen wieder richtig zu verarbeiten. Wie jedes Training muss Gleichgewichtstraining jedoch dauerhaft durchgeführt werden und Erfolge stellen sich nur langsam ein.

Hier hilft EQUIFit – Dein persönlicher Gleichgewichtstrainer mit Biofeedback für Zuhause. 
Die Symptome klingen schneller ab,
die Trainingseinheiten können kürzer gehalten werden und
der Effekt ist langanhaltender – auch für Menschen die schon länger unter Schwindel leiden.

EQUIFit ist ein medizintechnisches Produkt im Format eines handelsüblichen Kopfhörers, kann jedoch viel mehr. 

Wie funktioniert das Biofeedback von EQUIFit?

Das Biofeedback über EQUIFit öffnet dem Anwender einen bewussten Zugang zur sonst unbewussten Verbindung von Gleichgewicht und Tiefensensibilität.

Die Tiefensensibilität ist eine komplexe Sinneswahrnehmung, mit der die Position und Bewegung unserer Gliedmaßen an das Gehirn übermittelt werden. Dadurch wissen wir beispielsweise wo unsere Füße unter dem Tisch stehen, auch wenn wir sie nicht sehen können.

EQUIFit erfasst durch seine Position direkt am Kopf die Informationen, die sonst unser Innenohr erfasst: Die relative Position des Kopfes und seine Bewegungen. Weicht der Anwender von der Gleichgewichtslage ab erhält er von EQUIFit ein akustisches Feedback und kann sich so gezielt wieder in die Gleichgewichtslage bringen.

Durch regelmäßiges Training lernt unsere Tiefenwahrnehmung diese Position zu bestimmen – der Schwindel verschwindet.

Warum EQUIFit?

Bisher existieren am Markt lediglich Geräte für den Einsatz in Kliniken und Arztpraxen, die wegen Anschaffungspreisen von weit über 5.000 Euro und ihrer komplizierten Bedienung für die Heimanwendung völlig ungeeignet sind.

EQUIFit ist das erste System für Schwindeltherapie und Gleichgewichtstraining, das konsequent mit dem Anwender im Blick entwickelt wurde. Als einziges System ist es sofort einsatzbereit. Die intuitive Gestensteuerung und der Audioguide (Deutsch, Englisch, Spanisch und Französisch) führen den Anwender durch Konfiguration und Training.

Entwickelt und getestet in Zusammenarbeit mit Fraunhofer IMS, Universität Duisburg-Essen und einem Netzwerk von Hals-Nasen-Ohren-Ärzten ermöglicht EQUIFit eine Therapie ohne Medikamente und nichtinvasiv.

Eine große Schwachstelle bestehender Systeme ist, dass diese Systeme kein Training mit geschlossenen Augen ermöglichen. Unsere Augen werden dann für unser Gleichgewicht unverzichtbar. Bei Dunkelheit oder wenn wir die Augen schließen, treten dann jedoch sofort wieder heftige Schwindelattacken auf.

EQUIFit löst dieses Problem über akustisches Biofeedback, denn unser Gehör ist von Natur aus eng an das Gleichgewichtssystem angebunden. Das akustische Feedback ist für unser Gehirn besonders leicht zu interpretieren. Durch das akustische Feedback von EQUIFit werden Reflexe trainiert und Betroffene reagieren wieder automatisch richtig.

EQUIFit passt sich dynamisch dem Trainingsfortschritt an und wählt jeweils den passenden Schwierigkeitsgrad aus – das Training ist so jederzeit sicher und effizient.

Das Herz von EQUIFit – die Elektronik – wurde komplett in Deutschland entwickelt und wird auch weiterhin hier produziert und montiert.

 

Historie

 

Wem hilft EQUIFit?

Schwindel betrifft viele Menschen jeden Alters. Dem wird die aktuelle Versorgungssituation jedoch nicht gerecht. Derzeit gibt es keine Möglichkeiten für Betroffene regelmäßig unter Anleitung ihr Gleichgewicht zu trainieren, da hierfür tägliche Besuche bei Ärzten oder Physiotherapeuten notwendig wären. Zudem verfügen nur wenige Ärzte über die notwendige technische Ausstattung, da diese extrem teuer ist.

Deshalb haben wir die Produktfamilie EQUIVert entwickelt: neben EQUIFit gehört dazu auch EQUIMedi. EQUIMedi hilft Ärzten mittels der Software EQUISoft ihre Diagnose auf eine objektive Grundlage zu stellen. Damit schaffen wir die Grundlage für bessere Diagnosen und eine passende Therapie für mehr Lebensqualität.

 

Warum brauchen wir deine Unterstützung?

Wir sind überzeugt von EQUIVert und unserer Mission Schwindelpatienten zu mehr Lebensqualität zu verhelfen. Deswegen arbeiten wir seit rund fünf Jahren daran EQUIFit und EQUIMedi auf den Markt zu bringen und sind dabei bereits sehr weit gekommen.

Die strengen Anforderungen des Medizinproduktegesetzes machen die Entwicklung allerdings sehr teuer. Wir mussten uns nicht nur aufwändig als Hersteller von Medizinprodukten zertifizieren lassen. Die hohen Hürden für Medizinprodukte sorgen auch dafür, dass wir keinen auf dem Markt befindlichen Kopfhörer einfach aufrüsten können. Viele Produkte genügen nicht den strengen Auflagen, die beispielsweise an die Schadstoffbelastung gestellt werden. Dazu kommt: sollte der Hersteller auch nur kleine Änderungen vornehmen erlischt unsere Zulassung.

Um EQUIFit auch in Zukunft zuverlässig anbieten zu können haben wir uns deshalb entschieden einen eigenen Kopfhörer zu entwickeln, der extra nach unseren Vorgaben produziert wird. Dies ist natürlich mit weiteren Kosten verbunden, da allein die Gussform (das sog. Serienwerkzeug) für die Kunststoffteile über 20.000 EUR kostet. 

Wir laden euch ein, mit uns den nächsten Schritt zu gehen. Mit eurer Unterstützung können wir endlich in die Serienproduktion gehen und zeigen, dass Schwindel kein Schicksal ist. Deshalb haben wir uns für ein flexibles Fundingziel entschieden. Jede Unterstützung zählt!

 

Was passiert mit eurem Geld bei erfolgreicher Finanzierung?

Nach erfolgreichem Abschluss der Kampagne können wir direkt in Serienproduktion gehen und bereits ab September 2018 mit der Auslieferung der ersten EQUIFit beginnen.

Wir planen mittelfristig neben dem Direktvertrieb weitere Vertriebspartnerschaften aufzubauen und weitere Funktionen zu implementieren.

Mit eurer Unterstützung können wir folgende weitere Schritte gemeinsam mit euch gehen:

 

Sichert euch jetzt euren EQUIFit!

 

Wer steht hinter dem Projekt?

Wir, die GED Gesellschaft für Elektronik und Design mbH, sind seit 1986 als Dienstleistungsunternehmen für Elektronik tätig. D.h. wir sind im Bereich Beratung und Entwicklung, CAD-Design und Leiterplatten-Layout sowie die Herstellung von elektr. Modulen und Geräten tätig. GED entwickelt, testet und produziert innovative Elektronik-Produkte für die Industrieelektronik und nun auch Medizintechnik.

Entwickelt in Zusammenarbeit mit

Fraunhofer-Institut für Mikroelektronische Schaltungen und Systeme
Universität Duisburg-Essen
HNOnet NRW

Risiken & Herausforderungen

Offenheit und Transparenz sind uns besonders wichtig. Daher möchten wir euch auf die folgenden möglichen Risiken und Herausforderungen unseres Projektes hinweisen.

  • Mögliche Verzögerungen im aktuell laufenden Zertifizierungsprozess
  • Qualitätssicherung der Zuliefererprodukte bei erstmaliger Serienfertigung
 

 

English Version

 

Stop vertigo!

Vertigo – the perception of apparent movement between oneself and the environment – is not a disease.

Vertigo is a symptom that causes around 30% of people to be treated once in a lifetime – many of them permanently.

Vertigo is the second most common symptom in medical practices – exceeded only by pain.

Our sense of balance is the result of an extremely complex interplay of different senses. In addition to our inner ear, our eyes and countless positional receptors in our muscles and joints are also involved. The cause of vertigo is often a disturbance of the balance organ in the inner ear. This is called vestibular vertigo. It is often chronic, with a huge impact on the quality of life. The simplest everyday activities such as cycling and climbing stairs become impossible for those affected.

EQUIFit – re-balance yourself!

Fortunately, vestibular vertigo is treatable, because the human brain is extremely adaptable and can compensate the loss of the balance organ. The form of therapy with the best prospects for long-term success is structured balance training, which teaches our brain to process the information correctly. However, like any workout, balance training must be done on a sustained basis and successes are slow.

This is where EQUIFit comes into play – EQUIFit is your personal balance trainer with biofeedback for the home use.

The symptoms disappear faster,
the workouts can be kept shorter and
the effect lasts longer – even for people who have already experienced vertigo for some time.

EQUIFit is a medical device in the format of a standard headphone, but can do much more.

How does EQUIFit's biofeedback work?

The biofeedback via EQUIFit gives the user conscious access to the otherwise unconscious combination of balance and depth sensitivity.

Deep sensitivity is a complex sensory perception that transmits the position and movement of our limbs to the brain. For example, we know where our feet are under the table, even though we cannot see them.

EQUIFit, through its position on the head, captures the information that is otherwise captured by our inner ear: the relative position of the head and its movements. If the user deviates from the equilibrium position, he receives an acoustic feedback from EQUIFit and can thus bring himself back into equilibrium position.

Through regular training our depth perception learns to determine this position – the vertigo disappears.

Why EQUIFit?

Up to now, only devices for use in clinics and medical practices exist on the market, which are completely unsuitable for home use because of high purchase prices over 5,000 euros and their complicated handling.

EQUIFit is the first system for vertigo therapy and balance training that has been consistently developed with the user in mind. It is the only system that can be used immediately. The intuitive gesture control and the audio guide – available in German, English, Spanish and French – guide the user through configuration and training.

Developed and tested in collaboration with Fraunhofer IMS, the University of Duisburg-Essen and a network of ENT doctors, EQUIFit enables a non-pharmaceutical and non-invasive therapy.

A major weakness of existing systems is that these systems do not allow training with eyes closed. Our eyes then become indispensable for our balance. In the dark or when we close our eyes, violent attacks of vertigo occur immediately.

EQUIFit solves this problem through acoustic biofeedback. Because our hearing is naturally linked closely with the balance system the acoustic feedback is particularly easy to interpret for our brain. The acoustic feedback of EQUIFit correlates directly with the false posture thus reflexes are trained and affected persons react correctly again automatically.

EQUIFit adapts dynamically to the training progress and selects the appropriate level of difficulty – the training is always safe and efficient.

The heart of EQUIFit – the electronics – was completely developed in Germany and will also be produced and assembled here.

 

Development history

 

Whom does EQUIFit help?

Vertigo affects many people of all ages. However, this is not reflected in the current treatment supply situation. Currently, there are no opportunities for sufferers to regularly exercise under guidance, as this would require daily visits to doctors or physiotherapists. In addition, only a few doctors have the necessary technical equipment, as this is extremely expensive.

That is why we have developed the EQUIVert product family: in addition to EQUIFit, this also includes EQUIMedi. EQUIMedi helps physicians to put their diagnosis on an objective basis using the included EQUISoft software. This creates the basis for better diagnoses and suitable therapy for a better quality of life for all.

 

Why do we need your support?

We are convinced of EQUIFit and our mission to help vertigo patients achieve a better quality of life. That is why we have been working on bringing EQUIFit and EQUIMedi to the market for almost ten years, and we have come a long way.

The strict requirements of the German Medical Devices Act make new developments very expensive. Not only we have been required to be certified painstakingly as a manufacturer of medical devices. The high hurdles for medical devices also have ensured that we could not simply upgrade any headphones available on the market. Many products for example, even those of renown manufacturers, do not meet the strict low-pollution-requirements. In addition: should a manufacturer make even small changes our approval expires.

In order to be able to offer EQUIFit reliably in the future, we have decided to develop our own headphones, which are produced according to our specifications. Of course, this is associated with further costs, since only the mold (the so-called series tool) for the plastic parts comes with a price tag well over 20,000 EUR. 

We invite you to take the next step with us. With your support, we can finally go into serial production and show that vertigo is not a fate. That is why we decided on a flexible funding target. Every support counts!

 

What happens to your money when the campaign is successful?

After the successful crowdfunding campaign we can start serial production and begin shipping the first EQUIFits from September 2018.

In the medium term, we plan to set up further distribution partnerships in addition to direct sales and to implement additional functions.

With your support, we can tackle the following additional steps with you:

 

Get your EQUIFit now!

 

Who is behind the project?

We, the GED Gesellschaft für Elektronik und Design mbH in Germany, have been active as a service company for electronics since 1986. So far we have specialized in consulting and development, CAD design and PCB layout as well as the manufacturing of electronic modules and devices. GED develops, tests and produces innovative electronic products for industrial electronics and now medical technology.

Developed in cooperation with

Fraunhofer Institute for Microelectronic Circuits and Systems
​Universität Duisburg-Essen
HNOnet NRW

Risks & Challenges

Openness and transparency are particularly important to us. Therefore, we would like to draw your attention to the following possible risks and challenges of our project.

  • Possible delays in the currently ongoing last stages of the certification process
  • Quality assurance of supplier products on initial serial production

German Version
story_txt:
For English version please click here
 
Schluss mit Schwindel!
Schwindel – also die Wahrnehmung von Scheinbewegungen zwischen sich selbst und der Umwelt – ist keine Krankheit.
Schwindel ist ein Symptom, wegen dem rund 30 % aller Menschen einmal im Leben in Behandlung sind – viele von ihnen dauerhaft.
Schwindel ist das zweithäufigste Symptom in Arztpraxen – übertroffen nur von Schmerzen.
Unser Gleichgewichtssinn ist das Ergebnis eines äußerst komplexen Zusammenspiels verschiedener Sinne. Neben unserem Innenohr, sind auch unsere Augen und zahllose Lagerezeptoren in unseren Muskeln und Gelenken beteiligt. Die Ursache für Schwindel ist oftmals eine Störung des Gleichgewichtsorgans im Innenohr. Man spricht genauer vom vestibulären Schwindel. Er ist häufig chronisch, mit enormen Auswirkungen auf die Lebensqualität. Einfachste alltägliche Aktivitäten wie Fahrradfahren und Treppen steigen werden für Betroffene unmöglich.

EQUIFit bringt dich ins Gleichgewicht!
Glücklicherweise ist der vestibuläre Schwindel sehr gut behandelbar, denn das menschliche Gehirn ist extrem anpassungsfähig und kann den Ausfall des Gleichgewichtsorgans ausgleichen. Die Therapieform mit den besten Aussichten auf langfristigen Erfolg ist strukturiertes Gleichgewichtstraining, wodurch unser Gehirn lernt die Informationen wieder richtig zu verarbeiten. Wie jedes Training muss Gleichgewichtstraining jedoch dauerhaft durchgeführt werden und Erfolge stellen sich nur langsam ein.
Hier hilft EQUIFit – Dein persönlicher Gleichgewichtstrainer mit Biofeedback für Zuhause. Die Symptome klingen schneller ab,die Trainingseinheiten können kürzer gehalten werden undder Effekt ist langanhaltender – auch für Menschen die schon länger unter Schwindel leiden.
EQUIFit ist ein medizintechnisches Produkt im Format eines handelsüblichen Kopfhörers, kann jedoch viel mehr. 

Wie funktioniert das Biofeedback von EQUIFit?
Das Biofeedback über EQUIFit öffnet dem Anwender einen bewussten Zugang zur sonst unbewussten Verbindung von Gleichgewicht und Tiefensensibilität.
Die Tiefensensibilität ist eine komplexe Sinneswahrnehmung, mit der die Position und Bewegung unserer Gliedmaßen an das Gehirn übermittelt werden. Dadurch wissen wir beispielsweise wo unsere Füße unter dem Tisch stehen, auch wenn wir sie nicht sehen können.
EQUIFit erfasst durch seine Position direkt am Kopf die Informationen, die sonst unser Innenohr erfasst: Die relative Position des Kopfes und seine Bewegungen. Weicht der Anwender von der Gleichgewichtslage ab erhält er von EQUIFit ein akustisches Feedback und kann sich so gezielt wieder in die Gleichgewichtslage bringen.
Durch regelmäßiges Training lernt unsere Tiefenwahrnehmung diese Position zu bestimmen – der Schwindel verschwindet.

Warum EQUIFit?
Bisher existieren am Markt lediglich Geräte für den Einsatz in Kliniken und Arztpraxen, die wegen Anschaffungspreisen von weit über 5.000 Euro und ihrer komplizierten Bedienung für die Heimanwendung völlig ungeeignet sind.
EQUIFit ist das erste System für Schwindeltherapie und Gleichgewichtstraining, das konsequent mit dem Anwender im Blick entwickelt wurde. Als einziges System ist es sofort einsatzbereit. Die intuitive Gestensteuerung und der Audioguide (Deutsch, Englisch, Spanisch und Französisch) führen den Anwender durch Konfiguration und Training.
Entwickelt und getestet in Zusammenarbeit mit Fraunhofer IMS, Universität Duisburg-Essen und einem Netzwerk von Hals-Nasen-Ohren-Ärzten ermöglicht EQUIFit eine Therapie ohne Medikamente und nichtinvasiv.
Eine große Schwachstelle bestehender Systeme ist, dass diese Systeme kein Training mit geschlossenen Augen ermöglichen. Unsere Augen werden dann für unser Gleichgewicht unverzichtbar. Bei Dunkelheit oder wenn wir die Augen schließen, treten dann jedoch sofort wieder heftige Schwindelattacken auf.
EQUIFit löst dieses Problem über akustisches Biofeedback, denn unser Gehör ist von Natur aus eng an das Gleichgewichtssystem angebunden. Das akustische Feedback ist für unser Gehirn besonders leicht zu interpretieren. Durch das akustische Feedback von EQUIFit werden Reflexe trainiert und Betroffene reagieren wieder automatisch richtig.
EQUIFit passt sich dynamisch dem Trainingsfortschritt an und wählt jeweils den passenden Schwierigkeitsgrad aus – das Training ist so jederzeit sicher und effizient.
Das Herz von EQUIFit – die Elektronik – wurde komplett in Deutschland entwickelt und wird auch weiterhin hier produziert und montiert.
 
Historie

 
Wem hilft EQUIFit?
Schwindel betrifft viele Menschen jeden Alters. Dem wird die aktuelle Versorgungssituation jedoch nicht gerecht. Derzeit gibt es keine Möglichkeiten für Betroffene regelmäßig unter Anleitung ihr Gleichgewicht zu trainieren, da hierfür tägliche Besuche bei Ärzten oder Physiotherapeuten notwendig wären. Zudem verfügen nur wenige Ärzte über die notwendige technische Ausstattung, da diese extrem teuer ist.
Deshalb haben wir die Produktfamilie EQUIVert entwickelt: neben EQUIFit gehört dazu auch EQUIMedi. EQUIMedi hilft Ärzten mittels der Software EQUISoft ihre Diagnose auf eine objektive Grundlage zu stellen. Damit schaffen wir die Grundlage für bessere Diagnosen und eine passende Therapie für mehr Lebensqualität.

 
Warum brauchen wir deine Unterstützung?
Wir sind überzeugt von EQUIVert und unserer Mission Schwindelpatienten zu mehr Lebensqualität zu verhelfen. Deswegen arbeiten wir seit rund fünf Jahren daran EQUIFit und EQUIMedi auf den Markt zu bringen und sind dabei bereits sehr weit gekommen.
Die strengen Anforderungen des Medizinproduktegesetzes machen die Entwicklung allerdings sehr teuer. Wir mussten uns nicht nur aufwändig als Hersteller von Medizinprodukten zertifizieren lassen. Die hohen Hürden für Medizinprodukte sorgen auch dafür, dass wir keinen auf dem Markt befindlichen Kopfhörer einfach aufrüsten können. Viele Produkte genügen nicht den strengen Auflagen, die beispielsweise an die Schadstoffbelastung gestellt werden. Dazu kommt: sollte der Hersteller auch nur kleine Änderungen vornehmen erlischt unsere Zulassung.
Um EQUIFit auch in Zukunft zuverlässig anbieten zu können haben wir uns deshalb entschieden einen eigenen Kopfhörer zu entwickeln, der extra nach unseren Vorgaben produziert wird. Dies ist natürlich mit weiteren Kosten verbunden, da allein die Gussform (das sog. Serienwerkzeug) für die Kunststoffteile über 20.000 EUR kostet. 
Wir laden euch ein, mit uns den nächsten Schritt zu gehen. Mit eurer Unterstützung können wir endlich in die Serienproduktion gehen und zeigen, dass Schwindel kein Schicksal ist. Deshalb haben wir uns für ein flexibles Fundingziel entschieden. Jede Unterstützung zählt!
 
Was passiert mit eurem Geld bei erfolgreicher Finanzierung?
Nach erfolgreichem Abschluss der Kampagne können wir direkt in Serienproduktion gehen und bereits ab September 2018 mit der Auslieferung der ersten EQUIFit beginnen.
Wir planen mittelfristig neben dem Direktvertrieb weitere Vertriebspartnerschaften aufzubauen und weitere Funktionen zu implementieren.
Mit eurer Unterstützung können wir folgende weitere Schritte gemeinsam mit euch gehen:

 
Sichert euch jetzt euren EQUIFit!

 
Wer steht hinter dem Projekt?
Wir, die GED Gesellschaft für Elektronik und Design mbH, sind seit 1986 als Dienstleistungsunternehmen für Elektronik tätig. D.h. wir sind im Bereich Beratung und Entwicklung, CAD-Design und Leiterplatten-Layout sowie die Herstellung von elektr. Modulen und Geräten tätig. GED entwickelt, testet und produziert innovative Elektronik-Produkte für die Industrieelektronik und nun auch Medizintechnik.


Entwickelt in Zusammenarbeit mit
Fraunhofer-Institut für Mikroelektronische Schaltungen und SystemeUniversität Duisburg-EssenHNOnet NRW

Risiken & Herausforderungen
Offenheit und Transparenz sind uns besonders wichtig. Daher möchten wir euch auf die folgenden möglichen Risiken und Herausforderungen unseres Projektes hinweisen.

Mögliche Verzögerungen im aktuell laufenden Zertifizierungsprozess
Qualitätssicherung der Zuliefererprodukte bei erstmaliger Serienfertigung

story:
The possibilities are endless and now within your reach.

Whether you are looking for a study aid, to help protect precious memories, a morning energy booster to have you charging into a productive day, or just something for you to regain control over occasional nervousness, uneasy feeling and stress.

Unique ayurvedic formulations, working in multiple bio-pathways to optimize a wide array of cognitive functions— for whole-life mental performance.

COGNISANCE PREP

AID IN UNLOCKING A CHILD'S TRUE POTENTIAL

(Prep is suitable for children age 9-15)

 

Prep supports mood, focus and concentration levels, motivation to work/study, while lowering nervousness and agitation levels.

Helping children not only to level the playing field, but stack the odds in their favor during those crucial early years to win the game of life.

Contains neuro-protective ingredients proven to help with clarity of thought, reduce irritability, distracting thoughts, nervousness and agitation while increasing energy level, confidence and alertness.

 

 

COGNISANCE N'HANCE

BOOST PRODUCTIVITY & UNLEASH ONE'S TRUE POTENTIAL

(Suitable for adults age 16-54)

 

Student: Supports studying, learning, attention, storage and recall, all while strengthening the mind’s resistance to stress.

Professionals: Helps boost work performance & productivity, focus, multitasking under stress, creative problem-solving and more.

Athletes:  N'Hance boosts performance from the weight room right up to game time, promoting brain chemistry for motivation, willpower & intensity.

 

The goal is to not only increase mental energy and overall alertness, but to support other important functions of brain as well. 

Packed full of high quality ingredients that can help with focus issues, bring clarity and aid those who struggle with productivity, distractions, occasional nervousness, uneasy feeling or occasional memory lapse.

COGNISANCE SAGE

DOES MORE THAN JUST PROTECTING PRECIOUS MEMORIES

Helps seniors to rediscover their independence & make age nothing but a number.

(Suitable for seniors age 55 and above)

 

Everyone has memory blips from time to time. As one get older, these kinds of slip-ups may happen more often. One don’t have to resign himself to memory loss or reduced mental faculty.

It is the ultimate Quality of Life formula for seniors seeking extra support for memory, verbal communication, mood and mental clarity. 

Scientifically formulated to promote the feeling of youthful vitality, mental wellness and the confidence that aging is not holding them back.

 

GENUINE UNADULTERATED INGREDIENTS

  • Research-backed brain-boosting ingredients
  • High-potency, clinical-range dosages
  • All dosages shown; no prop blends
  • Safe, clean, legal & effective
  • Third-party tested & validated
  • No additives of any kind
  • Premium vegetable capsules

Our products are formulated in-house to our exacting standards. Quality ingredients are also sourced in-house ensuring the highest level of sustainable efficacy. Finally, products will be manufactured in Singapore accordance with GMP (Good Manufacturing Practice) and are US-FDA and SG-HSA  compliant.

WHAT GOT US STARTED

    JJ Lim, our CEO, has had quite a life in various executive positions in several multi-national corporations and running his own ventures. 

    His personal experiences with family & friends struggling with mental fatigue, memory lapses, low energy levels and dependence on antidepressant prescription drugs led him to venture into natural alternatives to address mental lag.

    Together with Vincent & Papatsra, who shared the same experiences, more so with students and young executives too mentally drained to function and have a family life, they set out to develop COGNISANCE.

    Cognisance Sciences was formed to address the shifting the focus towards cognitive health with the aim to combat brain aging, realise optimum potential for our brains and physical performance alike.

    At COGNISANCE, we believe that everyone deserves better cognisance.

    We couldn’t have created Cognisance without the help and support of friends and family. From the bottom of our hearts, we’d like to thank our friends, family, and supporters such as yourself for helping us get to this point. In particular, a big thanks to friends who had willingly tried out our products with no questions asked and giving us valuable feedback. We couldn’t have done it without you all!

    Like what you're seeing but aren’t quite ready to pledge? Want to help us? Just few seconds of your time can make a huge difference. Hit the share button below and to tag a friend or co-worker who needs this!

     

    Refer as many friends as you can and you stand to receive the following rewards.

    To understand how to participate in our referral rewards, please click on the link below

    https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles...

    Why should I back it now?

    • Take advantage of our discount available on Indiegogo. Our retail price will become USD$75 per bottle once Indiegogo campaign is completed in October.
    • Be among the first in the world to get a comprehensive solution to a healthy brain, sharper memory and higher concentration levels!

     

    Where are you in your launch effort?

    • We are ready for production and your support in this Indiegogo campaign will help us launch sooner. We believe in fair pricing and through this crowdfunding campaign we hope to give more people a chance to try us out. 

     

    Where can I find additional information about the products?

    Please kindly refer to the respective links below. Information are also available in Chinese, Spanishand Thai languages.

    • Prep - http://cognisance.life/en/pages/products/health...
    • N'Hance - http://cognisance.life/en/pages/products/health...
    • Sage -  http://cognisance.life/en/pages/products/health...

     

    Where are the products manufactured?

    • The products will be manufactured in Singapore, in accordance with GMP (Good Manufacturing Practice).

     

    Is any of the products FDA approved?

    • Prep, N'Hance and Sage are dietary supplements, and are HSA (Singapore) & FDA (USA) compliant. This means that the ingredients used are considered safe within the HSA (Singapore) & FDA (USA) monograph system. Additionally, every step of the ingredients sourcing, testing, and manufacturing complies with the requirements set forth in the HSA (Singapore) & FDA (USA) regulations.

     

    Are the products available internationally?

    • Yes! We are currently charging a flat rate of USD$5 to US$10 for international shipping during the Indiegogo campaign.

     

    How do I contact you for more questions?

    • Email cs@cognisance.life or message us on Facebook.

     

    Can I order in bulk or be a distributor?

    • Yes. Please email us  cs@cognisance.life

but to support other important functions of brain as well. Packed full of high quality ingredients that can help with focus issues, bring clarity and aid those who struggle with productivity, distractions, occasional nervousness, uneasy feeling or occasional memory lapse.COGNISANCE SAGEDOES MORE THAN JUST PROTECTING PRECIOUS MEMORIESHelps seniors to rediscover their independence & make age nothing but a number.(Suitable for seniors age 55 and above) Everyone has memory blips from time to time. As one get older, these kinds of slip-ups may happen more often. One don’t have to resign himself to memory loss or reduced mental faculty.It is the ultimate Quality of Life formula for seniors seeking extra support for memory, verbal communication, mood and mental clarity. Scientifically formulated to promote the feeling of youthful vitality, mental wellness and the confidence that aging is not holding them back. GENUINE UNADULTERATED INGREDIENTS
Research-backed brain-boosting ingredients
High-potency, clinical-range dosages
All dosages shown; no prop blends
Safe, clean, legal & effective
Third-party tested & validated
No additives of any kind
Premium vegetable capsules
Our products are formulated in-house to our exacting standards. Quality ingredients are also sourced in-house ensuring the highest level of sustainable efficacy. Finally, products will be manufactured in Singapore accordance with GMP (Good Manufacturing Practice) and are US-FDA and SG-HSA  compliant.WHAT GOT US STARTEDJJ Lim, our CEO, has had quite a life in various executive positions in several multi-national corporations and running his own ventures. His personal experiences with family & friends struggling with mental fatigue, memory lapses, low energy levels and dependence on antidepressant prescription drugs led him to venture into natural alternatives to address mental lag.Together with Vincent & Papatsra, who shared the same experiences, more so with students and young executives too mentally drained to function and have a family life, they set out to develop COGNISANCE.Cognisance Sciences was formed to address the shifting the focus towards cognitive health with the aim to combat brain aging, realise optimum potential for our brains and physical performance alike.At COGNISANCE, we believe that everyone deserves better cognisance.We couldn’t have created Cognisance without the help and support of friends and family. From the bottom of our hearts, we’d like to thank our friends, family, and supporters such as yourself for helping us get to this point. In particular, a big thanks to friends who had willingly tried out our products with no questions asked and giving us valuable feedback. We couldn’t have done it without you all!Like what you're seeing but aren’t quite ready to pledge? Want to help us? Just few seconds of your time can make a huge difference. Hit the share button below and to tag a friend or co-worker who needs this! Refer as many friends as you can and you stand to receive the following rewards.To understand how to participate in our referral rewards, please click on the link belowhttps://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles...Why should I back it now?
Take advantage of our discount available on Indiegogo. Our retail price will become USD$75 per bottle once Indiegogo campaign is completed in October.
Be among the first in the world to get a comprehensive solution to a healthy brain, sharper memory and higher concentration levels!
 Where are you in your launch effort?We are ready for production and your support in this Indiegogo campaign will help us launch sooner. We believe in fair pricing and through this crowdfunding campaign we hope to give more people a chance to try us out.  Where can I find additional information about the products?Please kindly refer to the respective links below. Information are also available in Chinese, Spanishand Thai languages.
Prep - http://cognisance.life/en/pages/products/health...

N'Hance - http://cognisance.life/en/pages/products/health...

Sage -  http://cognisance.life/en/pages/products/health...

 Where are the products manufactured?The products will be manufactured in Singapore, in accordance with GMP (Good Manufacturing Practice). Is any of the products FDA approved?Prep, N'Hance and Sage are dietary supplements, and are HSA (Singapore) & FDA (USA) compliant. This means that the ingredients used are considered safe within the HSA (Singapore) & FDA (USA) monograph system. Additionally, every step of the ingredients sourcing, testing, and manufacturing complies with the requirements set forth in the HSA (Singapore) & FDA (USA) regulations. Are the products available internationally?Yes! We are currently charging a flat rate of USD$5 to US$10 for international shipping during the Indiegogo campaign. How do I contact you for more questions?Email cs@cognisance.life or message us on Facebook. Can I order in bulk or be a distributor?Yes. Please email us  cs@cognisance.life

story:
Arginine and health

Arginine, an amino acid is integrally related to health and well-being. A regular intake of arginine helps you to maintain a healthy and medication-free lifestyle. In this publication series, we will focus on the main functions of arginine in the human metabolism.

Arginine, an amino acid, has been the subject of intensive medical research for more than two decades. It has also gained increasing popularity as a nutritional supplement. However, the publicly available information on arginine is often fragmented and outdated. Our goal is to publish a series of popular science publications on arginine and its health benefits. This publication series will give the reader a broader view of human metabolism and the importance of arginine in everyday life.

We warmly recommend the use of arginine as a nutritional supplement. However, in this series, we do not endorse any specific arginine products.

    Arginine and Health publication series

    • Gives a broad understanding of the importance of arginine in maintaining a healthy metabolism.
    • Based on original research as well as thousands of peer-reviewed scientific articles.
    • Basic concepts presented are easy to understand and apply in daily life.
    • Real-life examples of the effects of arginine for different target groups.
    • Common misconceptions corrected.

    The Arginine and Health series will consist the following publications:

    Part 1. Arginine - The Basics

    The first part in this series focuses on the basic facts about arginine, such as arginine as a chemical substance and the dietary sources of arginine. The authors introduce also some more advanced topics, such as the symptoms that should be regarded as warning signs of arginine deficiency, and the metabolic processes behind these symptoms.

    Part 2. Arginine and Circulation

    In the second part of the series, the authors show us why sufficient arginine levels are essential to a well-functioning cardiovascular system and to energy production in cells. These processes are viewed both at the micro and the macro level. The authors also discuss how these biochemical processes translate to a person's experience about their health and well-being.

    Part 3. Arginine and the Immune Defense

    In this part of the series the focus is on the main functions of arginine in the immune system, and the relations between arginine deficiency and different illnesses. Stress and some demanding situations in life like pregnancy or overtraining can cause arginine deficiency. Even temporary arginine deficiency lowers the efficacy of our immune system, which can lead to a vicious cycle of infections and poor health. The authors tell us how arginine helps us to avoid such problems.

    Part 4. Arginine and the Nervous System

    In the fourth part, the main topics are stress and the autonomic nervous system. The authors show how sufficient arginine levels and nitric oxide production help our bodies to cope with stress. Also, the connections between prolonged stress, arginine deficiency and various illnesses are discussed.

    Part 5. Arginine and Mitochondria

    The final part in the series takes a look at the chain of energy production in the body. The authors show that arginine has a major role at certain parts of the chain, and discuss how arginine levels affect the energy production, and conditions like type 2 diabetes. The authors also define the Arginine Deficiency Syndrome.

    Arginine and Health - The Perks

    You can order individual booklets or the complete publication series of five booklets for a special price. You can also order larger amounts (10 - 1000 pieces) of a product for a better price. The booklets will be shipped to our backers as soon as they are printed. Please see below for the estimated production schedule.

    Some of the perks are only linked to our Facebook page. Like us on Facebook to catch the best perks!

    Production and estimated shipping times

    • The publication series will be published in English during the year 2017.
    • We are raising funds to cover the expenses of translation and printing. Our goal is 9000 €.
    • The first publication Arginine - The Basics will be available as an e-book on Amazon Kindle and Google Play during March 2017.
    • Our backers on Indiegogo will be the first ones to receive the printed versions.

    The Arginine and health booklets will be shipped as soon as they are printed.

    Part 1.  Arginine - The Basics (available now also on Amazon Kindle  and Google Play)

    Part 2. Arginine and Circulation  (available now also on Amazon Kindle  and Google Play)

    Part 3. Arginine and the Immune Defense - September 2017

    Part 4. Arginine and the Nervous System - October 2017

    Part 5. Arginine and Mitochondria - December 2017

    All backers will be informed about possible delays.

    Our team

    Jyrki Penttinen, MD, is the lead scientist behind the scientific content of the series. Jyrki Penttinen has been conducting medical research on arginine since the 1990s. The publication series draws on a considerable number of internationally peer-reviewed medical research studies. Hannele Penttinen, MA, is responsible the educational aspects of the publications.

    The publisher PP Promotion Oy is a Finnish family company founded in 2011. Our family company has produced publications and education based on medical research from the year 2011. Over the years, we have published four books, an audiobook, and given over a hundred lectures on arginine for thousands of customers.

    Tell your friends about Arginine and Health

    Visit our webpage www.arginineinfo.net. You can also like and share our Facebook page Arginineinfo.net. Follow us on Twitter: Arginineinfo, #arginine #arginineinfo. Subscribe to our newsletter at www.arginineinfo.net. Some of the secret perks are revealed only in our newsletter or on our Facebook page.

    Additional information

    The Arginine and Health publication series is produced by PP Promotion Oy. There are no additional shipping costs. The Arginine and Health -booklets are shipped at the same price all over the world. Some hidden perks including books in Finnish or Swedish may include a shipping cost when shipped outside Finland or Sweden. The backer will be provided with an invoice for taxation purposes after the end of the campaign.

    All the products shipped to EU countries are subject to value addition tax. Shipments outside EU countries are tax free. Orders shipped outside of the European Union may be subject to import taxes, customs duties and fees levied by the destination country. Additional charges for customs clearance must be fulfilled by the recipient; PP Promotion Oy has no control over these charges, nor can PP Promotion Oy predict what they may be.

    The price estimate in US dollars ($USD) are estimates that are based on the exchange rates in the 10th February 2017. The actual exchange rates may vary during the campaign.

    PP Promotion Oy

    Location: Helsinki, Finland

    European VAT ID number: FI24292351

    Telephone: +358 50 448 5550

    e-mail: info@pppromotion.fi

    The company does not endorse any specific arginine products. It is not permitted to use the Arginine and Health publications, company name, logo, or other information to market any arginine products.
