story:
Introduction

Remdii is developed and has been proven to repair and revitalize skins affected by dermatitis, a skin condition that causes inflammation, itchy and dry skin commonly known as eczema. Through a thorough, extended scientific research and testing, Remdii’s group of scientists combined hard-to-find tocotrienol (Tri-E) with other bio-actives and bio-engineered it to be delivered to the inflammation area for it to work its magic; relieving symptoms of damage, irritation and dry skin as well as restoring the affected area from within.

The cream’s all natural bio-actives improve the skin’s moisture barrier and protects it from external irritants. Use this to 

  • Reduce itchiness
  • Repair damaged skin conditions 
  • Reduce flaking 
  • Seal (and heal)  the skin against moisture lost. 

Remdii has been effective in clearing 

  • eczema
  • sensitive skin
  • extremely dry skin
  • psoriarsis

 

How it all began

In 2013, Professor Lai, a bio-scientist was gifted with her first born; a baby boy. Her joy of motherhood was cut short when her barely month-old infant was diagnosed with eczema. Her quest for a remedy proved futile as she learned that none of the formulas and creams in the market were effective in penetrating the skin to repair the affected areas. In fact, most just offers temporary relief, hydrating or moisturizing the affected areas without repairing them.

Frustrated, she set out to discover her own remedy.  

 

The Results

After being in the Southeast Asian market for a year (through just word-of-mouth), we’ve had thousands of testimonies that the cream has shown significant results in reducing itchiness, flakiness and efficaciously repaired very dry skin conditions. 

One of such case is a 3-month old baby boy who had severe, weeping eczema. His mother, Zuliana; did everything she could for him to no avail. The prescribed steroid cream masked the symptoms but when the next flare up occurred, it was worse than before; scaring this mother to stop using it.  Thankfully, she was introduced to Remdii. 

Depending on the severity of each individual case and if steroid-creams have been part of the user’s routine remedial prescription, some of our users see a turnaround in as little as 2-3 weeks.

 

The Patented Formula

Remdii is effective because it is targeted to repair where it matters most, just below the skin surface; where the inflammation occurs.  Not only that, it is formulated with high anti-inflammation potency ingredients. 

  

 

A unique Vitamin E as the main ingredient

Vitamin E as we know it has an array of antioxidant benefits. But did you know there are 2 components of Vitamin E? One is tocopherol, which is the more commonly used and available vitamin E, (though most creams use the synthetic and cheaper tocopherol) while the other, tocotrienol (Tri-E) is usually present in much, much lower concentration.  Tri-E however is found to be 60 times more potent of an antioxidant. 

Remdii’s carefully sourced Vitamin E contains 3x more Tri-E. Combined with other anti-inflammatory bio-actives, Vitamin C and Pro Vitamin A, Remdii is a superior antioxidant and anti-inflammatory formulation.   

 

Engineered to penetrate the skin

One known fact about eczema is that inflammation occurs just below the skin’s epidermis, in the dermal layer. Most skin moisturizing creams, including those specific for eczema stays only on the surface of the skin. Hence eczema has been only treated with remedies to suppress  or allay the symptoms.

Remdii is bio-engineered to be near nano-delivery so that it can penetrate the epidermis layer to reach the dermis layer repairing the damaged skin at source, where it matters.

Not only does it repair from within, Remdii also seals, moisturizes, soothes itchiness and provides a protective layer on top of the skin

 

Going Forward

Remdii users have become our strong advocate, sometimes even giving up their own stock to help others that are in severe need.  When there was no stock available, Jennifer Cheong, selflessly gave up her  back-up tube that was for her son when she saw the severity of the condition in another mother's child.

So what? We want to ramp up production to spread this across the globe and help those who are distressed by this skin affliction. There are 35 million Americans suffering from eczema.   10-15% of children in the USA is afflicted with this condition. In the UK, 15 million are known to have eczema. 1 in 10 children suffers from eczema in developing countries. The numbers continue to grow yearly. We are hoping to bring this cream to the four corners of the world to help all who are suffering from this condition.

While we are not suggesting Remdii to be a replacement for corticosteroidal creams, we are offering this as an alternative to reduce the reliance and prolonged use of topical steroids.  If this is not relevant to you but you know of a friend, a relative or a colleague who is plagued with very dry, irritated, sensitive skin condition, share this with them. You will change their lives. Just like how Remdii has changed thousands of lives in its home country.

story:
Short Summary

By 2050, 2 out of 3 people won't have access to potable water.

Our project, ACH2O, was created with the concept of developing a new source of drinkable water for the planet. 

ACH2O is  a filtering system that purifies the air conditioners wastewater and makes it fit for human consumption. 

We presented this technology to companies like Panasonic Ecuador. They joined our cause and have already sold thousands of ACH20 units along with the new ACs. 

ACH20 was awarded with 5 Cannes Lions and recognised as one of the most innovative ideas in the Product Design and Innovation categories. 

Now we want to make ACH20s accessible to those who can't purchase them. 

How it Works:

The A/C's exit vent is connected to a small water pump which expulses the water and starts the purification process.

The filter is composed by active carbon that eliminates bacteria and odors; silica sand which retains solids and carbonates that stabilize PH and eliminate other microorganisms. 

This process basically turns air conditioners into water fountains inside home and public spaces that people can use to drink water from.

Our main objective its that in the course of 5 years every AC in the world becomes a source of clean water.

Our mission is to generate a new source of water for the planet.

What We Need:

  • We want to install 1000 ACH2O units for children in Ecuador. The plan is to install them across 200 schools in Guayaquil, one of the hottest cities in Ecuador.
  • We plan to raise 1 Million dollars in order to reach our goal. If we don't reach our goal, we aim to install as many ACH2O units with the amount of money raised.
  • Everytime we reach $1,000 we will be able to install one more ACH2O unit in a school.

The Impact:

  • By successfully installing  1000 ACH2Os we will be providing free potable water for  60,000 students.
  • Our plan is to install 5 ACH2Os per school, generating approximately 40,000 cups of water in each school every year. 

What You Get:

  • Every $1,000 dollars you donate, we will ship you a full functioning ACH2O unit for you to install in your home or office. (Perks will start being shipped starting Jan 1, 2016)
story_txt:
Short Summary
By 2050, 2 out of 3 people won't have access to potable water.
Our project, ACH2O, was created with the concept of developing a new source of drinkable water for the planet. 
ACH2O is  a filtering system that purifies the air conditioners wastewater and makes it fit for human consumption. We presented this technology to companies like Panasonic Ecuador. They joined our cause and have already sold thousands of ACH20 units along with the new ACs. ACH20 was awarded with 5 Cannes Lions and recognised as one of the most innovative ideas in the Product Design and Innovation categories. Now we want to make ACH20s accessible to those who can't purchase them. How it Works:

The A/C's exit vent is connected to a small water pump which expulses the water and starts the purification process.
The filter is composed by active carbon that eliminates bacteria and odors; silica sand which retains solids and carbonates that stabilize PH and eliminate other microorganisms. 
This process basically turns air conditioners into water fountains inside home and public spaces that people can use to drink water from.
Our main objective its that in the course of 5 years every AC in the world becomes a source of clean water.Our mission is to generate a new source of water for the planet.
What We Need:



We want to install 1000 ACH2O units for children in Ecuador. The plan is to install them across 200 schools in Guayaquil, one of the hottest cities in Ecuador.


We plan to raise 1 Million dollars in order to reach our goal. If we don't reach our goal, we aim to install as many ACH2O units with the amount of money raised.


Everytime we reach $1,000 we will be able to install one more ACH2O unit in a school.


The Impact:


By successfully installing  1000 ACH2Os we will be providing free potable water for  60,000 students.


Our plan is to install 5 ACH2Os per school, generating approximately 40,000 cups of water in each school every year. 


What You Get:

Every $1,000 dollars you donate, we will ship you a full functioning ACH2O unit for you to install in your home or office. (Perks will start being shipped starting Jan 1, 2016)

story:
Who I am, what I do and why my work is urgently needed on our planet

Hi, my name is Andres Pellegrini and I’m a healer, speaker and author. In 2014 I published in Switzerland the book “Heilung auf tiefster Ebene – Dem sexuellen Missbrauch ein Ende setzen”; that means in English: “Healing on the deepest level – Ending of the sexual abuse”. The book describes the healing of my own sexual trauma (I was sexually assaulted by my father, when I was a baby and a little boy) in a way that inspires and supports the reader on his own healing journey. In the movement of this book release I liquidated my household, started to travel and to do my healing work in Switzerland, Corfu, Tenerife and New Zealand.

Now's the time to work male specific! For that reason I invite in my individual sessions and groups to HEALING ON THE DEEPEST LEVEL FOR MEN – a clear and soft approach of trauma healing that puts the heart qualities in the centre, is grounded in Somatic Experiencing SE (Peter A. Levine’s trauma healing work) and nourished by the wisdom of earth mother. Through dialog and questions I invite men to reconnect with their real needs and to gently touch and explore their own healing potential.

As there’s still a gap of male specific healing approaches in the treatment of sexual trauma HEALING ON THE DEEPEST LEVEL FOR MEN is urgently needed on our planet.

With your financial support I’m able to start creating healing spaces for men all over the world.  

                             

                                              


Your money and my competence – a powerful combination!                                         

What your money allows me to do

The start-up capital of 50’000 Euro allows me to put all my energy and competence in my project until it is self-supporting. 

There is a lot of unpaid work to do, that needs a lot of time:

Advertising

I promote my work mostly on my blog and on Facebook (posts and videos on my page and in different groups as well as advertisements).

Speaking on youtube

On my youtube channel I talk about different aspects of sexual trauma and offer affected men simple healing-tools for everyday life. 

Writing  

In the posts on my blog I give men a first taste of my healing work. Beside of that I’m in the process of writing my second book “Healing on the deepest level for men – For a dignified male sexuality”.

Research

I’m on the way to transmit the deep wisdom of Somatic Experiencing SE to the physiology of male sexual function. That will help to emerge on one hand how trauma affects this level and on the other hand what kind of healing approaches are needed there. In addition I explore indigenous healing approaches that can be very valuable in the context of sexual trauma.

Networking

There are two parts of networking:

1.  I connect with healers and organisations, who work with the same issue, to build a deeper understanding of sexual healing in general and to emerge the similarities and differences between the treatments of men and women. Lately I created on FB a sharing group for healers: Male specific healing of sexual traumas - Sharing group for healers.

2.  I connect with affected men in FB groups, that already exist (for example: MenThriving – Male survivors of sexual abuse). Lately I created on FB an English and a German speaking sharing group for affected men: Healing of sexual traumas - Sharing group for affected men and Heilung von sexuellen Traumata - Austauschgruppe für betroffene Männer. Through videos from various sources I let affected men feel the enfolding of the world wide healing network. 

Organising

I organise men’s groups. Beside creating a healing space, there are a lot of practical things to do, such as finding and renting the right room, looking for accommodations, communication with the participants…

My first men’s group will take place in Corfu (GR) in summer 2016.

Travelling

For connecting with other healers/organisations and finding the right places for my men's groups I travel around the world.

What you receive for your money

Spend and choose one of the healing perks! And if you need none of the perks and just want to spent money you are very welcome to do this too, of course;-)!

What will happen with the donations, if I don’t reach the full amount?

If I don’t achieve the amount of 50’000 Euro, it will not prevent my project from going ahead, but it may not become as big as it could be; in other words: I will do what I can with the money I receive.

                                               


The benefit of our powerful combination

Sexual Healing and Earth Healing are deeply connected: if men can heal on the deepest level, our planet will heal on the deepest level. If our planet can heal, men will heal. With our powerful combination we inspire and support this precious exchange between men and our planet. And last but not least: men, who are deeply connected, are a gift for women.

                                              


Challenges & Risks

The biggest challenge in the context of my project is the feeling of shame, that often paralyses the men, who could benefit from my work. A long process of building trust is needed, before these men can step towards me. As I was myself a victim of sexual abuse in childhood and personally found a way to step out of the shame and to heal, I’m the right man for this challenge. As a so-called wounded healer I can easily establish a bridge of trust.

                           


You don’t have money? Support me in any other manner!

Share this page, my blog and my Facebook Page with friends, family and strangers via word of mouth and/or Social Media. Help me spread the word!

                                            


A little prayer in the end…

In spring 2014 I opened my hands and let fly my book. Around 100 books landed in the hands of interested people until now – mostly women and a few men. As I remember, how unexplored my path is, that men are still very afraid and ashamed in this context and that my book is just available in German, I dignify this outcome as a success. I trust that the women, I touched with my book, transmit its content in the right form to the right men – and I hope that the few men, I touched with my book, could find some healing.

Now I open my hands and let fly HEALING ON THE DEEPEST LEVEL FOR MEN into the German speaking as well as into the English speaking area. May I reach not just a few, but hundreds and thousands of affected men this time.

Please feel free to contact me for further questions or informations. 

HEARTFELT THANKS FOR YOUR TRUST AND YOUR SUPPORT.

story:
Short Summary

Hello Everyone!! My name is Sara Pickett, AKA "PIK"  . I am a certified Personal trainer, Kickboxing instructor , martial artist, and  bomb sports massage therapist!!(If I may say so myself ) I became passionate about fitness when I was 18 years old. I have always  been an athlete, however it wasn't until  I meet my Mentor Billy blanks that I found my true passion. Billy taught me not only how to fight physically, but mentally. He instilled self discipline, focus, and a persevering spirit that I have carried with my throughout my life. Back then, I never knew that fitness was going to be my calling. Now at 36 years old, my passion has become my purpose. I now have 7 years of experience as a certified Tae Bo instructor, and 18 years of experience teaching in the fitness industry. After becoming a mother 9 years ago, and starting my own brand Fit by PIK, I realized my true passion was to help women build their confidence the way Billy did mine as he literally changed my life. Helping women stay fit while raising families is very important to me because I understand the unique challenges of working mothers , and maintaining a healthy lifestyle. I have worked extremely hard these past 3 1/2 years to build the amazing team that I have while renting space out of other facilities. I have always envisioned the space that I want to someday create for my team and now that time is here! I am so excited for growth of our FBP Crew, and cannot wait to be able to provide more classes and a beautiful ambiance for all of you! The Fit by PIK Health club will  not only be a space where you can come get a incredible workout in, but a place where you can relax and recover as well. Your true go to spot. A place we can all call home. 

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail

- We need a total of 20K for the actual build out once we get the keys. This includes the spring flooring for all my kick boxers and dancers. (10K) Mirrors in each room . (estimate 2-3k) Interior and exterior paint. (trying to keep at 2k) and starting with one infrared sauna (we will have 2 eventually ) for now we are starting with the single seater for a more intimate , personalized feel. 

- We will be the only private kickboxing studio/health club all in one! FBP Heath Club is geared towards women. However , we allow men into our facility on approved applications only. All men must apply. 

-infrared saunas

-private massage room 

- showers

-changing rooms

- If we don't hit the funding goal, alll proceeds will go to bare min of the buildout . Flooring and Mirrors. 

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Your contribution Is important because it will not only help us spread love and Wellness in the NOHO district, but help me create a beautiful space for my clients. I will be able to utilize this space and create more classes that my clients have been requesting for years.
  • I definetly have a track record for going all out for my team. When you think of FBP Health Club, think of our one year anniversary party I threw at the Sixty in Beverly Hills. (for those of you who were there) Creating a peaceful  , beautiful ambiance for my team has always been my Dream. Top quality everything.. only. 
  • To be honest.. my goal was to open by summer. When I got back from Christmas vacation top of the year, I received news that I had to move my business as the current location I'm  at is moving as well. It came when I least expected, however I know at the end of the day its all happening on Gods Timing. 

Risks & Challenges

There has been a few challenges financially in getting our new facility going....

  • I was recently hacked, Meaning my bank account , email , entire life basically was hacked into . Short version.. Identity theft. The good news about me is , I was born a fighter and non of these obstacles will stop me from reaching my goals and or opening. I was BORN for this! 
  • My plan for these obstacles is simply keep pushing forward. Where theres a will, theres a way. 

Other Ways You Can Help

SHARING IS CONTRIBUTING!! 

  • LISTEN UP CREW!!  As a single parent of twin boys, I understand being financially strapped at times very much! If you are unable to contribute financially, please share our campaign all over your social , email ect. The more we get the word out, the better! WE APPRECIATE YOU! 
  • PLEASE DON'T FORGET TO USE ALL INDIGOGO SHARE TABS! 

And that's all there is to it.

It came when I least expected, however I know at the end of the day its all happening on Gods Timing. 


Risks & Challenges
There has been a few challenges financially in getting our new facility going....

I was recently hacked, Meaning my bank account , email , entire life basically was hacked into . Short version.. Identity theft. The good news about me is , I was born a fighter and non of these obstacles will stop me from reaching my goals and or opening. I was BORN for this! 
My plan for these obstacles is simply keep pushing forward. Where theres a will, theres a way. 


Other Ways You Can Help
SHARING IS CONTRIBUTING!! 

LISTEN UP CREW!!  As a single parent of twin boys, I understand being financially strapped at times very much! If you are unable to contribute financially, please share our campaign all over your social , email ect. The more we get the word out, the better! WE APPRECIATE YOU! 
PLEASE DON'T FORGET TO USE ALL INDIGOGO SHARE TABS! 

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Have no fear, the Finger is here!

 

Designed by a US Navy Medic, The Fearless Finger uses the natural anti-microbial properties of copper to reduce your exposure and worries of contaminated surfaces by 99%.

 

Save the gloves for when you REALLY need them!

 

 

 

 

Be Clean, Be Fearless!

 

Doors, elevators, pin-pads, bathrooms ...

... if they're out in public, they're dirty just the same.

 

The Fearless Finger takes away any worries:  almost all of them, in fact!

 

 

 

 

 

 

Kills Threats In Minutes

 
We crafted the Fearless Finger out of copper alloy to pack a mean, antimicrobial punch.
 
Copper and other metals that contain it are extremely unfriendly to microbes.  
How can something so benign to us be so deadly to viruses?
 
A March 2020 study found that SARS-CoV-2 began to adversely react within minutes of contact with copper, reaching zero detectable units within 4 hours.
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 

 

 

Touch It, We Dare You

 

Reclaim your freedom without the risk.

Open doors, sign your name, type in your PIN, push buttons, and more-- FEARLESSLY!

 

 

 


 
 
 
 
 

Packed Full Of Post-Pandemic Potential

 

Use the Optimistic Opener to crack open some cold ones after this all blows over.

We want the Fearless Finger to be one of the most useful tools you've ever had. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

A Fearless Future, Guaranteed

 

This keychain isn't the cheapest: for very good reasons.

The Fearless Finger is made in the USA, from start-to-finish, yet ships WORLDWIDE


Placing an order here guarantees the delivery of your Fearless Finger!

 

 

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

 

The Fearless Finger is made by Cobalt Black Machining based in Sheridan, Wyoming. 
We've been handling niche tool and parts manufacturing since 2016.

Our vision is to get The Fearless Finger out to people in heavily impacted areas around the world:

  • In order to make the Fearless Finger more affordable for everyone, we need to raise $10,000 to scale our manufacturing to meet worldwide supply needs.
  • Meeting this goal will help us reduce the cost of future runs of the Fearless Finger by up to 30%.
  • Since most manufacturers are working on ventilators and masks right now, we are one of the only companies able to produce a tool like this during the pandemic.
  • If we are unable to meet our goal, we will continue to make small batches at the most affordable rate possible. 
  • Your contribution will help us help the world!

 


We are committed to helping everyone get back to their lives again, a life without fear!

 

 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

 

Our machine shop has been very fortunate to be able to work within the CDC's social distancing guidelines and remain open during this crisis.  We have the equipment and personnel available to be able to safely meet our project goals.

We do not anticipate any difficulties in acquiring the materials for this project, however we do have backup suppliers available in case of such an event.  

Domestic and international shipping is handled in house using the US Post Office, which has been crucial in successfully transporting essentials without interruption.  

We promise to work smoothly on this project to ensure you're happy and healthy!

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Please help us spread the word about the Fearless Finger!!
  • Show this page to your family & friends-- copy & paste this link:
    https://igg.me/at/fearlessfinger
  • Seniors & the elderly will benefit the most from clean touch tools that help them live each precious day without fear


Thank you for supporting American small businesses!

If we are unable to meet our goal, we will continue to make small batches at the most affordable rate possible. 
Your contribution will help us help the world!

 
We are committed to helping everyone get back to their lives again, a life without fear!
 
 

 
 

Risks & Challenges
 
Our machine shop has been very fortunate to be able to work within the CDC's social distancing guidelines and remain open during this crisis.  We have the equipment and personnel available to be able to safely meet our project goals.
We do not anticipate any difficulties in acquiring the materials for this project, however we do have backup suppliers available in case of such an event.  
Domestic and international shipping is handled in house using the US Post Office, which has been crucial in successfully transporting essentials without interruption.  
We promise to work smoothly on this project to ensure you're happy and healthy!
